 Bil aakhir 1936 mein Sindh ko sooba Bombay se alehda kar ke aik nae sooba ka darja de diya gaya
 Sir Abdullah haroon ki koshishon aur muslim league ki markazi majlis e aamla ke tawwun se 7 se 10 October 1938 ko aik azeem ul shaan conference Karachi ke eid gaah meydan mein munaqid hui
 Jise ijlaas ke shurkaa ne kasrat raaey se manzoor kiya tha
 Pakistan ki tareekh mein Sindh muslim league ki is conference aur is mein pesh ki gai, Qarardadon ko behad aehmiyat hasil ki
 Is conference ke ineqad, is ke liye khat o kitaba, qarardadon ki tayyari aur conference ke bad aeham taqareer ki naqool tayyar kar ke Hindustan bhar ke deegar aeham sir karda musalman rehnumao ko bhijwane tak har marhaley par sir Abdullah haroon pesh pesh rahe
1939 mein Sir Abdullah Haroon Sindh Muslim League ke sadder muntakhib hue aur 1940 mein wo apni mukhlisana khidmaat ki wajah se all india muslim league ki working committee ke member chune gaey
 Yeh wo waqt tha ke jab barresagher ke Musalmano mein azaadi ke tasawurrat aam ho rahe the aur khud muslim league bhi azaadi ke is tasawwur ko “ qarardad e Pakistan ” ki soorat mein dene wali thi, chunache 23 March 1940 ko all india muslim league ke tareekhi ijlaas munaqada Lahore mein sir Abdullah haroon ne sooba e Sindh ki numaiydegi karte hue maulvi fazal ul haq ki pesh karda qarardad ki bharpor taiyd ki
Sir Abdullah Haroon jaise mukhlis aur musalmano ke mohsin ke karnamey tareekh mein mehfooz to hain lekin bad qismati se mutalla ke shauq mein kami ke sabab nae nasal in se mukammal taur par aagah nahi, chunache zarorat is amar ki hai ke tehreek e azaadi ke mujahideen ke karnamon se nae nasal ko electronic media ke zariye aagah kiya jaey, ta ke in ki afkaar ki roshni mein naujawano ko apna raasta muntakhib karne mein dushwari na ho aur un mein mulk se mohabbat ka jazba bhi beydar hua
 Hum dekhte hai ke jamhuriat ke jaali champion kisi na kisi daur mein aamriyat ke saey tale zaroor palte bharte rahe hai, siwae Jahangir Badar ke
Maroof siasatdan Sheikh Rasheed hamesha is baat ka dawa karte hai ke tamam siyasat daan GHQ ki nursery mein peida huye aur parwarish pae lekin is jumle ke sath woh aik aur jumle ka izafa kar sakte hain, “ siwae Jahangir Badar ke’’

 Unho ne Urdu mein Punjabi alfaz ka takhleeqi tor par istemaal kiya aur ek khobsurat shagufta nasar eijaad ki, jo inhe ka wasaf samjhi jati hai
 Urdu adab mein kahani likhne ke fun par Ashfaq Ahmed ko jitna aboor tha, wo kam logon ke hisse mein aya

 Ap ke walid aik ilm pasand aadmi the

 1944 mein Amritsar mein Jama ul sana hall bazaar mein jo ulom e sharqiya ki bhetareen darsgah thi wahan mahana tarhi mushairre hote the jin mein sharkat karna un ke leye bari khushi ki baat thi
 Saghar ke adabi doston mein Ameen Gilani, Latif Khalil, Zaheer Kashmiri, Ahmed Rahi aur Mirza Janbaz shamil the jab ke Sahir Ludhyanwi, Nareesh Kumar, Shad, Latif Gard Aspori ka Saghar bahad adab o ahteram karte the
 Us ki funi qabiliyat ki kise ne pazirai nahi ki
Pakistan ka lafz aik alehda Muslim watan ke liye sab se pehley Choudhry Rehmat Ali ne 1933 mein istemal kiya
Chaudhry Rehmat Ali  ne 28 January 1933 ko “Ab Ya Kabhi Nahi”(Now Or Never) ke naam se aik ketabcha shaya kiya jis mein na sirf aik alehda Muslim Watan ke qayam ki tajweej pesh ki gaye balkey majuza Muslim watan ko Pakiktan ke naam se mousom kiya gaya
Chaudhry Rehmat Ali nay apni tajweej mein Punjab sey “P” suba Sarhad key Afghanon sey “A” Kashmir sey “K” Sindh sey “S” aur Balochistan sey “Tan” ley ker unko apas mein       jor ker “Pakistan” banay
 Iss ke baad ye lafz taizi se maqbol hota chala gaya
 Hindustan ke mukhtalif alaqon mein na sirf Pakistan ke naam se tanzemein qaim huein balke “Pakistan” ke naam se akhbarat o jaraed bhi jari kiya gaya
pehla resala 1933 mein Chaudhry Rehmat Ali ne Cambridge ( Britania) sey jari kiya jo Pakistan Qaumi Movement ka terjuman tha
Hindustan mein haft Roza “Pakistan” June 1936 mein Abbottabad Soba Sarhad sey nikla jis key editor Syed Ghulam Hussain Shah Kazmi they
1937 mein Punjab key Maulvi Ibrahim Ali Chushti ney “Tehreek e khilafat Pakistan” shuru ki aur iss hawaley sey aik skeem pesh ki
 7 Augusst 1937 ki Nawab Ahmed Yar Khan Daultana ney apney aik mazmon mein ye  kiyal zahir keya key Congress ki policies ka natija yaqinan Pakistan ki sorat mein baramed hoga
Pakistan key nam sey dosra resala Qanoon saz Assembly key rukun aur maroof sahafi o shayar Maulana Farooq Dewa Gorakhpuri (professor Majnun Gorakhpuri key walid) ney January 1939 mein Lakhnow sey jari kiya ye bhi haft roza tha
" Iss mein Maulvi Mohammed Farooq Dewana Gorakhpuri ney ba hasiat Sadar taqrer kertey huye Choudhary Rehmat Ali ki skeem per roshni dali aur unki taqreer key dauran samayein barabar ""Pakistan Zindabad"" key narey buland kartey rahey"
Islam den e fitrat hai jis mein ese zawabit paye jate hain jo insani mizaj aur zaroriyat ke aan mutabiq hain
Islam khatoon ki izat aur toqeer ka dars deta hai
Isi fitri zarorat ke pesh e nazar Islam khatoon ki izat o ahteram ki taked karta hai
Kyun ke ye Hawa ki beti ka mamla hai, imtiaz ka nahi, niswani nazakat aur hifz e maratib pesh e nazar hai kuch aur nahi
Har musalman ko is baat par kamil iman rakhna chaheye ke islam insani hoqoq ka alam badar aur mashi aur samaji masawat ka dai hai
Islam masher ke tamam afrad ke hoqoq ki zamanat deta hai aur kisi fard ya giroh ya jins ki bunyad par imtiaz Islam ki roh ke khilaf hai
Ye din khawateen ke hoqoq ki jid o jehad ki yad delata hai
Phir 1908 mein America ki socialist party ne khawateen (women) ke masail hal karne ke leye Women National Commission banaya, jis ne khawateen (women)  ke almi din ke leye sifarishat mauratab kein, ta ke khawateen (women)  ke haq e ray dahi ke leye aik munazam muhim ka aghaz kiya jaye
Social democratic woman society ne 8 March 1908 ko New York mein khawateen ke hoqoq ke leye aik ijlas munaqed kiya, jis ke nateje mein American socialist community ne 1909 mein February ke akhiri hafte mein khawateen ka alami din manane ka elan kar deya
Socialist khawateen ne 1909 aur 1910 mein khawateen ke aki ijlas munaqid kiye aur women national commission ne 1910 mein socialist national congress ko sifarish pesh ki ke February ke akhiri itwar (Sunday) ko khawateen (women)  ka almi din qarar deya jaye
Phir August 1910 mein Copan Hagan mein socialist conference munaqid ki gayi jis mein tajwiz de gayi ke is din ko almi satah par bhi khawateen ka din qarar diya jaye
Conference ke doran ye tajwiz manzor kar li gai aur is tarah khawateen ka almi din wajod mein agaya
1917 mein Russia ki khawateen ne apne hoqoq  manwane ke leye gharon aur factoryon se sarkon par akar aik pur josh muzahira kiya
Is tarikhi waqeye ne khawateen ki duniya badal di
Is muzahire ke bad peter grad mein hartaal hoi aur khawateen (women) ka ye ahtejaj is had tak phel gaya ke aik hafte ke andar Zar Nicolas dom medan chor kar bhagne par majbor ho gaya
Almi satah par rosi khawateen ki is jurat ko saraha gaya aur Russia mein 8 March ko khawateen ka din qarar de diya gaya
1960 ki dehai ke akhir mein khawateen ki tehrikon mein aik naya ubhar aaya to 8 March ko almi yom e khawateen ke tor par manane ka mutalba aik pur zor tehrik ki shakal mein samne aaya aur socialist mumalik ke sath un mimalik mein bhi 8 March ko khawateen ke din ke tor par manaya jane lag ajahan  ye din dosri tarikon ko manaya jata tha
Shuru mein socialist paas e manzar ke bais America ki taraf se is tajwiz ki mukhalfat ki jati rahi, tahum 1981  mein wahan bhi 8 March ko khawateen ka din tasleem kar leya gaya
1975 se 1995 tak khawateen ki char (4) almi conferences munaqid hoein, jin ka maqsad duniya bhar ki khawateen ki numaindagan ko aik plate form par akhatta kar ke un ke masail ki nishan dahi karna tha
In conferences mein khawateen ke infaradi masailse le kar almi satah tak ke masail par tafsil se giftogo ki gai, aur sifarishat par mushtamil elamiye bhi jari keye gaye
Ye naya musawida e qanon mustaqbil mein Pakistan mein khatoon ke muqam aur hoqoq ke taiyon mein bunyadi ahmiyat ka hamil hia
Duniya ke har mullk mein aain ki bunyadi amarat insani hoqoq par khari hoti hai
In mein sheriyon ko khush haali, azadi, masawat, izzat e nafas jise bunyadi hoqoq shamil hain
Riyasat is dastawez ke zarye is baat ko tasleem karti hai ye wo har qemat par sheriyon ko ye hoqoq faraham kare gi aur in hoqoq par amal dar aamad ko yaqeni banane ke leye har mumkin iqdamat kare gi
khawateen ke hoqoq ki jab baat aati hai to 8 March ka din is hawale se khasi ahmiyat ikhteyar kar jata hai ke har saal is din pori duniya mein is haqeqat ko tasleem kiya jata hai ye khawateen ke hoqoq bhi insani hoqoq hain aur ye ke mashi aur mashrati taraqi sanfi masawat ke baghair mumkin nahi
8 March ko agar khawateen ko un ke hoqoq dene ki baat hoti hai to har satah par is azam ka izhar bhi zarori hai ke bahesiyat insan khatoon ko izat aur masawi hesiyat dena ho gi,khatoon ke khilaf hone wali istehsaal aur har shakal ke tashdud ko jar se ukharna ho ga
Khatoon par har kisi ka tashadud  khatam karne ke leye sirf qawanin bana dena hi kafi nahi, balke unhen behtar banana aur un par baqaidah amal dar aamad ko yaqini bana bhi zarori hai
8 March ka din mehaz taqarir karne ka din nahi balke ye din duniya bhar mein khawateen ke hoqoq ki bahali ka din hai
Aham baat ye bhi hai ke apne hoqoq ke hosol aur tahafuz ke leye mardon ki taraf dekhne ke bajaye khawateen ko khud bhi aik dosre ke hoqoq ka tahafuz karna ho ga
Usi zamane mein behtaren mazmon lekhne par lord lanes down se tamgha hasil kiya
Sir Syed ki dor andesh nigahon ne Molvi Abdul Haq mein wo sab kuch pa leya jise wo dekhna chahate the
Un ki zindagi ka baqi hissa Urdu ki farogh aur is ki tarwij ke leye makhsos raha, is leye quom ne unhen Baba e Urdu ke naam se nawaza
Baba e Mlolvi Abdul Haq ne Urdu zaban ki esi khidmat injam di jis ki missal dosri zaban ki tarikh mein nahi milti
Baba e Urdu Molvi Abdul Haq mahir e Lesaniyat the aur tehqiq o tanqed ke mahir bhi
Unhon ne lughat aur tarikh zaban tartib de
Unhon ne Karachi mein urdu College ki bunyad rakhi aur aik team bana kar is ke mansobe ko amli jama pehnate rahe
Un ki khuwahish rahi ke apni zindagi mein Urdu College ki bunyad rakh den magar qudrat ko ye manzor na tha lekin aaj hum dekh rahe hain ke Urdu University qayam ho chuki hai aur apna kaam jari rakhe howe hai
Tadbar koshish aur mehnat ko faraiz aur wajebat ka darja dete the
Baba e Urdu mutale, mushahide aue mukalme ke adi the
Mutale ki adat un ki zindagi ka juz thi
Tamam zindagi ke mushahidat ko unhon ne yak jan kiya aur quom ke mutale ke leye unhen chor deya
Akhbarat, risale aur tarikh par unki gehri nigah thi
Sidq aur nigar dilchaspi se parhte the
Jab parhte parhte thak jate to ehbab se parhwa kar sunte
Parhne ke bhi uqat the aur likhne ke bhi, un ki adat thi ke wo mazmon ko aik hi nashist mein pora lekhte
Anuman e taraqi e Urdu ki bunyad 1902 mein Dehli mein rakhi gai jis ke phele muhtamim e aala Molana Shibli Nomani the, jo Hyderabad mein beth kar anjuman ke intazamat dekhte the
Us waqat anjuman e traqi e Urdu ke liye Molvi Abdul Haq lazim o malzom the
Un ka naam Abdul Haq tha aur anjuman ka naam taraqi e Urdu
Molvi sahib ne apni rkar guzari se anjuman ko Hindustan ki bawaqar anjuman bana deya
Anjuman ka sab se shandar kaam qadem Dakni adab aur shura e Urdu ke tazkiron ki  ashat hai
Mukhtalif ulom ke tarajum tasanif, talifat, nisabi kutub aur angrezi Urdu lughat ki tadwene se karname hain jo tarikh aur Urdu ki kitab (books) mein hamesha jagmagate rahein ge
Widya mandir scheme ke muhaz par anjuman taraqi e Urdu ki yalgharon aur fatohat ki fehrist bari tawil hai aur ye sirf aik hi mard e mujahid ka kaam hai jise hum Baba e Urdu ke naam se yad karte hain
Molvi Adul Haq hama jehat shakhsiyat aur apni zatmein aik aik anjuman the
Urdu ke leye apni khidmat ke sile mein unhon ne Baba e Urdu ka khitab paya
Wo aik mumtaz nasar nigar, muhaqiq, mahir e talem aur mutazim the
Unhon ne nasar nigari mein sir Syed aur Hali donon ke asrat shamil keye aur un jesa hi aslob ikhteyar kiya wo Sir Syed ki tehriron se ziyadah mutasir howe  is leye unhon ne sadgi aur salasat ke bawajud Sir Syed ki tehrir ki shagutagi ko pesh e nazar rakha aur Hali jesi rokhi pheki tehrir lekhne se gurez kiya albata un ki nasar mein kush tabi aur sanjidgi ka aik haseen tawazun paya jata hai
Un ki tehriron mein besakhtagi aur rawani hai
Is leye kuch hazrat ke nazdek un ki tehrirein mazamin ke bajaye taqrir kehlane ki mustahiq hain
Basakhtagi aur rawani ne Molvi sahib ki tehriron mein bari dilkashi aur ranai peda kar di hai
Wo apni rawani tehrir mein qari ko bhi apne sath baha kar le jate hain
Unhon ne bila zarorat adaq zaban aur angrezi alfaz lekhne se gurez kiya
Unhon ne hindi zaban ke subuk alfaz bhi istemal kiye jin se un ki nasar mein aik ajeeb se chashni peda ho gai
Un ki tehriron mein ba payan khulos paya jata hai
Un ki tehrir parh kar yun mehsos hota hai ka is ke alfaz moye qalam se nahi balke dil se nikle hon
Isi sachai aur khulos ne Molvi Abdul Haq ko shurat e aam aur baqa e dawam ata kiya
Molvi Abdul Haq aik kamyab marqa nigar aur sawanah nawis hain
Un ke tamam marqaat sachai aur ghair janibdari se ebarat hain
Unhon ne jin afrad ki sawanah tehrir ki ya un ki shakhsiyat par izhar e khayal kiya un ki serat ke tama m pheloon par seer hasil behas ki phir sab se bari baat ye hai ke aam tor par bashtar marqa nigar ke bajaye apni zaat ko numaya karna chahate hain , wo us ke aur apne zati taliqat ke hawale se ese waqeyat samne late hain jin mein un ki shakhsiyat bar bar numaya ho kar ati hai
Taham Baba e Urdu ki marqa nigari is saqam se pak hai
Wo apne qalm ko us ki shakhsiyat ki serat tak mehdod rakhte hain jis ka khaka tehrir kiya ja raha hai ya sawanah likhi ja rahi hai
Taham agar kabhi musanif ki shakhsiyat jhalakti hai to is ka aks bara e naam hota hai jo aik chand jumlon ya aik  adha paragraph tak mehdod rehta hai
Unhon ne sirf marof aur aham shakhsiyat hi par qalm nahi uthaya balke Naam Dev Mali aur Noor Khan jese aam admiyon ke khake bhi likhe kyun ke Molvi Abdul Haq k na sirf phol hi mein aan nazar nahi ati wo to kante menbhi aik shan dekh kar mutasir ho jate hain
Molvi Abdul Haq ka sab se bara karnama ye hai ke unhon ne Urdu ke qadem sarmaye nazam o nasar ko daryaft karne aur is ka tahfuz karne ke silsile mein baqaidah aik tehrik chalai
Is tehrik ke natije mein Molvi sahib ki infiradi koshihson se Urdu ke naamwar qadem shura aur nasar nigaron ke nadir o nayab tazkare, qalmi kutub aur majmoi kalam dastiyab howe
Nizami ki qadem masnoiyon, Phol bin Nashati ki razm aama aur Molla Wajhi ki dastan sab ras ki daryaft Molvi sahib ki sai musalsal se hi mumkin ho saki
Molvi sahib ne qadem mehzotaat mein baqidah tehkik ki, un par tabsare kiye, unhen shaya karaya, is koshishs ki badolat bashumar mehzotaat zewar e taba se arasta ho kar ehl e  elm ke samne aye
Urdu College ka qayam Molvi Abdul Haq ka aik aur azeem karnama hai
Is Coolege mein fanon, qanon, science aur tejarat ki teleem Urdu mein hi de jati hai
Is College mein MA, MSC aur LLM ki taleem bhi de jati hai jin ka zarya e taleem Urdu hai
Molvi Abdul Haq ne Urdu ko Pakistan ki qaumi zanban banane ke silsile mein zabardast jid o jehad ki
Unhon ne na sirf apni taqriron aur tehriron ke zarye qaumi renumaon aur hukam ko mutawajah kiya balke 1951 mein unhon ne Urdu ke haq mein aik shandar awami jaloos nikala jis ke shurka ki tadad aik lakh se zaid thi
In hi koshishon ka samar ye tha ke 1956 ke dastor mein Urdu ko bahesiyat qaumi zaban ke taslim kar leya gaya
Molvi sahib ne anjuman e taraqi e Urdu ke zer e ahtemam do adad ilmi aur adbi jaraid, Urdu aur qaumi zaban bhi jari kiye
In jaraid mein anjuman ke maqasid ki tashher ke elawa mayari elmi aur adbi mazamin, shura ka mayari kalam aur elaqai zabanon ke mazamin aur afsanon ke tarajum bhi shaya kiye jate hain
Molvi Abdul Haq  ne aik mustanad aur mayari angrezi Urdu lughat bhi tarteb di
Unhon ne beshumar mutaradifat bhi ejad kiye
Molvi Abdul Haq ki koshishon se Karachi mein anjuman e taraqi e Urdu ka aik jaded chapa khana anjuman press ke naam se qaim howa
Is press ke qayam ki badolat anjuman ke leye apni kutub ki ashat mein bohat asaniyan peda ho gaein
Anjuman ke apne risale Urdu aur Qaumi zaban esi press mein shaya howe
Jinho ne film se apne career ka aaghaz kia aur in dino Tv ka hot star samjha jata hai
Guzishta do teen salon mein in ke kuch serials be had maqbool aur kamiyab hue hain
Haal he mein Ahsan Khan se aik ittefaqiya mulaqat mein kuch batein hui, jin ka aehwal pesh e khidmat hai
Film mein kaam karte hue hum pori tarha azaad hote hain aur khul kar apne jazbaat ka izhar karte hain
Main ne ab Tvko mustaqil taur par apna lia hai, yahan jitney ache roles kar raha hon, wo meri zehni taskeen ke liye kafi hain
Phir muaawza bhi thek thak milta hai
Is se zindagi ki garhi achi chal rahi hai
Yahan bohat mutmaiyn hon
Meri dua hai ke hamari films pehle ki tarha nazreen ke dilon mein apna maqam bana len
Agar films mein ache roles ki offer hui to waqtan fawaqtan in mein kaam karta rahonga
Main ne kae serials mein negative roles bhi play kiye hain aur in ka acha response mila
Is tarha mujhe kaam karne mein maza aaega aur logon ko bhi nea pan ka aehsaas hoga
Mere liye yeh bohat barha aezaaz tha ke film industry ke be misaal aur ba kamala hero ka role karon

Mujhay iska print bohat pasand aya, bohat nafees aur khubsurat print hai. Kurit kay sath tasweer mein dekhaya black trouser bhi add karna chaye ismein. 
Ye kurti bari achi hai iska print mujhay acha laga aur pehnney mein bhi comfortable hai. Aaj kal kay mausam kay hisab sey color aur kapra dono suitable hai.
behtreen.. jesi yeh shirts yahan dikhai gai hain mjhe bilkul wohi receive hui hain. na color mein koi difference hai na hi iske material me.. aur mjhe bohat pasand ai hain, size aur fitting b accurate thi bilkul aur inki quality se main kafi khush aur mutmaeen hoon.
Bohot acha tha maine yeh apni liye mangwai thi or mujhe sai lageen bus masla yeh tha ke meine medium mangwai thi laken mere paas large deliver hui laken maine rakh li phir bhi. Acha quality tha or defect bhi nahi thay bus red thora saturated tha baaki saet tha
T-shirt kaafi achi thi aur experience iss dafah kaafi acha raha hai mera aur koi bhi shikayat nahi hai iss se kyunke jaisi maine ye picture mai dekhi thi, ye bilkul waisay he thi aur mjhe fitting mai bhi bilkul sahi hai aur iska stuff bhi kaafi acha hai aur color bhi acha hai.
Meine daraz.pk se or bhi products mangwaye hain kuch achay hotay hain or kuch nahi. Khair ye tshirt achi hai pehn kar achi lagti hai laken kaafi mota kapra hai garmiyon mein pehnne laiq nahi hai laken wese aap kahin pehn ke bhi chalay jao toh achi lagti hai main isay jeans par pehnta hun arms ke paas se bohot achi fitting hai iski. V neck thora stylish lagta hai or price ke hisaab se mein kahunga ke yeh achi ha.
Achi tshirts thi asal mein meine apnay bachay ke liye mangwayi thi or who bhot khush hai kyunke who ek football ke players ka fan hai or who yehi pehnkar ghoomte rehta hai. Uske ilawa stuff bohot acha hai in tshirts ka toh is price mein bohot achi cheez hai yeh mein sabko recommend karna chahungi ye tshirts

Yay mobile bhtreen hay
Black mein prime plus, puranay walay prime ki yaad dilata hai, lekin shukar hai kay features behtar hain ussay. 8MP camera ka result din aur raat dono mein bohat acha hai. Iski wifi ki speed aur behtar hai, aur phone pehlay se zyada responsive hai 
acha phone hai, heatup hota hai thora and charge slow hota hai. but over all perfect device in price range.
itna pyara phone hai yeh main iski performance se bohat mutameen hoon , dikhne mein itna acha hai aur fast b hai .. camera iska bohat hi ziada acha hai . hang bilkul nahi hota na heat up horaha hai ab tak k istemal mein, umeed karta hon agay b aise hi chalega :)
Acha phone hai bettry bhi achi hai look zabardast hai
Phone tou no doubt bohat smart hai, looks mein bhee pyara aur qeemat mein bhee bohat zyada nai hai, tou aik achi choice hai kharedari ki. Is ka camera price kay hisab se bohat acha hai, light mein ya dark mein, picture quality bohat achee aatee hai, aur battery bhee lagbag aik din poora nikla letee hai. System ka istemal bhee mezay ka hai, android OS chalanay mein koi masla nai karta, lekin 1 GB ram honay ki waja se kabhi kabar mushkilat paish aatay hain. Jaisay mein social media bohat use karta hoon tou saray caches ram pe bhari parh jatay hain aur ram perform nai kartee, phone lag hona shuruh krdetee hai. Kbahi contacts mein scroll kartay waqt phone hang hojata hai aur number dial krne kay 30 seconds baad pata chalta hai kay call lag gayee hai ya nai, jab kay phone bohat lag krta hai. Lekin lagging kay elawa, budget mien yeh phone bohat acha hai, nbas mein yehee recommend karoonga kay iskay naye model mein ram ki behtari karein. 1GB ab kaun use karta hai? :P

Shakra ki Maa yeh Boli,,,Mujh ko Beti ke liye Barr chahiye…“ Zia Mohyeddin Show ” ke ilawa inho ne PTV par Payal, Zia Mohyeddin ke Sath, Chacha Chakkan, Drama Markhem, aur bohat se anfaradi noiyat ke programs mein bhi apni salahiyaton ke johar dikhlae
Zia Mohyeddin aaj bhi khoob se khoob turki talaash mein hain
Yeh bilkul achotey aur intehai meyari qisam ke programs ka silsila hai
Jab audience aik artist ko apne saamne stage par tann tanha… Urdu aur English adab ke shey paron ko parhte hue sunte hain to in par kaif o masti ka aisa aalam taari ho jata hai Jis ki lazzat se wo pehle na aashna the
One Man Show ka yeh silsila Zia Mohyeddin in ki khobsurat tajseem o tehzeeb mein khas malika rakhte hain
Wo ashaar ke ilawa lafzon aur jumlon ko bhi is qadar pur kashish bana dete hain ke audience mashoor hue jate hain
Yehi wajah hai ke in ka intekhab is qadar jama hota hai ke shaiyqeen ussh ussh kar uthte hain
In ka muntakhib karda kalaam samaton ke zariye audience ke adraak o shaoor ki gehraiyon mein apni tamam tar maeyne aafrini ke sath utarta chala jata hai
Zia Mohyeddin apne tarz takhatub aur andaaz e takallum ke zariye audience ki rooh mein boond boond taazgi aur farhat columns bikherte hain aur mehfil par sakoot taari ho jata hai, tab aisa lagta hai ke jaise un ki baat apne hadaff tak pohanch gai aur yehi takmeel aarzoo ki ghari hai

Maroof actress model Mathira ne 2014 mien apni all rounder performance se showbiz ke mukhtalif shobon par raaj karne ka aelaan kar diya
Aik taraf to Mathira film aur Tv mien acting ke johar dikhaeyngi, jab ke mezbani ke sath sath mauseeqi ki duniya bhi apni salahiyaten mutarif karwaengi
Mathira ne singing ki duniya mien qadam rakhte hue kuch geet record kar liye hain
Jab ke in ki video mukammal hote he aik ranga rang launching taqreeb ka ineqaad bhi kiya jaega
Is hawale se Mathira ne bataya ke Pakistan he nahi Indai mien bhi kuch project sign kiye hain
Jis ki wajah se rawa’n baras mien mukhtalif andaaz ke sath choti aur barhi screen par jalwagar hoti rahongi
Is ke liye main ne aik behtareen composition wale geet ko record kiya hai aur ab is geet ka video bhi banaya jaega
Inho ne kaha ke main janti hon ke music aik mushkil kaam hai aur is ke liye music ki samajh bojh hona bohat zarori hai
Main music ko samajhti hon aur jin logon ne meri awaaz sun rakhi hai wo jante hain ke main acha gaa sakti hon
Isi liye main ne acting, modeling aur hosting ke baad singing ke shobey mien qadam rakha hai
Yeh mere chahne walon ke liye surprise ho ga, magar mujhe umeed hai ke jab wo mera geet sunege to use khob enjoy karenge
Urdu zuban mien record kiye jane wale geet mien nachne aur jhomne ke liye hum ne original saaz istemal kiye hain
Jahan tak geet ke video ka talluq hai to us ko jadeed technology ke sath shoot kiya jaega, ta ke mera geet sirf Pakistani channels par he nahi, bal keg her mulki music channels se bhi on ear ho sake
Aik sawal ke jawab mien Mathira ne bataya ke main all rounder rahon aur bataur all rounder acting, modeling, hosting aur singing jari rahegi
Is liye mujhe jo bhi kaam acha lagta hai, main zaroor kar rahi hon, lekin film ka naam apne role aur film ki kahani ke barey mien kuch nahi bata sakti
Kyun ke main ne yeh iradah kiya hai ke 2014 mien apne chahne walon ke sath sath mukhalfeen ko bhi surprise don to is le liye sab ko sabar karna ho ga
Lekin is se mujhe koi farq nahi parhta
Mera focus apne kaam ki taraf hai
Jis ko jari rakhongi
Main ne apne kaam ke hawale se rawa’n baras ke liye jo schedule tarteeb diya hai Is mien film, TV aur music ke ilawa beron mumalik programs mein performance bhi shamil hai
Is liye yeh saal meri kamiyabiyon aur career mien nae direction ka saal hai
Mathira ne aik sawal ke jawab mien bataya ke fashion industry ke liye bohat se projects sign kiye hain
Fashion shows mien cat walk to nahi lekin Tv commercials aur photo shoot ke projects mien kaam karongi
Bohat se Multinational brands ne is silsila mien apni products ki tasheer ke liye sign kiya hai
Jis ke liye Malaysia mien bhi kuch photo shoot kiye jaenge
Inho ne kaha ke hamare mulk mien private productions ke banner taley bohat se ache drama banae ja rahe hain
Is liye ab aane wale nae dramas mien, main baqaiyda kuch sanjeeda roles mien dikhai dongi
Wo dekh saken ke main sanjeeda kaam karne ki aehal hon aur ab in ko mere kaam ke zariye he behtar jawab milega
Lollywood Actress Resham ka kehna hai ke baaz actresses meri kamiyabiyon se hasad karti hain lekin mujhe in ki qatai koi parwah nahi hai
Main naik niyati se apne kaam par tawajja markooz kiye hue hon aur is ka mujhe phal bhi mil raha hai
Yeh sirf ALLAH PAK ki zaat hai jo zarre ko aaftab bana deta hai
Main apne tamam fankar sathiyon ki izzat karti hon aur in ki shandar performance par in ko mubarakbad deti hon
Geo aur Jeene do mera falsafa hai aur agar hum is par karband ho jaey to is mulk ke masaiyl barhi had tak kam ho sakte hain
Actress Laila aur Nirma ne showbiz mien in hone ke liye koshishen tez kar di
Pakistan film producers association se films ke naam registered karne se qabal is ko behtar karne ke liye mulaqat karongi
Film industry ki bahali ke liye hukomat se madad mangne ke bajae humen apni madad aap ke tehat film banani chahiye
Fankar bila muaawza kaam karen aur film ki release ke bad apne muaawze wasool karen
Zeba Begum ne guzishta roze apni rehaiyshgaah par Karachi ki film and Tv journalist association aur Lahore ki cultural journalist foundation ke wafood se mulaqat ke dauran bataya ke apni zimmedari ko imandari ke sath nibhaongi
Past mien film industry ka mahaul bohat acha tha aur is ko behtar rakhne ke liye hum sab fankar mil kar koshish karte the
Abhi bhi is ko behtar kiya ja sakta hai
Main ne past mien jo kaam kiya wo logon ko aaj tak yaad hai
Inho ne kaha ke hamare mulk mien naujawano ne filmsazi ke shobey mien qadam rakha hai aur wo bohat acha kaam kar rahe hain
Adakara Meera ko hospital ki tamer ke leye teen aekar arazi ki farahmi ki dastawez par dastakhat kar deye gaye
Meera ko hospital ki tamer ke leye ye arazi Sialkot ki siyasi shakhsiyat Naeem Ghuman ne faraham ki hai
Press culb mein pur hujom press conference mein Meera aur Naeem Ghuman ne dastawez par dastakhat kiye
Kisi interview ya guftugo ka aik aurbarha aeham nukta yeh hota hai ek maizbaan… Mehmaan ko apni baat kehne ka ziyada se ziyada mauqa de
Zia Mohyeddin chunke tarbiyat yafta broadcaster hain aur bairoon mulk radio aur television ka wasee tajurba rakhte hain, lehaza wo in usoolon se bakhubi waqif hain, is liye inho ne hamesha apne mehmano ko markazi aehmiyat di
Razia Sheer Khan: Bilkul aik ache trainer ke sath sath ache nutritionist ki bari ahamiyat hai
 zahir hai ke aik balance diet aap ki karkardagi ko aage barhane mein mawin sabit hoti hai
 is mein protein ka imtezaj aur pani ka istemal bari ahamiyat ka hamil hota hai
Question: Apni karkardagi ko behtar banane ke leye rozana kitne ghante practice karti hain?
Unhen hukumat ki janib se har tarah ki support hasil hoti hai
yahan ke athletes job karne ke elawa zindagi ki tamam mushkilat bardasht karne ke sath sath kheelne ke leye waqat nikalte hain aur mulk ke leye bohat kuch karne ka jazba rkhte hain
 Main aik baat zaroro kahon gi ke in tamam mushkilat ke bawajod Pakistan mein talent ki koi kami nahi hai
agar tartan track achi ho gi to aap ki training aur practice ka mayar bhi acha ho ga,
achi tartan track par training ke doran aap enjoy karte hain,
aap ko is mein bounce milta hai jis se karkardgi behtar bannane mein madad milti hai
Question: Aik athlete ko apni karkadgi behtar banane ke leye ache joggers (jote) kitana aham kirdar ada karte hain?
Razia Sheer Khan: Haqiqat to ye hai ke mayari joggers mehange to hote hain lekin in ka balance bohat acha hota hai jo aap ki karkadagi ko na sirf behtar karta hai balke aap bohat acha mehsos karte hain
Ye baat bilkul sahi hai ke mayari joggers majmoi karkardagi ko behtar banane mein dosri cheizon ke sath sath aham kirdar ada karte hain
Question: Pakistan ki kis athlete khatoon se sab se ziyadah mutasir hain?
Razia Sheer Khan: Main Pakistan ki international athlete Shazia Khan se bohat mutasir hun
main ne jab quomi satah par ibteda ki to na sirf main ne un ko ideal banaya balke un se training bhi li
 Ye ibteda mein un ki training ka hi natija tha ke mujhe un se bohat kuch sekhne ka moqa mila aur apni karkardagi ko behtar banane mein kamyab rahi
 Is se phele Snidh games par nazaren hain jis mein aik martaba phir apni sabiqa achi karkardagi ko dohrana chahon gi
 Mujhe is baat ki khushi hai ke main ne 2013 ke games mein infaradi tor par sab se ziyadah 8 gold medals leye the, jo aik record hai
 main chahon gi ke is record ko mazid behtar banao
Razia Sheer Khan: Abhi to mereghar walon ne mujhe har tarh ka support kiya hai
main samajti hunk e karkardagi ko behtar banane aur tasasul ko qaim rakhne ke leye achi mulazimat ki bari ahamiyat hai
Mohibullah ne 3 mertaba British open ke final mein pahonche magar teeno mertaba woh Azam Khan ke vhaton shikast sey do char ho gae final mein bhi unhon ne bahot zaberdast khail ka mozahra keya megar un ke mamoon ne apne tajurbe sey faida uthate hue bazi jeet li
 Akhir kar British open title Mohibullah ke hisse mein 1962 mein aya yeh sabit qadmi ki fatah thi unki mehnat rang lai aur qismat neb hi un ka khoob sath deya
woh ibtedai round ke matches mein behtareen kar kerdagi ka mozahra kerke final mein pahonche they
1964 mein Mohibullah ne apne bare mein apne mamoon Hashim Khan ko do bare tournament ke final mein shikast di pehle unhon ne US open jeeta aur phir candian open 
 1964 mein Mohibullah ko America mein koching ka moqa bhi mila Boston mein qaim Harrods club ne Mohibullah Khan ko professional coach moqarar kiya tha
Many times, he has elected President of the World Squash Federation
Squash ki Duniya key leyea bea taj Badsha aur tareekh key behtareen khelari Jahangir Khan 10 December 1963 key roze Karachi mein paida huae
 Jahangir Khan na Squash ke maidan mein Pakistan ka nam roshan kei
Iss ke baad Jhangir Khan ke walid Roshan Khan aur bhai Torsam Khan kamyabian hasil kein te rahe
App ney pehli kamiabi September 1979 mein 16 sal ki umer mein gair peasha wer khelaryon ki almi chapion ship jeet ker hasil ki 
iss waqae ney Jhangir Khan ki nafsiat par ghara aser dala unhon ney shabana roz terbiat aur sakht mehnet ka silsila shuru ker dea aur apney kazen Rehmat Khan ki cotching mein aisey khelari baney key sirf 17 sal ki umer mein unhon ney Australia key Jeef HFunt ko shikasht dea ker world open jeet lea
Yahan sey Jahangir Khan ki kamyabeon key silseley ka agaz hua aur moselsel 5 sal tek who na qabil e shishat rahtey huae kamyabeon par kamyabian hasil ker tey gae 
unhon ney sarehy panch saw sey zaid moqablon mein mosalsel kamyabi hasil ker key aisa record qaiem kea jisey shaed aenda koi na tor sekey 
1982 mein Jhangir Khan ney aik point bhi beggar Inter national Squash plears asosi ashion ki champion ship jeet ker aik dunya ko warta hairet mein dal dea
yehan bhi Jahangir Khan ney apna loha manwaya aur 13 tournaments mein sey 12 mein kamyabi hasil ki 
Amrica key saf e aual key khaelari Mark Talboot sey iss dauran inn ka 13 moqabla hua aur inn mein sey 12 mertaba Jahangir Khan ney kabyabi hasil ki
ibtedai moqablon mein Jahangir Khan ko kamyabi hasil hue lakin bad azan Jan Sher Khan ney mosalsel 9 moqablon meinun key khelaf kamyabi hasil ki
 Jahangir Khan key khelaf kamyabi ka iss sey behter record aur kisi khelari ka nahin
 Retired honey sey pehley unhon ney mosalsel 10 bar yea ejaz hasil kea jo aik record hay
app ki kamyabeon key eteraf mein app ko sadarti temgha barae husn karkerdagi sey nawaza gea aur Canada key aik adarey ney un ki zindagi par “Fatha” nami aik film bhi taiyar ki 
iss key elawa almi sitah par unhein bea shumar deegar azazat sey nawaza gea woh kae mertaba almi Squash Fedreation key Sadar bhi muntakhib ho chukey hain
Boom boom Afridi mountains ke shehzade aur cricket ground mein sixers ka badshah…
 Jarihana andaaz se khelne wale khiladi to duniya mein beshumar hain, magar Afridi ki baat he kuch aur hai
Kuch log to yahan tak kehte hain ke cricket ki duniya ne in jaise mizaaj ka khiladi na dekha hai aur na shayad aaiynda dekh paaenge
 In ke bare mein yeh kehna ke wo jarihana style ke all rounder hain
tahum inhe ab bhi one day international aur twenty twenty ka king kaha ja sakta hai
 Agar wo bating mein johar nahi dikha pae to balling mein jadogari dikha dete hain
 Isi liye Shahid ko dunioya ke behtareen all rounder ki suff mein shamil kiya jata hai
Shahid Afridi aise batsman hain ke jo khelne ke liye ground mein aate hain to aik samaa band jata hai
 Cricketer Shahid Khan Afridi us daur ki paidawar hain, jab Pakistan ne 1992 mein world cup jeeta tha aur har naujawan Imran Khan aur Javed Miandad ki tarah cricketer banna chahta tha
Shahid ki aamad aik toofan sabit hui, kyun ke Nairobi ground par Kenya ke khilaaf 3rd number par bating karte huie in naujawan ne 37 balls par century bana kar aalmi record torh dala tha
 Yeh mehdood over ski tez tareen century thi, jise dekhte hue cricket ke paristaron ki oper ki saans oper aur niche ki saans niche reh gai thi
Sari duniya satellite Television ke zariye mebhoot ho kar yeh manzar dekh rahi thi
 Yun Shahid Afridi raaton raat gumnami se nikal kar aik super star ban gae the

 Jis ka faida qaumi team ko pohanchta hai

 tahum Shahid Afridi ne apne Watan ke liye khelne ko daulat kamane par tarjeeh di aur England ke khilaaf series ke baiys BPL mein khelne se inkaar kar diya

bal ke aehl e watan ke dilon ko jeetne ka hunar bhi khoob jante hain

is liey wo jab bhi bulayengy to main pehli fursat mein un ka hi project kerna chahungi
Hindustani art cinemas ke qad aawar artists ki top of the list murattab ki jae to Farooq Sheikh ka naam yaqeeni taur par is mien shamil ho ga
 Faooq ne us zamane mien mutawazi cinema mien naam peyda kiya
 Yun to is actor ne riwayati commercial films mien bhi salahiyaton ke johar dikhae, magar in ki shanakht art films he rahi
 Farooq ki acting mien aik tarah ka thehrao numayan tha
 Jo unhe art film ke liye mauzoo banata tha
 Phir aik taweel waqfey ke bad 2008 mien inho ne films se dobara nata jorha
 Jis ka aiteraf yeh khud bhi karte the
 Log mujhe pehchantehain, meri janib dekh kar muskurate hain aur hath bhi hilate hain
 Aesi pazeerai na milne ka qalq mujhe kabhi nahi raha
Art films mien acting ke aaghaz par Farooq Sheikh ko Satya Jeet Rai, Muzaffar Ali, Rishikesh Mukherjee aur Ketan Mehta jaise kohna mushq directors ke saath kaam karne ka mauqa mila
 In directors ne in ke talent ko nikharne mien aeham role adaa kiya
 Magar inho ne khud ko stage aur silver screen he tak mehdood nahi rakha, bal ke Television par bhi apni salahiyaton ka jadoo jagaya
 Khate peete khandan se talluq hone ki bina par inhe tamam saholtein hasil rahi
 In ke walid aik kamiyab wakeel the
 Is arsey ke dauran inhe sagar sarhadi jaise maroof directors mien banae jane wale dramas mien mukhtalif kirdaron ki adaeygi ka mauqa mila
 Jald he in ka shumar stage ke basalahiyat naujawan artists mien hone laga tha
 Director MS Sathewan in ke paas pohanche aur inhe Garam Hawa mien aik aeham moaawin kirdar adaa karne ki pesh kash ki
 Bataur director Sathewan ki bhi yeh awwaleen film thi
 Garam Hawa Hindi art cinema mien nae tarz ki films ka aaghaz samjhi jati hai
 Pehli film mien Sikander Mirza ka role ada karne par inhe 750 rupees muaawza mila tha
 Farooq Sheikh ki wajah shohrat agarcha art films hain
 Magar dilchasp baat yeh hai ke inhe ibtedai shanakht radio se mili thi
 Phir jab door darshan par Yoda Darshan aur Young World jaise programs ki meyzbani farooq ke hisse mien aai to in ka naam ghar ghar liya jane laga
 Guman mien khobsurat acting ne Farooq Sheikh ka career mustehkam kiya aur inhe markazi roles ki peshkash hone lagi
 Inho ne Satya Jeet Rai ki Shatranj ke Khiladi 1977 ke ilawa, Noori 1979, Chashm e Baddor 1981, Umrao Jaan 1981, Bazaar 1982, Sath Sath 1982, Rang Barangi 1983, Kisi se Na Kehna 1983, aur Biwi Ho to Aesi 1988, mien yadgaar kirdar adaa kiye
 Katha 1983 mien inho ne manfi kirdar mien bhi apni salahiyaton ke johar dikhae
Apne career mien inho ne art films ki kam o besh tamam maroof heroins ke sath kaam kiya
 Director Sagar Sarhadi ki film Lorri, Kalpana Lajmi ki Aik Pal aur Muzaffar Ali ki Anjuman mien Shabana Aazmi in ki heroin bani thi
 Magar Deepti Navil ke sath in ki jorhi boat maqbool hui
Amaya mien in ki jorhi ki performance se mehfooz hue
 Farooq Sheikh ne Shabana Aazmi ke sath bhi kae films ki
Television ke nazreen mien wo actor ke sath sath bataur meyzban bhi boat maqbool the
 In ka show Jeena Isi Ka Naam hai, dekhne walo mien boat maqbool hua tha
 Us dauran stage se in ka nata nahi toota tha
 Yeh drama 12 saal tak pesh kiya jata raha tha
 2009 mien inho ne film Lahore mien shandar acting ka muzahira kiya
 Jis ke aiteraf mien inhe behtareen muaawin actor ke National film Award se nawaza gaya
 Box Office par yeh film kamiyab qarar di ja chuki hai
 Magar yeh actor apne maddahon ke dilon mien aur apni films mien hamesha zinda rahega
Hollywood ki films ke rasiya afraad mein bhala kaun ho ga ke jo captain Jack Sparrow ka shehar aafaq kirdar nibhane wale zaheen o fateen actor Johnny Depp ke naam aur kaam se waqif na hon
 Yun to croron dilon ki dharkan kehlane wale is actor ne bohat si kamiyab films mein apni salahiyaon ke johar dikhae hain, lekin tijarti paimaney par in ki sab se kamiyab film series Pirates Of The Caribbean rahi hai
Magar phir india ke maroof siyasatdaan Amar Singh ne Jaya ko apni saraparasti mein le liya aur ab wo Amar Singh ke zair e saya siyasat mein apna muqaam banane ki jaddojehad mein hain
In dino Jaya Prada azaad candidate ki hesiyat se lok sabha ki rukun hain aur siyasat ke maidan mein tahaal sargaram hain
Bal ke agar yeh kaha jae ke Sylvester Stallone ka naam he action films ki kamiyabi ki zamanat hai to ghalat na ho ga
Isi film ko bad mein Italian Stallion ke naam se release kiya gaya, jis ne bohat maqboliyat hasil ki
Isi film se stallone ke filmy career ka sahi maeyno mein aaghaz hua
Wo is se itne mutassir hue ke forum aik film Rocky ki kahani likh daali
Yeh kahani inho ne sirf 20 ghanton mein mukammal kit hi
Tahum koshishon ke bad producer John G Avid Son ne is film ke liye sarmayakari par aamadgi zahir kar di aur director Robert Karloff ne is ki direction dene ki haami bhar li
Yeh is baras ki behtareen film qarar paai aur is baras ke academy awards mein in ki 10 nominations hui
Yeh film bhi kamiyab rahi aur yun Sylvester Stallone Hollywood ke super star ban age
Yeh film bhi maqboliyat ke kae record qaiym kar gai aur Sylvester Stallone Hollywood ke sab se maqbool action hero ban gae
In dono films ki maqboliyat ka andaza is baat se bhi lagaya ja sakta hai ke in dono ke sequels ke tehat kae films banai gai hain
Agarcha in ki kuch films ko nakami ka bhi saamna karna parha hai, lekin is se Sylvester Stallone ke career par negative asar nahi parha
Khas taur par wo tobacco ki masnoaat ki tasheer mein bohat sargaram rahe hain
College University mein jab koi taqreb munaqid ki jati to Tilawat e Quran  e Pak aur Naat Inayat Hussain Bhatti ke hisse mien aati doran  etaleeem College mein aik taqreb munaqid hoi jis ke mehman e khososi Baba Ji A Chishti the jo us waqat mosiqi ke betaj badshah the
Taqreb mein Inayat Hussain Bhatti ne Naat parhi Baba Ji A Chishti ne phechan leya ke ye nojawan apne awaz ke sehar se soz o gudaz ke lashkar se insani qlab o izhan ko musakhar kar sakta hai aur unhon ne Inayat Hussain Bhatti ko apni film “Phere” mein gana gane ke leye kaha
“Phere” mein uhnon ne kai gane gaye lekin Munawar Sultana ke sath un ke do gane “Akhiyan lawain na” ko khas tor par shurat mili jis ke baad Inayat Hussain Bhatti ke liye filmon ke darwaze khul gaye
Radio ka dor tha Inayat Hussain Bhatti ki awaz pore Punjab mein pheel gai aur ataraf o aknaf Punjab mein Inayat Hussain Bhatti ki fani zindagi ka aghaz tha
Do dehaion tak theater, film aur golokari ke medan chaye rahe
Is arse mein unhon ne Pakistan film industry ke tamam naamwar mosikaron ke sath kaam kiya
Billa akhir 1955 mein Inayat Hussain Bhatti ko film “Heer” mein hero ke tor par kaam karne ka muqa mila aur golokari ke sath sath un ki adakari ko bhi khasa saraha gaya
Rafeeq Peer Theater ke leye un ke gaye howae naghme aaj bhi mashor hain
Un ki wafat se kuch arsa qalb Shazia Manzoor ne un ka gana “chan mere makhna” dob arah gaya jo behad maqbol sabit howa
Inayat Hussain Bhatti ki samaji khidmat bhi hain
1971 mein unhon ne Gulab Devi Hospital mein apni waldah Barkat Bibi ke naam se aik ward tamer karaya aur Meo hospital Lahore mein CP Air conditioner plant mukamal faraham kiya
Inayat Hussain Bhatti kai ghareb bachon ko taleemi wazifa dete the
1965 ki jung mein 250 rupe pass rakh kar baqi sarmaya Pakistan Army Defense mein jama karwa deya to bewi ne ppocha ke jung taweel ho gai to kia bane ga?Inayat Hussain Bhatti ne kaha ke agar mera watan hi na raha to kia bane ga
“Allah ki rehmat ka saya, toheed ka pacham lehraya, Ae mard e mujahid jag zara , ab waqat e shahadat hai aaya, Allah Ho Akbar” Inayat Hussain Bhatti ne ye nagma ga kar Foji nojawanon ko garmaya aur un ke sene josh se bhar deye
Tarana is qadar maqbol howa ke Pak Foj ke band mein shamil kar leya gaya
Aaj bhi is tarane ke bool samaton se takrate hain to ye dilon ko garama kar Hub ul Watni paida kar dete hain
Miyan sahib ne kaha ke mein kaseer raqam se aik masjid tamer karne ka khuwahish mand hun
Bhatti sahab ne jawab deya ke masajid to phele hi bohat hain magar namazi koi nahi jab se Huzoor Nabi Kareem (SAW) ne qadam e Mubarak zameen par rakha hai sari zameen masjid bana di gai, lehaza aap ko esa kaam bataon jo Allah ki raza ka bais ho aur akhirat behtar ho jaye, aap aik hospital bana den jis mein bekas, besahara aur dekhi insanon ka muft ilaj kiya jaye
Miyan sahib ne band road par lakhon ki property khared kar behtareen hospital tamer karwaya jo Munshi hospital ke naam se apna aik taruf rakhta hai
Duniya mein na Inayat Hussain Bhattihain na Munshi sahib hain magar is kaam ka ajar e azeem aaj bhi un ko mil raha hai
Masajid aur imam bargahon mein namaziyon par goliyan, bomb hamla waghairah qatal o gharat ki inteha kar di jati hai, jis par Inayat Hussain Bhatti ne barwaqat qayam e aman ke leye aik jamat banai jis ka naam Almi aman conference rakha gaya
Inayat Hussain Bhatti ne itehad benul muslimeen ke leye dora shuru kiya aur pore Punjab mein ja kar tamam makatib e fikr ke ulma ko aman bhai chare par qaim masher ki tashkil par razi kiya
Inayat Hussain Bhatti 31 May 1999 ko dagh e mafarqat de gaye magar un ki jari kardeah terik ke rakun Inayat Hussain Bhatti ki khidmat ke eteraf mein har saal 31 May ko aik bohat bara ijtema karte hain
Inho ne 5 baras ki umer se he apne waldain ke sath stage par apne fun ka muzahira shuru kar diya tha
Martin aur Lewis ki jorhi 1940 mein stage par maqbool hone lagi
Is jorhi ki maqboliyat ka andaza is baat se bhi lagaya ja sakta hai ke aik Comic book Adventures of Den Martin and Jerry Lewis shaey ki gai
Ab Jerry Lewis ne NBC ka rukh kiya aur 1 ghante ke variety show ka aaghaz kiya, jise khatir khuwa kamiyabi hasil hui aur yeh show 2 baras tak telecast hota raha
Ab Jerry Lewis ne Columbia pictures ke banner taley producing shuru ki aur kae maqbool comedy films banai
Usi dauran inho ne University of Southern California mein film direction ka mazmoon parhana shuru kar diya
Tahum Doctors ki mehnat aur Jerry Lewis ki himmat ne Khuda ki mansha ke sath mil kar aisa hone na diya
Hollywood ke baaz deegar superstars ki tarah Jerry Lewis bhi rafahi kamon mein barh charh kar hissa lete hain
Is hawale se in ka kehna tha ke in ke nazdeek sab se barha aezaaz koi award nahi, bal ke maddahon ki taraf se milne wali pazeerai hai
Kaha jata hai ke logon ko hansana duniya ke chand mushkil tareen kamon mein se aik hai, tahum Hollywood ke yeh Legendary comedian actor 64 baras se bhi zaiyd arsey se logon ke faces par muskurahat bikherne ka fariza bahusun o khobi anjaam de rahe hain
Un hi ki rafaqat ki wajah se 13 saal ki umar mein Nisar Bazmi nohat se ragon par abor hasil kar chuke the
Is kheel ke sare geet super hit howae aur is ke sath hi kamyabi ne un ke qadam chomme
Ye saal un ki zindagi ka sunheri saal sabit howa
Rafi ki awaz mein fil “Khoj” ka gana “Chand ka dil tot gaya, rone lage sitare” 1940 ke ashre ke akhiri barson mein All India radio se khub khub chala
Is hesiyat mein unhon ne pheli bar Anand Bakhshi ko bator nagma nigar film “Bhola Admi” mein mutarif karwaya aur Kaliyan Ji Anand Ji jori ko sazindon ki jagah se utha kar mosiqaron ki saf mein shamil karane mein aham kirdar ada kiya
Mumbai mein wo aik naamwar mosikar shumar hote the aur Lakshmi Kant Piyare Lal jese musician un ki muawnat mein kaam kar chuke the
2 baras ki shaded jido jehad ke bad unhen Afzal Ahmed Karem Fazli ne apni film “Esa bhi hota hai” ke leye muntakhib kiya
Film to 1965 mein release hoi lekin Noor Jahan ka gana “ho tamana aur kia jan e tamana aap hain” waba ki tarah pore mulk mein phel gaya
“chalo acha howa tum bhol gaye” is gane ne aag laga di aur isi baras Mehdi Hassan ki awaz mein nfilm “aag” ka gana “yun zindagi ki rah mein takra gaya koi” release howa
Pakistan aane ke bad chand hi baras ke arse mein unhon ne bator mosikar aik muziz muqam hasil kar leya
Kyun ke ghazal ki gaiki ke leye darker neem classical dhunon se le kar fok aur pop music ki dharakti pharakti composition tak unhein har tarah ki bandishon mein kamal hasil tha
Mehdi Hasan aur Noor Jahan jese manjhe howe golokaron ke sath sath Rona Laila aur Ikhlaq Ahmed jesi nikhez awazon ko bhi nikharne sawarne ka muqa diya
Madam ne missal dete howe kaha ke Nisar Bazmi sahib ki rehearsal par mein hameshah waqat se phele pohanchti hun aur suron ke utar charhao ki mashq karti hun kyun ke wo aik azeem mosikar hain aur fan ki barikiyon se na sirf khud aagah hain balke dosron ko samjhane ki salahiyat bhi rahte hain
Baqol Nisar Bazmi ye meri janib se aik bare mosikar ko khiraj e tehseen tha
Is se phele Bazmi sahib ne 9th class ki aik 13 saala bangali talba Rona Laila ko daryaft kiya aur film “aasra” mein ye gana gavawa “nena taras gaye, piya aaye na sari raat” jab Bazmi sahib “nag mani” ka gana “sajna re” compose kar rahe the to un ke zehan mein Rona Laila ki awaz thi
Bazmi sahib phir bhi mutmain na howae lekin jab ye gana super hit howa tab un ka mode durust howa
Ye film kuch itni kamyab hoi ye is ne Salman Khan ko raaton raat super star bana deya, isi film ke leye Salman Khan ko behtareen “naye adakar” ka film fare award diya gaya, jab ke isi ke sath un ko behtareen markazi kirdar ke leye bhi naamzad kiya gaya tha
Is film ki yadgar kamyabi ka andazah is baat se bhi lagaya ja sakta hai ke ese English aur hispanwi zabanon mein dab kar ke mukhtalif mumalik mein numaish ke leye pesh kiya gaya aur is ne har jagah record kamyabi hasil ki
1990 mein Salman Khan ki film “Baghi” release hoi aur ye bhi box office par hit ha gai
Ye film box office par super hit rahi, is ke sath naqadeen ne bhi bohat pasand kiya
Yun Salman Khan aik mustanid super star ban gaye lekin aane wale do baras Salman ke career ke leye ache sabit na howae
1994 ke awail mein “andaz apna apna” ne aik bar phir Salman Khan ko kamyabi ki shahrah par gamzan kar diya
1994 mein hi release hone wali film “hum aapke hain koun” block buster sabit hoi, is film ke hisse mein kai awards bhi aaye
Alami satah par is film ne 135 arab Bharti rupe (taqreban 21 million American dollar) ka business kiya
Ye film us waqat tak ki sab se ziyadah business karne wali film qarar pai aur 7 baras tak cinema gharon ki zenat bani rahi
1995 mein Salman aur Shahrukh Khan ki filn “karan arjun” release hoi jise osat satah ki pazirai mili
Tahum Salman ke career par is ke bais kisi kism ke manfi asrat nahi pare
Agar cha ye filmein box office par ziyadah acha tassur na chor sakein lekin Salman ka shumar batadrij saf e awal ke adakaron mein hone laga
1998 mein Karan Johar ki film “kuch kuch hota hai” saal ki behtareen film qarar pai, is film mein Salman Khan ne bator mehman adakar ke tor par kaam kiya lekin unhon ne ye mukhtasir kirdar is khubi se ada kiya ke behtareen mawin adakar ke film fare award ke haqdar qarar paye
2009 tak Salman ne kai filmon mein kaam kiya jin miens kuch kamyab hoein aur kuch ne nakami ka mun dekha, lekin aik tamil film ke remake “wanted” ne shayad Salman ke career ke zaren dor ka aghaz kar diya
2013 tak in ki 5 filmon “dabang” “body guard” “ready” “aik tha tiger” aur “dabang 2”ne yak ke bad degare 100 karor rupe ka business karne wali filmon ke club mein apni jagah banai aur jab 200 karor rupe business karne wali filmon ka club qaim howa to is mein un ki 4 filmein bhi shamil ho gaein aur wo Salman Khan ke sath sath Dabang Khan ke naam se bhi mashhor ho gaye
Salman Khan ka filmi career nihayat shandar tasawor kiya jata hai
Tahum 11 baras bad bhi ab tak un par ilzam sabit nahi ho saka
Filmi duniya mein aane ke bad wo kai falahi kaamon mein sharik rahe
Isi doran unhon ne aik rafahi tanzeem Being Human ki bunyad rakhi, jo online aur mukhtalif stores par T shirts farokht karti hai aur is ki amdani se mashi mehromiyon ka shikar afrad ki madad ki jati hai
2011 mein in NGO ko aik trust ki shakal de di gai jo ghareb bachon ko taleem aur sehat ki saholatein farham karti hai
Is idare ke tehat banne wali filmon ki aamdani bhi falahi sargarmiyon mein istemal ki jati hai
January 2012 mein Salman Khan ne 40 lakh rupe ada kar ke un qediyon ko rehai dilwai jo mehaz jurmana ada na kar pane ki wajah se Uthar Pardesh ki jailon mein qed the
Salman Khan ki zindagi par agar tairana nagah bhi dali jaye to ye andaza bakhobi ho jata haike bazahir chulbula sa nazar aane wala shakhs behtareen entertainer hone ke sath sath apne sene mein aik nihayat hasas aur dard mand dil bhi rakhta hai
Jab Emma Watson ko tilismati kahaniyon ke silsile Harry Potter par mabni films mein Harmony Granger ke role ke liye cast kiya gaya to inho ne yeh role is tarah play kiya ke aane wale barson mein yehi in ki shanakht ban gaya
Simple si ladki yeh role play kar ke kae kam umer girls ki role model bhi ban gai
8 baras tak film beeno aur jaraiyd mein barhti hui maqboliyat ke sath is ne apne role ko ba khobi ada karte hue glamour ki chakachond kar dene wali duniya ke mutabiq khud ko munasib andaaz mein dhal liya hai
8 filsm par mushtamil silsile ki pehli film ne maqboliyat ke tamam record torh diye aur zahir hai ke is ke sath he Emma Watson bhi raton raat famous ho gai
In ki khud aitemadi aur makalmon ki adaiygi bohat pasand ki gai
2009 mein Forbes Magazine ne sab se ziyada qabil e qadar kam umer artists ki top of the list  mein Emma Watson ko 6 number par rakha
Emma Watson apni zaati zindagi apne doston aur press se alag rakhti hai
Is ka naam abhi tak kisi celebrity ke sath nahi jorha ja saka hai
Emma Watson ne modeling ke maidan mein bhi qismat aazmai hai, lekin filhaal wo aik American University mein apni taleem mukammal kar rahi hai
Aik interview mein inho ne kaha tha, mujhe shohrat nahi gumnami chahiye
Abhi wo aam talba o talbaat ki tarah zindagi guzaarna chahti hai aur filhal inho ne acting tark kar di hai
Apne career ke mustaqbil ka faisla wo taleem mukammal hone ke bad he karega
Jinhe beyk waqt Urdu aur Punjabi films mein kamiyabi mili thi
Aik mauseeqar gharane se talluq rakhne wale Munir Hussain ke sage Mamo Rasheed Atrey Pakistan ke azeem tareen mausiqar the, jab ke in ke khala zaad Bhai Safdar Hussain bhi aik aala paaey ke mausiqar sabit hue
Munir Hussain ko apni pehli he naghmati film Saat Lakh ke famous zamana sada bahaar geet “Qarar Lautne wale to Pyar ko tarsey” ki recording ke liye in ke Mamo Rasheed Atrey ne barhi tayyari karwai thi aur aaghaz he barha dhamaka khez sabit hua tha
Jo is se qabal film Heer aur Ishq Laila ke shahkar geeton ki wajah se suf awwal ke singer ban chuke the

Bollywood ke style icon Shahrukh Khan sirf naam ke hi king aur badshah nahi balke wo caroron madahon ke dilon par raj bhi karte hain
Un ki muskurahat se le kar style statement tak har cheiz jese perfect hai aur dilchasp baat ye hai ke wo na sirf aik kamyab adakar hain balke aik kamyab producer aur mezban bhi hain
Mini screen ke junior artist se le kar global icon banne tak unhon ne har shobe mein shuhrat aur kamyabi hasil ki, chahe wo koi stage show ho ya film, press conference ho ya kisi benul qawami university mein ki jane wali taqrir
Shahrukh Khan kisi bhi moqe par nazireen ko lutf indoz karne mein nakaam nahi howae aur agar in tamam baton ke elawa un ke style statement par nazar dali jaye to pata chalta hai ke wo bhi un ki tarah hi anokha hi hai
Main rozana inhi kapron mein hota hun, albata joton ke mamle mein meri makhsos pasand hai, wo aramdah hun aur mere peeron ke size se kuch bare hun, jahan tak jeans ki baat hai main ne phichle panch saalon se koi jeans nahi kharidi
To agar aap kabhi mujhe phathi hoi jeans pehne dekhein to ye nahi samjhiye ga ke ye koi naya fashion hai ya designer jeans hai balke wo to purani ho kar esi ho jati hain
Aur mere khayal mein job hi ye zabardast combination pehan le wo fashion icon hai
Mujhe nahi lagta ke aik hi jote bar bar pehnne mein koi borai hai
Mujhe jote kharidne ka shoq hai magar koi si do joriyan hi bar bar pehanta hun
Main to aik hi jori us waqat tak istemal karta hun jab tak wo kharab na ho jayein
Mujhe dhehli dhali T shirts aur jeans pasand hain
Jis ki wajah se un ke dil mein adakari ke bare mein dilchaspi paida hoti gai

Pakistan ki filmi sanat mein 60 aur70  ki dehayon ko baja tour par Waheed Murad ka zamana qarar diya ja sakta hai ager chay iss dour mein Santos, Darpan, Sudheer, Eajaz, Habib aur bad mein Mohammed Ali aur Nadeem ne hi apni adakari ke jouhar dekhye lakin un mein se kio actor woh dastani hasiat ikhtiyar na ker saka jo Waheed Murad ko hasil hue
Shayad iss liye ke Waheed Murad ki zati kahani aik mokammal aur kamyab almeay kay tamam anasir khud mein samoye huye hain

Jo shaks zindagi ki sari kamyaban moqadder mein likhwaney ke bad iss duniya mein aya ho aur jisey shuhrat amm ki manzil tek pahonchney ke liyeh aik tinka na hilana paraho uski bazahir sedhi aur sapat zindagi mein awam ko kiya dilchspi ho sakti thi?Lakin haqeeqat yeh hay key apnay maddahon ki jetni bari khaip Waheed Murad ne tayar ki woh Pakistan key kisi Hero ko naseeb nahein hue yeh wahid Hero tha jiskey maddahon ne monazzim hoker fan club tashkeel deay aur ajj is ski mout key itney baras bad bhi yeh maddah uski yad mein ijtemat ker tey haien uski filmon key khasusi show muaqid karatey haien uski qaber par hazri detey haien aur uskey nam par film award jari ker tey haien
Waheed Murad key walid Nisar Murad Karachi mein kamyab distri bauter they 1962 mein Waheed Murad ne Karachi University se MA (English) kiya aur uskey bad walid key karobar mein purey tour par shareek hotey huay apni pehli film Aulad ka agaz keya jis key director SM Yousuf they aur adakaron mein Nayar Sultana aur Darpen shamil they Waheed Murad nay iss film mein aik roll bhi ada keya lakin in ki adakari key asal jaouher tab khuley jab un key dost  Parvaiz Malik Amrica se film sazi ka diploma ley ker lautey aur unhon nay Waheed Murad ki film Heera aur Patther ki hedayat kari key faraiz sanbhal leyeh
Iss film mein Waheed Murad nay aik gadah gari waley ka kirdar ada keya jo key Zaiba ki mohabbat mein giraftar ho jata hay film ko zaberdast kamyabi hasil hue aur Waheed Murad ko 1964 key behtareen adakar ka Nigar award hasil hua
"Film Arman nay Box office pe kamyabi key tamam guzashta record tor deay yeh Pakistan ki pehli film thi iss ka geet “Akelay Na Jana” aur ""Ko Ko Korina"" gali gali gunaya janey laga"

Shakhsi sehar ke lihaaz se bhi Johnny Depp kisi dosri celebrity se piche nahi

Ustaad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne apni tamam umar qawali ke fun ko seekhne aur use mashriq-o-maghrib mein maqbool aam banana mein sarf kar di
Inho ne Soofiya-e-karam ke peyghamat ko duniya ke kone kone tak pohnchaya aur un ke faiz se khud unhe bepanah shohrat nasib hui
Pakistan mein Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ka pehla tarruf apne khandan ki riwayati rang mein gaai hui in ki ibtedai qawaliyon se hua
Bad mein unho ne lok Shaiyri aur apne hum asar shora ka kalam apne makhsoos andaaz mein ga kar mulk ke andar kamiyabi ke jhandey garhe aur us daur mein   Sun Charkhe Mithi Mithi Mithi Kok Mahi Meyno Yaad Awanda   aur   Sanson ki Mala Pe Simron Mein Pee ka Naam   ne aam taur par qawwali se lagao na rakhne wale tabqey ko apni taraf raghib kiya aur yun Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ka halqa asar-o-wasee tar ho gaya
Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan  sahi maeyno mein shohrat ki bulandiyon par us waqt pohnche  jab Peter Gabriel ki mauseeqi mein gaai gai
Lekin kehte hai Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne apne walid ki wafat ke 10 din bad he unhe khuwab mein dekha jis mein unho ne Nusrat ko gaeyki ki takeed ki
Us waqt Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ki umar 16 baras thi aur yun bator qawwal wo dunya-e-mauseeqi mein mutarif hue
In ki shuru ke salon ki gaeyki tasawwuf ke peyghamat se bharpor rahi
Shaiyri se le kar mauseeqi tak in ki qawwali ka har juz samaa ki mukhtalif mehfilon mein ja kar is rohani kefiyat se faiziyab hui
Is barey mein Bharat ke mashoor filmsaaz aur mauseeqar Muzaffar Ali kehte hain ke   Nusrat ki Awaz Dilon mein Ghar kar Jati thi  Mashriq ho ya Maghrib  Hindustan ho ya Pakistan in ki awaaz ne tamam Sarhaden torh di thi  
Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne qawwali mein jiddat la kar Maghrib mein barhe peymane par is sanaf ko mutarif karwaya aur is ke sath sath maghrib ke naamwar mauseeqaron ke sath mil kar apne fun ka muzahira kiya
Kya is se in ki asal sanaf par koi asar parha ??? Muzaffar Ali ka kehna tha ke   Qawwali mein bajne wale tamam saaz aik rang ya mizaj mein dhale hote hain  un par izafi saaz dalna zabardasti dosra libas pehnane ke mutaradif hai  
In ke aik maghrabi maddah ne aik dafa kaha tha ke   Nusrat ki gaeyki ap ko dawat deti hai  chupke se kaan laga kar is guftugo ko sunne ki jo aik bandey air us ke RAB ke darmiyan hoti hai
Apne RAB ke huzoor nazrana pesh karne kea mal   lekin Nusrat ko sunte hue hum mehaz aik bande aur us ke RAB ki guftugo anhi sunte bal ke un ki gaeyki ka asal jado he yeh hai ke hamare dil in ki gaeyki ke utar charao ke sath dharakne kagte hain
In ke gaeyki mein zam ho jate hain aur hum RAB ke huzoor us nazrane ke hissa ban jate hain  wo gaeyki mein RAB se guftugo karte hain aur humen bhi apne RAB se hum kalam kar dete hain  
Speilberg abhi teen ager he the ke inho ne apne doston ke sath mil kar aik 8MM adventure movie shauqiya taur par banai thi
1958 mein wo scout boy ban gae aur us dauran 9 minute ki 8MM  The last gun fight bana kar photography merit badge hasil kiya
Inho ne scout master se pocha ke agar wo yeh kaam apne walid ki movie camera se kar len to kaisa rahega ??? inhe ijazat mil gai  ghaliban yehi in ki direction ke career ka nuqta aaghaz the
13 baras ki umer mein Spielberg ne Wartonowear naami 40 minute ki film bana kar apna pehla award jeeta
16 baras ki umer mein inho ne apni pehli 140 minute ki science fiction film Fire Light ki kahani likhi aur is ki direction bhi ki
Jise maqami cinema mein numaiysh ke liye pesh kiya gaya aur is se 1 dollar ka munafa hasil hua
Isi kamiyabi se mutassir ho kar Steven Spielberg ne film Close Encounter banai  jis ne box office par acha business kiya
Graduation karne ke sath he inho ne Eagle Scout ka rank bhi hasil kar liya
Apne bachpan ke barey mein in ka kehna hai ke wo awail umer he se pukhta mazhabi aqaiyd rakhte the
Usi waqt tak in ka kaam mehaz shauqia samjha ja raha tha
Yeh pehli baqaida commercial film thi  jis ki kahani bhi inho ne khud he likhi thi
Yeh film box office par super hit sabit hui aur inhe pehli bar behtareen director ke academy award ke liye nominate kiya gaya
Is ke bad Spielberg ne pehli jang e azeem par banne wali film 1941 ki direction ki
Yeh film bhi blockbuster sabit hui aur yun Spielberg ne kamiyabi ki shahrah par aise safar ka aaghaz kiya
Jo tahaal pori raftaar ke sath jari hai
Ibtedai daur mein Spielberg ne apne walid ki jangi kahaniyon se mutassir ho kar dosri aalamgeer jang ke hawale se bhi kae films banai
Jis ki kamiyabi ke bad inhe science fiction films ka mustanid director samjha jane laga
Tahum inho ne khud ko sirf science fiction films tak he mehdood nahi rakha bal ke har mauzoo par filmy stories likhin  direction ki aur kuch films produce bhi ki
Steven spielberg samaji o falahi sargarmiyon mein bhi barh charh kar hissa lete hain
Jinhe bilamoom saraha jata hai
In mein se beshtar bpx office par kamiyab rahi hain
Jo misaal ke taur par Shark fishes ya Dinosaurs ke muqabley mein kahi ziyada sanjeeda mauzoaat ka aahata karti hain
Hum baaz auqaat aam dagar se hat kar  apni nakamiyon se bhi waisi he mohabbat kar sakte hain  jaisi ke kamiyabiyon se karte hain
Is liye ke hum kamiyabi ke muqabley mein apni nakaami se kahi ziyada sabaq seekh sakte hain
  Mujhe paisa banane se nahi  films banane se dilchaspi hai
Aap behtareen kaam kijiye  paisa khud chal kar aap ke paas aaega
Is ke piche in ki barson ki mehnat aur gher mamooli salahiyatein hain
Inho ne bilashuba apne mulk ki filmy history par gehre naqoosh murattab kiye hain aur in ke zikar ke bagher yeh tareekh mukammal nahi ho sakti
Khud shahrukh khan ka is silsile mein yeh kehna hai ke Major General Shahnawaz in ke walid ke azeez the
Wo batate hain ke in ke waldain ki mulaqat khasey filmy andaaz mein hui thi
Walid sahib ne inhe na sirf hospital pohanchaya tha  bal ke in ki jaan bachane ke liye khoon bhi diya tha
Is accident ke badaulat hone wali shanasaai ka natija shadi ki soorat mein nikla
Walid se in ki qurbat aur wabistagi bohat gehri thi
In ke inteqal ke sadmey ki shiddat apni jagah thi  lekin isi saneha ki badaulat unho ne apne balbotey par zindagi guzaarne ka hunar seekh liya
Jis mein wo khasey kamiyab rahe
Jis ke tehat wo kae kamiyab films bana chuke hain
Shahrukh khan falahi kamon aur imdadi sargarmiyon mein bhi hissa lete hain
Khas taur par hospitals ko shahrukh khan bhari donations dete hain
Shahrukh khan sirf apne mulk mein he nahi bal ke bohar se deegar mumalik mein bhi bohat maqbool hain aur india mein box office par inhe number one samjha jata hai
Shahrukh khan ki kamiyab tareen films ke naam yeh hain
Inhe bachpan se he singing ka shauq tha
Is awaaz ki kashish inhe kasha kasha sath wale ghar le gai  jahan 2 bachiyan apne ustaad se gana seekh rahi thin
Kamsin Iqbal Bano chup ke se jaa kar is class mein beth gai aur ustaad ki awaaz ke sath awaaz milana shuru kar di
Ustaad kehen lage   Yeh ladki agar singing seekh le to bohat acha gaegi  
tab Iqbal Bano ke shauq ko ustaad ki raae ne jilaa bakhshi aur inho ne apne aehal e khana se kaha  mujhe gana seekhna hai
Aehal e khana ne jab yeh dekha ke Iqbal Bano ke is shauq ki wajah se in ki parhai mutassir ho rahi hai to inhe singing ki mashroot ijazat dete hue radio station par bachon ke program mein le jaya gaya
Jab khandaan&  Iqbal Bano ke shauq ki raah mein mazeed rukawat na bana aur inho ne ustaad Chand Khan se classical singing ki baqaida tarbiyat leni shuru ki
Dono ustadon se thumri aur daadra samait classical singing ki barikiyon se aagahi hasil ki
Yehi wajah hai ke Iqbal Bano ke gaae hue geeton aur ghazlon mein classical rang numayan nazar aata hai
Inqelabaat zamana ne Iqbal Bano ki awaaz ko kabhi mutassir nahi kiya  bal ke mazeed nikhaar diya tha
Wo apni zindagi ke aakhri saal tak gaati rahin aur daad samait ti rahin
Taqseem hind ke kuch arsey bad wo shadi kar ke Pakistan aa gai aur phir yahan inho ne radio  film aur TV ke liye apni awaaz ka jadoo jagaya
Jab film walon ne Iqbal Bano ki classical awaaz suni to in se rujoo kiya aur film ke liye gaane ki baqaida dawat di
Tab aik sadabahar geet ne janam liya
Tu laakh chale ri gori tham tham k& Film Gumnaam ke is geet ke bad aik aur maqbool tareen geet Iqbal Bano ki awaaz se jawidaan hua
Ulfat kin ae manzil ko chala   Tu bahein daal ke baahon mein& Anwar Kamal Pasha ki in dono films ki kamiyabi mein Iqbal Bano ki awaaz ka bohat dakhal tha
Is ke bad Iqbal Bano ke pas films ki line lag gai  lekin inho ne sirf muntakhib geet gaane ko tarjeeh di
Isi liye inho ne films mein kam gaya lekin khob gaya
Iqbal Bano ne film ke liye kae khobsurat aur yaadgar naghme gaae
Jin ka shumar sadabahar geeton mein hota hai
Film Ishq Laila ke geeton ne to har taraf dhoom macha di thi
Is film ke liye Iqbal Bano ne mausiqar Safdar Hussain ka compose kiya hua yaadgar geet gaya
Sitaron tum to sou jao  paresha an raat sari hai& Sapaid rangat aur dilkash naqosh ki malik Iqbal Bano ka ghazal aur thumri gaane ka apna khas andaaz tha jo inhe deegar gaane walon se mumtaz karta tha
Rasio par Iqbal Bano ne usatza ki ghazlen gaane ko tarjeeh di
Yun to Iqbal Bano ne barhe barhe shoara ka kalaam gaya  magar mayanaz poet Faiz Ahmed Faiz ki nazmon aur ghazlon ko inho ne is kamaal maharat ke sath gaya ke sunne walon par sehar taari ho jata tha
Faiz ki is famous nazam ko Iqbal Bano ne khud he compose kiya aur itne khobsurat o dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke in ke naam ko zinda rakhne ke liye yehi kafi hai
Dasht e Tanhai mein ae jaan e jahan larza an hain   Teri aaghosh ke saaey  tere honton ke saraab& Phir Faiz Ahmed Faiz ki aik aur maqbool aam nazam
Hum dekhenge  lazim hai ke hum bhi dekhenge   Jab takht giraae jaenge   Jab taaj uchale jaenge& In nazmon ko apni khobsurat aur munfarid awaaz mein gaa kar Iqbal Bano ne Amar kar diya aur khud bhi Amar ho gai
Daagh dil hum ko yaad aane lage   Log apne diye jalane lage& Is ko Iqbal Bano ne itne dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke is mein chaar chand laga diye
Iqbal Bano ka aik yaadgar musical concert Jaipur mein hua tha  jab wo Saarc ke tehat saqafti wafood ke tabadley ke hawale se pehli baar India gai thin
  Jaipur mein bohat barha auditorium tha  October ka month tha  sardi thin a garmi  barha acha mausam tha
Ab ke saawan ghar aa ja& Mera gana jari tha ke achanak barish ki boondein parhna shuru ho gai
Mujhe aisa laga ke jaise moti tapak rahe hain
Isi asnaa mein announcer ki awaaz sunai di jo keh raha tha ke pehle suna he suna tha  lekin aaj hum dekh rahe hain ke Meghraj mein Iqbal Bano thumri gaa rahi thin ke barish ho gai
Iqbal Bano ko classical aur neem classical bilkhusoos mere watan ke naujawan  watan ke geet gaae jaa  aur yeh apni zameen yeh apna watan  sooraj ki tarah roshan roshan apni misaal aap hain
Agar sawal kiya jae ke Pakistan ke kisi fankaar ka naam batae  jise radio  television aur film ke hawale se aalmi shohrat hasil hai to jawab mein hamare paas sirf aik naam hai aur wo hai zia mohyeddin
Theater ki mohabbat inhe kusha kusha London le gai  jahan inho ne 1953 - 56 mein royal academy of dramatic arts mein drama ki baqaida tarbiyat hasil ki aur stage dramas ka aaghaz kiya
Zia Mohyeddin se meri dosti barson par muheet hai
Jis shakhs ne sari zindagi nazreen aur tamashaiyon ke saamne apne funn ka muzahira karne mein guzari ho  wo bhala sharmeela kis tarah ho sakta hai  lekin haqiqat yeh hai ke Zia Mohyeddin sharmeele hain aur is silsile mein  main apni taraf se kuch kehne ke bajae khud un ke alfaaz dohrana chahonga
Main yeh baat is liye keh raha hon ke amoman log samajhte hain ke showbiz mein sharmile aadmi ka koi kaam nahi  halan ke mera khayal hai ke mein to is maidan mein aaya he is liye tha
