Zia Mohyeddin Show apne daur ka behad maqbool aur meyari program tha
Zia Mohyeddin ka kehna hai ke mujhe is program ki maqboliyat ka andaza is roz hua  jab main ne aik choti si bachi ko yeh kehte hue suna    Ammi Ammi  wo dekhen Zia Mohyeddin Show ja rahe hain  
Zia Mohyeddin barhi mehnat aur tehqeeq ke sath sawalaat tayyar karte the
Nasir Iqbal is waqat Pakistan ke un chand khilariyon mein se aik hain jin se mustaqbil mein achi umeeden wabasta hain
Wo Pakistan squash ki tarikh ke wahid khilari hain jinein British Open junior ki under 13 championship jetne ka ezaz hasil hai
Wo duniya squash mein junior satah ke kai muqabalon ke title apne naam kar chuke hain
1st April 1994 ko Bannu mein paida hone wale Pakistan number one Nasir Iqbal apne khandan ke wahid fard hain jo benul qawami satah par Pakistan ki numaindagi kar rahe hain
Unhein England mein hone wale London Open aur Malaysia mein hone wale Royal Cup ka title jeetne ka ezaz bhi hasil hai
Duniya e squash mein 2013 ke ikhtetam par un ki World ranking 48 thi, tahum Nasir Iqbal ke azam buland hain aur bohat jald dunya ke top ten khilariyon mein shamil hone ke leye pori mehnat kar rahe hain
Nasir Iqbal: Main Bannu se squash kheelne wala phela khilari hun,
bas usse dekh kar mera shoq barha aur main is tarah aaga aur teen saal ki practice aur training ke bad main ne British Junior mein shirkat ki aur under 13 championship jeetne mai kaamyab raha
Is tournament mein kaamyabi se mere leye squash kheelne ki rahein khulti gayein, phir bad mein na sirf Pakistan balke beron e mulk mein bhi junior title jeetne mein kaamyab raha hun
Question: Haliya dinon mein benul aqwam satah par aap ki karkardagi nisbatan behtar rahi hai aage kia tawaqoaat hain?
Nasir Iqbal : koshish yehi hoti hia ke mehnat Karen aura chi karkardagi pesh Karen, 
har waqat zehan mein yehi baat hoti hai ke jis tarah Jahangir Khan aur Jan Sheer Khan ne Pakistan ka naam roshan kiya hai un ke naqsh e qadam chalen aur squash mein Pakistan ke khoye howae muqam ko aik martaba phir hasil kar len, 
lekin is ki wahaj talent ya practice ki kami nahi hai 
Allah ka shukar hai ke is ke bawajod main London Open aur us se qabal Malaysia mein hone wale Royal Cup ko jeetne mein kaamyab raha
jahan squash ke almi number aik aur do khilariyon se muqable ache aur kante ke howae the
Khas tor par Girigiri Goltair se bohat close match howae the, 
main ab tak top 16 ranking ke khilariyon ko shikast de chukka hun, 
sirf moqa milne ki baat hai agar ye musalsal milte rahe to nataij aur behtar hun ge
jab ke aik waqat tha ke jab 35 ya 40 saal tak ke khilari court mein benul qawami squash kheelte nazar aate the,
meri umar is waqat 20 saal hai aur mere pas abhi kafi waqat hai ke main duniya ke bare bare tournaments mein karkardagi pesh karon aur top position hasil karon
Nasir Iqbal: Jahan tak Misr ki baat hai to Misr se taluq rakhne wale khilari kafi ache ja rahe hain, Misr mein junior khilariyon
Junior muqablon mein Misr ke khilari benul aqwami satah par kafi behtar karkardagi ka muzahirah kar rahe hain, is waqat Misr ke benul aqawami satah ke khilari Karim Darwesh aur Amar Shabana junior khilariyon ko training de
halan ke humare khilariyon ko tawatur ke sath bare tournaments mein shirkat ke moqe mile to hum top ten khilariyon ko shikast dene main 
apni missal pesh karta hunk e agar beron e mulk hone wale shirkat ke leye mujhe sirf tickets bhi mil jayein to main bohat jald ranking behtar karte howae top ten khilariyon mein aasakta hun
Question : Ghar walon ki taraf se beron e mulk hone wale tournaments mein shirkat ke hawale se kitni support hai?Nasir Iqbal : Is waqat to tamam tar support ghar walon ki taraf se hi hai, won a sirf hum par mehnat kar rahe
hum ne himat nahi hari, hum neek niyati ke sath lage howae hain
humein umeed hai ke halat hameshah kharab nahi rahein ge aura cha waqat zaror aaye ga, kyun ke hum bhi kisi se kam nahi hain
Question : Ese kon se senior khilari hain jin ki ranking behtar hone ke imkanat hain aur wo kam iz kam top 20 mein aasakte hain?Nasir Iqbal : Senior mein is waqat mere sath Farhan Zaman, Danish Atlas, Sheikh Saqib aur Taiya
Main samajhta hunk e khilariyon ko PIA ya mukhtalif banks aur degar idaron mein mulazimat mile to phir squash ka kheel aur tezi se taraqi kare ga
Yeh 28 November 1979 ka waqea hai jab Adleed mein Torsam Khan doosre round ke match mein New Zealand ke Newan Barber ke madd e moqabil they woh tamashayon sey bhari huee galri mein apne fun ka shandar mozahra ker rahe they
Uss waqt un ke teen behtareen dost Hadayat Jahan,Gogi Alauddin, Jaif Hat, un ke qareeb maujood they aur un ki azmat ko salam ker rahe they
16 saal (years) ki umer mein woh pehli mertaba qaumi junior champion bane they aur iss tarah unki shohrat ka silsila shooru hua
1971 mein New Zealand ke daura mein unhon ne Pakistan ki numaen dagi ki 1972 mein unhon ne Western England open jeeti aur issi saal professional serkit mein agae
1973 mein unhon ne teen aham tournament jeete aur apna nam bare khelaryon ki saf mein likhwa leya ane wale saalon mein woh duniya ke top ten khelaryon mein shamil they magar
Wo guzishta dinon Russia mein hone wale World University moqablon mein Pakistan Universities ki numaindagi kar chuki hain
Higher Education unhein un ki athletics ke medan mein outstanding karkardagi par scholar ship se bhi nawaz chukka hai
wo Pakistan athletics ki pheli athlete hain jo quomi satah ke moqablon mein aik event ke doran infaradi tor par 8 gold medals hasil karne ke elawa majmoi tor par 2 darjan se zaid gold medals apne naam kar chukka hain
Wo aik behtareen sprinter aur jumper hain
Un ki shandar karkardagi ke baad ab ye baat yaqini hai ke wo bohat jald Pakistan ki numaindagi karne mein kamyab ho jayein gi
Phir jab main secondary school mein aai to aik moqe par meri sports teacher Miss Zareen ne mujhe bolaya aur kaha ke tum behtareen athlete ban sakti ho
Wahein se athletics mein meri dilchaspi barhti gai aur main ne school mein taleem ke doran hi secondary satah par hone wale muqablon mein baqaidah shirkat karni shuru ki
Question: Aap apni mojudah karkardagi se mutmain hain?Razia Sheer Khan: Main anpi karkardagi se bohat mutmain hun
Main ne pheli martaba 2010 mein hone wale quomi muqablon mein gold medal hasil kiya tha, Allah ke fazal se us waqat se ab tak meri karkardagi behtar se behtar ho rahi hai aura b tak main national level par 2 dozen se zaid
Question: Is ka matlab hai ke aap ka athletics mein jane ka fasla sahi tha?Razia Sheer Khan: Bilkul, ab jab ke main is mein achi karkardagi pesh kar rahi hun to main ye keh sakti hunk e mera athletics mein aane ka fasla sah
is ka credit main apni scholl teacher ko bhi don gi jinhon ne mujhe athlete banne par aamadah kiya
mera kaam nekniyati se mehnat karna hai aur wo main kar rahi hun
Meri karkardagi bhi sab ke samne hai, aur mujhe selectors par etemad hai
Insha Allah main bohat jald quomi team ki numaindagi karon gi
Jinhon ne meri ibtedai khamiyon ko khatam karne aur mujhe bahesiyat athlete sahi track par lane mein aham kirdar ada kiya
Is waqat M
Aslam aur Imran Khan mere coaches aur trainers hain, jo meri karkardagi ko har guzatre din ke sath behtar karne mein madad farahum kar rahe hain
abhi jab main Russia mein hone wale World Universities muqablon mein sharik thi to wahanmuqablon ka behtareen mayar dekh kar bari khush gawar heraat hoi
Har muqable mein hissa lene ke bad har athlete ko aik doctor dekhne aata tha aur usse check karta tha jab ke dosri saholaten is ke elawa thein
Ye esi cheizen hain jin se athletes ke etemad mein izafa hota hai aur wo mazid behtar karkardagi ki janib barhte hain
Left hand se khelne wale stylish batsmen ka tazkara ho to baat Pakistan ke mayanaaz opening batsmen Saeed Anwar tak zaroor pohanchegi
Aamir Sohail ke sath in ki jorhi ko Majid Khan aur Sadiq Mohammad ke bad Pakistan ko milne wala behtareen opening pair qarar diya ja sakta hai
Tahum selectors in se mayoos na hue aur inhe dobara mauqa diya gaya, jis se Saeed Anwar ne pora faida uthaya, yahan tak ke jab Saeed Anwar retire hue to in ka shumar duniya ke suff e awwal ke cricketers mein hota tha
Rote hue aate hain sab, hansta hua jo jaega,,,
      Wo muqaddar ka sikander… Janemann kehlaega…
 NED university se computer science mein engineering ki degree li aur cricket ki duniya fatah karne nikal khare hue
 Phir 1984 – 85 mein KCCA ne inhe select kar liya, bad mein inho ne UBL, ADBP, Lahore, National bank aur Pakistan ki numaiydegi ki
Saeed Anwar aksar off stump ki taraf andha dhund andaaz mein jhapat’te the, lekin inhe rokne ka koi faida nahi tha kyun ke yehi in ke liye runs banane ka sab se zarkhez ilaqa tha
One day cricket mein jab ibtedai 15 overs ke liye fielding ke hawale se baaz pabandiyan aaiyd ki gai to Saeed Anwar fifty banane ke liye goya race lagaya karte the aur apni team ko aksar flying start diya karte the
Saeed Anwar match winning innings khelne ki pori salahiyat rakhte the
Cricket ke bohat se qadamat pasand experts ne off stump ki janib yalghar karne ki Saeed Anwar ki kamzori par umgliyan uthai hain, lekin sachi baat yeh hai ke jis batsman ne off stump ki bhol bhullaiyon par mabni gher yaqeeni duniya ko musakhir kiya
 Jab wo off stump ki taraf ball ko dhondne nikalte to aisa maloom hota tha ke jaise bijli koond rahi ho
Saeed Anwar ball ko aise maarte the, jaise hathora maar rahe hon
"aksar Saeed Anwar ke bat se milaap ke bad ball bijli ki si tezi se boundary line ki taraf jati thi, jise rokne ke liye kisi bohat je jeedar fielder ki zarorat hoti thi
"
 Itna kisi hum asar batsman ne na kiya hoga
In ka sab se barhi khobi he off stump ke samandar mein jaal daalna aur wahan se runs ke rang barange moti nikalna thi
In ka sab se barha test score 188 runs not out raha
 Saeed Anwar ne 247 one day international matches mein 39
Jo inho ne May 1997 mein Chennai mein khelte hue India ke khilaf banaya tha
Is yadgaar innings mein 22 fours aur 5 sixes bhi shamil the
Yeh Saeed Anwar ka din tha
 Jab inho ne Indian balling ka bharkas nikaal diya tha
Yeh one day international cricket ka sab se barha infaradi score bhi tha
 1997 mein Wisden  new Saeed Anwar ko 5 behtareen cricketers ki top of the list mein shamil kiya
Aaj kal saed anwar aur in ki wife ka ziyada tar waqt gharibon aur hajatmando ki khidmat o a’anat mein guzarta hai
Saeed Anwar ke is safar ke dauran shaiyqeen cricket to aik stylish batsman se mehroom ho gae, lekin bohat se zaroratmandon ko un ka masiha mil gaya
Pakistani cricket ki tareekh ka behtreen batsman all time grades mein kia numaya muqam ka hasiil aur Pakistan cricket ko kia naya chehra dene wale javed Miandad 12June 1957 ko  karachi mein paida huwe
  Cricket se bohot lagao hone ki wajah se in ki khawaish thi ka in kakoi beta cricketer bane
 Javed Miandad ko bachpan se circket ka mahoul mila
 14 saal ki umar mein Javed Miandad ka shumar ache cricketers mein kiya jane lage
 Sindh under 19 ka fainal ki dono innings mein sanctuary bana kar inhone  selectors ki tawajah apni taraf mubazol karli
 Iss ka bad kardar smar shild tournament mein inhone karachi wahites ki taraf se khelte huwe nathional bank ka kheliaf 331runs banaye
Javed Miandad kay  musalsal umda kar kardagi ne rang dekhaya aur 1975 ka World Cup ka liye inhe team mein shamil karliya gaya
 World cup mein apna phela  match Javed Miandad  West Indies ka khilaf khela aur 24 runs ki pur atemad innings kheli
 Sri Lanka ka khilaf khele jane wale match mein Javed Miandad do wickets hasil kien aur not out rehte huwe 28 runs banaye
 Javed Miandad ki kardagi dekhne walon ko mutasir kar gai aur inhein six’s county ki second eleven mein jaga mil gai lakin apni umdah karkardagi ki badolat woh jald hi nai senior eleven mein shamil hogaye
 Javed Miandad ne is test ko jitane mein aham kirdar ada kiya
  Javed Miandad,  Asif Iqbal ki hamrahi inning ka agaz kiya aur apne phele hi match mein 163 runs ka bara score bana dala
 Isi sires mein unhone kia double sanctuary bana kar double sanctuary banane wale sub se kam umar player hone ka azaz hasil kiya
1978  mein  jab Bharat ki team Pakistan ka dore per ai to mulk mein cricket ki maqboliyat apne urooj per thi
 kia taweel arse bad dour riwayati hereef kia dusre may mad e muqabil the
 Javed Miandad ne Bharat ka khilaf  Faisalabad mein khele jane wale phele test mein 154 runs  banaye aur not out raha aur phir Karachi mein khele jane wale tesre test mein Javed Miandad aik aur century banai
 Asif Iqbal ka sath Miandad ki inning qabil e deed thi
 Dono ne jis andaz mein Bharti fielding ko mutashir kar ka runs samaete shayid hi aisi innings dobara kabhi dekhne mein na aye
 Aik dilchaps baat ye hai ka duniya ko wicket ka darmiyan dorna sikhne wale ye dono khilari apne apne career ki akhri inning Bharat mein khele aur dono hi iss inning mein run out  hi huwe
1979 se 1980 mein Pakistan ki team ne Bharat ka doura kiya jis mein khilaryon ki khasosan super stars karkardagi achi na rahi
  Air marshal Noor khan ko Pakistan cricket board ka sarbarah bana diya gaya unhon ne qaumi team ka caption javed Miandad ko muqarar kardiya
 Iss liye Australia  ka khilaf 3 test machetes ki series mein Javed Miandad ne team ki qayadat ki aur Pakistan  ne spiners ki madad se series jeet li
 Iss ka bad Melbrane test mein Pakistan ne aik inning mein 500 runs banaye aur match jeet liya
1982 mein England ka doure mein Imran khan ne team ki qayadat (Captain) ki in ko Miandad ka tawon hassil tha aur Imran khan ka pure career mein hata ka world cup 1992 mein bhi javed Miandad Iimran ko mouqe ki munasbat se mashware diyakarte thay
 Iss liye in ko Miandad ka sath le kar kamiyabi hasil huwe
  Javed Miandad in dino apne career ka urroj per thay
1982 mein Bharat ka khilaf Hyderabad test mein  Javed Miandad ne 280 runs banaye Imran ki qayadat (Captain) mein unhone test matches mein phele session  mein 948 runs banaye jin mein 3 centuries shamil thi
 1984 se 1985 mein Zaheer Abbas  ne New Zealand  ka doure mein captaini wapas lene se inkear kardiya to aik bar phir captainship Miandad ka pass wapas agai
 Iss doran Miandad ki purzour sifarish per Waseem Akram New Zealand ka doure ka liye muntakhib huwe to Waseem Akram ate hi Dunedin test  mein 10 wickets le kar shurat hasil karli
1986 mein Sharjah mein hone wale Australia  cup ka final ki akhri ball per Javed Miandad ne Chetan Sharma ko six mar kar Pakistan ko fatha diladi
 Iss yadgar tareekhi chahke ki badolat na sirf Javed Miandad ne Pakistan ka riwayati hareef se mini world cup ki shikast ka badla liya bal ka Bharat ko nafsiyati  tour per aisa majroh kiya ka iss ke  bad Bharat ki team kabhi Pakistan ki ankh mein ankhein dal kar na dekh saki aur bain ul aqwami muqabalo (International Cricket ) mein Pakistan ka palra Bharat ka moqable mein hamesha bhari raha
1992  ka world cup ka bad Imran khan retire hogaye to Javed Miandad ki jaga captain bane magar jald hi tareekh (history) ne kia bar phir khud ko dhuraya
        Retire hone ka bawajud cricket  se Javed Miandad ka taluq toota nahi 2008 se 1999 mein unhone ne Pakistan team ki coching ki aur aj kal Pakistan cricket board ka director general ka tour per khidmat unjam de rahe hain
 Javed Miandad  ne kahi munfarid records apne naam kiye woh musalsal 6 world cup mein hissa lene wale wahid khilari hain aur in mudad  chand  khilariuon mein se kia jin ki test matches  mein euns banane ki average kabhi 50 se niche nahi ai 2009 mein Imran khan aur Hanif Mohammad ka sath inhein 1CC ka Hall of Fame mein shamil kiya gaya
Football World Cup 2014 Brazil mein munaqid ho raha hai aur Brazil bilashubah Football se diwangi ki had tak muhabat karne walon ka mulk hai
 Jahan Football dekhna aur kheelna aik abdat ki se ahmiyat rakhta hai
 Lehazah tawaqa hai ke teams ke mabeen zabardast marka aarai ho gi
 Aaiye kurah e arz ke is aham tareen kheel ke mah e rawan mein hone wale sab se bare almi event ke bare mein jante hain
Mojudah Football World Cup tarteb ke lehaz se beaswan (20th) event hai
 Jis ke ineqad ke leye kai mumalik khuwahishmand the
 Tahum qura e fal Brazil ke naam nikla
 Is elan ke taqreban aik saal bad 17 March 2004 ko South American Football Assosiation ke mutazamin ki janib se elan kiya gaya ke World cup 2014 ke muqable Brazil mein munaqid kiye jayein ge
 Is peshraft ke baad 13 December 2006 “Brazilian Football Confederation” ke us waat ke saddar “Ricardo Teixeira” ne bazabta tor par muqabalon ke ineqad ki hami bharte howae Brazil ko FIFA ke samne bator umeedwar mulk pesh kia
 Tahum is doran Colombia ne 18 December 2006 ko elan kiya ke wo bhi muqabalon ke ineqad ke leye bator umeedwar is muqabale mein dakhil ho raha hai
 Is tarah taqreban 6 mah ki mushawarat ke bad FIFA ne 30 October 2007 ko elan kiya ke chun ke 20014 ke Football World Cup ke ineqad ki dor mein Brazil ke elawa koi mulk sharik nahi hai, lehaza 2014 ka Almi Cup Brazil mein munaqed kiya jaye ga
Football World Cup 2014 ka mezban mulk mutakhib hone ke bad almi satah par is baat ka wawela kiya gaya ke Brazil iqtesadi tor par is qabil nahi ke wo in muqabalon ke leye almi mayar ke stadiums tameer kar sake
Tahum Brazil kyun ke Football ke dewanon ka mulk hai lehaza isjazbe ko samne rakhte howae Brazilian Football Assosiation ne stadiums ki tameer ke leye din raat aik kar deye
 Tahum FIFA ne in sheharon ki tadad ko 10 se 8 tak mehdod karne ka mashwarah diya jis ke jawab mein Brazilian Football Confedrationke us waqat ke Saddar Ricardo  Teixeira ne muqabalon ke leye sheharon ki tadad 12 mutaiyan kar di
 31 May 2009 ko muqabalon ke mezban sheharon ka elan karte howae unhon ne waze kiya ke ye wo shehar hain jin ke zarye pore mulk mein Football ke tamashai muqabalon se mehzoz ho saken ge
Guzishta saal December tak naye stadiums ki tameer aur purane medanon ki tazeen o araish  ke leye Brazil Football Assosiation aur Brazilian hukumat ne 3.7 Billion Dollor ke akhrajat ka takhmina lagaya tha
 Lekin Brazilian hukumat ne naye stadiums ki tameer aur degar tamirati kaamon ka silsila jari rakha
 Stadiums ki tameer ke elawa sarkon ki tameer, Tram service, Railway line, Airports aur degar tamirati kaamon ke akhrajat ke leye mashhor maliyati adare Bloomberg ne World cup ke doran majmoi tor par 14
 Is ke bawajod World Cup par ane wale akhrajat aur stadiums ki tameer ke leye rihaishi elaqon ko khali karane par Brazil ke bare sheharon mein zabardast muzahire kiye gaye aur ye silsila jari hai
Mohammad Hafeez: Senior team ki zarorat hote hain, isi ke sath meri koshish hoti hai ke youngsters ko moqa don ta ke wo T20 se one day phir test team mein jagah banayein aur team ke kamm aate rahein, main ne 2 saal mein 12 se 13 nojawanon ko promote kiya, T20 mein Mohammad Irfan, Zulfiqar Babar, Umar Amin, Haris Sohal, Raza Hassan aur Sohab Maqsod ko laya, Nasir Jamsheed aur Ahmed Shehzad ka come back karaya, aaindah bhi ye silsila jari rakhon ga
 pichle dinon Stain ko kaamyabiyan milein mustaqbil mein mamla ulat ho sakta hai, ye nahi samajhna chaheye ke Stain ka samna karte howae mujhe koi dushwari hoti hai
Mohammad Hafeez: Cricketers umoman zehani tor par mazbot shakhsiyat ke malik hote hain, isi leye mushkil conditions mein bhi acha kheel peh karte hain, zati tor par mujhe to zarorat nahi lekin agar board samajhta hai ke team ke ese sessions hone chaheyein to main usse bora nahi samjhon ga
Mohammad Hafeez: Meri ray ke mutabiq kheelon ko siyasat se alag rakhna chaheye, Bharti league mein humare siwa pori duniya ke cricketers kheel rahe hote hain, is mein Pakistani khilariyon ko bhi moqa dena chaheye, kai baras se esa ho raha hai, ab board masle ka hal soche, IPL mein muqable se bharpor cricket hoti hai, duniya ke maroof khilariyon ke sath aap ko dressing room share karne ka moqa milta hai, Kolkata Knight Raiders ki janib se hissa leya to Ricky Pointing aur Sorove Gangoli jese seniors ke sath the, un se player sekhta bhi hai, bari tadad mein crowd ki mojudgi kheelna ka lutf barha deti hai, mujhe chance mile to event mein shirkat kar ke khushi mehsos karon ga
 Mulk se bahar kheelne ke sabab saal mein humein kai mah ahal e khana se dor rehna parta hai jo asan nahi hota, is ke bawajod team ne apni karkardagi ka mayar barqarar rakha hai
Ahmed Nadeem Qasmi iss waqt ke Badshahi masjid ke Imam Maulana Ghulam Murshid ke qaribi aziz they jo Ahmed Nadeem Qasmi Lahore laye aur unhien iss waqt ki shahar ki adbi shaksiyat Sufi Ghulam Mustafa Tabassum se motaraf karwaya

1999 mein umer bhar ki adbi khidmaat ke silay mein hukumat Pakistan ne Nishan e Imtiaz deya

�EEE€�EEE Un ke likhe howae afsane aur qalmi khake adbi halkon mein aik khas shuhrat rakhte the lekin un ki manzil afsana aue khaka nigari na thi
 Purane waqton mein jab hukumat kisi khbar ki zamanat zabt karti to mali nusan awam ke chande se pora kiya jata, lekin 1947 mein Nawa e waqat ki dobara zamanat zabt hone par bhi Hameed Nizami ne chande ka kashkol uthana quomi gherat ke munafi tasawor kiya aur apne mali wasail se zar e zamanat dakhil karaya
Qayam e Pakistan ke baad har hukumat ki ghalat policyon ko hadaf e tanqeed banate rehna un ke akhbar ki policy aur un ki zindagi ka maqsad thera aur wo intehai jurat aur bebaki se azadi e sahafat aur jamhuriyat ki jung larte rahe
Un ki haq goi o bebaki ki padash mein Nawa e waqat ko kai bar bandishon ka samna karna para magar un ke paye istaqlal mein larzish na ai
25 January 1949 ko jab Punjab assembly tor kar Governor raj nafiz kiya gaya to Hameed Nizami ne mulk ke mafad mein General Gracey ko Pakistan ke Commander In chief ke uhde se subogdosh karne ka mutalba kar deya
Hameed Nizami ne ghabhara kar hawasbakhta hone ke bajaye aik naye roznama �EEE€�EEEjihad�EEE€�EEE ka aghaz kar deya jo Nawa e waqat ki tarah logon mein bohat maqbol howa
Bila akhir Hameed Nizami ki koshishein rang laein aur June 1952 mein Nawa e waqat ka deceleration bahal ho gaya
Aap ne Ayoub Khan ke mashal law ke khilaf bhi sada e haq buland ki
1987 mein pas az marg hukumat e Punjab ne aap ki khidmat ke etiraf mein aap ko �EEE€�EEEtehreek e Pakistan gold meddle�EEE€�EEE se nawaza
Lekin nisaab se charhti aur shaiyri se ishq
15 saal ki umar se Mashq-e-Sukhan shuru ki
Ibtedah mein Jigar Murad Abadi se mutasir the aur rewayati ghazlen kehte the
Ibtedah mein Raghib Murad Abadi ke samne zaanoey tilmiz tey kiya
Sadar Ayub Khan ki ki fauji aamriyat ke khilaf awami jalson aur mushaiyron mein khul kar inqelabi nazmein parhe
Jab 1962 mein Ayub Khan ne naya dastoor diya to Murree ke aik barhe mushaiyre mein Habib Jalib ne apni mashoor baghiyana nazam
apni makhsoos tarz mein tarannum se parhi aur logon ne in ke har misrey ka sath diya
Jab general Yahya Khan ka Martial Law laga to is ke khilaf bhi Jalib ne nara-e-mastana buland kiya
 Mashraqi Pakistan mein fauji karwai ke khilaf inho ne aik nazam mushayare mein parhi, jis ke ibtedai misrey ye the
General Zia-ul-Haq ke bare mein in ki mashoor nazam ka aik shair kisi tarha bahar aa gaya
Is par inhe mulk ki bad tareen jailon main se aik, Mianwali jail mein bhi kuch arsa rehna parha, lekin inho ne apne awam dosti ke usool se kabhi rogardani nahi ki, jis ke aeteraf mein inhe 25 December 1981 ko Karachi Press club ne apna life member banaya aur in ke aezaaz main shandaar jalsa munaqid kiya
 Is ke ilawa inho ne Filmi shaiyri mein bhi khoob taba aazmai ki, maslan Raqs Zanjeer pehn kar bhi kiya jata hai ( Zarqa ) aur zulm rahe aur aman bhi ho, kya mumkin hai aesa bhi ho ( Ye Aman )
Habib Jalib ki siyasi shaiyri aaj bhi aam aadmi ko zulm ke khilaf bebaak awaz uthane ka sabaq deti hai
November 1997 main jab us waqt ke hukmaran General Parvez Musharraf ne Amergency lagai to Musharraf ke siyasi mukhalfeen ke jalson main Habib Jalib ki shaiyri dilon ko garmane ke liye parhi jati thi
 Koi nojawanon mein, koi khawaten mein aur kisi ko umar rasidah logon ki sanad e pasandedgi mili
Baz fankar maqboliyat aam hasil na kar sake lekin alla elmi o adbi satah rakhne walon mein maqbol howe
 Ghalib un shura mein se hain jin ko har tabqe ne sar aankon par bethaya lekin Ghalib ki nudrat aur buland khayali ko bayan karne ke leye ye kafi nahi, kuch aur chaheye wossat mery bayan ke leye, ap yun samajh len ke Ghalib na hote to koi aur hota lekin wo Ghalib na hota
Mirza Ghalib ne bara pur ashob daur dekha jo Saltanat e Mughliya ke zawal e akhir aur angrez ke mukamal tasalut ka zamana tha
Mirz Ghalib ki zati zindagi bhi masaib se pur rahi
Ghalib ki shakhsiyat mushkil dor mein parwan charhi
Mirza Ghalib ki shayari Ghalib ki shakhsiyat se photi hai
 Mirza Ghalib ne jis pur ashob daur mein hosh sambhala, us ka pora adrak, mukamal dukh aur insanon par jo biti, us ka bayan un ki shayari mein milta hai
Ghalib ki shakhsiyat bayakwaqat admiyat aur insaniyat ke anasir se malamal thi
, shidat e ahsas aur halat ke jabar se mehfoz rehne ka un ka apna tariqa tha aur ye zindagi se farar nahi balke us ka samna karne ke liye tha
Ghalib ne darasal urdu ko zinda rakha hai
Is zaban mein wo bayan kiya hai jis ki is se qabal nazir nahi milti
 Behad sanjidah mehsosat, afkar aur khayalat ko yun bayan karna ke goya ye mere dil mein hai,  Ghalib ka kamal hai
Jab hum ajz e bayan ka shirak hote hain to Ghalib ka koi sher humari madad ko ajata hai aur humare dil mka bojh halka kar deta hai
 Is ki wajah ye hai ke saqawat apni batni taqat par zindah rahti hai, koi kisi ko majbor nahi kar sakta ke �EEE€�EEEye zaban apnao ya ye lebas pheno
 Ghalib aaj bhi is liye pasandedah hain ke wo un mehsosta ko jo hamari giraft mein nahi ate, fankarana aur takhliqi chabuk dasti ke sath bayan kardete hain
Ghalib ki infaradiyat aur sheri azmat ka sabot ye bhi hai ke un ki ungli tham kar kitne log bare shair to ban gaye lekin kisi ko un ki tusi qarar nahi deya ja sakta kyun ke wo apni jagah mukamal shayar hain aur un ka kamal un par khatam ho gaya
 Jo shakhs apne jazbe, ahsas, fiqar o khayal mein jitna shaded aur khara ho ga, is ki tehrir o taqrir isi qadar mosar ho gi
 Ghalib ki shairi mein esi shidad e ahsas pai jati hai jo marizana nahi, is se qonotiyat ka izhar nahi hotabalke ye fikar aur khayal angez hai
Un ke har sher mein jahan e mani poshidah hota hai
Asal mein takhliq ka matlab hi ye hai ke jo nahi tha is ko banaya jaye
duniya mein koi esa fankar nahi howa jo infiradiyat aur naye pan yani originality ke fuqdan ke bawajod bara ban gaya ho
har fankar ko create ya recreate kana parta hai
Mirza Ghalib ne shayari mein pora slob hi takhliq kar dala
Humein ese tarz e shayari se roshanaz karaya jis ki phele koi nazir nahi milti
Ghalib ki shayari part dar part aur teh dar teh kholti chali jati hai
is ki satahein itni ziyadah hain ke aik janib to un ka sher aam qari ko chota hai, dosri taraf aala adbi zauq rakhne wale is ki gehri manuyat kea sir ho jate hain
 Goya sabhi sar dhunte hain, mushkil pasandi un ka mizaj sahi lekin sher ki manuyat aur is mein mujod �EEE€�EEEshairi�EEE€�EEE is par havi hoti hai
 Falsafyana mozuat  ko unhon en jis aasani se sheri takhliq ke qalb mein dhala is ki misl na un se phele thi, na un ke bad mein, un ki shairi ki afaqiyat aur lafani hone ke leyeyehi dalil kafi hai ke wo aah ki nasal mein bhi maqbol hain
Ye nasal kalam e Ghalib ki is manuyat ko pa rahi hai jo is ke sciencesi dor ki zarorat hai kyun ke Ghalib ki fikar darasal fitrat ke qarib tar aur sciencesi hai chunacha ye baat herankun nahi honi chaheye ke Ghalib kisi sarkari sarparasti ke bagheir maqboliyat mein tamam shora se aage hain
Ghalib ke kalam se shora ko ye sekhna chaheye ke  apne dork o batin mein yun sachai se ameza aur mehsos kiya jaye ke khayal sheri takhliq ban kar baramad ho aur is mein kahein masnoi pan ka shuba tak na ho
Yehi shairi na sirf apne dor ki tasveer hoti hai balke mustaqbil mein bhi zinda rahti hai
Leki is ke leye taqatwar takhliqi shakhsiyat ki zarorat hoti hai kyun ke ye nihayat mushkil kaam hai
Ghalib hama jahat takhliqi fankar the
Mirza Ghalib ki shakhsiyat bari aur ghair mamoli thi
Yehi wajah hai ke un ka izhar ghair mamoli hota tha
 Maslan un ki shairana azmat nasar mein un ki barai ko kam nahi kar sakti, un ki tamam hi tehriron mein WIT jhalakti hai lekin nasar nigari mein ye kamal numaya hai
Un mein nasar nigari ka khudadad johar tha
 Jis tarah un ki shairi anokhi hai, un ke khotot bhi nasar nigari ken aye dor ka aghaz hain
Un ke tarz e tehrir ne khat nawisi ko bilmushafa goftogo bana deya
Ghalib ne gehre dukh ko mazah aur zarafat ki dhal ke zarye khud par hawi hone se roka
Un ke khotot is ki waze missal hain
Zarafat ke makhsos andaz ne un ke khotot ko dilchasp nasar nigari bana deya
Ghalib ki takhliq taqat ka sab se bara sabot ye hai ke humari tehzib aur humare shaor par Ghalib ka asar ghalib hai
Ghalib par bohat likha gaya hai, aur likha jata rahe ga, haqeeqat to ye hai ke is azeem fankar par jitna likha jaye kam hai
Tadris ka shuba chorne ke bad aap ne likhne ko apna mustakil zariya e mash banaya aur kai novel aur afsanwi majmoye likhe
Aap ka daira e tehrir sirf baron tak hi mehdod na tha balke bachon ke leye bhi aap ne bohat si kahaniyan likhein
 Is ke elawa aap ne apni sawanah umri par mabni teen kitabein marbaka, memories of my childhood aur dairy of Selma Lagerloflik hein
Aap ki aalmi khidmat ka har satah par eteraf kiya gaya
1909 mein Selma Lagerlof ko adab ka Nobel Prize mila aur 1914 mein Swedish academy ne aap ko apna rukun muntakhib kiya
 Selma Lagerlof bayak waqat mahir e taleem, Novel nigar, kahani kar, shayar, sawanah nigar, khud nosht nigar aur drama nigar thein
Selma Lagerlof se phele Swedish adab mein romaniyat ka dor dora tha
Aap ne mulki adab ko nai jahton se roshanas karaya
Selma Lagerlof ke novel aur kahaniyon ke mutarajim duniya ki kai zabanon mein ho chuke hain
Urdu ke mashor afsana nigar Khwaja Ahmed Abbas ka afsana �EEE€�EEEAbabeel�EEE€�EEE Selma Lagerlof hi ki aik kahani se makhoz hai
Selma Lagerlofne apne mulk ki lok kahaniyon ko aik naye andaz aur mufarid tanazur mein pesh karne ki tarz dali
Selma Lagerlof ka tarz e tehrir behad marsa aur dil nasheen tha
Selma Lagerlof ke andaz e tehrir par Scotland ke musanif aue tarikh nigar Thomas Carlyle ka asar nazar aata hai
Selma Lagerlof ki tehrir aik fitri tazgi leye howae hai jo parhne wale par nehayat khushgawar tasur chorti hai
Selma Lagerlof ka inteqal 16th March 1940 ko howa lekin apne kaam ki badolat aap ka naam aaj tak zindah hai
Jang-e-azeem doym ke zamane main ap ko fauj main publicity officer muqarrar kiya gaya
App tehreek e Pakistan ke sar garam rukun rahe
Qeyam-e-Pakistan ke bad ap afwaj-e-Pakistan mein director general of morals aur amoor-e-Kashmir ke nigran muqarrar hue
 Hafee Jullandhury  mein Pak, Bharat jung 1965 mein Pakistan ke liye kaye Milli Naghmay likhe
Hafeez Jullandhuri shaiyr ki hesiyat se nazam aur ghazal dono par qadir thay
Khusoosan Urdu geet nigari mein Azmat ullah Khan ke bad dosra naam Hafeez Jullandhuri ka ata hai
Ap ke bachon ke geeton ke sath majmouy shaey hue
 Is ke ilawa ap ki nazmon, geeton aur ghazlon ke majmou mein naghma zaar, sozosaaz, tulkhaba sheeren, haft-e-peykar aur chiyonti nama shamil hai
Ap ki khidmat ke aeteraf mein hukoomat-e-Pakistan ki taraf se ap ko Hilal-e-Imtiaz aur Husn-e-Karkardgi ke sadarti award diya gaya
In ki shahkar tasneef �EEE€�EEE Shahnama-e-Islam �EEE€�EEE ne inhe maqbooliyat ki bulandi par pohncha diya
Ye Islam ki Nazmi tareekh ka ek record hai
In ki shaiyri mein bar-e-sagheer ke manazir ki tasveer hai aur in ki shiayri mein Hindi aur Urdu ki bohat khoobsurat aamesizh paai jati hai jo mushtarka riwayat ki tasveer hai
Hafeez Jalandhari aik nihayat maqbool shaiyr the aur apne ashaar ke ilawa apni khush tabie ke liye bhi shohrat rakhte the
Wo sarhad ke dono atraf yaksan shohrat rakhte the
Hafeez Jalandhari pakistan ke qaumi shaiyr the magar in ki maqbooliyat bharat mein bhi kam nahi thi
Taqseem mulk se qabal he wo apni adbi hesiyat manwa chuke hai
Hafeez Jullandhuri ki shaiyri ki teesri khobi is ki ghanaiyat hai
 Wo khud bhi mutarannum the, is liye inho na aesi lafziyat ka intekhab kiya jo ghanaiyat ke peykar par pore utarte hai
Inho ne dosri jang-e-azeem ke zamane mein fauji geet likhe the aur geet ko bhi inho ne nae peykar ata kiye
Shayad isi liye aj tak Hafeez jullandhuri ki shanakht �EEE€�EEE Abi Tou Main Jawan Hoon �EEE€�EEE ke hawale se ki jati hai
 Bilashuba ye ek pur asar geet hai, kyun ke is mein jo alfaz istemaal kiye gae hai, wo apni jagah par nageene ki tarha jarhe hue hai aur samaey ke dil par gehra asar chorte hai
Lekin Haqeeqat ye bhi hai ke in ki ghazlon ka sarmaya kafi hai aur Hafeez Jullandhuri khud ko ghazal go kehalwana pasand karte the
Sab se barhe baat ye hai ke silees zuban ka istemaal kiya aur gird-o-pesh ke waqeyat ko apni ghazlon ka mauzoo banaya
Ek tarha se inho ne ghazal ko fitri poshak ata ki
In ke haan rewayat sebaghawat milti hai
 In ke kuch ashaar to aaj ke halaat ka ahata kar lete hai, in ki hesiyat mawraey asar hai
Jab Pakistan mein Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ki hukoomat thi to Hafeez Sahab chand wajohaat se is hukoomat se bohat shaki the
 Taqreer mein to is ka izhaar nahi kiya, lekin ashaar mein kafi hadf-e-malamat banaya
Hafeez behraal Urdu ke shairi adab mein qabil-e-zikar hesiyat ke malik hai aur inho ne Urdu shaiyri ko jo kuch diya hai
 Us ka Urdu adab mein numaya maqam hai, in ke bohat se ashaar Sehl-e-mumtana ki hesiyat rakhte hai
In ki shaeri kainat 6 dehaiyon par muheet hai aur in ka ye dawa durust hai
Inho ne use ghalat sabit karne ke liye pehle jasoosi dunya aur phir Imran series shuru ki
 Ibne Safi ke baqol, in ke sirf 8 novelon ke markazi khayal kisi aur se mustaar liye hai, baqi ke 245 novel mukammal tor par in ke apne hai
Lekin 1963 main he is marz se na sirf sanbhala liya bal ke Imran series ka behtreen novel derh matwale bhi likha
Janab Ibn-e-Safi bilashuba Urdu ke sab se barhe jasoosi novel nigar hai aur in ki tehreeron mein aesa jadoo hai ke 50 saal likhe gae novel jab aaj ke daur ka bhi insaan parhta hai to wo sab bhool jata hai
Ibn-e-Safi ka lagaya hua pauda Imran series is qadar tanawar hua ke aaj tak yah samarbaar hai aur kae aik musannifeen is silsile ko aage barha rahe hai
Professor DrSyed Muhammad Abu Alkhair Kashfi ne Ibn-e-Safi ko yun khiraj-e-tehseen pesh kiya
�EEE€�EEE Maine ne kabhi Ibn-e-Safi ke novelon ko kitabon ke darmiyan chupa kar nahi rakha
 Hamare intellectual ise aik sub standard mawad gardantey hai, lekin un mein se koi bhi Ibn-e-Safi ke takhleeqi zehan ka muqabla nahi kar sakta
 Koi mujh se pochta hai ke aap Ibn-e-Safi ke novel kyun parhte hai to main jawab deta hoon, kyun ke Ibn-e-Safi hamare kae novel nigaron se behtar zuban likhte hai

Is role ko karte hue khushi ho rahi thi aur khauf bhi mehsoos ho raha tha

Kyun key eh meri pehli tarjeeh hai

Koi bhi film sign karne se pehle tamam pehloun ka jaiyza longa, sirf aik film ke liye barson ka image to kharab nahi kar sakta
Mujhe bhi gane ka shauq tha, magar sirf gungunane ki had tak

Phir un logon ne he mashwara diya ke is shauq ko aage barhao, tab achanak he mujhe aik serial ke title song ki offer hui

Mere liye to bohat acha raha

Ji han, main doston ko apni zindagi ka aeham hissa samjhta hon
Waise to sab se ache talluqaat hain
Lekin bhai aur biwi mere qareebi dost hain
Yeh bohat zarori hai ke agar biwi ko apna dost samajh kar us se har achi buri baat share ki jaey, to aitemad barhega aur wo bhi apne aap ko aeham samjhegi
Agar use kisi third person se koi baat maloom hui to use is liye aehmiyat nahi degi kyun ke wo pehle se is ke barey mein janti hai
Lehaza hum biwi ko apna dost aur raazdar banae rakhen to sab se ziyada faiyda hum he ko ho ga aur ghar ka mahaul bhi pur sukoon rahega

Abid Ali ko Pakistani tv screen ke golden dor ka numaindah adakar kaha jata hai
Apni bhar pur awaz, mardana  wajahat aur purtasur chehre ke bais wo pheli hi nazar mein nazreen ko bha gaye
Is ke bad unhon ne kamyab dramon ko aik qatar laga di balke ye kehna behtar ho ga ke aik zamane mein Abid Ali ki mojudgi kisi bhi drama ki kamyabi ki zamin samjhi jane lagi thi
Atta Shad ne Abid Ali mein chupe here ko bhanp liya aur un ki awaz ki tarifon ke pul bandhte howe unhen radio par kaam karne ki dawat di
Lahore mein tv ki chamak aur glamour ki chakachond ne is nojawan ko apni bahon mein leya aur raaton raat shorat ki bulandiyan te karte howe Abid Ali tv ke mashhor fankaron ki fehrist mein shamil ho gaye
Lekin tv par dakhla unhen kisi chor darwaze ya achanak chance ke zariye nahi balke mutadid bar audition ke marahil se guzarne aur apne intekhab ki merit sabit karne ke bad hi mila
Is ke elawa bhi unhon ne tv ke sath sath Pakistani filmon mein apni adakari ke johar dikhaye
Fan e adakari ke shobe mein Abid Ali ko aik legend ki hesiyat hasil hai
Wo guzarte waqat ke sath apni adakari mein tano paida karne ke mahir hain
Chunacha unhon ne Hollywood ke adakaron ki rah par chalte howe character acting par tawaja di aur chotte kirdaron ko bhi apni jandar performance se bara bana kar dikha diya
Abid Ali Pakistan ke wo fankar hain jinhon ne pichle 40 salon mein betakan kaam kiya aur adakaron ki 3 naslon ke sath na sirf adakari ki balke nazreen ki 3 naslon ko apne fan se mehzoz bhi kiya
Wo aaj bhi kisi drame ke set par hon to nihayat inkasari aur piyar ke sath apne juniors ko apna fan aik ustad ki tarha muntaqil kar rahe hote hain
Wo dheme lehje mein goftogo karne wale aik khush shakal, khush libas aur khush goftar fankar hain
Sirf kaam se kaam rakhna un ka style  aur sab se dosti rakhna un ka mizaj hai
Wo apne tabnak mazi se jure rehne ke bawajod jadid dor ke taqazon se bhi khud ko humahang rakhe howe hain
"Amoman log samajhte hain ke jhok siyal hi Abid Ali ki pheli serial thi halan ke sach ye hai ke unhon ne sab se phele Saleem Chishtti le likhe howe kheel ""zanjeer"" mein adakari ki"
Unhon ne aik ese dor mein shohrat hasil ki jab tv par aana aur adakari karna nihayat mushkil kaam tasawor hota tha

Ustad Bare Ghulam Ali Khan ne mosiqi ke tamam raz Master Inayat Hussain par wa kar deye aur un ki khososi tawajah ne Master Inayat Hussain mein ese roshni paida ki jis ka izhar unhon ne apni filmi mosiqi mein is tarah kiya ke un ke banaye howae geet amar ho gaye aur aaj bhi sune walon ke kanon mein ras gholte hain
Mumbai aur Kolkata ke mukhtalif theateron mein kaam kiya aur neem classical gaiki mein un ka naam bare ehtaran se leya jane laga
Master Inayat Hussain ne in gramophone companies mein nihayat umdah aur arfa kaam kiya
Aaj jab ke nifs sadi se ziyadah arsa ho chukka hai,hawwa e nobahar ki tarah is ke subuk jhunke mashor kun hain
Malka e mosiqi Roshan Aara Begum ki gai hoi thumri ho ya dadra, ya phir Malka e Phukhraj jesi sahib e aslob maghniya ki gai hoi ghazal, Master Inayat Hussain ne har sif e mosiqi aur har fankar ke sath pora pora insaf kiya
Apni uhad ke nihayat pur soz aur surile golokara Zenat Begum ke gale se ese ese Urdu aur Punjabi geet gawaye jis ki missal milna mushkail hai
Master Inayat Hussain ne gramophone company ke sath taqreban 9 baras kaam kiya, is ke bad 1946 mein un ko aik Punjabi film “kamli” mili jo Lahore hi mein taiyar hoi
Is film mein Master Inayat Hussain ne Ustad Barkat Ali Khan se bhi geet gawaya tha
Qayam e Pakistan ke baad un ki pheli film “hichkole” thijo 1949 mein numaish ke leye pesh hoi
Is ki wajah ye thi ke wo dheme mizaj ke insan the aur kaam apni lagan se karte the
dosri aik wajah ye bhi thi ke wo ziyadah tar nagme ragon mein banate the jis ke leye waqat aur mehnat darker hote hain
Yehi wajah hai ke film “anar kali” mein Anwar Kamal Pasha ki jald bazi ki wajah se Master Inayat Hussain ne teen nagme compose karne ke bad Anwar Kamal Pasha ko jawab de deya kyun ke wo kaam jaldi chahate the aur Master Inayat Hussain apni tabyat ke mutabiq kaam karna chahate the
Un ki tarteb di hoi mosiqi mein film “gum naam” mein Iqbal Bano ka gaya howa geet “payal mein geet hain cham cham ke” na sirf zaban e zad e aam howa balke Iqbal Bano ko bhi shuhrat ki bulandion par le gaya
Bol the “ulfat ki nai manzil ko chala” is gane ne bhi us dor mein tehalka macha deyaaur zaban e zad o aam howa
Film “ishq par zor nahi” ka ye geet sun kar bhi log jhoom uthte hain “dil deta ro ro duhai kisi se koi payar na kare
Ye film box office par super hit thi
Is ki mosiqi itni lajawab thi ke Mala Begum ki pehchan ban gai
Is film mein Mala begum ne itne khubsorat geet gaye ke aaj bhi logon ko bhale lagte hain
Master Inayat Hussain ke 1949 se 1965 tak ke dor ko aap aik sunehri dork eh sakte hain
Jis mein unhon ne khubsorat naghmat takhliq kiye
Koi geet ya ghazal rag Malkonas, Malhar, pahari aur Je je winti mein hai, kahein Bheron hai to kisi mein Darbari ka teez aahang hai aur ye turra e imtiaz sirf Master Inayat Hussain ka hai
Aap tamam golokaron se mehnat karwate the is leye un ko mushkil mosikar bhi kaha jata tha
Is doran bhi khubsorat kaam kiya
Is dor mein un ki shuhra e afaq film “mola jaat” bhi shamil hai jis ne Pakistan ki tarikh mein record business kiya aur sab se ziyadah cinema haalon mein numaish pazeer rahi
Master Inayat Hussain ne ghair filmi ghazalen aur geet bhi compose kiye jin mein Inayat Hussain Bhatti, Munawar Sultana, Malka e Pukhraj,Dilshad Begum aur Malka e mosiqi Roshan Aara Begum ne awaza ka jadu jagaya
Inhe agar husun ka majmooa kaha jae to be jana ho ga, kyun ke aisa lagta hai ke qudrat ne tamam tar khobiyan in ke paikar mein yakja kardi hain
Tahum in ki shohrat mein in ki fankarana salahiyaton ka bhi barha dakhal hai
Kyun ke wo acting ke sath fun e raqs mein bhi apna jawab nahi rakhti
Behar e taur isi 3 minute ke dance ki badaulat wo 1976 mein kae hit movies ke sath South film industry ki barhi star ban chuki thin
Jaya ko bohat se aise kirdar mile jin mein inhe acting ke johar dikhane ka mauqa mila
Jis mein raqs ki khudadad salahiyatein thin
Yeh khasi glamorous film thi, jis ke raqs o naghmaat ne charon taraf aik dhoom macha di thi
Is song par Jaya Prada ne bohat kamal ka raqs kiya
Tab Jaya ne Hindi seekhna shuru ki aur bollywood film Kaam Chor mein rawani ke sath Hindi bolti hui jalwagar hui
Sharabi bhi super hit film thi
Jis ka aik song is qadar maqbool hua tha ke is ke bolon ki bazagisht aaj bhi suni ja sakti hai
Amitabh Bachan aur Jaya Prada par filmae gae, is gane ke bol kuch yun the ke Inteha Ho Gai Intezar Ki, Aai Na Kuch Khabar Mere Yaar Ki… Film Sharabi mein acting ke sath Jaya Prada ki raqs ki salahiyatein urooj par nazar aati hain
Lekin Jaya Prada ka fun Amitabh Bachan ke chaa jane wali shakhsiyat ke saamne jaise kuch aur nikhar kar samne aaya
Khas taur se film Sharabi ke aik intehai maqbool gane Mujhe Nau Lakha Manga De Rey O Sayyan Dewane… par raqs karte hue wo bilashuba apne fun ke joban par nazar aati hain
In ka yehi image us waqt bohat kaam aya, jab inho ne siyasat ka rukh kiya
Jaya Prada ka shumar aesi khush qismat khuwateen mein hota hai
Jinhe 9 umri se he apne husun ka ehsaas ho jata hai
Tahum 1994 mein jab 32 saal ki umer mein Jaya Prada ne siyasat mein qadam rakha to in ki filmy masrofiyat kam ho gai aur wo pukhta qisam ke role muntakhib karne lagi

Attaullah Esakhelvi has been sung forty thousand songs in seven languages of Pakistan
In this page you can see the biography of Ataullah Esakhelvi
Ataullah Niazi ne 19 August 1951 ko Mianwali ke village Esakhel ke aik sadah aur mazhabi gharane mein janam liya
Inho ne ibtedai taleem maqami school aur deeni madarsey se hasil ki, jo khandan aur mahaul ki riwayat thi, lekin in ki riwayat shikan soch aur khayalaat inhe muztarib rakhte
Mehnat mazdoori hotel mein nokri, truck driving, gharz zinda rehne ke liye inho ne kya kuch nahi kiya
Gardish ayyam inhe Faisalabad le gai, jahan wo auto rickshaw chalate rahe
Parhe likhe log jinhe gaeyki aur mauseeqi se shinasaai ka zaaym tha
Yeh in ki pehli shadi thi, jis se in ka aik beta bhi hai
In ki dosri shadi apne daur ki famous qalmi actress Bazgha se hui, jin se in ke 2 bache beta Sanwal aur beti Laraib hain
In dono bachon ki paidaish London mein he hui
Laraib ki shadi bhi aik Pakistani ladke se London mein he hui, jab ke Sanwal singing ka shauq rakhte hain
Islamabad mein derina dost Yasir Noman, jinho ne lok virsa mein un ki sab se ziyada recording ki, mohabbat se Lala ( Barha Bhai ) pukarte the
Wo Pakistan ki 7 languages mein ab tak 40,000 songs gaa chuke hain
Bushra Ansari is a Pakistani drama actress, presenter, host, comedian, singer and play writer also
She married with She started her career as a child star in children music show “ Kalbon Ki Mala ” from PTV channel
First time Bushra Ansari performed in the Iqbal Ansari’s drama, and then she participated in the different shows and dramas of PTV channel
She played a nurse role in “Emergency Ward” drama
Bushra Ansari well known from the Anwar Maqsood’s drama “Shosha” as a role of Bijli
 Bushra Ansari performed in well known dramas like, Neeli Dhoop, Kuch Dil Ne Kaha, Makaan, Fifty Fifty, Dolly Ki Aaegi Baraat, Annie Ki Aaegi Baraat, Mera Naseeb, Bilqees Kaur, Mere Dard ko Jo Zuban Mile etc
Now she is working in the Pakistan Idol as a judge with Hadiqa Kiyani and Ali Azmat from Geo TV
In this page, you can see  Bushra Ansari biography in Urdr
Bushra Ansari ki sakhsiyat ke kae roop hain
Bushra Ansari ne aik child performer ke taur par apna career shuru kiya aur guzishta 4 dihaiyon se television screen par mukhtalif andaaz mein apne fun ka jadoo jaga rahi hain
is mein koi shak nahi ke wo khudadad salahiyaton ki malik hain, lekin yeh credit bhi unhi ko jata hai ke inho ne un salahiyaton ko behtar tariqey se istemal kar ke wo maqam hasil kar liya hai
Early life : Bushra Ansari namwar adeeb aur sahafi Ahmed bashir ki beti hain
Lady griffin school Lahore se taleem mukammal karne ke bad Lahore college for Women se Intermediate kiya
Jab ke BA ki degree Waqarunnisa college for Women se hasil ki
Bushra Ansari ki shadi 1978 mein Tv producer Iqbal Ansari se hui
Jab wo apne parents ke sath Islamabad muntaqil hui
Yeh aik kat putli show tha, jis ke kirdar Uncle Sargam, Heega aur Masi Musibtey aaj bhi logon ke zehno mein zinda hain
Bushra ne is show mein sharmeeli ke character ke liye apni awaz record karwai thi
Is ke bad wo PTV ke mukhtalif shows aur dramas mein baqaiydgi se hissa lene lagein
Emergency ward mein inho ne aik nurse ka role nibhaya
Is show mein Bushra Ansari ne Shakeel ki larhaka biwi ka role kiya tha
Bushra Ansari ne na sirf mazahiya role he nahi bal ke sanjeeda acting mein bhi apni salahiyat ka bharpor muzahira kiya
Neeli Dhoop, Makaan, Kuch Dil Ne Kaha aur deegar dramas mein in ki acting dekhne se talluq rakhti hai

Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto Pakistan kay pehlay muntakhab Wazir-e-Azam aur siasat ko drawing room say nikal kar awam mein lanay walay pehlay Pakistani rahnuma 5 January 1927 ko Sir Shahnawaz Bhutto kay han Al Murtaza  Larkana Sindh mein  paida huye.
Sir Shahnawaz Bhutto namwar siasatdan aur tehreek-e-Pakistan kay markazi rehnumaon mein say aik thay aur Bar-e-Saghir Pak o Hind mein Sindh aur Bombay ki saisat kay markazi satoon manay jatay thay.
Bhutto khandan Sindh anay say qabal zila Hisar kay aham qasba Sarsa kay aik gaon Mozu Bhutto mein abad tha aur isi monasbat say usey Bhutto kaha jata hai. 
Yeh gaon ab bhi sarsawati kay kinaray abad hai. Sarsa aik aham railway station bhi tha. 
Sikhon kay zamanay mein jab dariya saraswati khushk ho gia aur 
iss khandan kay afrad Sindh ki taraaf hijrat kerkay Larkana mein moqeem ho gaye.
aur Pakistani tareekh per app nay itnay gehray asrat morattab keyeh kay inka ahatah karna kai jildon ka matqazi hay.
Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto nay Bishop High School Karachi sa ibtadai taleem hasil ki aur Cathedral High School Bombay say December 1946 mein Senior Cambridge ka imtahan pass kia September 1947 mein unhain America mein Los Angles ki junubi California University mein dakil karwadia gaya 1950 mein unho nay siasiat mein BA owners kiya.
Iss kay bad unhon nay Christ Church College Oxford University mein dakhla lia jahan say  1952 mein unhon ney MA owners ki dirge hasil ki.
Taleem say farig hokar woh 1953 mein Pakistan lautay aur amli zindagi ka aaghaz kia.
Woh Sindh Muslim Law College mein juz waqti professor rahay aur wakalat bhi ki 
Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto  dar asal amli siasat mein hissah lanay kay khahan thay
8 October 1958 ko mulk mein Martial Law laga to General Ayub Khan ko apni Martial Law Cabnate kay leye qabil-e-atemad aur ahal kar wazra darkar thay Jo puranay siasat danon mein say na hon.
Chunanchay  unhon nay Iskander Mirza ki shafarish per Zulfiqar Ali Bhutu ko apni cabina mein shamil kar lia aur Commerce Ministry un kay hissay mein aie 
agarchay bunyadi taur per woh kharja amoor mein dilchaspi rakhtay thay 
Jnauary 1960 mein un kay mehakamy badal deye gaie aur woh itlaat aur qoumi tameer nou kay wazir bana deye gai. 
Baad azan indhan qudrati wasail aur bijli kay mehakamay bhi unhain hi sonp deye gai
chunanchay January 1963 mein unhain wizarat kharja daydi gai.
Halat ka baghor jaiza lanay kay bad 30 November 1967 ko Lahore mein unhon nay Pakistan People’s party kay qiyam ka allan ker deya.
Magrabi mofkain kay motala nay unhain magrabi andaz siasat sikhaya. Woh awam ki nafsiat say agah thay aur un kay jazbat ko ubharna khub jantay tahy.
Yeh 2 martaba Russia ke president aur aik martaba prime minister ban chuke hain. 
Putin Russia sarbarah mumlikat banne wale sab se kam umer shakhs hain, inho ne yeh aezaaz sirf 48 baras ki umer mein hasil kiya.
Inhe zehni aur jismani har 2 lihaaz se aik sakhtgeer leader samjha jata hai.
Mauqir American jareede “ Time Magazine ” ne Putin ki qaidana salahiyaton ka aiteraf karte hue inhe 2007 ka Person of the year yani 2007 ki aeham tareen shakhsiyat qaraar diya hai.
Vladimir Putin ne 7 October 1952 ko sabqa soviet union ke shehar Lennon Grad ke aik ghareeb Russian Orthodox Christian family mein janam liya. 
Putin ko detective films se dili shaggaf tha aur inhe se mutassir ho kar inho ne qanoondaan ke bajae suragh risa’an banne ka faisla kiya aur soviet khufiya agency “ KGB ” mein shamoliyat ikhteyar kar li.
26 March 2000 ko Vladimir Putin ko Russia ka naya sarbarah mumlikat muntakhib kar liya gaya.
Vladimir Putin 2 martaba sadar muntakhib ho chuke hain aur in ki meyaad March 2008 mein khatam ho rahi thi lekin tab bhi in ka yehi kehna tha ke Russia ki taraqqi ke liye maujoda policies ka tasalsul aur khud in ka iqtedar mein rehna zarori hai.
Maino ne 9 December 1946 ko Italy ke qasbe Luciana ke aik mutawasit gharane mein aankh kholi.
 Rajiv Gandhi se in ki mulaqat Cambridge mein hui, jahan dono zair e taleem the.
 Is mulaqat se Sonia Gandhi ki zindagi he badal daali. 
Jahan in ki Saas Indra Gandhi prime minister ban chuki thin.
Sonia Gandhi ko congress ki president chunn liya gaya aur 1999 mein wo parliament ki rukun muntakhib ho gai.
Pakistan mein awami saisat ko aik naya rukh aur naya cheyhrah danay walay Muttahida Qaumi Movement kay bani aur Quaid Janab Altaf Hussain 17 September 1953 ko Karachi mein aik ghareb gharanay mein paida huye.
Unkay walid Nazeer Hussain aur walda Khursheed Begum dono ka taluq India kay sehar Aagrah kay mazhabi gharano say tha.

Shuru Huwa Tha
Pyari si TV journalist Reham Khan ne isi saal January mein Islamabad mein munaqida aik sada si taqreeb mein Pakistan ke maqbool politician aur sabiq cricketer Imran Khan se shadi ki thi.
 Dubli patli aur nafees shakhsiyat ki malik Reham Khan lawn ki shalwar qameez mein malboos thin.
Inho ne 3 mukhtalif TV channels par prime time anchor person ke taur par program pesh kiye, is dauran inho ne suff e awwal ke taqriban sab he siyasatdano ke interview kiye, mukhtalif aeham waqeyaat ki coverage ki aur halaat hazira se mutalliq sab he mauzoaat par baat ki.
Agarcha Reham Khan ko PTI ya province NWFP mein qaiym is ki hukomat mein koi auhda nhi diya gaya.
Is sawaal par ke kya shadi ke baad Imran Khan ne kabhi aap se kaha ke apna sir dhanpe ?
Reham Khan yun goya hui.
Haqiqat yeh hai ke main ne un se kaha tha.
  Wo bohat ziyada sharmile hain.
yeh kya hai
Is sawal ke jawab mein ke shadi se pehle Imran ke barey mein aap ke kya khayalat the
Reham Khan ka kehna tha
Hum ne istafsar kiya ke aaya Imran aik ache Baap hain ?
Log sochte honge ke shadi ke hawale se hamare masail kya the 
 Misaal ke taur par meri beti Ridha ne A level mukammal kar liya hai, idher Suleman ne bhi, to masla yeh tha ke kabhi kisi ko school trip par jana hai to kabhi kisi ko is ki apni trip par. 
Khaas taur par bachon ke muaamle mein.
Bachon ki nigehdasht ke hawale se Reham Khan ka kehna tha
Anchor person ke taur par apne career ke barey mein aik sawal ka jawab dete hue Reham Khan yun goya hue
Main ne is ka interview karne ke liye bajore agency ka safar kiya.
Jab Reham Khan se pocha gaya ke wo aik politician ki wife ke taur par apne nae kirdar ko kis nazar se dekhti hain
Reham Khan ka jawab tha
Apni shadi ke barey mein izhaar e khayalaat karte hue Reham Khan na kaha
Is sawal ke jawab mein ke aap ko Pakistan ke aik nihayat maqbool politician ke sath shadi ke bad kaisa lagta hai ???
Is par Imran ne kaha, Kaisa celebrity status
Jab wo ghar aate hain to apna phone door rakh dete hain. 
Jab yeh pocha gaya ke aap NWFP mein kya kar raahi hain ?
Yeh azam main ne Imran Khan ke sath shadi se bhi pehle se kiya hua tha.
Main is hawale se 2 films bana rahi hon.
Jis ki kahani hamare jaisi aik normal aur modern pakhtun family ke
・Love Triangle ・se mutalliq ho gi.
Jewelry ke hawale se baat karte hue Reham Khan ne bataya
Jahan se main apne liye jewelry leti hon.
Apni dili aarzo ke hawale se Reham Khan ne bataya
Inhe rehaish ke liye ghar milna chahiye.
Muaashre mein khuwateen ke maqaam ke hawale se Reham Khan ne apne khayalaat ka izhaar kuch yun kiya

Helen Keller 1880 mein American riyasta Alabama ke aik qasbe mein paida hoein.
Phir us ne apni gurya aur habshi bawarchi ki beti ke sath khelna shuru kiya.
Unho ne aik jagah parha ke kisi shakhs ne aik behri aur andhi aurat ko parhna likhna sikhaya tha.
Mukhtalif jagah dar badar ho kar us ki waldah telephone ke mujid doctor Graham Bell se milein aur unhon ne unhen special bachon ki ustani Miss Eon Miens Field Salon tak pohancha diya.
Miss Salon ne Helen Keller ke hath par alfaz likh likh kar ehsasat ke zarye ese horf e tahaji se mutarif karaya. 
Helen Keller ke hath mein gurya pakra kar wo us ke hath par gurya ke horf e tahaji likhti.
Helen Keller ki taleem ka dosra dor us waqat shuru howa jab us ki ustad ne brills par chapi hoi kitabein mangwaein.
Jese ji use parhna likhna agaya wo khud khatot likhne lagi.
Jab khud us ke pas koi khat aata to wo apni unglion se sotor ka matlab nikalti.
Jab Helen Keller ki umar 8 saal ki hoi to Miss Salon ne te kiya ke ab wo waqat aagaya hai ke wo dosre bachon se mile.
Chunacha wo use Boston Perkins Institute tuition le gai.
Wo hamesha har khat ka jawab deti.
Shehar ki nisbat Helen ko dehat ka muhol ziyadah pasand tha. 
Wo fitrat ko nihayat qareeb se dekhna pasand karti thi.
Helen Keller ne 88 saal ki taweel umar pai aur 1968 mein us ka inteqal howa.

Besween sadi (20th century) mein insaniyat ki khidmat ke leye zindagi waqf kae dene wale afrad aur idaron mein aik numaya tareen naam Mother Teresa aur un ke qaim kardah idare ka hai.

Mother Teresa 26 August 1910 mein Maqdonia ke qazbe Skopje mein paida hoein.
Mother Teresa ke walden Albania se taluq rakhte the.
 Skopje us waqat Usmania saltanat ka aik hissa tha. Aaj kale se Maqdonia ke dar ul hukumat ki hesiyat hasil hai.
Mother Teresa mazhaban Roman Catholic Esai thein.
18 saal ki umar mein unhon ne mazhabi jazbe ke zere asar Ireland ke mazhabi idare order of the sisters of aur lady of Loreto mein dakhla le leya.
Mother Teresa ne mazhabi tarbiyat Ireland ke shehar Dublin aur India ke shehar Dar jeeling mein hasil ki. 
Kolkata mein Roman Catholic High School ke tehat kaam karte howae Mother Teresa ko wahan rehne walon ka qareeb se mushahidah karne ka moqa mila. 
Mother Teresa ke idare ka hissa banne wale logon ko char (4) ehad karna parte the gharibana tarz e zindagi, farman bardari aur tajrad ke bunyadi uhadon ke elawa chotha ehad ye karna parta tha ke wo apni sari zidagi gharibon ki khidmat ke leye waqf kar dein ge.
 Mother Teresa ki khidmat ke eteraf mein unhein 1979 mein aman ke Noble Inaam se nawaza gaya.
Isi saal Mother Teresa ka inteqal ho gaya.

Edhi Foundation Pakistan 1957 mein Karachi mein bohot bare pemane per flow ki wabah phali jis per Edhi sahab nay fouri tour per rade ammal kiya.
Ajj Edhi foundation kay pass 600 say zada ambulance hain jo mulk kay tool o arz mein pheli hoi hain.
Hospital aur ambulance khidmaat kay alawa Edhi foundation nay clinic zachgi ghar pagal khana mazoro kay liye ghar blood bank yateem khane lawaris bacho ko goud lene kay marakaz panha hain aur school khule hai is kay elawa ye foundation nursing aur ghardari kay cource bhi karwati hain.

Pakistan kay elawa foundation jin mumalik mein kam kar rahi hai in mein say chand naam Afghanistan,Iraq, Chechnya, Bosnia, Sudan, Ethiopia aur qudrati afaat sonami say mutasira mumalik kay hain.

 Wo Africa ke mashraqi sahil se le kar malabarh, Indonesia aur China tak jate the
 Sindh mein fateh ki hesiyat se aae the aur 221 tak Sindh, Punjab aur Kashmir ko fatah kar liya tha, lekin tajir, mubaligh, siyah aur fateh ki hesiyat se wo jahan bhi gae aur jin logon se mile un ki rodadein likhi aur behrober ki shahrahon, nae nae jagahon aur wahan ke tabbi halaat ke zikar kiya, jis ke natije mein aalmi geographic mein besh qeemat izafa hua
 Phir hukma ne jis mein Al Biruni, Ibn Khaloon shamil hain
 Inho ne apni kitab mein mashraqi mumalik ki un shahrahon ka zikar kiya hai ke jin par tijarti qafile guzarte the
 In ka pora naam Ahmad Bin Yaqoob tha, lekin wo Al Ya’qubi ke naam se famous hua
 Qadeem kitabon mein is ke mutalliq bohat kam likha gaya tha
 Hatta ke maurikh ya quwwat ne bhi is se mutalliq chand he sutrein likhi hain
 Is ke ilawa in ka zikar bohat se kitabon mein aaya hai
 Lekin tafseel kahin nahi hai
 Aik jaded research ke mutabiq haal he mein in ke kuch waqeyat manzar e aam par aae hain
Kaha jata hai ke wo Abbasi Khalifa Al Mansoor ke aik azaad karda Ghulam Waseh ke khandan se the
 Yeh Khurasan mein paida hue the
 Inho ne jin mulkon ka safar kia wo Misar, Aar mina waghera hain
 Yaqoot ke beyan ke mutabiq in ki maut 284 mein waqey hui
 Aik maghrabi mohqiq Brooklyn ka yeh bhi yehi khayal hai
 In ki tasaneef mein sirf 3 books ke naam milte hain, 1  Kitab ul tareekh Kabeer,  Kitab ul Baldan, Akhbar ul Umam, lekin yeh bat qareen qiyas nahi hai ke is paya ke aalim ne sirf 3 books likhi hain ya to us ki dosri tasaneef waste ho gai hain
 Ya kisi dosri zaban mein muntaqil ho gai hain, jin ka filhal koi suragh nahi milta
 Aisa hona aen mumkin hai, kyun ke us zamane mein riwaj ke mutabiq beron mumalik ke talba tehseel ilm ke liye aate the aur yahan se aesi kitabein le jate the, jin ki ziyada naqlein na hui hon ya un ki naqal ki naubat he na aai ho
 Wasooq ke sath nahi kaha ja sakta ke Al Ya’qubi ke sath kya saneha pesh aaya hai, lekin in ki tasaneef ki mukammal fohrisat na milne ka aur koi jawaz nahi hai
 Phir in 3 kitabon mein sirf 2 kitabein tareekh kabeer aur kitab ul baldan maujood hain aur mukhatlif zabano mein in ke tarajum shaey ho chuke hain, lekin akhbar ul umam napaid hain
Kitab ul tareekh Islam se pehle aur Islam ke bad ki tareekh Yaqoobi bhi kaha jata hai
 In ki pehli jild mein Islam se pehle ke hallat hain aur is silsile mein Hazrat Adam se le kar Hazrat Essa tak ke paighambaron aur deeni peshwao ka tazkara hai
 Phir Babli aur hindi badshahon ki tafseel, baznatini aur Irani saltanaton ka haal, Yunan ke philosopher aur un ke nazariyat ki tashreeh, Chinese aur Misri hukmarano aur sikander aazam ke auhed ki tafseel di hai
 Sudan, Habsha, Sham, Yaman, aur Arab Countries ke halaat aur Arab ki famous mandiyon ki rodaad hai
 Aakhri 50 pages mein Hazrat Ismail ki aulad ke halaat hain
 Dosri jild mein Rasool Allah SAWW  ki seerat aur chaon Khulfa se le kar bani Amiya aur bani Abbas ke halaat 59 tak milte hain
Al Ya qubi ne pehli martaba tareekh ko adwaar mein taqseem kiya hai
 Tibri aur al balazri ke yahan aesi tarteeb nahi hai
 Al Ya’qubi ilm riyaz mein Moosa Al Khwarizmi ka bohat munaqid maloom hota hai, jo is se pehle guzara hai
 Wo is riyazidan ka zikar apni books mein karte hain
 Is ki kitab ul baldan aik nae tarz ka geography hai, jis mein arzi tabiyat ke sath insane talluq ko bhi wazeh kiya gaya hai
 Zameen se mutalliq in ka khayal tha ke wo ball ki tarah hai aur aasman ke wast mein waqey hai
 In ka muheet 9,000 farsung hai
 In ka shumali aur wasti hissa aabad hai, lekin zameen ka nisf hissa jo karra ke dosri taraf hai, gher aabad hai
 Is ka matlab yeh hai ke America ka inhe ilm tha
 In ke bad aane wale geographies mein al Biruni ka yeh bhi khayal tha ke karra zameen ko mutawazin rakhne ke liye is ki dosri taraf zameen ka hona zarori hai
 Kitab ul baldan jise mufassil geography kehte the, is ke aakhri zamane ki tasneef hai aur in ki zindagi ke tajurbat aur ghaur o fikar ka nichore hai
 Is bunyad par bad ke aane wale geographies ne jo tameer ki hai, un mein istakhra al masoodi, al biruni, yaqoot Idrees aur Salam shamil hain
 In mein se akser aise hain, jahan wo khud nahi gae

Badshah Salamat ne aik prototype tayar kar li.
Ye circuit aik ver-o board per banaya gaya tha.
100 rupay k andar aik aam TV k remote se activate hojane aur kabhi na band hone wali device tayar thi.
Aik do martaba Sir Hashim se bhi project k baray main discussion huwi.
Khair akhir wo din aya jis din plant krna tha.

Aik aakhri testing ki.
Class main ghus aik ko rosterm main aur ko aik kursi k neechay rakh diya.
Shayad ambient light zyada thi aur IR rays pohanch nahi paye remote k.

Plant kiye.
Is martaba aik tubelight k uper tha aur aik aik chair k neechay double tape se chipkaya gaya.

youn iss daur say aj  tak honay walay tamam intakhabat mein Karachi samait Sindh kay dusray ilaqon mein mahajir abadi walay ilaqon mein MQM hi kay umedwar kamyab hotay hain
