 App 1950 mein Lahore mein paida huye app nay Lahore say graduation tak taaleem mukamal ki
 1985 mein app Lahore chamber of commerce and industry kay sadar munthakeb huye
 Aik manjhe huye business man ki hasiyat say inhone Ittefaq group company ki kamyabi mein nehayat aham kirdar ada kiya
 1988 kay intekhabat mein app nay subai assembly kay intekhabat (election) mein kamyabi hasil ki aur is kay bad 1990 kay intekhabat mein qaumi assembly kay rukun is halkay say muntakhab huye jahan iss say pehlay PPP ko kamiyabi hasil hoi thi
3 February 1997 kay intekhabat (election) mein kamyabi kay baad app Punjab ki wazarat-e-aala kay uhday par 20 February 1997 ko faiz huye aur 12 October 1999 ko Pervaiz Musharraf ki take over say pehlay tak ye zimedariya nibhatey rahay
 Shabaz Shareef ka dour nihayat administration kay liye mashorr hai
Saudi Arab mein in ki jalawatani kay douran 3 August 2002 kay roz inhe Pakistan Muslim league ka sadar muntakhib karliya gaya
Watan wapsi kay liye London kay Heathrow airport say rawana hone say phele inhone nay BBC ko aik interview diya jis say in kay mustaqbil kay azam ka izhar huwa aur in ki shaksiyat kay baz goshay par bhi roshni pari
Election 18 February 2008  mein kamyabi hasil kar kay Shahbaz Sharif aik bar phir wazeer alla bane is martaba bhi app nay apne guzishta daure hukumat ki yad taza kardi
App ki pheli shadi 1973 mein begum Nusrat Shahbaz say hoi jin say in kay 2 betay Hamza Shahbaz aur Salman Shahbaz aur 3 betiyan hain
 Dekha jaye to Shahbaz sharif nay mulki saisat mein is hud tak kirdar ada nahi kiya jis hud tak woh kar saktay hain
 Dusro ko kehnay par Shahbaz Sharif nay apne app ko manwane ki koshish karne kay bajaye  nay apne baray bhai Nawaz Sharif ki parvi karne ko hi tarji di hai
Ibrahim Ismail Chundrigar 15 April 1898 ko Ahmadabad, India mein peyda hue
 Ibrahim Ismail ka dil bhi isi jazbey se mamoor the
Muslim league ke salana ijlaas 1916, 1924 aur 1936 mein Bombay mein munaqid ho chuke the aur in ijlaason ke hawale se aal india Muslim league ki karkardegi, is ke maqasid aur is se wabasta rehnumao ke khayalat musalmanan e hind ke samne khul kar aa chuke the
Chundrigar ne 1936 mein baqaiyda taur par aal india Muslim league mein shamoliyat ikhteyar kar li
 February 1937 mein unhe all india Muslim league ke ticket par sooba e Bombay ki qanoonsaaz assembly ke intekhabat mein zilaa Ahmadabad ke dehi ilaqa ki nashist se rukun muntakhib kiya gaya aur aap Ahmadabad se Bombay muntaqil ho gaey
 Ibrahim Ismail Chundrigar isi halqey se dobara 1946 mein bhi muntakhib hue
March 1940 mein aal india Muslim league ka 27th annual congress Lahore mein munaqid hua
 Maslan difaa, amoor e kharja, mawaslaat, mehsolaat aur deegar aise amoor jo zarori samjhe jaey, chunache is maqsad ke liye jo committee bani, us mein bhi I chundrigar shamil the
1945-46 ke intekhabaat ke bad jab aal india Muslim league ne aboori hukomat mein shamoliyat ki dawat ko qabool kar liya to I Chundrigar bhi Quaid e Azam ke namzad wuzraa mein se aik the
 14 October 1946 ko all india Muslim league ki working committee ne Liauqat Ali Khan, Ibrahim Ismail Chundrigar, Raja Ghazanfar Ali Khan, Sardar Abdur Rab Nashtar aur Jogandarnath Mandal ke naam bhijwaey, jise waesarae hind ne qabool karte hue un ke supurd wazartein aur mehakmey kar diye
 1948 – 49 mein Afghanistan mein Pakistan ke safer rahe
 1950 se 1951 tak aap soobey sarhad ke Governor rahe aur phir  1951 se 1953 tak Punjab ke Governor rahe
 Ibrahim Ismail Chundrigar 1955 - 56 mein wazeer e azam Chaudhry Muhammed Ali ki markazi kabeena mein wazeer e qanoon rahe aur 1956 ke aaiyn ka masooda tayyar kiya
 17 October 1957 ko Ibrahim Ismail makhloot hukomat mein Pakistan ke 6th wazeer e azam ban gaey
 Magar rules ki bunyad 16 December 1957 ko wazarat uzmaa se istefaa di diya
 Yehi nuqta Ibrahim Ismail Chundrigar ne Quaid e Azam se seekha aur isi par karband rahe
 Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan zindagi bhar adam tashadud ke hami rahey aur Mahatma Gandhi ke baray maddahon mein se aik thay
App 1890 mein Utmanzai mein paida huye
 Ibtedai taleem ghar per hasil ki
 Baad mein Mission High School Peshawar mein dakhil huye
 Aik saal Aligarh mein bhi guzara
 Britannia foj mein shamuliyat ka shouq huwa
1911 mein Angrezon se nabro azma mashoor mojahid Haji Sahib Turangzai ki tahreek se wabista hogaye
 Haji Sahib ne Sarhad bhar mein 72 Madrase qaim keya jo unki tehreek jehad ke marakez they
 1913 mein Haji Sahib Tarangzai Qabaili Ilaqon mein apna markaz qaim kerne ke liyeh muntaqil hogaye
 Issi bares hijrat ki tahreek chali to Bacha Khan  bhi bohot se satheon ke sath Kabul Hijrat ker gaye
 Tehreek hijrat halaat ki sangini se takrao to Bacha Khan bhi dusre mahajreen sameat iss ehisas ke sath watan wapas loutay ke azadi aise jazbati iqdamat se hasil nahein ki ga sakti tahreek hijrat Haji Sahib Turangzai ke madrason ko khatam ker dala tha Bacha Khan ko teen saal ke liyeh jail mein dal dia gaya 1942 mein jail se nikley to khelafat comaitee mein kam kerte rahe
 Issi baras badtareen hotey hueay halat mein unhon ne Mahatma Gandhi aur Indian National Congress ke sath ilhaq kar dea jo iss waqt adam tashadud ki sab se bari hami jamat tasauar ki jati thi
 Ye woh dour tha jab Khan brothers Gandhi ke qareeb aye Sait Jamnalal Bajaj ne unhein apne haan Warda aney ki dawat di
 Unhein dinon Gandhi Ji bhi waheen moqeem thay
 Jang Azeem ke khatme per app reha huye 1946 ke amm intekhabat mein Mutthida Hindustan ki markazi dastoor saz Assembly mein rukun muntakhib huye baad mein Pakistan ki dastoor saz Assembly ke rukun rahe
 Punjab ke zila Atak mein Ghour Ghashi ke moqam per moqeem rahe
 Albatta iss sauran khasusi ajazat ke sath Karachi aur Murree mein dastoor saz Assembly ke ijlason mein shirkat ker tay rahey July 1955 mein pabandyan khatam huein to Sarhad aye aur Anti One Unit Front banaya ta ke One Unit ka qiyam roka ja sake
 Kabul mein app ne Bharti safarat khane ke sath gahre taluqat qaim rakhe
 Bharat ke iss doure ke dauran unhein apni tehreek ke liye karoron rupay ki thalyan bhi pashe ki gayein
Bhacha Khan ki pehli shadi 1912 mein hue jis se Khan Abdul Ghani Khan aur Abdul Wali Khan paida huye
 Dosri shadi 1920 mein huye jis se aik Sahib Zadi Yehya Jan aur Abdu Ola Khan paida huey
 Magar Pakistani siasat aur South Asia ki tareekh per un ke asrat se inkar nahien kiya ja sakta hai
Mymensingh District board ke sadar rahe 1942 mein Bengal Legislative Council ke aur 1946 mein Muslim League ke ticket per Bangal Legislative Assembly ke rukun chunay gae
 Muslim league ke zile Sadar bhi rahay
 Bangal Speaker chunay gae
 Qeam e Pakistan ke bad 1947 mein Mashraqi Pakistan (maujuda Bangla desh) kabina mein wazir civil supplier rahey
 September 1948 se March 1954 suba e Mashraqi Pakistan ( Bangladesh) key wazir-e-Ala rahay yani chay sal tek iss ohday per faiz rahay 1960 mein Aqwam e Motahda key iqtesadi aur samaji council key ijlas mein Pakistan ki numaendagi ki 9 March 1964 ko National Demo Critic Front key chairman baney
 Nurul Amin 7 December 1971 se 20 December 1971 ke athween (namzad) Wazir Azam (Prime Minister of Pakistan) rahe
 21 December 1971 ko naib Precident bane aur kabina ki tashkeel huye
14 August 1973 yani ion ke nafaz tak naib Sadar (president) ke uhday par apni khidmat sar anjam dete rahe
 14 April 1972 ko Qaumi Assembly ke ikhtetami ijlas ki sadarat ki
 Nurul Amin Pakistan jamhori party ke pehley sarbarah they
 Un ki Namaz Janaza GHQ ground Rawalpindi mein ada ki gaye aur unhain Mazar e Quaid e Azam ke ahata mein Sardar Abdur Rab Nishtar ke pehlu mein dafan kiya gaya
Nurul Amin  ne teen betey sogwar chorey jin ke naam yeh hain 1- Ruhul Amin 2- Anwar ul Amin 3- Mahbubul Amin
Pir Pagara  Hur jamat ke sarbarah azeem dargah Pagara Gaddi ke sajjadah nasheen aur aik mumtaz politician ki hesiyat se nihayat mutehrik nazar aate the
 Pir sahib pagara Pakistan Muslim league ( Functional ) ke sarbarah the
 Pir Pagara ne Muslim University Aligarh ke ilawa British mein bhi aala taleem hasil ki
Pir Pagara ka pora naam Pir Syed Sikander Ali Shah, Shah Mardan Shah Sani tha
 In ke mureed aqeedat se inhe “ Sohriya Badshah ” bhi kehte hain
 Wo 22 November 1928 ko Khairpur mein waqey apne aabaai qasba Pir Jo goth mein paida hue
 Bad azaa inhe 1946 mein aik behri jahaz ke zariye England bhej diya gaya
Qiyam e Pakistan ke bad jab 1949 mein mulk ke pehle prime minister Liaqaut Ali Khan british ke tour par gae to naujawan Pir Pagara aur in ke chote bhai Pir Nadir Shah wahan zair e taleem the
 In ki Liaqaut Ali Khan se mulaqat karai gai
 Chunache Pir Pagara ki Pakistan wapsi par 4 February 1952 ko pir jo goth mein dastar bandi hui
 Inhe Huron ka rohani peshwa tasleem kiya gaya
 Is tarah wo 7 Pir Pagara qarar pae
 1954 mein in ki shadi Makhdoom ul Mulk Syed Ghulam Meeran Shah ki sahabzadi ke sath hui
 In ki pehli begum se 3 sahabzade, Pir Sabghat Ullah Shah rashidi, Syed Ali Gohar Shah aur Syed Sadar uddin Shah hain
 Jab ke dosri begum se 1 sahabzadi aur 2 twins bete hain
 Prime minister Yousuf Raza Gilani bhi in ke qareebi rishtedar hain
 Sindh aur Punjab ke famous siyasi khandano ke sath in ki rishtedariyan hain
Pir Pagara ka shumar mulk ki un muqtadir shakhsiyat mein hota tha, jo baik waqt siyasi, mazhabi, rohani aur hurriyat pasand halqon mein muatbbir hain
 Jis ke mujahideen Pakistan ke ilawa India mein bhi barhi tadad mein maujood the
Pir Pagara GHQ se apne talluq ke izhaar mein kabhi hichkichahat mehsoos nahi karte the
 Sindh mein wazeer e aala ke mansab tak pohanchne wale justice Syed Ghaus Ali Shah ne bhi Pir Pagara ki siyasi seerhi ko istemal kiya tha
 Pir Pagara se un ke aik interview mein pocha gaya ke aap ne Punjab ki wazarat e aala ke liye pane Brother Nisbati Makhdoom Hassan Mehmood ( Late ) ke bajae Nawaz Sharif ki himayat kyun ki thi to inho ne jawab diya ke Punjab ke barey mein faisla to General Zia Ul Haq ko karna tha aur unho ne he yeh intekhab kiya tha, albatta Baluchistan mein wazeer e aala banane ke liye main ne Jam sahib Lasbela ka naam pesh kiya tha, jo wazeer e aala ban gae the
 Wo nafsiyat aur sitara shanasi mein bhi maharat rakhte hain
 Is ke ilawa mardam shanasi ki hairat angez salahiyat rakhte hain, aik nazar mein insaan ko pehchan jate the aur jis ke barey mein jo kuch keh den, wo mustaqbil mein waisa he nikalta tha
 Pir jo goth mein jab Pir Sahab Pagara mureedon ke saamne aa kar inhe apna deedar karate the
Islami Jamhuriya e Pakistan ke Sabiq Sadar e Pakistan Justice (retired) Muhammad Rafiq Tarar 2 November 1929 ko Ghakhar mandi Zila Gungranwala Tehsil Wazirabad ke gouon  Pera Kot mein paida hoye
 Rafiq Ahmad Tarar ke walid ka naam Chohdri Sardar Khan Tarar tha
 1945 mein Islamiya high school Gungran Wala se matric kiya
 1947 mein Guru Nanak Khalsa college (mujudah Islamiya college) se FSC aur graduation kiya
 1951 mein Punjab University se LLB kiya
 1955 mein Gungran Wala mein practice shoro kardi
 1970 mein Chairman Punjab labor Court bane
 1974 mein high court ke Judge bane
 1989 mein Chief Justice High Court muqarar hoye
January 1991 mein Supreme Court ke Judge bana deye gaye
 Ye us bench mein shamil the
 31 October 1994 mein wo Supreme Court ke Judge ki hasiyat se retired ho gaye
1997 mein wo Muslim League Ke ticket par Senator bane
 15 December 1997 ki sham thi jab Juhar Town Lahore mein Justice (r) Rafiq Tarar ki rehaish ghah par bar bar phone ki ghanti bajne lagi
 Wazir e Azam house ke ehelkar un ki talash mein the
 Ghar walon ko itna pata tha ke wo dopehar ko Mulana Ameen Ahsan Islahi ke janaze mein shirkat ke leye Defense gaye the
 Bila akhir unhen Defense mein apne azizon ke han “talash” kar leya gaya aur wo raat ko aam parwaz se Islamabad rawana ho gaye jahan Wazir e Azam ne unhen sadarti umeedwar ke tar par unki naamzadgi ki ittla de gayi
 Kuch dear herat zadah rehne ke bad unhon ne ye peshkash qabool kar li
 Asal baat ye hai ke intezamiya kis tarha Judges ko le kar ati ha
 Mere khayal mein to sedha sadah pemana hai
”19 December 1997 ko Justices Malik Muhammad Qayum Lahore High Court ne is fesle ko muatal kar ke unhen election larne ijazit de di
 20 December 1997 ko un ka naam Sadarti intakhabi fehristmein shamil kar leya gaya
 Logon ne inwa o iqsam ki baatein kein
 31 December 1997 ko Sadar e Pakistan ban gaye
 1 Junuary 1998 ko Janab Justice Muhammad Rafiq Tarar bila akhir Pakistan ke Sadar ban gaye
 Mulik bhar mein dale gaye majmuye 457 votes mein se Justice (r) Muhammad Rafiq Tarar ne 374 votes hasil kiye jab ke in ke qaribi harif Peoples Party ke umeedwar Shaban Merrani ne 58 aur Jamiyat e Ulma e Islam (f) ke Mulana Muhammad Khan Sherani ne 22 votes hasil kiye
Punjab assembly ke 247 arkan mein se 243 ne Sadarti intakhab ke leye apna haq e raidahi istamal kiya
 243 arkan mein se 235 ne Justice (r) Muhammad Rafiq Tarar, 3 ne Aftab Shaban Merrani aur 2 ne Mulana Muhammad Khan Sherrani ko vote deya
 Yad rahe assembly ki aik nashist abhi khali thi
 Justice (r) Muhammad Rafiq Tarar ko kul 83 votes mein se poll hone wale 82 votes mein se 69 vote mile jo ke Sarhad assembly ke kul 43 number ke hisab se 35
 Sabiq wazir aur sazrhad assembly ke azad rukun Habib ulllah Kundi ka aik vote zaya ho gaya jab ke Thereek e Insaf ke subai sadar Nawab Zadah Mohsin Khan ne vote poll nahi kiya
 Aik vote mustarad hoa baqi 37 votes mein se 26 Muslim Laegue aur itehadi  jamaton ke umeedwar Justice (r) Muhammad Rafiq Tarar ko mile
 Nine vote Mulana Muhammad Khan Sherani ko aur 2 vote Aftab Shaban Merrani ko mile
 12 October 1999 ko Nawza Sharif hukumat ka takhta ulat kar Chief of Army Staff General Parveez Musharaf Chief Executive ban gaye aur Muhammad Rafiq Tarar ko badastor Sadar rehne diya
 Mulk bhar mien karobar zindagi mutassir hua hai
Shaukat Aziz1949 mein paida hoye, 1972 mein shadi hoyi
 Unhon ne 1967 mein Punjab se graduation aur 1969 mein Karachi University se MBA kiya.
 1969 mein unhon ne apni amli zindagi ka aghaz Karachi mein City Bank mein mulazimat se kia, 1975 mein un ki taenati beron e mulik kar di gai
 Wo Filipain, Urdan, Unan, America, Bartaniya, Malaysia, Singapore aur Saudi Arab mein taenat rahe aur mukhtalif uhdon par kaam karte rahe
 1999 mein unhan Pakistan ki wazarat e khazana ki zimedari sonpi gayi, Shaukat Aziz 4 saal 8 mah  wazir e khazana rahe
 Ghulam Ishaq Khan ke bad wo is qalamdan par sab se ziyadah mudat ghuzarne wale wazir han
Sadar General Pervez Mushaaf ne Meer Muhammad Khan Jamali se istifa wasool karte hi aendah Wazir e Azam ke uhde ke leye Shaukat Azizko naamzad kar deya
 Wizarat e Uzma ke uhde par faiz  hone ke leye zarori ha ke umeedwar qomi assembly ka member ho
 Chunach zamni intakhabat mein Shaukat AzizTharparkar aur Ataak se Q league ke umeedwar the
 Panjab aur Sindh ke in donon halkon se un ka koi taluq nahi tha aur na hi wo siyasat ke medan ke khelari the
 27 August 2004 ko hone wale intakhabat mein Shaukat Azizke muqabil ARD ke mutafiqa umeedwar Makhdum Javed Hashmi the lekin Hashmi ke production order jari karne se speaker ke inkar par opposition ne intakhabat ka bicote kar deya aur Shaukat Aziz191 votes hasil kar ke Wazir e Azam muntakhib ho gaye is se ugle roz unhon ne apne uhde ka halaf uthaya aur isi roz assembly se atemad ka vote bhi hasil kiya
September ko 32 rukeni kabina ne apne uhde ka halaf uthaya jin mein 21 porane aur 11 naye chere shamil the
 Pakistani awam ke leye wo dosre Moin Qurashi hi sabit ho rahe han
 14 December 2004 ko Wazir e Azam Shaukat AzizPakistan ke qabil e aetimad dost mulik china ke dore par gaye aur Chinese hum mansab Ho Jin Tao se mulaqat ki
 Donon mumalik ke darmiyan tawon ke 7 samjhuton par dastakhat hoye jin mein sar e fehrist teal o gass ki talash, sandik mansobe mein tosi aur zarat par mabni sanaton mein bahimi tawon barhana shamil hain
 Sadar Musharaf siyasi nizam ka hisa hain parliament ki manzori ke bad unhon ne do uhde rakhe hain
 Do tarfa muzakrat ke natije mein 4 muhaide te paye jin ke mutabiq China Pakistan ko Pak behriya ke leye frikitis ki tatari ke silsile mein technology faraham kare ga
 Pakistan ne nuclear power sakhat mehnat se hasil ki hai ye control and command system ke tehat hai
 Wazir e Azam Shaukat Aziz22 January 2005 ko America ke dore par gaye aur Pentagon mein American Wazir e Difa Ramz Field se mulaqat ki
 Is mulakat mein Afghanistan ki sorat e haal aur is se mutaliq dosre amor par tafsili guftogu hoi
 Agle roz unhon ne Sadar Bush se mulaqat kar ke bahimi dilshaspi ke amor par baat chet ki
 Is steel mills ka 1971 mein sowit union se muhaide ke bad 30 December 1973 mein sang e buniyad rakha Gaya aur is ne 1981 mein pedawar shoro ki
 31 March 2006 ko Privatization commission ne farokhat karne ki manzori de di
 Mutehdah opposition ke 136 arkan ne vote dala jab ke tehrik ki kamyabi ke leye 172 vote darker the
Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy, tehreek e Pakistan ke rehnuma aur aik inqilabi siyasatdaan the
 Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy Calcutta Municipal Corporation ke deputy mayor muntakhib hue
 Tehreek e khilafat se wabasta rahe aur khilafat committee ke secretary bhi rahe
 Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy 8 December 1892 ko Madanpur ( Maghrabi Bengal ) mein peyda hue
 Aap ke dada Dhaka ke aik arbi madarsa ke sarparast e aala the
 Jab ke walid Sir Zahid Ur Rehman Zahid  Suhrwardy, arbi aur farsi ke scholar aur Calcutta high court ke judge the
 School ki taleem mukammal karne ke bad Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardyne Calcutta mein taleem hasil ki
 Madaras mein bhi parhte rahe aur phir aala taleem ke liye oxford chale gaey
Wahan se MA aur PCL ki degrees hasil ki
 Watan wapis aa kar aap ne Calcutta mein wakalat shuru ki aur siyasat mein amli hissa lena shuru kar diya
 1937 ke intekhabat mein muslim league ke ticket par assembly ki nishast hasil ki aur muslim league ki kabeena mein wazeer muqarrar hue
 Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy ke pas mukhtalif auqaat mein tijarat, labor, maliyat, sehat, dehaat sudhar aur khuraak ke mehakmey bhi rahe
 1946 ke intekhabat mein Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardyne muslim league ki intekhabi mohim ko umdagi se munazzam kiya, jis ki wajah se muslim league ne 250 mein se 170 nishasten jeeti thin
Chunache Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardy ne azaad arkaan ke sath mil kar Bengal mein wazarat qaiym ki aur wo khud Bengal ke wazeer e aala muqarrar hue
 In ki kabina mein Mohammed Ali Bogra bhi shamil the
 Jinhe qiyam e Pakistan ke bad governor general Malik Ghulam Mohammed ne wazeer e aazam namzad kiya tha
 Noor ul Ameen us waqt Bengal assembly ke speaker the
 1946 mein pore Hindustan ke muslim league ke muntakhib umeedwaron ka aik convention Delhi mein munaqid hua tha
 Jis ki rou se musalmanan e hind, 2 mumlikatein nahi bal ke aik mumlikat ka mutalba karte hain
 Yeh qarardad “ qarardad Delhi ” ke naam se famous hui
 Qiyam e Pakistan ke mauqey par Hussain Shaheed Suhrawardygher munqasim Bengal ki azaad riyasat ke hamii the
 Yahan aa kar hazb e ikhtelafat ki jamhori riwayat ki buniyad dali aur awami league ke ticket par qaumi assembly ke rukun muntakhib hue
 Phir 1945 mein muttehda mahaz ( Jagto Front ) ke tawwun se mashraqi Pakistan mein muslim league ko shikast di
 December 1954 mein wazeer e qanoon bane
 August 1955 mein jab muslim league aur muttehda mahaz ki mushtarka wazarat qaiym hui to  Suhrwardy hazb e ikhtelaf ke leader muntakhib hue
 December 1956 mein aap ne republican party ke tawwun se markaz mein wazarat banai aur khud wazeer e aazam ban gaey
 App 25, November 1952 mein  Lahore mein Ikramulla Khan Niazi   kay ghar paida huye
tehreek-e-Insaf kay sarbarah Pakistan cricket team  kay liye 1971 say 1992 tak khaltay rahay
App nay ibtedai taleem Lahore mein Cathedral School Lahore aur  Achison  College Lahore say hasil ki
Britannia chale gaye wahan Royal Grammar School mein parha aur phir 
oxford university say BA owners kiya app nay 1974 mein oxford university
 cricket team kay captain  bhi rahay
App nay first  class cricket ka agaz 1969 say  Lahore ki taraf say Sargodha kay khilaf kheltay huye kiya 1971 mein England  kay khilaf phela test match khalay 21 sal per muhet apney  carrier kay doran app nay 88 test matches khal kar 362 wickets 22 81 ki 
osat say hasil kiye app nay 1981 -1982 mein Lahore mein sri Lanka kay 8 
khalari sirf 58 runs dey kar out kiye aur 23 martaba aik inning mein 5 
wickets hasil kiye app nay 36
69 ki osat say 3807 runs banaye jin mein 
say 5 centuries bhi shamil hain
 App ka ziada say ziada score Adelaide 
mein 1991 mein Australia  kay khalaf kheltay huye 132 runs raha
  Imran Khan 48 test matches khalay jin mein say 14 jete aur 8 hare aur 26 
maches drow ya bagair kisi nataij kay khatam huye
Imran Khan  175 one day machetes mein hissa liye aur 182 wickets hassil kiye app nay 3709 runs 33 41 ki osat say banaye in ka ziada say ziada scoure 102 not out tha jo inhon nay Sri Lanka kay khilaf 1983 mein banaya
 Imran khan ki qayadat mein 139 one day match khalay gaye
Iss shadi ka shurat puri duniya mein huwa international media nay iss ko  khusosi ahmiyat di
App nay 25 April  1996 ko tehreek-e-Insaf qayam kar kay siasat maidan mein qadam rakha
 2008 kay intakhabat mein in ki jamat nay Pervaiz Mushrraf ki zere nigrani munaqad honey wale intekhabat mein hissa layne say asoli bunyado per inkar kardiya
 iss kay baad say ab tak Imran Khan apney bayanat aur Tv per diye gaye
dekhna ye hai kay Imran Khan siasat mein bhi aisi hi tarekh raqam kar patey hain ya nahi
 Pir Ali Rashdi, Pir Mohammad Rashid bani tehreek hurkey ki aulad hain
 5 August 1905 ko zila Larkana ke aik goth bahman mein paida hue
 Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi ne Sindhi ki 4 janatein apne goth ke school se pass ki aur English taleem Master Mohammed Rafeeq aur us ke baad Nusrat station ke station master se hasil ki
Is tarha Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi ne kisi school aur college mein baqaiyda taleem hasil nahi ki
 1920 mein jab Pir Ali Rashdi ki umer sirf 15 saal thi
 1924 mein sahafti zindagi ka aaghaz “ Sindh News ” ki namaa nigari se kiya jo Karachi se nikalta tha
 Ibteda mein shayri bhi ki lekin phir kisi sabab se shayri chor di
 December 1924 mein Sindh taleemi conference Hyderabad mein hissa liya
 1925 se 1929 tak Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi ne haftawar “ alhazab ” nikala aur us ke editor rahe
 Pir Ali Rashdi 1926 se 1931 tak Sindh Association ke sargaram rukun rahe
 Jo Sindh ke musalmano ki wahid siyasi tanzeem thi
 Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi ne is dauran association ke secretary ki hesiyat se bhi faraiyz anjaam diye
 Tanzeem ke sadder Sir Shanawaz Bhutto the
 Jab sukhur se news paper “ Al ameen ” jari hua to wo us ke editor 1925 se 1928 tak rahe
 1929 mein sukhur se nikalne wale akhbar “ Sindh Zameendaar ” ke editor muqarrar hue
  1930 mein district board larhkana ke member muntakhib hue
 1933 mein “ Sindh Sitara ” ke naam se apna roznama sukhur se jari kiya
 Isi tarha 1936 mein “ Subha Sindh ” ke naam se apna aik roznama Karachi se bhi jari kiya
 1938 mein Mahnama “ Al Rashid ” ke editor muqarrar hue
Jo Maulana Abu Alkalam azaad ke “ Alhaal ” aur “ Abalaagh ” ke tarz par shaey kiya jata tha
 1934 mein Peoples Party ke naam se aik tanzeem qaiym ki aur phir 1936 mein “ Sindh Ittehad Party ” mein bhi kaam kiya
 All India Muslim League ki yeh tareekhi conference thi jis mein pehli baar taqseem hind ka mutalba kiya gaya tha
 Isi saal yani 1938 mein All India Muslim League Council ke member muntakhib hue aur is ke sath he Sindh soobai muslim league ke secretary bhi muqarrar hue
Pir Ali Rashdi all india muslim league ki foreign committee nashar o ashaat ( barae androon e mulk aur beyron e mulk ) ke secretary bhi muntakhib hue
 Sindh mein Muslim League ke general secretary ki hesiyat se masjid manzil gaah sukkur je fasadaat ke silsile mein rehnumai ke faraiyz anjaam diye
 Pir Ali Mohammed Rashdi ne 1941 mein Karachi se angrezi zaban mein haftawar “Muslim Voice” jari kiya
 1945 mein aap ne G M Syed ki himayat mein “Qurbani ” ke naam se aik akhbar jari kiya aur yeh news paper 1947 mein khoro wazarat ke dauran band hua
 1948 mein Karachi se nikalne wale roznama “Sindh Aabroz ” ke mudeer muqarrar hue
 1946 mein aap ne3 “ Faryad Sindh ” ke naam se aik kitab likhi
1949 mein he Pir Ali Mohammed Rashdi mushtarka hind pak press ke sadder muntakhib hue
 Is ke ilawa 1955 tak Sindh soobai kabeena mein wazeer e sehat, ittelaat aur naiyb wazeer e aala ke auhdon par bhi kaam kiya
 1955 mein Pakistan ki majlis qanoon saaz ke member muntakhib hue aur wafaqi hukomat ke wazeer e ittelaat o nashriyat muqarrar hue
 Ajb republican party barsar e iqtedar aai to Pir Ali rashdi ne wazarat se istefaa de dioya aur hazb e ikhtelaaf ki saf mein beth gaey aur phir 1957 mein markazi majlis qanoon saaz se mustafee ho kar Philippine mein Pakistan ke safeer ban gaey
1961 mein Pir Ali Mohammed Rashdi ko china mein Pakistan ka safer muqarrar kiya gaya
 1962 mein Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi safarti zimmedariyon se mustafee ho kar apne sabqa almi, adbi aur tehqeeqi mashaghil mein masroof ho gaey
 Pir Ali Rashdi 1972 mein hukomat Pakistan ke musheer khas barae ittelaat o nashriyat muqarrar hue aur Pakistan National Centers ke chairman bana diye gaye
 Jis ka silsila 1977 tak qaiym raha
 Jab Hazrat Ameer Khusro ka 700 sala jashan manaya gaya, to unhe Ameer Khusro committee ka karkun banaya gaya
 Pir Ali Muhammed Rashdi ne 1963 mein roznama jang mein “ Maktoob Mashriq Baeeyd ” ke unwaan se apna haftawar Colum shuru kiya aur phir bad mein ueh Colum mashriq o maghrib ke unwaan se aakhri waqt tak shaey hota raha
21 April 1934 ko Mianwali ke aik mutawasit gharane mein paida hone wale Mohammad Hayat Khan ko Kausar Niazi banne mein in sab jaa’n gasal marahil se guzarna parha, jin ke bagher baam urooj par pohanchna mumkin nahi hota
 In ki zindagi barhi talatum khaiz rahi
 Zamana talib e ilmi he mein maidaan siyasat mein kood parhe the
 Tehreek e Pakistan ke zamane mein muslim students federation ke general secretary bhi rahe hain
 Punjab University se English, Urdu, Arabic aur Persian mein honors kiya
 Jamaat ke tarjuman Roznama Tasneem aur Roznama Kausar ke mudeer rahe
 1960 mein haft roza Shahab jari kiya
 Jo aage chal kar Pakistan people’s party ka tarjuman ban gaya
 Waqt guzarta raha aur Kausar Niazi ki soch mein tabdeeli aati gai
 Jamat e islami se ikhtelaaf hua to is ki mukhalfat peoples party mein shamil ho gae
 Intekhabi mohim ke dauran peoples party ke stage se aesi shola biyani ka muzahira kiya ke iqtedar mein aane ke bad wo Bhutto sahib ke 5 piyaron mein shumar hone lage aur peoples party ke pehle daur e hukomat mein ittelaat aur mazhabi umoor ke baa ikhteyar wazeer rahe
 Kabhi to Progressive peoples party ke naam se apni siyasi jamat banane ki koshish ki aur kabhi peoples party ke mutawazi groups ka sahara dhoonda
 Kausar Niazi ne aik darjan se zaiyd kutub tasneef ki
 Jin mein Zargul, Rahail, Lamhe ( Shairi Majmooey ), Deedadar, Baseerat, Takhleeq Aadam, Aaina, Tasliyat, Jamaat e islami awaam ki adalat mei, Mutalla Tareekh, Islam ke muaashi tassawuraat, Zikar e Rasool S
Andaaz e Biyaan, Aik Hafta Cheen mein, Kooh e Qaaf ke Dais mein, Mushaahedat o Tassurat ( Roznama Jang mein shaey shuda columns ka majmooa ), aur Line Cut Gai waghera shamil hain
 Sir Abdullah Haroon 1872 mein aik memon gharane mein paida hue, abhi 6 saal ke the ke in ke walid ka inteqal ho gaya
 Tajir baradri se talluq rakhne ke sabab pehle apne aik azeez ke han mulazmat ki phir apne aik aur azeez seth saleh mohammed ke sath mil kar business shuru kiya
Sir Abdullah Haroon ne 1901 mein siyasat mein dilchaspi lena shuru ki
 All India Muslim League ke qiyam 1906 se le kar 1925 tak inho ne mulki siyasat ka barhi gehri nazar se jaiyza liya tha
 Is dauran wo baaz auqat baraherast aur baaz auqat bilwasta siyasi sargarmiyon mein hissa lete rahe
 1911 mein jang tarablis ke mauqey par turkon ki imdaad ke liye barresagher mein anjuman hilal ahmer ke zer e aehtemam chanda jama karne ki mohim shuru hui aur Sindh mein mir ayub ali khan ki sadarat mein anjuman hilal ahmer ki branch qaiym hui to us ke secretary aur khazanchi sir Abdullah Haroon the
 October 1913 tak wo chanda jama kar ke turkey bhejte rahe
 1913 mein sir Abdullah Haroon Karachi Municipality ke member hue
 In ka karobari daftar siyasi sargarmiyon ka markaz banta chala gaya
 Wo 1917 tak Karachi municipality ke member rahe
 1917 se Abdullah Haroon ne siyasat mein bharpor hissa lena shuru kar diya aur Indian National Congress mein shamil ho gaye
 1919 mein inhe Sindh khilafat committee ka president muntakhib kiya gaya aur 1924 tak wo is auhdey par faiyz rahe
 Khilafat tehreek mein musalman tajiron mein Bombay ke seth umer chotani aur sir Abdullah Haroon ne sab se ziyada hissa liya
 In ka ghar khilafat tehreek mein hissa lene walon ka apna ghar tha
 Ali brothers aur Bi Amma in ke mehman hote the
 Khilafat tehreek ke ilawa in ki sarparasti aur amli tawwun ka daiyra Aligarh Muslim University tak phela hua tha
1920 mein sir Abdullah Haroon ne Sindh ka pehla roznama nikala
 Isi saal inho ne sukkur mein Sindh soobai siyasi conference ki 17 majlis ki sadarat ki aur apna khutba e sadarat parha
 Sir Abdullah Haroon 1921 se 1934 tak Karachi Municipal Corporation ke rukun rahe
 1923 mein sir Abdullah Haroon ne Bombay majlis qanoonsaz ki nishast ke liye intekhab larha aur kamiyabi hasil ki
 1926 mein wo markazi majilis qanoonsaz ke rukun bane aur aakhir dam tak majlis mein Sindh ki numaiydegi karte rahe
 Is maqsad ke husool ke liye sir Abdullah Haroon ne deegar sindhi rehnumao maslan sir ghulam hussain hidayatullah, sir shanawaz Bhutto, sheikh abdul majeed sindhi, mohammed ayub khoro, syed meera’n mohammed shah
 Pir ali mohammed rashdi, syed ali murtaza shah aur raees ghulam mohammed bharghari ke sath mil kar bharpor tehreek chalai
 Sindh united party ke founders mein sir Abdullah haroon ka naam bhi shamil hai jo 1935 mein qaiym hui thi
 In ke sath sir shanawaz Bhutto bhi khasey fa’aal the
 Jab 1935 ke india aket ke tehat intekhabat hue to Sindh united party ne soobey mein 60 mein se 40 nishasten jeet li thin
1937 mein Quaid e Azam Mohammed Ali Jinnah ki qiyadat mein all india muslim league ki nashat ul sania hui to sir Abdullah haroon ne 1938 mein united party ko chor kar all india muslim league mein shamoliyat ikhteyar kar li aur muslim league ki awazz ghar ghar tak pohnchai
 Is conference ki sadarat Quaid e Azam Mohammed Ali Jinnah ne ki
 Ijlaas mein Sindh ke ilawa jin deegar ilaqon ke muslim league ke rehnumao ne shirkat ki, un mein sir sikander hayat ( Punjab ), Maulvi abu al qasim fazal ul haq ( Bengal ), sardar Aurangzeb kha’n ( sarhad ), sir saadullah kha’n ( aasam ), Khan bahadur nawab syed mohammed ismail ( bahar ), chaudhru khaliquzzaman, Maulana jamal mian firangi mehal, Maulana shaukat ali, begum Maulana mohammed ali johar, raja sahib mehmodabad, syed sajjad haider yaldaram ( UP ), syed ghulam bhek neerang ( ambala ), aashiq ali wakeel ( bahar ), syed abdul rauf shah ( CP ), khan bahadur pir mureed hussain sajjada nashin dargah ghaus baha ul haq zikriya multani, nawab ahmedyar khan doltana, malik barkat ali ( Punjab ) aur nawabzada Liauqat Ali Khan shamil the
 Chon ke is ijlaas mein Hindustan bhar ke aeham muslim league ke rehnumao ne shirkat kit hi
 Is aitebar se use kul hind ijtemaa ka naam bhi diya gaya
 Conference mein sir Abdullah haroon ne urdu mein khutba e istaqbaliya pesh kiya
 Is mauqey par Sindh se qanoonsaz assembly ke rukun aur mumtaz danishwar sheikh abdul majeed sindhi ne 10 October 1938 ko muslim wafaq ke qiyam ke mutalbey par mabni aik qarardad pesh ki
Pakistan mein jamhuriat ke liye taweel tareen jaddu jehad karne wala, lower middle class se talluq , taweel tarin siasi wabastagi ka hamil
 ye hai Pakistan ki sab se barhi siasi jamat Pakistan Peoples Party ka secretary general Jahangir Badar
Jahangir Badar ne apni siyasat ka aaghaz 60 ki dehai mein kiya
 1968 mein jab woh Heli College Punjab University Lahore ke student union ke muntakhib sadar the
 Aziyat aur masaib ke aalam mein guzra lekin ye musafir jamhoriyat par chalta raha
 Bil aakhir wohi hua jo hamesha hota aya hai
Siasat ke is pur-khar safar mein Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto Shaheed aur Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto Shaheed ke sath un ki taweel rafaqat aik misaal ke taur par pesh ki jati hai
1999 se ta dam-e-tehreer woh Pakistan Peoples Party ke secretary general ke auhde par faiz hai
1995 se 2003 tak PPP overseas ke sadar rahe
1985 se 1988 tak aur bad-azan 1991 se 1995 tak Pakistan ke sab se barhe soobe Punjab mein PPP ke sadar rahe
1980 se 1985 tak PPP sooba-e-Punjab ke talbah aur amoor-e-nau jawan ke incharge rahe
1979 se 1985 tak soba-e-Punjab ke additional secretary general rahe
1978 mein woh party ke sab se kam umar central executive committe rukun bane
Aap ne 1979 mein Punjab University se M siyasiyat, 1972 mein LLB,  1967 mein BCom ke sath paas kiya
 Phir 1972 se 1977 Punjab University Lahore mein Qanoon-e-Tijarat ki tadrees ke faraiz anjaam diye
Senator Jahangir Badar taweel parlimani tajurbe ke hasil siyasat daan hai
 Ap soba-e-assembly ( Punjab ), qaumi assembly aur aewan-e-bala ( senate ) ke rukun muntakhib hue
2001 se 2003 tak aseeri ke dauran unho ne markatul-aara kitab likhi
 In ke bad aane wali kitab mein mundarja zel shamil hai
Evolution of Democracy jis mein zamana-e-qadeem se le kar daur-e-jadeed jamhuriat ke irteqa aur namo ka jaiyza hai
 Women Leadership jis mein khuwateen mein qaidana salahiyaton ko namo dene ke tareeq-e-haekaar par baat ki gae aur khuwateen ki qiyadat ke ausaf ka ahataa kiya gaya hai
Musharraf Rebuff jis mein Musharraf aamriyat ke ibtedaai daur mein likhe gae woh khatoot shamil hai jo Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto Shaheed aur Jahangir Badar ki taraf se jamat ke mukhtalif sathiyon aur hukomati auhdedaron ke naam likhe gaye
Pakistan ke 7th sadar Ghulam Ishaq Khan 20 January 1915 ko Ismail Khel (Bannu) mein paida hoye
BSC Punjab University se kiya
 1940 mein Civil Service Soba  Sarhad se wabasta hoye
 1947 mein Pakistan ke marooz e wajud mein ane ke baad Wazir e Aala ke Sectary khurak aur Civil o Supplies Soba  Sarhad ke director rahe
 1st January 1961 ta April 1966 Wapda ke Chairman rahe
 April 1966 mein Wifaqi Wazir e Maliyat ke Sectaryrahe
 1st December 1970 mein Sadar Secretariat mein Sadar Division ke sectary rahe
 18 Dcecmber 1971 ko State Bank of Pakistan ke Governor bane
 May 1974 mein wo mashi kameti Islami mumalik ke ijlas mein Pakistan ke wafd ke Quaid bane jo ke Jidah mein munaqid kiya gaya tha
 24 January 1975 ko Sectary General Defance bane
 24 November 1975 ko Wazir e Difa ke Sectary General muqarar hoye
 7 July 1977 ko sectary General Incheif bane
 23 August 1978 ko khazana aur massob bandi ke Wifaqi Wazir bane
March 1985 ko pheli bar aur 1988 mein dosri bar senit ke chairman chune gaye
 17 August 1988 ko Sadar e Pakistan General Zia ul Haq ke tayare ke hadse mein jan bahaq hoye to is raoz Ghulam Ishaq Khan ko Qayam Muqam Sadar bana deya gaya
 Isi roz unhon ne Islamabad mein Wifaqi kabina ka hangami ijlas talab kiya aur mulik ko chalane ke leye fori tor par aik council qayam ki
 13 December 1988 ko Ghulam Ishaq Khan baqaidah aur ba Ikhteyar Sadar e Mumlikat ban gaye
16 August 1990 ko aain ke article 58  2-B ka ikhtayaraat ka istemal karte hoye Sadar e Pakistan Ghulam Ishaq Khan ne Wazir e Azam Pakistan Benazir Bhotto ko bar taraf kar deya
 Quomi assembly tor di jis ki wajha se Benazir ki pori kabina bartaaf ho gayi
14 October 1990 ko Lahore High Court mein Quomi assembly bartaraf karne ke Sadarti hokum ko durust qarar de diya
 24 October 1990 ko Pakistan mein Quomi assembly ke intakhabat meinIslami jahoriitehad ki waze fatah hoi
 27 October 1990 ko Subai assembliyon ke intakhabt hoy
 30 October 1990 ko Wifaqi Shari Adalat ne toheen e Risalat ke Jurm ko saza e muat dene ka fasla kiya
3 November 1990 ko nai Assembly ka iftetahi ijlas howa
 Is ijlas mein irkan ne halaf uthaya
 18 April 1993 ko aik bar phir Sadar Ghulam Ishaq Khan ne apne ikhteyarat ko istemal karte hoye Quomi assembly tro di
 Us waqat Muhammad Nawaz Sharif Wazir e Azam the
 26 May 1993 ko Supreme Court ne Sadar e Pakistan ke is iqdam ko aain ki difa 58 2-B mein deye gaye ikhteyarat kemanafi qarar dete hoye Muhammad Nawaz Sharif hukumat ko ghair mashrotr tor par bahal kar deya
Adalat e Aliya ne Punjab assembly ko bahal kiya aur phir chand minute ke baad dobara assembly tor di
 16 July 1993 ko  EPC ne mid term intakhabat karwane ka mutalba manwane ke leye long march ka elan kiya
 Mulk mein aainni aur siyasi bhoan shidad ikhteyar kar chukka tha lehaza Sadar e Pakistan Ghulam Ishaq Khan ne 18 July 1993 ko Quomi assembly ke Speaker Ghohar Ayoub ko apna istifa peash kar deya jo unhon ne fori tor par mazor kar leya aur senit ke Chairman Waseem Sajad ne raat 12 baje ke baad qayam muqam Sardar ka halaf uthaya
 Unhen Peshawar ke University Town ke Qabrustan mein supurde khak kiya gaya
Urdu ke nabgha afsana nigar, drama nigar aur nasar nigar Ashfaq Ahmed 22 August 1925 ko zila Ferozpur mein Dr  Muhammad Khan ke han peda hue
 Govt College Lahore se ap ne MA kiya
Italy ki Rome University aur Grenoble University France se Italian aur Francesi zubaan mein diploma kiye
 aur Newyork University se broadcasting ki khusosi tarbiyat hasil ki
 unho ne Deyal Singh College Lahore mein do saal tak Urdu ke Lecturar ke tor par kaam kiya aur bad mein Rome University mein Urdu ke ustaad muqarrar ho gae
 Watan wapsi aa kar unho ne Adbi Mujalla go dastaan jari kiya, jo Urdu ke Offist tabaat mein chapne wale ibtedai risalon mein shumar kiya jata hai
 Unho ne do saal haft roza Lel-o-Nahar ki adarat bhi ki
Wo 1967 mein markazi Urdu board ke director muqarrar hue
 Jo bad mein Urdu Science board mein tabdeel ho gaya
 Wo 1989 tak is idarey se wabasta rahe
 Wo sadar general Zia-ul-Haq ke daur mein Wafaqi Wazarat-e-Taleem ke musheer bhi muqarrar hue
Ek mohabbat sau afsane aur ujle phool in ke ibtedai afsanon ke majmoey hai
 Bad mein safar dar safar ( safarnama ), khel kahani ( novel ), aik mohabbat so afsanay drama ( drama ) aut tota kahani ( drame ) in ki numaya tasaneef ban kar samne aae
 1965 se unho ne Radio Pakistan Lahore par ek hafta war feature program Talqeen Shah ke naam se karna shuru kiya
60 ki dehai mein Ashfaq Ahmed ne Dhoop aur Saey ke naam se ek nae feature film banai, jis ke geet mashoor shaeyr Muneer Niyazi ne likhe aur Tufail Niyazi ne is ki mauseeqi tarteeb di thi
 Adakar Qaumi Khan is mein pehli martaba Hero ke tor par aae the
70 ki dehai ke shuro mein Ashfaq Ahmed ne muasharti aur romani muzoaat par ek mohabbat sau afsane ke naam se ek drama series likhi aur isi ki dehai mein in ki series tota kahani aur manchale ka sauda nashar hui
Kuch arsey tak wo Pakistan Television par zawiya ke naam se ek program karte rahe, jis mein wo apne makhsoos andaaz mein qisse aur kahaniyan sunate the
 Is ke bawajood aane wale zamane mein jab bhi in ka naam liya jae
 Aap anjuman taraqqi pasand tehreek ke fa’al rukun aur aik mumtaz communist the
Faiz Ahmed Faiz 13 February 1911 ko Sialkot ke aik muazziz gharaney mein peyda hue
 Aap ki waldah ka naam Sultan Fatima tha
Aap ne ibtedai taleem Maulvi Muhammed Ibrahim Mir Sialkoti se hasil ki
 1921 mein aap ne Scotch Mission School mein dakhla liya
 Aap ne Matric ka imtehan Mary School Sialkot se paas kiya aur phir FA  ka imtehan bhi wahin se paas kiya
 Aap ne School mein Persian aur Arabic Zuban seekhi
 BA aap ne Govt  College Lahore se kiya air phir wahin se 1932 mein English mein MA kiya
 Bad mein aap ne Oriental College Lahore se Arabic mein bhi MA kiya
Aap ne 1930 mein Alys Faiz se shadi ki  College Amritsar mein Lecturer ki hesiat se mulazmat ki aur phir Hely College Lahore mein
 1942 mein aap Fauj mein Captian ki hesiat se shamil ho gaey aur Mehakmae Talluqaat aama mein kaam kiya
 1943 mein aap Major aur phir 1944 mein Leuitenant Colonel ke auhdey par taraqqi pa gaey
 1947 mein aap Fauj se mustafi ho kar wapis Lahore aa gaey aur 1959 mein Pakistan Arts Council mein Secratery taiynaat hue aur 1962 tak wahin par kaam kiya
 1964 mein London se wapsi par aap Abdullah Haroon College Karachi mein Principal ki hesiat se mulazim ho gaey
 Zindaa Nama ki beshtar Nazmein isi Arsey mein likhi gaen
 Aap ke majmoey Hae Kalam mein Naqsh Faryadi, Dast-e-Saba, Zindaa Nama, Dast e tah e Sang, Sarwadiy-e-Seena, Sham-e-Sheharyaran, Mere Dil Mere Musafir aur Nuskha-e-Hae Wafa ( Kulyaat ) shamil hain
Saghar Siddiqui 1928 mein anbala (Mashriqi Punjab) mein paida hoye
 Un ka asal naam Muhammad Akhtar Shah aur filmi naam Nasir Hijazi tha
 Unhon ne aik 40 50 sala buzurg se taleem hasil ki jin ka naam Habib Hassan Khan tha
Qayam e Pakistan ke waqat Saghar ki umar 19 baras thi jab wo Amitsar se Pakistan aye
 Dev Samaj road par aik hotel mein qayam kiya
 Anokhi Dastan, Jabro, Shalimar, Baap ka ghunah, Do Ansoo, Baghi, Anjam, Ghulam aur Sarfarosh film ke gane Saghar Siddiqui ne likhye
 Is tarane mein Fida Shahjahan Pori aur Naeem Hashmi ne muavnat ki
 Saghar Siddiqui hafat roza “Tasveer” ke auditor bhi rahe
 Hafat roza Tasveer band hone ke bad Unhon ne apna filmi akhbar nikala
 Mehndi Hassan ne jo Saghar ki Ghazal is ki zindagi mein gayi is ka mutla haiSadar e Pakistan Field Marshal Khan ne Saghar ki shayari  khusosan jo un par nazam likhi gai
  Saghar Siddiqui ko darwesh shair ke naam se yaad kiya jata ha
 Saghar Siddiqui ke marne ke bad Yonus Adeeb ne us ki zindagi par 2 kitabein tahereer kien han
 Saghar Siddiqui ki Shakhsiyat Fan aur Kalam, Shekast e Saghar
 Saghar Siddiqui ki takhlikat mein Lohe Junon, Shesha Dli, Gham e Bahar, Shab e Agahi, Maqtal e Gul, Sabaz Natiya Majmua han
 Ghazaliyat ka majmua “ kuliyat e Saghar” ke naam se shaya ho shuka hai
 Hazrat Sultan Baho ke dohon ka urdu sheer mein tarjuma Punjab ke sheeri adab paron mein Sohni Mahiwal ka urdu tarjuma kiya
 Lekin pora sheeri tarjuma kahen mehfooz nahi, is ka ibtadai hisa abhi dasteyab howa hai
Us waqt Chaudhry Rehmat Ali Cambridge University ke aik tallib ilm thay
September 1937 mein Punjab Muslim Fedreation Lahore ney alan keya key shumal Magrabi alaqon mein Pakistan key qayam key lea talba jaddojahad karain
 June 1938 mein Lahore key chand Muslim naujawano nay aik tanzeem “Majlis e kabir Pakistan” key nam sey qaim ki
Hyderabad Dakan mein Muslim league  key zair ahtemam 20 May 1939 ko aik confrance munaqid huwa tha
Zamana-e-qadeem mein ye Kolachi Jo Goth ke naam se mashoor tha
Zamane ki rawish ne ise Karachi bana diya
1947 mein Hazrat Quaid-e-Azam ne ise Pakistan ka sadar moqam qarar diya
1959 mein sabiq sadar Field Marshall Muhammed Ayub Khan ne darul hukoomat Karachi ke bajae Islamabad muntaqil kar diya
Khatoon ki izat o waqar ka tahafuz is hawale se bhi aham hai ke aik khatoon ki betoqiri bayak waqat kai hawalon se masher ke dosre afrad ko baraherast mutasir karti hai
Aik khatoon bayak waqat kisi ki beti, kisi ki behan, kisi ki maa aur kisi ki bewi hoti hai
Is tarah aik fard ke kai khandan baraherast mutasir hote hain
8 March duniya bhar mein khawateen ke leye itehad, yak jehti aur jehd e musalsal ki alamat hai
Us waqat America mein socialist kafi mtadad mein mujod the
Lekin abhi khawateen ke din ki tarikh te karne ka marhala baqi tha
Is ke bais 1910 se 1917 tak duniya ke mukhtalif mumalik mein “Yom e khawateen” mukhtalif tarikhon mein manaya jata raha, jab ke America mein ye din February ke kakhiri hafte mein hi manaya jata raha
Ye waqeya 8 March ko (Gregorian calendar ke mutabiq 23 February ko) pesh aaya
1921 mein Bulgaria ke communitist international women sectariat mein sharik khawateen ne qarardad manzor ki ke almi satah par 8 March ke din ko khawateen ka almi din qarar deya jaye
51 baras tak almi yom e khawateen apne is paas e manzar ke bais socialist day ke tor par manaya jata raha
Ye conferences Mexico, Nairobi, Copan Hagan aur Beijing mein munaqid ki gaein aur in mein duniya bhar ki khawateen ne shirkat ki
Lehaza hodod o qawanin mein pai jane wali khamiyon ko dor karna bohat zarori tha
Khawateen ki hoqoq ki pamali ko rokne ke leye aik bill jise “hoqoq e niswan 2006 ka naam deya gaya, quomi assembly ne 15 November 2006 ko manzor kar leya
Ye bill aain ka hissa ban chukka hai
Phele nafiz shuda hodod ordinance mein pai jane wali khamiyon ki nishandahi gahe bagahe mukhtalif halkon ki taraf se hoti rahi hai
1979 ke hodod o qawanin mei naguzir taramim ke leye Islami nazariyati council, jaed ulma aur mazhabi scholars ne rehnumai ki jis ki badotal tahafuz e hoqoq e niswan ka tarikhi bill pass howa
Baba e Urdu Maulvi Abdul Haq ne Hapar mein 1872 mein janam leya
Khaye pete khandan ke fard the
Ibtedai talem Punjab mein hasil ki
Adbi zindagi ka aghaz 1887 mein kiya
Risala Tehzib ul Ikhlaq mein un se kaam lena shuru kia
BA karne ke bad Molvi Abdul Haq Sir Syed Ahmed Khan ki hidayat par 1895 mein Hyderabad Dakan pohanche
Maradsa e Asifiya mein dars o tadris par mamor howe
 1914 mein mohtamim talimat e Aurangabad howe
1919 mein sadar shuba e Urdu Jamiya Usmaniya bane
1928 tak un hi khidmat par mamor rahe aur isi saal wazifa par sobokdoshi hasil kar ke Dehli muntaqil ho gaye
Unhon ne Hyderabad mein 34 saal tak qayam kiya
Urdu ki tawij o ashat ke silsile mein olvi Abdul Haq ne Baresaghir ke chpe chpe ka dora kiya
Un ki zindagi ka har dor musalsal jid o jehad aur amal se bharpur hai
Unhon ne apni zindagi ko mukhtalif hisson mein taqsim kar rakha tha
Anjuman ki pheli kita May 1904 mein shaya hoi
Isi saal Molana Shibli Nomani ne mutamdi ka charge Habib ur Rehman sherwani ko deya
Janab Habib ur Rehman Sherwani ne 1909 mein mutamidi ki masnad se Molvi Abdul Haq ko nawaza
1913 mein anjuman ka daftar Hyderabad muntaqil ho chukka tha
Molvi Abdul Haq Sir syed ke maktab e fikar se taluq rakhte the
Molvi shaba ki tehriron mein aam bol chal ki zaban hoti hai
Anjuman e tarqi e Urdu 1903 mein Maulana Shibli Nomani aur Nawab Mohsin ul Mulk ne qaim ki
1911 mein Molvi Abdul Haq ne is mutamid ka mansab sanbhala aur apne inteqal tak pore 50 baras anjuman ke mutamid rahe
1947 mein Molvi Abdul Haq ne is anjuman ka sadar daftar Karachi mein muntaqil kiya
Is jaloos ki qayadat Molvi shab khud kar rahe the

In ki audience bhi alag hai
Yun to dono he aik jaisi field hain aur kaam bhi aik he jaisa hota hai, magar peshkash ka andaaz mukhtalif hai

Maslan agar shokh o chanchal hero ka role hai to film ka hero naach gaa kar aur uchal kood kar shokhi ka izhaar karega
Jab ke Tv par use sirf apne jumlon aur harkaat o saknat se shokh o chanchal nazar aana hoga
Magar Tv par humen hudood mein rehna hota hai aur bilkul is tarha react karte hain, jaise hum apne ghar mein hain
Film mein ba awaaz e buland jumley bolte hain, jab ke Tv par Dheema andaaz hota hai
Is liye acting karte waqt dono jagah alag alag andaz ko follow karna parhta hai

Inho ne Rashid, Faiz aur Meera Ji waghera ki bohat si shahkar poems tehat ul lafz pesh kiyen
Is item ko wo sab se aakhir mein pesh karte aur sazindon ki taraf hath se ishara karte hue, ba awaaz e buland kaha karte the “ Theka ” is ka matlab hota tha ke orchestra wale saaz bajana shuru kar den
Guzishta kar barson ke dauran inho ne mehfil shair o nasar ke zair unwaan jo program pesh kiye hain Wo bhi is silsile ki karhi hain
In solo performances mein parhne ke liye adabparon ka intekhab bhi wo khud karte hain aur jahan tak mujhe ilm hai, wo aik aik iqtebas ko muddaton par rakhte hain aur phir faisla karte hain ke ise apne program mein shamil karen ya na karen

iss par Jahangir Khan ney sirf itna tebsera kea “ main koi record bananey key lea matchon par match nahin jeet raha tha main sirf her match mein puri jan lagata tha aur yahi silsila RAs Narman sey shikasht khaney tek jari raha

 yea Squash, Almi paimaney par kheli janey wali Squash sey kisi qader mukhtalif hoti hay

yeh wo chand alqaab hain, jin se Shahid Khan Afridi ko tamam duniya mein phele hue in ke paristar yaad karte hain
 Bilkul aisa he hai jaise yeh bataya jae ke Elbert Einstein scientist the
Shahid Afridi ki dehshat kis tarah hareef ballers ki nafsiyat par sawar ho jati hai, in ka izhaar aik zamane mein England ke tez tareen baller Graham Dilley ne khud kiya tha
 Inho ne tasleem kiya ke baller chahe spinner ho ya fast, six to zaroor parhte hain,
 lekin Shahid Khan Afridi ke six kuch is andaaz ke hote hain ke ballers ka waqar khaak mein mil jata hai
 Aik Graham Dilley he nahi, aise kae ballers hain jo “ Lala ” ke jarihana andaaz se panah maangte hain
 Shahid Afridi ne test cricket se kinara kasha zaroor ikhteyar kar li hai
Audience mein hulchul mach jati hai
Aik bhonchal sa aa jata hai
 Log dil thaam kar beth jate hain
Takht ya takhta… Shahid Afridi yehi azam liye maidan mein jate hain,
kabhi kushton ke pushte laga dete hain to kabhi pehli he ball par out ho kae wapis pavilion laut aate hain
Sahabzada Mohammad Shahid Khan Afridi 1 March 1980 ko Khyber agency mein paida hue
 Height 5 ft 11 inch hai
 Karachi mein pale barhe hain
 Ibrahim Ali Bhai school se matric kiya
 4 bhai aur 6 behno wale gharane mein sab se chote hain
 Pakistani selectors ne aik teen ager Shahid Afridi ko, jin ki masey bhi abhi nahi bheegi thin, un ko bhej diya
Match ke dauran fielders ka kaam yehi dikhai diya ke wo ball uthae aur wicket keeper ki taraf wapis uchalte rahen
 Yeh 4 October 1996 ki bat hai
 Jab Shahid Afridi ne 11 six aur 7 fours ki madad se 102 runs banae
Yeh aise munfarid mawaqon mein se aik tha
 Jab six ki tadad fours se barh gai thi aur ikka dukka runs ki tadad sharmindagi ke marety sukhar gai thi
Jahan tak aedaad o shumar ka talluq hai to wo Shahid Afridi ki salahiyaton ki bharpor akkasi nahi karte
Inho ne international career ka aaghaz 2 October 1996 ko Nairobi mein Kenya ke khilaf aik roza match khel kar kiya tha
 Jab ke test career ki shuruwaat 22 October 1998 ko Australia ke khilaf Karachi mein kit hi
 Shahid Afridi ne 27 test match khel kar 36
51 ki osat se 1716 runs banae
 Jis mein 5 centuries aur 8 half centuries bhi shamil hain
 Test matches mein Shahid Afridi 48 wickets bhi hasil kar chuke hain
 Is ke ilawa Shahid Afridi ne 338 1 day matches mein 23
72 ki osat se 6999 runs score kiye hain
 Jis mein 6 centuries aur 33 half centuries shamil hain
 Bataur ballers wo one day matches mein 341 wickets le chuke hain

NALE NITIN MUKESH ke sath affair ke sawal per unho ne kaha ke Bollywod film industry mein is qism ki afwahen roz ka mamul hai,hum achy dost hain aur is se ziyada kuch nahen,filhaal meri tawajja apny career
 Jab is film nagar mien Naseeruddin Shah, Om Pori aur Kalbhoshan jaise actors ka toota bol raha tha
in ka filmy career do adwaar par mushtamil tha
 1977 se le kar 1989 tak in ki tawajja ka markaz art films he rahi
 Bad azaa inho ne commercial films mein bhi acting ka aaghaz kiya
 2002 mien inho ne roznama times of India ko diye gaey interview mien kaha tha
 Commercial cinema par main kabhi itna maqbool nahi raha
 Acting ka aaghaz Farooq Sheikh ne theater se kiya tha
 Phir Farooq Sheikh art films ki taraf aae
 Farooq Sheikh ne 1948 mien Indian riyasat Gujrat ke zilaa Soorat ke shehar Amroli ke aik musalman gharane mien janam liya tha
 Agarcha yeh aik zameendar gharana tha
 Magar in ke walid Mustafa Sheikh profession ke lihaaz se lawyer the
 5 behan bhaiyyon mien Farooq Sheikh sab se barhe the
 Inho ne school aur phir college ki taleem Mumbai mien rehte hue hasil kiaur phir walid ke naqsh e qadam par chalte hue qanoon ki taleem hasil karne ke liye Sidharth College of Law mien dakhla le liya
 Is ke bar aks in ka rujhaan acting ki janib tha
 College ke zamane mien wo baqaiydegi se stage dramas mien hissa lete the
 Chunache inho ne wakalat ko kherbad kaha aur acting se nata jorh liya
 Agarcha Farooq Sheikh us waqt law college he mien zer e taleem the
Acting ka aaghaz inho ne Indian peoples theater association IPTA ke tehat hone wale stage dramas se kiya
 IPTA left arm se talluq rakhne wale stage artists ki tanzeem thi
 1973 mien jab ke Farooq law college he mien zer e taleem the
 Garam Hawa mien aik muslim gharane ki kahani dikhai gait hi, jo taqseem ke bad is makhmasey mien mubtila hota hai ke Pakistan hijrat ki jaey ya Hindustan he mien reh jaey
 Radio par wo zehni aazmaiysh ke program ke meyzban the
 Us dauran wo art films mien bhi acting kar rahe the
 In ki agli aeham film Guman thi
 Markazi acting ki hesiyat se yeh Farooq Sheikh ne badayon se roozgar ke silsile mien Bombay aae hue aik taxi driver ka role adaa kiya tha, jo apni biwi se milne ke liye wapis jana chahta hai, magar itne paise nahi bacha sakta ke ghar ja sake
 Tahum tawalat se ziyada in ki nazar kirdar ki mauzoniyat aur aehmiyat par hoti thi
 Isi liye wo aane wali films mien mukhtalif roles mien nazar aaey
 Film beyn Chashm e Baddor, Katha, Sath Sath, Kisi se na Kehna, Rang Barangi, Tell Me O Khuda, aur Lessonâ€¦â€¦
 Shayad is ki wajah choti screen par in ki barhti hui masrofiyat thi
 Agarcha 1980 ke ashrey mien bhi inho ne Television dramas mien role kiye the
 Magar 20 century ke awakhir mien wo mini screen par boat ziyada masroof ho gaey the
 Is zamane mien inho ne mukhtalif channels ke mutadid drama serials mien mukhtalif alnoo kirdar adaa kiye
 Wo taweel arsey tak mukhtalif shows ki meyzbani karte rahe
 Jis mien wo bollywood ke fankaron se interview kiya karte the
 Wo Tumhari Amrita jaise stage dramas mien markazi role adaa karte rahe
 Is drama mien Shabana Aazmi in ki heroin thi
2008 mien film Saas Bahu aur Scene Six se silver screen par in ki wapsi hui
 Club 60 in ki aakhri film thi, jise chand roz qabal numaiysh ke liye pesh kiya gaya
Farooq Sheikh ne apne stage dramas ki saathi Roopa se shadi kit hi, jis se in ki aik beti Sana hai
 Guzishta December ke aakhri hafte mien yeh khandan Dubai mien tha
Jaya ne siyasat ki ibtedah TDP yani Telugu party mein shamoliyat se ki
2004 mein Jaya ne Rampur ke set se aam intekhabat mein hissa liya aur 85000 votes ki bartari se kamiyabi hasil ki
Dosri bar wo election mein 30000 votes se apne hareef par sabqat le gae
Duniya bhar mein films ke shaiyqeen mein sab se ziyada tadaad Hollywood ki action films ke shaiqeen ki hai aur jo log action films dekhte hain, wo actor Sylvester Stallone ke naam se ba khobi waqif hain
5 ft 9 inch qadamat o qamat wale in kohna mushq actor ne kae yadgaar action films ki hain
Wo sirf aik actor he nahi bal ke kamiyab kahani navees, filmsaaz aur director bhi hain
Hollywood ke in fankaar ka janam 6th July 1946 ko American City New York mein paida hue
Inho ne apni ibtedai taleem Neuter dam Academy aur Lincoln High School se mukammal ki
Jis ke bad inho ne Chariot Military Academy, Miami Dead College aur University of Miami se mazeed taleem hasil ki
Yun Sylvester Stallone ne apne filmy career ka aaghaz 1970 mein teesre darjey ki film The Party of Kitty and Stud’s se kiya
Stallone ko is film ka muaawza 200 dollars mila tha
Yeh naam inho ne apni famous film Rocky tak mein bhi use kiya
Inhe aaj tak isi naam se jana jata hai
Sylvester ne apne career ke ibtedai daur mein teesre darjey ke theater mein live performance bhi den
1970 mein Sylvester Stallone ko film No Place To Hide mein aik mukhtasir role ki peshkash hui
1975 mein inho ne Mohammad Ali aur Chuck Wepner ke darmiyan boxing match dekha
Yun 1976 mein yeh film release hui
Rocky ki kamiyabi ke bad agle baras isi ka sequel release hua
1982 mein Sylvester Stallone ne aik aur film First Blood ka script likha, jis ka markazi role John Rambo tha
Bal ke yeh bhi kaha jata hai ke jab bhi stallone ke career ka graph niche ki taraf jane lagta hai, wo Rocky ya John Rambo ka sahara lete hain
2003 ke bad Sylvester Stallone ne films mein bataur villain kaam karna shuru kiya, lekin 3 baras bad he wo aik bar phir action films ke hero ke taur par jalwagar hone lage
2010 se inho ne films ka aik naya silsila The Expendables ke naam se shuru kiya hai, jis ki abhi tak 2 films release ho chuki hain aur teesri bhi isi baras mutawaqqa hui hai
Sylvester Stallone ne apne career mein ziyada tawajja action films par he markooz rakhi hai
1995 mein inho ne film Judge Dredd mein aik aise munsif ka role ada kiya jo mujrim ko saza sunane ke bad is par khud he amaldaar aamad bhi karta tha
In ki kamiyab films mein Death Race 2000, Cannonball, Rocky, FLST,, Nighthawks, First Blood, Cobra, Over The Top, Lock Up, Tango & Cash, Cliffhanger, Assasins, Daylight aur The Expendables shamil hain
Inho ne aik Hindi film Kambakht Ishq mein bhi bataur mehmaan actor kaam kiya hai
Is ke ilawa inho ne chand TV series mein bhi apni acting ke johar dikhae hain
Rocky ki kamiyabi ke bad inhe kae masnoaat ke advertisement mein kaam karne ki peshkash hui, jin mein inho ne kaam bhi kiya
Sylvester Stallone ne abhi tak 3 shadiyan ki hain
1974 mein jab in ki umer 28 baras thi to inho ne Sasha Zaik se shadi kar li, in dono ke 2 bete hain
Is ke 10 baras bad Sylvester Stallone ne American model Jennifer Fallon se shadi kar li, jo tahaal barqarar hai
In dono ke 3 bache hain
Wo 68 baras ki umer hone ke bawajood aaj bhi kamiyab action hero samjhe jate hain
Is baras in ki 2 films The Expendables 3 aur Reach Me release hui hain
Inayat Hussain Bhatti Pakistan ke phele Super Star play back golokar the
Un ka career panch (5) ashron par muheet tha jis ke doran unhon ne theater ke liye bhi apni awaz ka jadu jagaya
Miyan Mohammad Bakhash Lahore ke mashor tajir the aur Inayat Hussain Bhatti ke qarebi dost bhi the
Bad azan naam badal kar aman tehrik kar deya gaya
Comedy films ke shauqeen afraad mein se shayad he koi aisa ho ga, jis ne shehra e aafaaq comedian Jerry Lewis ka naam na suna ho
Actor, singer, producer, screen writer aur director Jerry Lewis 16th March 1926 ko America ke City New York mein paida hue
Maa Baap ne in ka naam Joseph rakha tha
In ke walid stage programs ki hosting kiya karte the,jab ke waldah radio station mein piano bajaya karti thin
Wo pehle pehal stage programs mein Joe Lewis ke naam se perform karte the, lekin bad mein inho ne apna professional naam Jerry Lewis rakh liya
Jerry Lewis ne apne career ka baqaida aaghaz singer, actor Den Martin ke sath kiya
In ki khas baat yeh thi ke wo pehle se tayyar kiye hue khakey pesh nahi karte the,bal ke stage par aik dosre ke sath hasb mauqa mazaq kiya karte the, usi dauran inho ne radio program bhi shuru kar diye
Martin aur Lewis ne Television par pehli live performance 20 June 1948 ko Toast of the Town mein di
Usi baras TV par in ki pehli series Welcome Aboard nashar ki gai
1950 mein in ki jorhi ne pehli baar aik TV show ki hosting ke faraiz anjaam diye
Lewis aur Martin ki jorhi ne 1949 mein My Friend Irma ke zariye silver screen ka rukh kiya
1956 tak inho ne paramount pictures ki 14 films mein kaam kiya
Jis ke bad dono fankaron ne apne apne anfaradi career ka aaghaz kar diya
In dono ko aakhri baar 1989 mein Den Martin ki 72 Birthday ke mauqa par aik sath dekha gaya
Den ki maut ke bad Jerry Lewis ne un ki yaad mein 1995 mein Den and Me ke naam se aik kitaab bhi likhi thi
Den Martin ke sath kaam karne ke dauran Jerry Lewis ne singing ki taraf bhi tawajja di aur 1950 mein in ka gaya hua song Rock A Bye Your baby bohat famous hua
1958 mein in ka album Jerry Lewis Just Sing release hua
Bataur comedian hero Jerry Lewis ki pehli film Delicate Delinquent thi
Paramount pictures ke sath lagataar 3 films karne ke bad jerry ka is producer idarey se 1960 mein baqaida muaaheda ho gaya
Usi baras Jerry Lewis ne apni zaati production Cinderella ki tayyari bhi shuru kar di
Jis ki release ke liye usi baras Christmas ka din muntakhib kiya gaya tha
Tahum paramount ne bhi film The Bell Boy banane ki peshkash ki, jise jerry ne qabool kar liya aur is film ki production, direction aur story writer ka kaam anjaam diya aur apni zaati production ke sath sath yeh film bhi mukammal kar li
Is ke bad Jerry Lewis ne kae dosri films ki direction di aur in ki stories bhi likhin
Jin mein sab se ziyada kamiyab The Nutty Professor aur Who’s Minding the Store ko hasil hui
1963 mein Jerry Lewis ne films ke sath dobara TV shows bhi karne ka faisla kiya aur yun 1963 mein ABC channel se 2 ghante dauraniye ke The Jerry Lewis show ka aaghaz hua
In ke students mein Steven Spielberg ki pehli mukhtasir dauraniye ki film Amblin dekhi to kaha,is ko kehte hain filmsazi
Jerry Lewis TV aur films ke ilawa waqtan fawaqtan stage par bhi singing aur acting ke johar dikhate rahe
1981 mein inho ne Hardly Working ke zariye dobara filmy duniya ka rukh kiya, jis ke bad 2013 tak 15 mazeed films mein kaam kiya
In ki nae film Big Fish abhi takmeel ke marahil mein hai
Tawaqqa hai ke yeh 2015 mein release ki jaegi
Jerry Lewis ne 2 shadiyan ki
Pehli 1944 mein singer Patty Palmer se aur dosri 1983 mein 32 sala dancer Sandy Pat nick ke sath ki, jab wo 65 baras ke the
Wo 1950 se 2011 tak Muscular Dystrophy Association MDA ke chairman ke taur par faraiz anjaam dete rahe
Inho ne 1952 mein usi idarey ke liye attiyat jama karne ki khatir Telethon ka aaghaz kiya tha
Wo 1966 se 2010 tak baqaidgi ke sath har saal Jerry Lewis MDA telethon ki hosting ke faraiz anjaam dete rahe
Pakistan ke mashor mosiqar aur lazawal dhunon ke khaliq 1 December 1924 mein Mumbai ke zila Khandis ke sadder muqam Jal gaoon mein paida howae
Un ka asal naam Nisar Ahmed Bazmi tha
Nisar Bazmi ke walid Syed Qudrat Ali ka taluq mosiqi se na tha
Bachpan mein Nsar Bazmi mashor Bharti mosikar Amman Aki Khan se mutasir the
1944 mein unhon ne Mumbai radio station se nashar hone wale drame “Nadir Shah Durrani” ki mosiqi tartib di
Nisar Bazmi ki shurat agle do saal mein All India Radio ke studios se nikal kar Mumbai ke film studios mein pohanchi aur director A R Zamindar ne unhen apni pheli film “Jamna Paar” ke gane compose karne ki peshkash ki
Ye film 1946 mein release hoi aur phir agle 12 baras ke doran Nisar Bazmi ne 40 filmon ki mosiqi di
Aap ne Lita, Asha, Mana De aur Mohammad Rafi jese fankaron se gane gawaye
Mumbai mein behpanah peshawarana masrofiyat ke bawajod Bazmi sahib muawze ke etebar se mosiqaron ki C category mein shamil the
1962 mein Nisar Bazmi Pakistan aaye
Filmi mosiqi mein ye zamana the Khursheed Anwar aur Rashed Attre ka
Usi zamane mein Baba Chishti, Feroz Nizami, Robin Ghosh, Master Abdullah, Suhail Rana aur Hassan Latif bhi apne fan ke johar dekha rahe the
Zitadah commercial sathah par ye Manzor Ashraf, Debo, Nashad, A Hameed, Saleem Iqbal, Tassaduq, Lal Mohammad Iqbal, Rehman Warma, Bakhshi Wazir
Khalil Ahmed aur Wazir Afzal ka zamana tha
Is film ke leye Bazmi sahib ne Noor Jahan ki awaz mein “Aaye aaye piyar ke din aaye” 19 take mein record kiya
Ye Pakistan mein record hone wali Nisar Bazmi ki pheli composition thi
Isi shurat ki bunyad par Bazmi sahib ko film “head constable” mili jo “esa bhi hota hai” se sal bhar phele release ho gai
Is film ke bad Pakistani film industry ke darwaze Nisar Bazmi par khol gaye
Phir “hatim tai”, “adil” aur 1967 mein jab “lakhon mein aik” release hoi to Nisar Bazmi ka tota bolne laga
Agle baras hidayatkar Fareed Ahmed ki film “andalib” release hoi “khuch log roth kar bhi lagte hain kitne piyare
”Ab Pakistan ki filmi duniya mein mosiqi se taluq rakhne wale har shakhas par ye haqiqat ayan ho gai Mumbai ka ye mosikar mehaz tafrehan yahan nahi aaya balke aik waze maqsad ke sath yahan mustaqil qayam ka iradah rakhta hai
Aik interview ke doran Malka e Taranum ne eteraf kiya ke wo yaqinan esa karti hain lekin sirf naam nehad mosikaron ke sath
1972 mein Raza Meer ki film “naag mani” ka gana “sajna re” Bazmi sahib ne is ki dhun S D Burman ki composition “rangila re” se mutasir ho kar tarteb di
Raza Meer ne kaha ke Madam Noor Jahan ko is composition mein gawa kar dekhein
Bazmi sahib ne kaha ke jitni high pitch unhein chahiye wahan shayad Madam na pohanch sakhein
” Is par Bazmi sahib ne Noor Jahan se “Sajna re” ki tan lagwai aur phir ye geet unhi ki awaz mein record karwaya
Isi tarah “umrao jan” ka ye gana “jo bacha tha wo lutane ke leye aaye hain” Bazmi sahib Rona Laila se aur film producer Hassan Tariq Noor Jahan se gawana chahate the
Is gane ki recording mein 19 take lage
Lekin is se phele wo Alamgeer (hum chale to humare sang sang nazare chale), Tahira Syed (ye mehfil jo aaj saji hai) ko filmi duniya se mutarif karw gaye
Asad Amanat Ali Khan se “mora jiya na lage”, Mehdi Hassan se gana “ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke leye aa” aur “ye watan tumhara hai tum ho pasban is ke”, Mehnaz se “mera piyar tere jewan ke sang rahe ga” aur Naheed Akhtar se “Allah hi Allah kiya karo” gawa gaye
1968 mein film “Saiqa” ki mosiqi par aur 1970 mein film “Anjuman” ke music par Nisar Bazmi ne “Nigar Award” hasil kiya 1972 mein “Meri zindagi hai Nagma” 1979 mein “Khak aur khoon” aur 1986 mein film “Hum aik hain” ki mosiqi par bhi unhein isi award se nawaza gaya
Karachi mien akhiri 20 baras unhon ne apne kuch shagird paida kiye lekin ziyadah tar waqat gosha nashini mein apni ullad ke sath ghuzara
Bollywood par guzishta kai dehaiyon se Khanon ka raj hai
Unhein mein se aik Salman Khan bhi hain
Salman Khan ka janam 27 December 1965 ko Bharat ke shehar Indore mein mazi ke adakar aur screen writer Saleem Khan ke ghar mein howa
Saleem Khan ke bachon mein Salman ka phela number hai jab ke in ke chote bhai Arbaz aur Sohail Khan bhi filmi sanat se hi wabasta hain
Salman Khan ne Gawaliyar aur Mumbai mein apni taleem mukamal ki
Isi leye Salman ki pheli film 1989 mein release hone wali “main ne piyar kiya” kehlai
Is ke bad Salman ki lagatar teen filmon “pathar ke phool” “sanam bewafa” aur “qurban” ko juzwi kamyabi hasil hoi, isi baras Salman Khan ne Madhori aur Sanjay Dat ke sath “sajan” mein kaam kiya
1992 se 1993 ke doran Salman ki 6 filmein nakaam hoein, kuch logon ka khayal tha ke shayad un ka career zawal pazer ho gaya hai lekin esa nahi tha
Agle 4 baras tak Salman Khan ne “piyar kiya to darna kia” aur “jurwan” samet taqreban 10 filmon mein kaam kiya
Salman Khan ne apne filmi career ke doran filmon mein adakari ke sath sath kai TV shows ki mazbani ke faraiz bhi anjam deye, jin mein “das ka dum” aur “big boss” qabil e zikar hain
Unhon ne “dabang” samet kuch filmon mein golokari ke shube mein bhi taba azmai ki
1997 ki film “dil to pagal hai” ke leye malbosat design kiye, “pathar ke phool” aur “veer” ki kahani likhi, “wanted” aur “chilar party” jesi jesi bamaqsad filmein produce kiein
Is ke elawa bator model wo kai mashrobat aur degar masnoat ki tashhiri muhim ka bhi hissa rahe
Salman Khan ka shumar bollywood ke insane dost fankaron mein hota hai
2011 mein hi unhon ne “Salman Khan Being Human Productions” ke naam se apna production house qaim kiya
Is silsile mein pheli film “chilar party” ne teen national awards hasil kiye
Koi nahi janta tha ke 15 April 1990 ko Paris mein British lawyers ke ghar mein paida hone wali actress apne career ke mukhtasir se arsey he mein itni shohrat hasil kar lengi
Harry Potter ki kamiyabi ke bad Emma Watson ne 2 aur role kamiyabi se adaa kiye
Pehla karishmati khuwahishat se bharpor film The Pricks of Being Wolf Ware mein Sam ka aur dosra The Baling Ring mein Nicky ka
Jis ke bad wo apni Maa aur Bhai ke sath Oxford aa gai
Acting ki taraf is ke rujhaan ka izhaar 6 baras ki umer se he hone laga tha
Isi liye is ne maqami school mein acting, singing aur dance ki tarbiyat hasil karna shuru kar di thi
10 baras ki umer tak wo kae maqami theaters mein kaam kar chuki thin
Tahum peshawarana karkardegi dikhane ka mauqa inhe Harrry Potter ke liye audition mein mila
Agarcha Harry Potter ke liye in ke 8 auditions hue, lekin kahani ki musannifa JK Rolling ne pehle he test mein Emma Watson ke haq mein faisla de diya tha

Jis ke bad wo February 2010 tak Hollywood ki sab se ziyada muaawza lene wali actress ban gai

Tahum jou jou is ki umer barh rahi hai, wo Harry Potter ki child actress ka image badalne ki koshish kar rahi hai

Monir Hussain  Pakistan ke pehle singer thay
Mehboob ko barhe muhazzib andaaz mein  bad duaaeyn dene wale is munfarid geet ko Saifuddin Saif ne likha tha aur yeh geet Santosh Kumar  par filmaya gaya tha
Lekin release ke aitebar se Punjabi film Noora’n Munir Hussain ki pehli film banti hai
Jo May 1957 mein release hui thi
Is film ke mauseeqar in ke Khala zaad Bhai Safdar Hussain the
Film Noora’n Naghmaat ke lihaz se aik bohat barhi aur yaadgar film thi
Jis mein actress aur female singer Malka Tarannum Noor Jaha’n thin
Munir Hussain ko is film mein 5 geet gane ko mile the jo in ke filmy career ka wahid mauqa tha
In mein do char gane the jo sab he malka Tarannum Noor Jaha’n ke sath the
Munir Hussain ne apne 4 ashron par mushtamil taweel filmy career mein 163 films ke liye 217 geet gaey the
Jin mein se 122 Urdu geet 91 films se the
Jab ke 95 Punjabi geet 72 films mein the
Munir Hussain ke Solo Songs ki tadad 70 hai, jab ke in ke 2 songs ki tadad 161 hai, jo 74% banti hai
Gher release shuda films aur gher filmy songs ki tadad in ke ilawa hai
kyun ke wo chahe kisi bhi brand ke malbosat zebtan kar len SRK brand se ziyadah maqboliyat koi bhi hasil nahi kar sakta
Wo apne fashion sense ke bare mein kia kehte hain? Aaye jante hain
Question: Aap ka fashion statement kia hai?Shahrukh Khan: Safed T shirt, blue jeans aur snickers
Beharhal mera mizaj kuch esa hai ke chust kapre mujhe pasand nahi, kapron ke mamle mein meri soch bikul riwayati hai
Question: Aap ka pasandidah fashion icon?Shahrukh Khan: Rock Spring Field aur Brose Springsteen, kyun ke wo donon hi safeed T shirt aur blue jeans pehante hain
Question: Aik celebrity star ke leye fashion trend follow karna kitna zarori hai?Shahrukh Khan: Main bas fashion trend samajhne ki koshish karta hun, mera stylist Den aur Naresh jo pichle kai saalon se mere sath kaam kar rahe hain hameshah infaradiyat ko mad e nazar rakhte hain, magar jab main logon k dekhta hunk e wo had se ziyadah saje sawre hain to mujhe acha nahi lagta
Shayad is ki wajah ye ho ke mujhe mard hazraat ke libas mein sadgi pasand hai ya phir shayad main old fashion hun kyun ke mujhe acha nahi lagta jab larke dhoti shawalr ke sath jacket pehan len
Main apni film ya show ke leye to ese kapre pehan sakta hun lekin is ke elawa kabhi nahi
Mere khayal mein Delip Sahab ka dressing style zabardast tha aur MrBachan bhi kafi stylish hain magar in ke elawa aur koi bhi nahi jis ke fashion senses se mutasir hun
Question: Aap kharidari ke shoqeen hain?Shahrukh Khan: Main sirf London mein shopping karta hun kyun ke wahan shopping kara aasan hai, wahan 2, 3 brend outlet mere pasandidah hain aur unhein mere size ke bare mein aagahi hai
Main garmiyon ke mosam mein shopping ke leye jata hun
Question: Fashion ke mamle mein tanqid ka samna karna pare to?Shahrukh Khan: Esa kabhi nahi hota, han main aksar akhbar parhta rehta hunk e falan star ne is T shirt ke sath coat kyun pehnna? Aur koi jote aur dresses dobarah pehan leye wagherah wagherah
Agar main chahon to saal ke 300 din 300 alag alag jote pehan sakta hun magar main esa nahi karta
Agar mujhe koi jeans ka shoe acha lagta hai to main ussi ke 2, 3 sets kharid leta hun, mujhe yehi pasand hai
Question: Aap ki wardrobe ki sab se sasti tareen cheiz kia hai?Shahrukh Khan: Mujhe jo pasand aaye wo kharid leta hun, magar mere wordrobe mein bohat si esi T shirts hain jo shayad dosre adakaron ke kapron se ziyadah sasti hon
Main qemat ke bare mein sawal nahi karta magar ye aksar pochta hunk e kahein ye dolne ke bad sukar to nahi jaye ga? Jis par log herani se hanste bhi hain, shayad ab wo zamana nahi raha jab kapre 1 bar dhulne ke bad sukar jaya karte the
Question: Koi esa libas jo aap kabhi pehanna nahi chahate?Shahrukh Khan: Main filmon ke leye har tarah ka costume pehan sakta hun, jese “Rab ne bana di jori” mein jo jeans pehanni pari thi wo mujhe bilkul pasand nahi thi magar shooting ke waqat main ne inkar nahi kiya tha
Mere khayal mein main kurta aur chori dar pajama kabhi nahi pehan sakta, is ke bajaye mujhe shalwar kamiz pehanna pasand hai
Hollywood nagri mein jin adakaron ne ghair mamoli shohrat hasil ki, un mein aik naam Angelina Jolie ka bhi hai
Tekhe naqosh bari chamakdar aankhon aur surahidar gardan wali Angelina Jolie 4 June 1975 ko Los Angeles mein adakar John Voight ke ghar piada hoi
Un ki maa bhi adakara thein
Bachpan mein Angelina pabandi se apni maa ke sath films dekhne jati thein
Jab wo 6 baras ki hoi to apni maa aur sotele bap ke sath New York aagayen
Lekin 5 baras bad Angelina ne dobarah Los Angeles ka rukh kiya
Is bar Angelina  ne adakari ke medan mein qadam rakhne ka fasla kiya
Angelina ne baqaidah adakari sekhne ke leye aik institue mein dakhla le liya jahan wo do sal tak adakari ki tarbiyat lene ke sath mukhtalif stage dramon mein bhi hissa leti rahein
14 baras ki umar tak pohanchne ke bad Angelina adakari ki tarbiyat adhori chor kar murdon ki akhri rasomaat ada karne ke kaam (funeral direction) mein dilchaspi lene lagen
Isi doran Angelina ne modling ki duniya mein qadam rakh diya
Us dor mein wo ziyadah tar siyah libas hi mein malbos nazar aati thein
Isi dorran aik larke se un ki dosti hoi jo 2 saal tak chali
Is ke bad Jolie Beverly Hills High School se taleem mukamal karne ke bad dobara adakari ki tarbiyat ki tataf mutawaja ho gayein
"Screen par un ke career ka aghaz 1982 mein film ""lookin to get out"" mein apne walid John Voight ke sath mukhtasir kirdar ke sath howa"
"Is ke bad wo apne bhai ke school ke ""television cinema"" ke leye banai gai 5 filmon mein kaam karne ke sath sath chand gaon ki videoes meim bhi nazar ayen"
Adakari mein Angelina ne apne walid se bohat kuch sekha hai
"Adakari  mein  Angelina Jolie ke career ka baqaidah aghaz 1993 mein kaam bagudet ki science faction video film ""Cyborg 2"" se howa"
"1999 mein film ""Girl interupted"" mein behtareen performance par unhein Acadmy Awarad se nawaza gaya"
Inhein kaamon par unhein kai azazat se bhi nawaza gaya
Jab ke filmi career mein unhein aik Academy, 2  Screen  Guild aur 3 Golden Globe award hasil kiye
2009 mein Forbes nami jaride ne unhein sab se ziyadah mawza lene wali adakara qarar diya
Unhein kai jaridon mein purkashish aur khubsorat tareen khawateen mein sarefehrist rakha
Un ka phela boy friend 14 baras ki umar mein bana tha
May 2000 mein Jolie ne adakar Billy Bob Thronton se shadi kar li
2005 mein un ke taluqat adalar Brad Pitt ke sath qaim howe jo abhi tak barqarar hain
Bad mein Waheed Murad aur Parvaiz Malik, Mosiqar Sohail Rana aur geet Nigar Masroor Anwar ki aik aysi team tayar hogae jis nay industry kop e der pe kamyab filmein dein lakin iss se pehley Waheed Murad nay mokhtalif hadayat karon key sath mil kam keya jin mein Qadeer Gori, Shouker Hashmi, SM Yousuf aur Hasan Tariq shamil thet
"Apni zati company film arts ke bainer taley 1966 mein Waheed Murad nay ""Arman"" banae iss ki kahani unhon ne khud shochi thi Hero bhi khud they aur produser bhi, director un ke dost Parvaiz Malik they Nagma nigar Masroor Anwar aur mosiqar Sohail Rana aur yahi charon film arts nami company key buyadi satoon they"
Yeh woh zamana tha jab Arman key bad Dauraha, Ahsan, Dewar Bhabi aur Dil Mera Dharken Teri kamyabi key jhandey gar chuki thein aur Hero number wan key tour par Waheed Murad ka maqam mateen ho chukka tha
Parvaiz Malik nay apni alehda film sazi shuroo ker di aur Waheed Murad ki jaga Dhaka se aney waley naey Adakar Nadeem ko cast kerna shuroo ker deya
Apne opretion se aik din pehle Waheed Murad ne apnay betay ki salgira (birth day) manae usey bohot se tohfey (gift) deye aur raat soney ke liyeh apni munh boli behan Mumtaz Ayoub ke ghar chaley gaye yeh 23 November 1983 ka din tha
Sarwat o Namori ki Dewi ko nai ahkamat mil chukey they
Woh shuhrat amm ki shama aur baqe dawam ka lebada liye ker Nadeem Shahid aur Javed Sheikh ki talash nikal chuki thai
Johnny Depp ka shumar Hollywood ke un artists mein hota hai  jin ka naam he box office par kamiyabi ki zamant samjha jata hai
In ki films sirf America mei he ab tak 3 Arab 10 Crore Dollars  jab ke duniya bhar mein 7 Arab 60 Crore Dollars ka business kar chuki hain
In mein se Pirates of the Caribbean series ki films ne global box office par 3 Arab Dollars se zaiyd Ales In Wonderland ne 1 arab dollar Charlie and the Chocolate Factory ne 47 crore 40 lac dollar aur The Tourist ne 27 crore 80 lac dollar kamae
2012 mein Guinness World record ne inhe sab se ziyada muaawza 7 crore 50 lac dollar wasool karne wala actor qarar diya tha
Hollywood walk of Fame mein in ka naam star ki shakal mein maujood hai
Johnny Depp 9th June 1963 ko American estate Kentucky ke shehar Owensboro mein paida hue  in ka naam John Kristopher Depp 2 rakha gaya tha
Apne showbiz career ki shuruwaat mein inho ne chand chote motey role karne ke bad 1984 mein pehli bar film Nightmare On Elm Street mein aik aeham role adaa kiya  jis ke bad inho ne acting ke israar o ramooz seekhne ke liye acting class mein dakhla le liya
Inho ne pey dar pey kae kamiyab films mein kaam kiya aur ben ul aqwami shohrat paai
in ki numayan films mein Pirates of the Caribbean series ke ilawa Nightmare on Elm Street  Edward Scissor hands  Sleepy Hollow  Alice in Wonderland  Charlie and The Chocolate Factory  The Tourist  Donnie Brasco  Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas  Public Enemies  Sweeney Todd  The Rum Diary  The Lone Ranger waghera shamil hain
Johnny Depp aik garage mein qaiym musical band The Kids mein bataur Guitarist shamil ho gae
Johnny Depp ne apni azdawaji o romani zindagi mein bhi kae nasheb o faraz dekhe
Inho ne pehli shadi 20 baras ki umer mein 25 sala make up artist Lorry Alison se ki thi
Jis ke bad actress Shoreline Fan  Jennifer Gray  Vienna Rider aur Kate Moss ke sath bhi in ke muaashqe chale
1999 mein Depp ne Francis actress Vanessa Parades ke sath dating shuru ki
Jo in ke 2 bachon ki Maa bhi hain  lekin 2012 mein in se bhi alehdgi ho gai  agle he saal Depp ne actress Amber Heard se mangni kar li  jo tahaal barqarar hai
Tahum qabil e tareef baat yeh hai ke tamam tar zaati masaiyl ke bawajood Johnny Depp ne apne career par in ka koi negative asar parhne na diya aur mushkilaat ki chakki mein musalsal pisne ke bawajood wo filmy duniya mein kamiyabi ka zeena mutawatir charhte rahe  yahan tak ke Baam urooj par ja pohanche
Johnny Depp in dino bhi kae aeham films mein kaam kar rahe hain  jo agle 2  3 saal ke dauran release ki jaengi
In mein Alice in Wonderland ka sequel bhi shamil hai  jo May 2016 mein numaiysh ke liye pesh kiya jaega

Azeem Pakistani qawwal  mauseeqar aur Singer Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan 13 October 1948 ke roz Faisalabad mein peyda hue
Ap ke walid Fateh Ali Khan aur Chacha Mubarak Ali Khan apne waqt ke mashoor qawwal the
In ke khandan ne qiyam Pakistan ke waqt Mashraqi Punjab ke zila Jhalandar se hijrat kar ke Faislabad mein sakonat ikhteyar kit hi
In ki mashoor qawali   Ali Maula Ali   inhe dinon ki yadgaar hai
In ki qawwali   Dam Mast Qalandar Mast Mast   release hui
Is mashoor qawwali ke manzar-e-aam mein aane se pehle wo America mein Brooklyn Academy of Music ke Next View Festival mein apne fun ke johar dikha chuke the
Lekin   Dam Mast Qalandar Mast Mast   ki release ke bad unhe University of Washington mein mauseeqi ki tadrees ki dawat di gai
Maghrib ke ilawa Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne Bharat mein bhi kae filmon ki mauseeqi di
Kae filmon mein un ke gane istemaal kiye gae aur aaj tak kiye ja rahe hain
Genius Book of World Records ke mutabiq duniya bhar mein qawwali ke sab se ziyada album Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ne ( 125 ) release kiye gae
Yeh wo waqt tha ke Pakistan mein ziyada log in ke naam se aashna nahi the
Tahum 90 ki dehai mein aik qawwali   Dam Mast Qalandar   pore Pakistan mein in ki pehchan ban gai
Us waqt tak maghrib ke mauseeqar Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan ke kaam se aashna ho chuke the aur in mein kae bohat mutassir the
Jis ke bad maghrib mein bhi wo kisi tarruf ke mohtaj nahi rahe  lekin maghrib mein mauseeqaron ne qawali mein jiddat mutarif karwane ke liye nae saaz shamil kiye
Wo gaeyki kea mal ko bandage bana dete hain

Steven Spielberg 18th December 1946 ko America estate Ohayo ke City Sonsonate mein paida hue
Film industry mein in ka career ka aaghaz zamana e talib e ilmi se he ho gaya tha to ghalat na hoga
Is film ka budget sirf 500 American dollars tha
Waldain alehdgi ho jane ke bad Steven ne California ka rukh kia aur wahan Arcade ya High School mein admission le liya
Jis ki wajah se inhe deegar bachon ke sath ziyada khul kar milne ki aadat nahi thi
