Steven Spielberg ke career ki sahi maeyno mein shuruwaat film Jazz se hui
Is film ne box office par shandar kamiyabi hasil ki aur us film ne 47 crore dollar kamae
Tahum is ke bad Spielberg ne Jazz ka sequel ya King Kong aur Superman jaisi films banane ki offers mustarid kar den
Ab inho ne bachpan ki apni khuwahish pori karne ke liye Urhan Tashtariyon ke barey mein aik film Close Encounter of Third Kind banane ka faisla kar liya
Is ke ilawa inho ne is film ki badaulat 6 deegar awards bhi hasil kiye
Jin mein academy award films Sewing Private Ryan aur Chandlers List bhi shamil hain
In ki agli manzil adventures movies thin
Jis ke liye inho ne Star Wars series ke khaliq George Locus se rabta kiya aur in ki film ke hero Harrison Ford ko le kar famous zamana adventure film Readers of the lost arc banai
Yeh film itni kamiyab hui ke is ke sequel banane ka silsila aaj bhi jari hai aur is series ki 5 films numaiysh ke liye nominate kiya gaya
ET bhi Spielberg ke career mein be had aehmiyat ki hamil film hai
In ki deegar numayan fims mein Jurassic Park  Lincoln  War Horse  Catch me if u can  The Adventures of Tin Tin waghera shamil hain

�2 November 1965 ko India ke dar ul hukomat New Delhi mein paida hone wale shahrukh khan ko king khan ya Bollywood ke badshah ka khitab yun he nahi mil gaya
Shahrukh khan ki zindahi ke ibtedai 5 baras India ke city Mangalore mein basar hue  jahan in ke dada us waqt chief engineer ki hesiyat se bandargah par taainaat the
Tahum Dilip Kumar ki tarah shahrukh khan ke aabao ajdaad ka talluq bhi Peshawar se tha aur wo bhi qissa khuwani bazaar mein raha karte the
Lekin taqseem hing se pehle yeh gharana Delhi muntaqil ho gaya tha
Shahrukh khan ke dada Afghanistan mein paida hue the
Shahrukh khan ki waldah Latif Fatima aik engineer ki beti thin  jo sarkari mulazim the
Latif Fatima ke barey mein yeh bhi kaha jata hai ke wo Indian national Army ke aik Major General Shahnawaz Khan ki le palak beti thin  lekin Army is ki tardeed karti hai
Shahrukh khan ka kehna hai ke wo waldah ki taraf se Hyderabadi  walid ki taraf se Pathan aur dadi ki taraf se Kashmiri hain
Delhi ke senate Columba School mein taleem ke dauran wo aik laiq aur mumtaz talib e ilm the
Tahum college ki taleem ke dauran in ka ziyada waqt Theater Action Group ke sath stage dramas mein hissa lete hue guzarne laga
Mass communications mein masters karne ka in ka iradah bhi inhe sargarmiyon ki wajah se pora na ho saka aur inho ne acting mein he career banane ki thaan li
In ki umer 20 baras kam thi

Yeh qiyam e Pakistan se pehle ka zamana tha
jab 7  8 saal ki Iqbal Bano apne parhose se sunai dene wali aik taan ki janib pehli baar mutawajja hui

Wo khud 4 November 1935 ko Delhi mein paida hui aur sunn baloghat tak ka ziyada arsaa isi shehar mein guzara

Zia Mohyeddin 20 June 1933 ko Faisalabad mein paida hue
Waldain ka talluq Kasur se tha
In ke walid Khadim Mohyeddin dars o tadres ke shobey se munsalik the
Zia Mohyeddin ne bachpan mein pehla drama apne walid ke zair e hidayat Devta ke naam se kiya
Ibtedai taleem hasil karne ke bad inho ne government collede Lahore mein dakhla liya aur 1949 mein graduate ho gae
Zia Mohyeddin ne fankarana zindagi ka baqaida aaghaz radio programs mein sadakari se kiya
Jald he inhe aik tarbiyati course par Australia jkane ka mauqa mila aur is ke bad wo radio chor gae
BBC ke 50 se ziayd dramas mein bhi hissa liya
1956 mein Pakistan wapsi par inho ne bohat se Urdu Drama stage kiye  jin mein Hafeez Javed ka tarjuma karda   Joules Scissor   aur Khuwaja Mohyeddin ka khel   Laal qila se lalokhet   waghera shamil hain
Zia Mohyeddin ne apne filmy safar ki shuruwaat 1962 mein Hollywood ki mashoor zamana film Laurence of Arabia se kit hi
In ki deegar films mein Work as a four letter Word  Kharttom  ashanti aur Bombay talky waghera shamil hain
1970 ke ashrey mein Zia Mohyeddin kuch arsaa PIA arts and dance academy se bhi wabasta rahe  aaj kal wo Karachi mein National academy of performing arts ( Napa ) ke sarbarah hain
Main inhe un dino se janta hon  jab wo Jawan Raana hua karte the aur main radio Pakistan mein drama producer tha
Inho ne aik jagah likha hai
  Main zaati taur par be had sharmila hon
Khud ain aur duniya ka har artists meri raaey mein 2 chezon ka majmooa hota hai
Pakistan mein log Zia Mohyeddin ko television ke hawale se jante hain
PTV ke ibtedai daur mein inho ne Karachi markaz se Zia Mohyeddin Show ke zair e unwaan jo program pesh kiye  un ki yaad aaj bhi logon ke dilon mein taza hai
Zia Mohyeddin ko is show mein shareek apne mehmano ko bhi apne mehmano se guftugo karne ka funn aata tha  lehaza inho ne jin mehmano ko bhi apne program mein bulaya  bawajood is ke key wo sabbarhi aur jani pehchani shakhsiyaat thin
Zia Mohyeddin ne un se aise sawalaat kiye ke in ki zindagi ke wo goshey bhi  nazreen ke saamne aa age  jin se wo pehle aashna nahi the
Un ki khososi guftugo qaireen ki dilchaspi ke leye pesh e nazar hain
Question: Aap ne kheel ka aghaz kahan se kiya?
meri walid sahib ne kabhi squash nahi kheeli, 
balke wo Pakistan sports board mein weight lifting ke coach the  
Mera bara bhai bhi sirf shoq pora karne ke leye squash kheelta tha,
Question: Ab tak squash ke kin bare khilariyon se muqabla kar chuke hain?
Nasir Iqbal: Abhi guzishta dinon main ne France mein hone wali World team championship mein shirkat kit hi
Question: jaded squash mein benul aqawami satah par behtar karkardagi kis umar tak barqara rakhi ja sakti hai?
Nasir Iqbal: Main ye samajhta hunk e aaj kal squash mein power aur tajurbe ki ziyadah zarorat hoti hai, 
 mojudah almi squash champion Nic Mathew ki umar 30 saal ke lag bhag hai, 
Question: Jahangir ya Jan Sheer Khan ne agar cha guzishta dor mein kaamyabiyan hasil kein to is ki kia wajah thi aur aaj ked or mein humare khilari bohat peche hain to is ki kia wajah hai?
jahan tak meri taleem ki baat hai to main is waqat Islamia College mein first year ka talib e ilm hun
Question : Family mein aap ko dekh kar kisi ne squash shuru ki ya bhai waghairah ka rujhan parhai ki taraf hai?Nasir Iqbal : Hum Masha Allah 7 behan bhai hain, mere bare bhai Tahir Iqbal ne shoqiya squash zaror kheeli thi a
Unhon ne Peshawar University se MBA kiya howa hai aur bhi behan bhai taleem hasil kar rahe hain
Question : Squash ke khilariyon ke leye mukhtalif idaron mein mulazimat ke mamlat aur halaat ko kis tarah dekhte hain?Nasir Iqbal : Kisi bhi khilari ke leye us ki karkardagi ko behtar banane mein mulazimat aham kirdar ada k
Question : Pakistan mein squash academy ke qayam ki kitni ahmiyat hai?Nasir Iqbal : Main apne mulk ke squash ke legend khilariyon ko ye pegham dena chahon ga ke wo squash ki academy kholein, jin mein khas tor par junior khi
chand junior khilari hain aur wo mustaqbil ki itni zimedari ka bojh akele nahi utha sakte
Is ke leye zarori hai ke aik khas tariqa e kar ke tehat un ki groming aur training ka intezam ho
Australian open championship 1979 ke dermeyan Roshan Khan ke sahib zade aur Jahangir Khan ke bare bhai Torsam Khan cort per hi dam tor gae woh pehle professional player they jo bainul aqwami sercit per khelte hue kort mein
Satra(17) minutes ke zordar moqable mein Barbar ,Torsam per dabao dal rahe they aur woh set ko 6
6 sey baraber kerne mein kamyab ho gae they achanak Torsam ghutno ke bal gir pare woh mosalsal hanp rahe they kort ke samne do doctor aur aik nurse joy eh moqabla dekh rahe they foran Pakistani khelari ki tibbi imdad ke lea
Doctors Torsam Khan ke seene ki malish kerne lage aur mokhtalif tareeqon se hoshe mein lane ki koshish kerte rahe thori dair mein unhein Royal Adelaide Hospital le jaya gaya taqreeban do ghante ki jaddo jahad ke bawajood un
Duniya ka yeh Azeem khelari naujawani ki umer mein hi iss duniya se kooch ker gaya

Razia Sheer Khan ne Government Girls School Gulshan e Iqbal se Matric ka imtehan pass kiya aur isi school se taleem ke doran athletics ka aghaz kiya
Razia Sheer Khan aaj kal Karachi University ke shuba e sports mein MSC ki talba hain
Question: Athletics ki taraf aane ka khayal kese aaya?Razia Sheer Khan: Jab main school mein third class mein thi to pheli martaba main ne school mein hone wle kheelon ke muqable mein shirkat ki

Goya in ke career par yeh filmy shair sadiq aata hai
Saeed Anwar 6 September 1968 ko Karachi mein paida hue
Wo bunyadi taur par left hath se jarihana andaaz mein khelne wale batsman the, jab ke kabhi kabhar left arm slow baler ka kirdar bhi nibha lete the
Saeed Anwar ne pehle pehal Mailr gym khana mein shmoliyat ikhteyar ki
Wo Saeed Anwar he the
Off stump keg her yaqeeni corridor ka jitna safar Saeed Anwar ne kamiyabi ke sath tey kiya
Saeed Anwar ne one day career ka aaghaz 1st January 1989 ko Perth mein west indies ke khilaf kiya, jab kle test career ki shuruwaat November 1990 mein west indies ke khilaaf Faisalabad mein ki thi
Saeed Anwar ne 55 test matches mein 45 52 ki osat se 4052 runs, 11 centuries aur 25 half centuries ki madad se score kiye
21 ki osat se 8824 runs banae, jis mein centuries ki tadad 20 aur half centuries ki tadad 43 rahi
In ka sab se barha score 194 runs tha
Apne 14 sala career mein kae nasheb o farez dekhne ke bad Saeed Anwar ne bil aakhir August 2003 mein international cricket se retirement ka aelaan kar diya
Aakhir mein Saeed Anwar ki zindagi mein aane wali is tabdeeli par nazar daalte hain, jis ne inhe aik sharer aur khalandare naujawan se baresh mazhabi insaan bana diya

 Foot ki almi tanzem FIFA ne  foot baal ke almi cup ke muqablon ke leye “rotation” ki policy ke tehat ye fasla kiya tha
 Is policy ka elan karte howae FIFA ke saddar “Sep Bilatar” 7th March 2013 ko elan kiya tha ke World Cup ke leye Football ki tamam alimi tanzemon ko masawi tor par muqablon ke ineqad ka muqa dene ki policy apnai gai hai, jis ke tehat 2014 ka Football World Cup Jonubi America ki Football fedaration se taluq rakhne wale kisi bhi mulk mein munaqid kiya jaye ga
 Is elan ke bad khud bakhud Jonubi America ke bahar sargaram e amal tamam Football fedrations World Cup ke ineqad ke muqable se bahar ho gayein aur Jonubi America ki Football ki tanzeem “South American Football Assosiation” ke members mumalik ke mabeen tehra
In mumalik mein Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Cheli, Colombia, Ecuador, Paraguay, Uruguay, Peru aur Venezvila shamil hain
tahum 3 June 2013 ko Argentina, Brazil aur Colombia ke elawa tamam mumalik ne muqable ke ineqad ki dor se khud ko alehdah rakhne ka elan kiya
 Mutazamin ke mutabiq World Cup ke muqabalon ke leye ibtedai tor par 18 sheharon ka intekhab kiya gaya
 Waze rahe ke ye tamam shehar Brazil ke taqreban tamam aham elaqon ya khiton ka ahata karte hain
 In sheharon mein Brasilia, Sao Paulo, Salvador, Recife, Cuiaba, Manaus, Natal, Rio de Janeiro, Fortaleza, Belo Horizonte, Porto Alegre aur Curitiba shamil hain
 Tahum is andazah lagai gai raqam mein 435 Million Dollor ka ezafah howa jis par zabardast awami rad e amal bhi samne aaya
 Dosri taraf Brazil ke wazir e Kheel Aldo Rebelo ka kehna hai ke World Cup ke ineqad se Brazil ki maishat mein lag bhag 90 Billion Dollor dakhil hon ge, jis ka baraherast faidah awam ko hasil ho ga
World Cup ke doran majmoi tor par 12 stadiums mein muqabalon ka ineqad ho ga
 Inmein se 7 medan naye tameer kiye gaye hain
 Jin mein Brasilia mein waqaye “Eatadio Mane Garrincha” bhi shamil hai
 Is stadium mein World Cup ke 7 muqable hon ge

63 sala Abid Ali 17 March 1952 ko Baluchistan ke sadar muqam Queeta mein paida howe
Zaman e talib e ilmi mein unhen adakari ka koi shoq nahi tha, balke un ka ziyadah rujhan us dor mein musaviri aur tehrir ki taraf raha
1986 mein Queeta ki mashhor addbi aur samaji shakhsiyat aur maroof shair Atta Shad ki un se mulaqat hoi
Abid Ali audition ke leye gaye aur kamyan hone ke bad Queeta radio se dramon samet mukhtalif programon mein sada kari karne lage
1973 mein hosol e raozgar aur behtar mashi mustaqbil ka khawab ankhon mein sajaye ye gabro jawan Queeta se Lahore mumtaqil ho gaya
"Abid Ali ke mashhor dramon mein jhok siyal ke elawa "" waris, suraj ke sath sath, ghulam gardish, mehandi, morat, sehali, samandar, dosra asman, buri aurat, masi aur malka, aan, jehaz, kala jadu, rukhsati aur dasht samet latadad drama serials, soaps aur infaradi drame shamil hain"
"In dramon mein adakari ke sath sath unhon ne "" malka aur masi"" samet "" saheli"" ki hidayaat bhi den aur in donon dramon ko produce bhi kiya"
"2009 mein Abid Ali ne aik Bollywood film ""Mr Bhatti on chuti"" mein kaam kiya"
"In filmon mein ""mosa khan, laila, sahibah, betab, fatah, nagina, Allah rakhi, gharibon ka badshah, sone ki talash, waris aur khak aur khoon"" waghaira shamil hain"
Lekin ziyadah shorat unhen jhok siyal se mili
Tv par unhen Yawar Hayat, M Nisar Hussain, Saleem Chichtti, Ashfaq Ahmed aur Bano Qudsiya jese asatzah mile
Ye wo dor tha ke jab Firdos Jamal, Shujat Hashmi aur M Qawi ka tota bol raha tha
Is ke elawa bhi wo mutadid award hasil karte rahe
Super model Iman Ali, Rahima Ali aur Mariyam Ali bhi apni shanakht kitni bhi mutabar ho magar in ki pehchan aik mazboot hawala ye bhi hai ke wo Abid Ali ki betiyan hain
Kisi bhi drame ke kirdar ko haqiqat ke rangon se sajate Abid Ali ka orhna bichona sirf showbiz hai
Wo apna zati production house bhi chalate hain aur khob chan phatak ke bad apni taraf ane wali adakari ki offer bhi qabol kar lete hain
Wo aaj ke dor mein directors aur producers ki nai nasal ke sath zaror kaam kar rahe hain magar apne kuch purane usalon par wo aaj bhi samjhota nahi karte
"Misal ke tor par wo aaj bhi set par pohanche se phele script ko achi tarah yad kar lete hain, aur jab tak apne sath sath apni pori team ko drame ki rerhersal nahi karwa dete us waqat tak ""ok take"" ka nara sunne ke sakhat khilaf hain"
Purane usolon aur jadid riwayaton ke sahare Abid Ali ka fani safar jari hai aur Abid Ali ki zati shakhsiyat mein koi tabdili aaye ya na aaye lekin dekhne wale har naye drame aik bilkul naye Abid Ali se zaror mulaqat karte hain
Marilyn Monroe 1 June 1926 ko paida hui to naam Norma Jean rakha gaya
Biptisma ki rasam adaa hui to naam Norma Jean Baker ho chukka tha
Is se pehle is ka naam Norma Jean Mortenson bhi rakha gaya, lekin aik actress, singer aur model ke taur par suniya bhar mein Marilyn Monroe ke naam se lazawaal shohrat paai
Jin logon ne bhi is yahoodi actress ki films dekhi hain
Wo ab umar ke kisi bhi hisse mein hon
Is ke tazkare par in ke dilon ki dharkane do chaar lamhon ke liye zaroor taiz hoti hain
Wajah aap samajh sakte hain
Modeling ki wajah se filmy duniya ka darwaza is liye khula
1946 mein aik chote se role ke liye pehli baar film sign ki
Isi tarah ke chand chote motey roles karne ke bad 1950 mein 2 films The Asphalt Jungle and All About Eve mein qadrey numayan role mile aur in films ko oasat darje ki kamiyabi bhi hasil hui
1953 mein Marilyn Monroe ko films mein markazi kirdar milna shuru hue
The Dumb Blonde mein sunehre balon wali bewaqoof ladki ka role umdagi se kiya to bad mein 2, 3 films mein in se isi tarah ke comedy role karwae gae aur in par goya isi kirdar ki chaap lag gai
1957 mein in ki apni production company ki film The Prince and The Show Girl par Bafta award ke liye nominate hui
1959 mein Some Like It Hot par golden globe award mila
Tahum maut ke 37 years bad American film Institute jaise mauqqir aur barhe idarey ne Marilyn Monroe ko Greatest Female Star of all Time qaraar diya
29 June 1956 ko Marilyn Monroe ne famous drama nigaar Arthur Miller se shadi ki
Marilyn Monroe ke left paaon ki 6 fingers thin aur in ke left gaal par aik real till bhi tha, jise lop artificial samajhte the
Go ke inho ne sanjeeda aur tragedy character bhi barhi maharat se adaa kiye hain, lekin nazreen inhe comedy aur interesting roles mein he dekhna pasand karte hain
Bushra Ansari aik kamiyab host bhi hain
Inho ne TV shows ke ilawa kae award shows, stage shows aur mukhtalif taqareeb mein hosting ki hai
haal he mein Hum Tv ne Indian dinger Mikka Singh ke music show ka aehtemam kiya, to us mein bhi mezbani ke faraiyz Bushra Ansari ne he adaa kiye
bushra Geo Tv ke music show Pakistan Idol mein Hadiqa Kiyani aur Ali Azmat ke sath judge ke faraiyz anjaam de rahi hain
Bushra Ansari Tv ke liye dramas bhi likh rahi hain
In ke tehreer karda serial Neeli Dhoop, Makaan, Kuch Dil ne Kaha aur Dil hai Chota Sa, behad maqbool hue
Bushra Ansari ko apne career mein beshumar award aur aezazaat mile hain
Jin mein pride of performance bataur khas qabil e zikar hain
Inhe sabiq sadar Parvez Musharraf ne apne daur mein sadarti award aur sabiq wazeer e aazam Benazir Bhutto ne Women Achievement award diya tha
Bushra Ansari PTV award ke ilawa kae martaba Lux style award bhi jeet chuki hain
TV Shows : Fifty fifty, show time, rang tarang, loose talk, Saturday night live, Dolly ki aaegi baraat, mera naseeb, annie ki aaegi baraat, mere dard ko jo zuban mile, bilqees kaur, aangan terha, kalliyan, emergency ward, waghera
Bushra Ansari ne Geo films ki Abhi to Main Jawan hon mein bhi aik dilchasp role play kiya tha
Hollywood mein bataur martial art hero qadam rakhne wale Steven Seagal 10th April 1952 ko American estate Michigan mein paida hue
Jis ke forum bad in ke parents California muntaqil ho gae
Jahan steven ne apni high school ki taleem mukammal ki
Jab steven school mein the to apni umer chupate hue inho ne aik aise restaurant mein bartan dhone ka kaam shuru kar diya jahan ka aik cook martial art ke mahir the
19 baras ke hue to is ke walid ko 2 baras ke liye Japan jana parha
1974 mein America wapsi par in ki mulaqat khatoon Aikido instructor Miyako Fujitani se hui
Steven ke susar aik Aikido academy mein head instructor the
Un ke retire hone ke bad yeh jagah Steven Seagal ne sanbhal li
Biwi se alehdgi ke bad steven Mexico chale gae, jahan martial art ki tarbiyat dene lage
1983 mein America wapsi ke bad California mein Aikido academy khol li
In ke 2 music album bhi release ho chuke hain
Steven Seagal ki films mein martial art aur qanoon ka ansar roles mein numaya rehta hai
Shayad is ki wajah in ki martial art mein maharat aur filmy career ke dauran aik police academy se graduation karna hai
Isi liye Steven Seagal ko American estate Luciana mein reserve Deputy Sheriff ka aezaaz hasil hai
Steven ne 3 shadiyan ki aur in ke 6 bache hain
Wo budhmat ke manne wale hain
Jaise bohat se cento logy ke manne wale hain
Pakistan ki mosiqi ka fakhar, Master Inayat Hussain Lahore ke andiron Bhati darwaza mein 1916 mein paida howae
Khandani tor par mosiqi wirse mein mile
Wajibi si taleem ke bad khandani dastor ke mutabiq mosiqi ki taleem hasil karna shuru ki
Harmonium ki taleem apne mamoon Ustad Behar Bakhash se hasil ki
Classical mosiqi ki baqaedah taleem Khan Sahab Bare Ghulam Ali Khan se hasil ki
Master Inayat Hussain bohat hi surelye the aur is par Ustad Bare Ghulam Ali Khan ki nazar e Inayat ne unhein waqayi Master Inayat Hussain bana deya
Apne ibtedai dinon mein Master Inayat Hussain ne golokari ke sath sath adakari bhi ki
Nawab of Rampur ne un ki shurat ke pesh e nazar unhein apne darbar se musalik kar leya lekin ye arsa kuch ziyadah nahi hai
Bad azan mukhtalif gramophone companies ke sath kaam kiya
Is dor mein gramophone companies record par composer ka naam nahi likhti thein lekin is ke bawajod mosiqi ko samajhne wale log un ke kaam ki shanakht kar sakte the
Un gramophone companies mein Colombia gramophone recording company, Hans Masters Voice aur Jaino phone recording company ke naam qabil e zikar hain
Film business ke etebar se flop ho gai magar mosiqi ke etebar se Master Inayat Hussain ke leye kaam ke darwaze khol gai
Master Inayat Hussain ne taqreban 36 saal film industry mein kaam kiya
Baz uqat unhon ne kai kai saal tak koi kaam nahi kiya
Film “anar kali” ka baqi music us waqat ke dosre namwar mosikar Rashed Atre ne compose kiya
Master Inayat Hussain ne apne 36 saala dor mein taqreban 60 filmon mein mosiqi di jin mein 22 ke qareeb Punjabi filmen hain
Ye film 1954 mein release hoi thi
1955 mein aik film “qatil” release hoi jis ka gana bhi Iqbal Bano ki hi awaz mein tha
Master Inayat Hussain buzurgon ko bohat mante the aur un ke mazarat par hazri dete rehte the
Multan mein Shah Shams Tabrez ke mazar par khososi tor par jate the
Un se riwayat hai ke film “gum naam” mein “payal mein geet hain cham cham ke” aur Anwar Kamal ki film “qatil” mein “ulfat ki nai manzil ko chala” donon geet unhon ne Shah Tabrez ke mazar par dua magne ke bad compose kiye
Buzurgon ki is nazar ka natija dekhiye ke donon hi geet Iqbal Bano ne gaye aur wo bhi amar ho gaein
”1956 mein film “Naila” bani
Ye Pakistan ki phli rangeen film thi
Is film mein Shamim Aara heroin jab ke in ke muqabil Santosh Kumar aur Darpan the
Naghmon aur ghazalon ko situation ke mutabiq compose kiya aur ragon ko donon isleb mein istemal kiya
Phir 1967 se 1970 tak aap film industry ke leye kaam karte rahe
1973 se 1985 tak ke zamane mein aap ne 22 filmon ki mosiqi tarteb di jin mein ziyadah tar Punjabi filmen thein
Jaya Prada Indian cinema ki un chand actresses mein se aik hain, jinhe in ke khudadad husun ki bina par be had pazeerai mili
Teekhe naqosh, lambe baal, sabk chehra aur is par aankhen aesi goya 2 jhilmilate roshan diye hon
Yehi wajah hai ke in ke paristaron mein mehaz aam film bean he nahi bal ke india ke khas khas afraad bhi shamil hain
Indian mutawazi cinema ke maroof director, Satyajeet ne Jaya Prada ko duniya ki haseen tareen aurton mein se aik kaha tha
South India se talluq rakhne wali Jaya Prada 3 April 1962 ko riyasat Andhra Pradesh mein Krishna Rao ke ghar paida hue, jo Tamil films ke financer the
In ka naam Lalita Rani rakha gaya aur chunke raqs o mauseeqi ko India mein ibadat ka sa darja hasil hai
Is liye bohat choti umer mein Jaya Prada ko raqs o mauseeqi ki tarbiyat hasil karne bhej diya gaya
Jab wo 14 saal ki thin to raqs mein is qadar maharat hasil kar chuki thin ke school ke salana functions mein dance karte dekh kar aik film director ne inhe apni Telugu film Bhomi Kasam mein 3 minute ke dance number ki peshkash ki
Jaya Prada ne yeh peshkash qabool kar li
Qismat shayad isi ko kehte hain ke Jaya Prada jo bachpan mein Doctor banne ke khuwab dekha karti thin
Fun e adakari ki nabz shanaas ban gai
Kashapnaat ki aik Telugu film mein Jaya Prada ne aik aesi goongi larki ka role play kiya
Yehi film 1979 mein Sargam ke naam se bollywood mein banai gai jis mein Jaya Prada ke hero Rishi Kapoor the
Khas taur par Rishi Kapoor ke sath filmaya gaya
Jaya ka song Dafli Wale bohat famous hua
Yun South Indian cinema mein dhoom machane ke bad Jaya film Sargam se bollywood mein mutarrif hui
Is ke bad Amitabh Bachan ki humrahi mein film Sharabi ne inhe mazeed kamiyabiyon se humkinaar kiya aur wo aik baar phir film fare award ke liye nominate hui
Bollywood mein Amitabh Bachan aur Jitendra ke sath in ki jorhi maqbool hui
Us waqt Sridevi, Jaya Prada ki sab se barhi hareef thin
Jaya Prada ki kamiyab bollywood film Tohfa Telugu zaban mein banai gai
In ki film Devta ka remake thi
Is qisam ki films ki badaulat mardon ke sath sath Jaya Prada ki khuwateen maddahon ki tadad bhi kam nahi thi
Mutazakra bala films ke ilawa Insaniyat, aaj ka arjun, Maa, ganga jamuna, saraswati, mawali, in ki kamiyab films mein se hain
Is baat ka izhaar inho ne apne aik interview ke dauran kiya tha ke wo larhakpan he se apni janib uthne wali sataishi nazron ki aadi hain
Inho ne 30 sala filmy career ke dauran 300 films mukammal ki aur 8 zabanon mein kaam kiya, jin mein Telugu, Tamil, Marathi aur India ki riyasat Karnatak mein boli jane wali zaban top of the list hain
1983 mein inhe film fare best Telugu actress ka award aur 2007 mein film fare life time achievement award se nawaza gaya
1986 mein inho ne film producer, Srikant Nihata se shadi ki jo pehle se shadi shuda aur 3 bachon ka baap tha

aur iss ilaqay ki faslain tabah o barbad ho gain, Log qahat ka shikar ho gaye to 
lakin unhain  na wakalat pasand thi na profferi 
1965 ki jang kay bad jab January 1966 mein Ayub Khan nay Allan-e-Tasqand per dastakhat ker deye to Bhutto nay apnay uhday say istafa day dea aur larkana chalay gaye lakin Ayub Khan kay lia Allan-e-Tasqand kay baray mein akalay jawab dahi bohot mushkil thi.
Iss leye waqti tour per Bhutto ko mana lea gia aur qoumi assembly mein unsay Allan-e-Tasqand ki hamayat bhi kerwai gai tahum June 1966 mein achanak unka istafa manzoor ker kay unhain farig ker dia gai.
Bila shuba iss waqt Bhuto kay istafay say pori qaum ko sadma hua aur na sirf Ayub Khan ki amriyat bai naqab hui balkay awam kay jazbat Ayub Khan kay sakht khelaf aur Bhutto ko mazloom qarar day ker un kay haq mein ho gaye chunanchay jab Bhutto Larkana jatay huye Lahore Railway Station say guzray to un kay maddahon naray ki aik kasir tadad station per moujood thi.
Mr. Bhutto socialist na thay.
Woh aik jagirdar kay ghar mein paida huye thay magar unki walda ka taluq jagirdar khandan say na tha jis ki wajah say un kay susral walay un say achcha salook na kertay thay.
un tamaam awamil nay Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto kay siasi sonch kay khadokhal tashkil deye tha.
1991 mein colonel Vladimir Putin ne KGB se istefa de diya.
Kisi ne shayad sach he kaha hai… “ Iqtedar ki kursi par gond laga hota hai… ”
Mushkil yeh aa parhi ke Russia ke aaeyn kisi shakhs ko musalsal 3 martaba president ke auhde par faiz hone ki ijazat nahi deta, beharhaal ghanimat hai ke president Vladimir Putin ne kisi mawrae aaeyn iqdaam ke bajae 2012 mein sadarti intekhab larhne aur darmiyani arsaa prime minister ke taur par guzaarne ka andiya diya hai. 
Azaadi ke bad beshtar arsaa bharti siyasat par congress bhaai rahi aur khud congress par ab Nehru khandaan haavi raha hai. 
1984 mein sikh muhafizon ke hathon Indra Gandhi ke qatal ke bad Rajiv Gandhi ko in ka jaan nasheen chunn liya gaya aur khatoon e awwal ka kirdar Sonia Gandhi ke hisse mein aya.
1991 mein Madras ki aik taqreeb mein Rajiv Gandhi ko aik khatoon ne guldasta pesh kiya, jo achanak he zordaar blast se phat parha.
Us guldaste mein bomb chupaya gaya tha aur mazkora khatoon ka talluq Tamil Tigers naami group se tha.
Rajiv Gandhi bomb blast ke natije mein chal base.
Is accident ne Sonia Gandhi ko bharat ki pur tashaddud politics se mutanfir kar diya aur inho ne congress ki janib se Rajiv Gandhi ki jaan nasheen banne ke liye dale jane wale dabao ki saliha saal tak mazahmat ki. 
Wo nahi chahti thi ke in ke dono bachon Rahul Gandhi aur Priyanka Gandhi par khoon e siyasat ka manhoos saya bhi parhe, lekin bil aakhir 1998 mein inhe party ke mustaqil dabao ke saamne himmat dikhani parhi aur wo congress ki intekhabi mohim mein hissa lene par aamada ho gai. 
Sonia Gandhi bharat ki pehli roman catholic prime minister ban sakti thin, agar wo 2004 mein congress ki hairan kun intekhabi kamiyabi ke bad wazarat e uzmaa ka auhda qabool karne se inkaar kar ke sab he ko hairan na kar deti.
Congress ka dabao tha ke wo yeh mansab zaroor sambhalen, lekin inho ne yeh kehte hue inkaar kar diya ke, “ Mere andar ki awaaz mujhe yeh auhda sambhalne se roak rahi hai. 
”2006 mein Sonia Gandhi parliament ki rukniyat se bhi mustaafi ho gai, kyun ke mukhalfeen ne yeh mauqqif ikhteyar kiya tha ke wo “ National Advisory Council ” ki sarbarah bhi hain.
Is liye aaiyn ki roah se 2 munfaat bakhsh auhdey apne paas nahi rakh sakti.
Agarcha council ke sarbarah ko koi tankhuwa adaa nahi ki jati, is liye use muna fat bakhsh sarkari auhda qaraar nahi diya ja sakta, lekin Sonia Gandhi ne khud ko tanazey se bachane ke liye parliament ki rukniyat aur council ki sarbarahi… dono se he istefaa de diya. 
Party Rehnuma Chahtay Thay Main Ghar Me Chapatian Banati Rahun Shadi Ki Angothi Tak Nahi Mili Ghar Me Taweez Bhi Milay Reham Khan
Younus Khan Ki Achanak Retirement Per Heran Howa Ahmed Shahzad 16 Rukni Team Ka Hissa Mumkin Hai Jald Mauqa Dia Jaye Waqar Younus

16 December 1811 Ko 1 Taqatwar Zalzalay Ki Waja Se Azeem Mississippi Darya
Apni baat dosron tak pohanchane ke liye aap ka chillana zaroori nahi.
Agar aap ki divorce ko 10 baras ka arsaa beet chukka ho to aap ki zindagi aik nae dhap par aa chuki hoti hai.
Jab main pehle pehal Pakistan aai to sab he ne kaha ke tum kamiyab nahi ho sakogi.
Mujhe rangon aur mardon ke malbosaat ke barey mein ziyada sojh bojh nahi.
Imran aise kapre pasand nahi karte, jo in ke liye araamdey nah on.
Mera khayal tha k yeh bohat khaufzada karne wala tajurba ho ga aur main ne yeh bat Imran se bhi kit hi.
Main ne in se kaha tha ke in ka celebrity status mujhe khaiyf kar raha hai.
Bohat se khush haal afraad ne 7 - 8 saal ke bachon ko gharelo mulazim rakha hua hai.
NWFP mein sanati mulazmeen ke liye to kam se kam ujrat muqarrar kar di gai lekin gharelo mulazmeen ke liye aisa kuch nahi hua.
Pakhtono ko dosron se mukhtalif aur stereo type ka samaja jata hai.
Street children ko sarkon par nahi rehna chahiye.
In se in ka bachpan chinn jata hai.

Remote k button daba daba halkan hogaye lekin buzzer ne choon tak na ki.

Kafi tareefain thookeen uski aap ne.

Kahani ka khulasa ye k circuit ne wo sab kiya jo aap chahte thay siwaye aap ki marzi se chalne k.

Un k pass aik robot thi jo chal nahi rahi thi.
Kuch hi dair main naak kat chuki thi, jo do char loog (???) support main thay wo bhi ahista ahista khisak rahay thay, Gulzar sahab ko Bilal sahab laptop rakhne ki best jagah suggest kar rahay thay aur Hashir sahab moun (????) band kar k baith gaye thay.

KIA scene hay laundon
13 March 1967 ko Janab Altaf Hussain ke Walid Mohtaram Nazeer Hussain  ka Inteqal huwa aur walida mohtarma ka intaqal 5 December 1985 ko  huwa
Ibtadai taur par tarbiat Karachi cantt say shuru ki phir Hyderabad cantt muntaqil ho gay iss dauran Mashriqi Pakistan mein jang chir gai
jamia Karachi say BPharmacy  kar nay kay baad MPharmacy mein dakhla leya lakin university chornay par majbur hogaye
Ye tulba tanzem fouran iss qadar mqbul hogai kay dusri tulba jamaton ka nishana bannay lagi
Jo iss ki maqboiyat say ahsas-e-adam tahaf fuz ka shikar ho gai thein
Yon university campus mein aaye roz tashaddud ka silsilah shuro hogaya
Altaf Hussain ko pehli bar 14, August 1979 mein griftar kar leyah gaya aur woh nou (9) mah tak qaid mein rahay
Karachi kay tamam ilaqon Korangi, Golimar, Maler, New Karachi, FB area, Nazimabad gizri kay tamam Karachi mein MQM ka tuti bolnay laga
1984 mein iss kay tashkeeli dour mein Karachi mein lasani fsadat ka aagaz hua to MQM aik bari siasi jamat ki haisiat say samnay aie in fasadat nay Altaf Hussain ki shohrat aur badnami donon mein azafa kiya 
Sindh  mein barhtay huay tashddud kay waqayat mein Fouji operation ka agaz 19, June 1992 ko hua
MQM apni suhrat ki wajah say iss operation  ka khasusi nishana bani
Iss daur mein MQM pur  tashdud amaze siasat mein hissa lanay  aur torture sell chalanay kay  ilzamat lagaye gaye
Altaf Hussain aur un kay sathiyon par qatal aur dosray jaraim kay hawalay say moqadmat qaim keye gaye
Iss daur mein Altaf Hussain aur unkay sathiyon kay darmian akhtalafat nay janam leya aur  yuon alehdah Afaq Ahmed, Amir Khan, Bader Iqbal, Mansoor Chacha nay alag hokar apni jamat MQM Haqiqi ki buniad rakhi
Amir Khan kuch arsa pehlay Janab Altaf Hussain aur unki jamaat Muttahida Qaumi Movement say apni ghalti ki maafi mang kar Muttahida mein shamil hogaye hain
  youn Altaf Zardari bhai bahi ka nara samnay aya 
 Altaf Hussain aaj bhi London mein moqeem hain aur wahan  party ke international secretariat se party ke muamalat chala rahay hain
  Altaf Hussain par bohot say ilazmat lagaye gai hain
 Unhain dahshatgard aur qatil tak kaha gaya hai
 Tamam hukumaton ki taraf say unhain aik mujrim sabit karnay ki koshish ki gaie hai
 Naserullah Babar Imran Khan aur Zulfikhar Mirza jaisay logon nay Britannia jakar bhi unkay khalaf qanuni karwai kar nay ka alan kia lakin iss sab kay bawajud woh apni jagah par qaim aur mustehkam hain
 Altaf Hussain ki  maqbuliat mein har guzartay din kay sath azafa hi hua koi kami nahi aie aur na unkay mokhalif apnay tamam tar dawon kay bawajud unhain hilanay mein nakam rahay
 Altaf Hussain Pakistan say bahar honay kay bawajod Pakistani siasat mein aik aham markaz ki haisiat rakhtay hain aur unki taqarer aur bayanat hamashah am-o-khas ki tawajjah hasil kartay  rahay hain
Pakistan mein NRO kay silsilay mein jo shuro galga utha woh isi waqt thamnay mein aya jab Janab Altaf Hussain nay NRO ki mokhalfat kartay huye Sadar-e-Pakistan Janab Asif Ali Zardari ko mashwarah dia kay woh doston ki baat manain aur agar Pakistan mein istehkam lanay kay silsilay mein unhain koi qurbani bhi daina paray to woh us say draig na karain
 Altaf Hussain  ki taraf say do tok alfaz samnay anay par aik dam sab kuch thanda par gaya aur Wazeer-e-Azam ki taraf say NRO ko manzuri kay leye parliament mein pass na kar nay ka  alan kar dia gaya
  Altaf Hussain ka ye musbat faisla jahan unki sakhsiyat ko mazeed mustehkam kar nay ka bais bana wahein iss say ye bhi zahir hua kay Pakistan mein na rehnay kay  bawajud unki baton mein katna wazan aur ahmiyat rakhti hai
5th  July 1977 ko Zia ul Haq nay Pakistan mein Martial law lagadia jis ki waja say Zulfiqar Ali Butto ko takhtadar ka moun dakhna para aur Benazir Bhutto ko harasat mein lalia gaya
 1979 say 1984 tak ka arsa Benazir Bhutto nay mukhtalif jaloon mein qeaid-o-band  ki sobatain jhaltay mukhtalif muqamaat per nazar band rehkar guzara
 Iss doraan inhun nay 10 mah ki qeaid-e-tanhaye bhe kati
 1984 mein reha honay kay baad woh khud sakhta jila watni kay tehat 2 saal kay lia England chali gayein
 August 1985 mein woh apnay bhi shanawaz Bhutto ki tadfeen kay lia watan lotein jissay France kay sahar  canes mein zahar day kar halaq kardia gaya tha
 18 December 1987 ko inn ki shadi Asif Ali Zardari say hoye
1990 kay intekhabat mein IJI nay akasariyat hasil ki aur Nawaz Sharif Wazeer-e-Azam Pakistan banay
 18 March 1993 ko mulki halaat kay pesh  nazar Nawaz Sharif nay apnay sathiyon samat wazarat-e-Uzma say istafa day dia aur Sadar Ghulam Ishaq Khan nay assembly tehleel kardi
 Inn sab kay bawajud halat ki kashidgi barqarar rahi aur yeh kashedgi us waqt uroj per pahonch gaie jab Benazir kay chotay bhai Mir Murtaza Bhutto ko unki apni bahan kay ahde hukumat mein aik intahaye masqooq police maqblay mein sath sathiyon samat halaq kardia gaya
 Murtaza Bhutto ki halaqat ko sarkari qatal qarar deya geya aur Asif Ali Zardari ko iska zemma dar tehraya gaya
5 November 1996 mein Sadar Farooq Ahmed Leghari nay mukhtalif ilzamat kay tayhat Benazir Bhutto ko unkay uhday say mazol kar deya aur assemblyan tor dein
 Benazir Bhutto per mukhtalif moqadmat qaym kar kay adalti karwai ki gae laykin issi dauran woh mulk say bahar chali gayein aur khud sakhtah jila watni ikhtyar kar li
 Moqadmat chaltay rahay aur Asif Ali Zardari ko 8 sal say zaid arsay ki  qeid bhugatni pari
Benazir Bhutto Aur “Meesaq-e- Jamhurait”Nawaz sharif jab Pervez Musharraf  ki “karwai” kay shikar hokar jila watan honay per majbor huye to iss tajurbay nay unhain aur Benazir bhutto ko bhi bahot kuch sochnay par majbur kar deya
 ARD nay General Pervez Musharraf ki hukumat kay khelaf bhar pur mazahmat ka alan keya
 Jab 14 May 2006 mein London mein Nawaz sharif aur Benazir kay darmayan “meesaq-e- jamhurait” par dastakhat huya Jis kay tayhat donon nay jamhuryat ko bahal karnay aur aik dosray kay khaylaf istaymal na honay ka faisla keya
Dosri pesh qadmi iss waqt huie jab 28 July 2007 ko Abu Dhabi mein General Pervez Musharaf aur Benazir Bhutto kay darmeyan aik aham mulaqat huie jis kay baad people’s party  ki chairperson taqriban sarah 8 saal ki jila watni khatam kar kay 18 October 2007 ko watan wapis ayein to unka Karachi Airport par faqedul misal istaqbal keya gaya
 Benazir Bhutto ka karwan Shara-e-faisal par Mazar Quaid ki janib barh raha tha kay achanak zordar dhamakay huye
 Inn dhamakon mein paunay do sau kay lag bhag afrad jan bahaq huye aur sankron zakhmi hoye
 Qiamat e sughra kay iss manzar kay dauran Benazir Bhutto ko bahefazat Bilawal house paucha deya gaya people’s party ki chairperson jab apnay bachchon (Bilawal, Bakhtawar aur Asifa ) say milnay
DobarahDubai gayein to mulk kay andar General Parvez Musharraf nay 3 November ko emergency nafiz kar di
 Iss surat hal mein people’s party nay maidan khali na chornay ki hikmat amli kay tayhat tamam halqon mein umedwar kharay keye aur kaghzat-e-namzadgi jama karay
 Agar chay ARD kay faislay kay tahat Nawaz Sharif nay bhi intekhabat mein hissah na lanay ka faisla keya tha lakin Benazir Bhutto nay unhain qayel keya kay herkaron ko khuli chott na de jaye aur halat khwa kaisay bhi hon, intekhabat mein hissah zarur leya jaye
Intekhabat mein chalaie janay wali mohim kay dauran 27 December 2007 ko Benazir Bhutto Liaqat bagh Rawalpindi say aik jalsay amm say khitab kar kay bahar nikal rahi thein kay unki gari par fairing huie aur uskay sath hi aik falak sagaf dhamaka hua
 Benazir Bhutto jo us waqt awam kay purjosh naron ka jawab daynay kay leye gari  kay hawadan say bahar nikli khari thien, buri tarha zakhmi huien aur thori hi dair mein khaliq-e-haqiqi say jamilien
 Khuch arsay baad Nawaz Sharif Punjab kay sobai council ka hissa rehnay kay baad 1981 mein Punjab kid sobia kabina mein bator wazeer-e-khazana huya
1985 kay amm intaykahbat (General election) mein Mian Nawaz Sharif qaumi aur subai assembly ki seaton pay bhari aksaryat say kamyab huye
 19 April 1985 ko Nawaz Sharif nay Panjab kay wazir-e-alla ki hasyat say halaf uthaya
 Iss kay sath sath Mohtarma Benazir bhutto ki hukumat kay sath sath unki ikhtilafat  bhi chalti rahi unhon nay Mohtarmah Benazir bhutto kay khaylaf tahrek adam ataymad mein barh carh kar hissa leya lakin kamyabi hasil na kar sakay
 Markaz aur suba Punjab kay darmyan kashidgi ki fiza baqarar rahi ta waqat kay 6 August 1990 kay roze Sadar Ghulam Ishhaq Khan nay Benazir Buttu kid hukumat khatam kar deya
 Iss ithad nay intaykhabat mein numayan aksaryat say kamyabi hasil ki aur 1 November 1990 kay roze Nawaz Sharif ko  palimony leader chun leya geya
 6 November 1990 ko Nawaz Sharif nay Wazeer-e-Azam ki haisiyat say halaf uthaya
 App nay pehlay daur hukumat mein  kaye aham aqdamat keye lakin iskay sath sath people's party kay sath sath kashedgi ka silsila jari raha
 Mulk ki saisi surathal tahal puri tarah bahal nahein hui thi iss par hukumat aur aik bari siasi jamat ki mahaz arai nay jalti par tail ka kaam keya
 Benazir Bhutto ki tarah Nawaz Sharif bhi 5 (panch) saal puray nahi kar sakay aur President Ghulam Ishaq Khan nay unki hukumat ko bhi taqriban unhi ilzamat kay taihat rukhsat kar deya jo pehlay Benazir Bhutto ki hukumat per lagaya gaya thay
 Agar chay mulk ki Adalat-e-Uzma nay aik ayni muqadmay kay baad unhain dobarah un kay uhday pay bahal to kar deya lakin phir bhi July 1993 mein Sadar Ghulam Ishaq Khan kay sath Mian Nawaz Sharif ko bhi apnay uhday say istayfa dayna para
 Unkay daur-e- hukumat mein Nawaz Sharif datkar unki mukhalfat kartay rahay
 Nawaz Sharif nay 2 June 1993 ko qaumi assembly mein Mehran bank scandal mein Sadar Pakistan kay maluwis honay kay sabot faraham keye
12 June 1994 ko bujat par bahas kartay huyae kaha kay bajat masakh shudah haqayaq ka majmua hay 20 July ko aik baray jalsa e amm say khaytab kartay huay kaha kay ajj mulk ko tornay walon ki aulad aqtaydar mein hay
Mujhay aqtaydar milay na milay unhain jana hoga unhon nay Benazir hukumat kay khatmah kay leyeh tahryk najat ka alan keyah 4 November 1994 ko parlimant kay mushtarkah ijlas mein apozishan ki janib say zabardast ahtayjaj hua aur sadar kay khaytab ka mokammal tour par batkat keya geya
 5 November 1996 ko sadar Farooq Ahmad Khan Leghri nay Benazir hukumat ka khatma kar deya aur February 1997 mein election kar waye un election mein Mian Nawaz Sharif ko zabardast kamyabi huie aur woh dobarah wazir-e-azam bangaye 1970 kay intakhabat kay baad mulki ki tareekh mein pahli martabah koi wazir-e- azam atna bhari mended lay kar aqtaydar mein ayaIss matabah wazir-e-azam bantay hi Nawaz Sharif nay athwein tarmem ka khatma kar deya jis kay tayhat koi sadar hukumat ko khatam kar nay ka akhtayar rakhta tha
 Mulki satah par unhon nay “Qarz utaro, mulk sanwaro” ki iskeem kay tayhat awam say paisay lay kar mulki qarzay utarnay ki mohim shuru ki jo agarchay kamyabi say hamkinar na hosaki lakin awami yaqjehti ka aik mazhar ban kar samnay aye
 Nawaz Sharif dour mein bhi establishment kay sath Nawaz Sharif ki khan cha tani ka silsila jari raha pehlay chief justice supreme court Sajjad Ali Shah say Mian Nawaz Sharif kay akhtalafat huye jis mein unhain kafi kamyabi rahi, iskay baad fouj kay sar barah General Jahangir karamat ko unhon nay rukhsat keya
 Inn kamyabiyon nay unkay ataymad ko barah deya aur unhon nay Pak fouj kay dosray sarbarah General Pervaiz Musharraf ko bhi chand ikhtilafat ki bina par bar taraf kar na chaha lakin iss martaba unhain kamyabi hasil na hosaki
 General Pervaiz Musharraf ki sarbarahi mein unkay khaylaf fouji bagawat huie aur fouj ka kirdar qaumi sayasat mein kam kar nay ki yeh dyanat daranah koshish unkay leyeh afat ban gaie
12 October 1999 ko Fouj ki taraf say Nawaz hukumat khatam honay kay bad Nawaz Sharif par moqadma chala jo “tayara shazish case” kay nam say mashoor huya
 Iss mein agwa aur aqdam-e-qatal kay ilzamat shamil thay
 Pervez Musharraf  kay sath aik khufia mohaiday kay baad Nawaz Sharif Saudi Arab chlay gaye
 Aik arsa tak Nawaz sharif Jaddah mein moqem rahay iss kay bad mulk mein jamhuryat ki bahali kay leye unhon nay Mohtarma Benazir Bhutto kay sath milkar koshishon ka agaz keyah aur meshaq jamhuryat ki shakal mein aik tarykhi dasta wyz samnay layeh
23 August 2007 ko adalat nay Sharif khandan ki darkhast par fayslah sunatay huay unki watan wapsi par hukumty aytayrazat rad kartay huyae puray khandan ko watan wapsi ki ayjazat daydi iss say pahlay Nawaz sharif ki watan wapsi ki aik koshish nakamy say hamkinar hochuki thie bahar hal iss martabah unhain apnay maqsad mein kamyabi hasil huie aur 25 November 2007 ko woh apnay khandan kay himrah Lahore pahonch gayae
 Nawaz Sharif nay un intaykahbat mein bazat e khud hissah nahi leya magar aik aham quait kay tour par seyasi manzer namay par moujud rahay
 wukla tehreek kay daouran mazole Chief justice Iftekhar Muhammad Chaudhry ki bahali kay leye Nawaz Sharif nay bhar pur balkay kalidi kirdar ada keya iss kay alawa NRO jaisay badnam zamana qanun ko parliament say manzoor nahi karwanay kay silsilay mein bhi Mian Sahab ka  kirdar sab say zayadah ahmeyat kay hamil raha
 Iss waqt woh go mulk ki sarbarahi kay uhday par fayz nahin lakin agar ahmyat kay aitabar say daikha jaye to Nawaz Shareef ko  Pakistani sayasat ki sab say aham saksiyat qarar deya jasakta hai
 In ki private zindagi ke is kamzor pehlon ki tasdeeq Marcus Mabry ne bhi ki hai
 Condoleezza Rice auhd o shabaab mein aik naujawan American footballer Rick Upchurch se raah o rasam rakhti thin lekin aik arsey tak saath rehne ke bad inhe yeh bataya gaya ke mazkoora naujawan se in ki shadi kamiyab nahi hogi, chunache inho ne is se laa talluqi ikhteyar kar ke shadi na karne ka faisla kar liya, par wo taa haal qaiym hai
 15 baras ki umar mein jab inho ne apne barey mein khud faisle karne shuru kiye to inho ne is haqiqat ka bhi saamna kiya ke musalsal koshishon ke bawajood wo piano bajane mein itni maharat hasil nahi kar sakin ke inhe “ Professional Pianist ” qarar diya ja sake, chunache Pianist banne ka khayal dil se nikaal kar inho ne shobaa siyasiyat ka rukh kar liya
 Tahum bad mein barhe paimane par tabahi phelane wale hathiyar baraamad na hone par Condoleezza Rice ko zabardast tanqeed ka saamna karna parha
 Condoleezza Rice par is hawale se bhi tanqeed ki jati hai ke inho ne he America ke khilaaf sargarmiyon mein mulawwis alqaida ke arkaan ke khilaaf “ water boarding ” jaise azziyat rasani ke jadeed aur mohlik tariqe istemal karne ki tajveez Bush administration se manzoor karai thi
Condoleezza Rice ke khayalat ke tanazur mein in ka shumar America ke qadamat pasand aur riwayaat pasand logon mein kiya ja sakta hai, maslan George Bush ki sadarti mohim ke dauran wo aelania kaha karti thi ke “ Isqaat Hamal ” par pabandi aaiyd honi chahiye
 Rice ne isqaat hamal ke khilaaf mohim chalane wale logon aur tanzeemon ko fund dene ki himayat karte hue kaha tha
 Condoleezza Rice ko awaiyl umer mein apni “ Siyah Rangat ” ke baiys nasli imtiaz ke waqeyaat ka bhi saamna karna parha tha
 Inhe hotel mein kam darjey ka kamra diya jata
 Departmental stores mein goron ko fauqiyat di jati aur restaurant mein inhe qadrey veeraan nashiston par khana khana parhta tha

11 May 2004 ko Shahbaz Sharif nay Pakistan wapas aney ki koshish ki magar Lahore kay alama Iqbal bain ul aqwami hawai adde (alama Iqbal international airport) say unhein wapas bhej diya gaya

 March 2009 na ahali kay case mein faisla in kay khalaf aney par Shahbaz Sharif ko kuch arsa kay liye iqtedar say alag bhi hona para lakin bad aza ye faisla khatam kardiya gaya aur woh aik bar phir suba punjab ki halat sudharne kay mission mein jet gaye in kay halqa-e-ahbab mein shamil afrad ka kehna hai kay Shahbaz sharif is kam kay liye itni mehnat kar rahay hain kay in ki apni sahat kharab ho rahi hai

Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan (Bacha Khan) ke barey bhai Abdul Jabbar Khan (Doctor Khan ) Englishtan mein thay unhon ney Abdul Ghaffar Khan ko waheen bolaya lakin Walid Sahib ney janey na deya keonkey Doctor Khan Sahib ne waheen molazmat ikhteyar ker ke aik Angrez Khatoon se shadi ker li thi aur un walda ka kheyal tha ke bara beta to hat se geya ab chota beta bhi waheen jaker kisi Angrez larki se shadi karey ga aur waheen ka ho rahey ga
 Iss tarah Bacha Khan taleem ke liyeh baher na jasake
1927 mein Ghazi Amanullah Khan ke khelaf Afghanistan mein sorish huye to Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan (Bacha khan) aik wafd ke sath Amanullah Khan se mulaqat ke liye Balochistan ke raste Kandahar ja rahe thay ke unhein Sibbi mein griftar kar liya gaya
 1930 mein sarhad mein Angrezon ke khelaf azadi ka ahang intehai taiz ho gaya Qissa Khawani Bazar mein firing huye hazaron ki tadad mein Pakhtoon shaheed kiye gaye Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan (Bacha Khan) ko Atmanjai se Peshawar atey huye griftar ker liya geya aur agley 7 saalon mein Abdul Ghaffar Khan sirf chand mah jail aur nazar bandiyon se azad reh sake
 Iss tehreek ki kamyabi par inhein aur sathiyon ko kai bar tashadud ka nishana banaya gaya aur paband slasal kiya gaya
1931 mein app jail se chutey to issi baras phir Mount Marlow islahat ke khelaf tahreek chalane ke jurm mein pandrah hazar razakaron samait griftar huye
1934 mein rahai pai to un ka Punjab aur Sarhad mein dakhla mamnun qarar diya
 Iss ke baad azadi ki jaddojehad mein congress ke sath rahe
"1944 mein ""Hindustan chor do” ki tahreek mein lathi charj ka shikar hoker app ki do paslian toot gayein"
 Zakhmi halat mein app ko qaid mein dal diya gaya
 1948 mein karachi mein Peoples Party ki bunyad Bacha Khan ne rakhi lakin iss se pashter ke iss nauzaidah jamat ka dhancah khara hota June 1948 mein griftar ker liye gaye
 January 1954 mein reha keye gaye to Soba Sarhad mein dakhla aur naqlo harkat ki azadi na thi

 June 1956 mein apney bhai Doctor Khan Sahab hi ki wazarat Aala ke zamane mein griftar ker liye gaye

 1919 se 1964 tak koi ais arsa na tha jab app mosalsal teen saalon tak jail se bahar rahe hon

 Agarchay Khan Abdul Ghaffar Khan zindagi phar apne Pakistani hone se inkari rahey aur Pakistan ko aik “Ghulam” reyasat qarar detey rahey (Yahi waja hai key unhon ney dafan hone ke leye Afghanistan ki “Azad” Sarzamine ka intekhab kiya) iss hawale se unhein iss kitab mein shamil nahein kiya jana chahiye tha
May 1965 mein Momin Shahi key halqa se Qaumi Assembly key rukun chuney gae 13 June 1969 ki hizb e ikhtelaf key leader muntakhib huae 28 September 1969 ko Pakistan Democratic Party ke Leader baney 26 March 1971 ko Sadar Yahya Khan ne Sheikh Mujibur Rahman ko jo ke Awami league ka sarbarah thay Mashriqi Pakistan mein Qaumi Assembly ki 162 nishashton (seats) mein se 160 nishashtain (seats) hasil ki thin ghair ioni qarar de dia aur Sheikh Mujibur Rahman ko griftar(Arrest) kar liya iss waja se yeh hamaray azli dushman Bharat se ja mila
Yani Bharti Afwaj ko Sheikh Mujibur Rahman ki hami mosllah tanzeem mukti bahini ka mokammal tawun hasil tha

 Bharat ko Ruse aur Bartania ki mukammal hamayat aur madad hasil thi
 21 November 1971 ko Bharat ki bari fauj ne Mashriqi Pakistan par hamla kar dia
 25 November 1971 tak Mashriqi Pakistan mein jangi halat bahut kharab ho gaye to Sadar Yahya Khan ne majburan Bangali rehnuma Nurul Amin ko Aburi daur ke lia Wazir Azam namzad kar deye aur unke sath Zulfiqar Ali Bhutto ko naib Wazir Azam aur Wazir e kharja bana diya

 Pakistan ke do tukrey hojaney ka Nurul Amin ko be inteha sadma huwa
 Iss moqa par unhon ne kaha “kash Allah Tala mujhey Pakistan ke iss almiya se pehley hi iss duniya se utha leta”
 2 October 1974 ko Nurul Amin inteqal kar gaye
 Pir Pagara ki ibtedai zindagi mushkil halaat mein guzri
 Wo abhi 2 saal ke the ke in ke walid Syed Sabghat Ullah Shah ko angrez hukomat ne hurriyat pasandi ke jurm mein giriftar kar liya
 Is ke bad inho ne Hur jamat ko angrezon ke khilaf munazzam kiya, jis par angrez hukomat ne inhe baghi qarar de kar 20 March 1943 ko Hyderabad jail mein phansi de di aur in ke jasd e khaki ko Virsa ke hawale karne ke bajae ghayab kar diya
 Pir jo goth mein in ke aabaai ghar Kangri house aur atraaf ke makanon aur aabaadi ko bombing se tabah kar diya gaya
 Is ke ilawa in ke mureedon ko, jo Hur kehlate the  Barhi tadad mein phansiyan di gai
 Us dauran Pir Pagara ki rohani gaddi ko hamesha ke liye khatam karne ki sazish bhi ki gai, ta ke is khitte mein azaadi ka naam lene wala koi baqi na rahe
 Yehi wajah hai ke 20 March 1943 se 4 February 1952 tak Kangri House mein takht pagara par koi pir muajood nahi tha
 Walid ki phansi ke bad Sikander Ali Shah ko in ke chote bhai aur khandan ke deegar afraad ke sath kuch arsey Bandar road ( MA Jinnah Road ) ke aik bungalow mein nazar band rakha gaya aur wahan se Aligarh muntaqil kar diya gaya
 In ki pesh goiyan aur siyasi tabsarey news papers namak mirch laga kar shaey karte the

18 December 1997 ko ayein ke article (G) 63-1 ke tehat qayam muqam Chief Election Commissioner Justice Mukhtar Ahmed Junejo ne unhen na ehel qarar dete hoye khazat e naamzadgi mustarad kar deye kyun ke un par ilzam tha ke 27 June 1996 ko haft rozah jaridah “Takbeer” Karachi ko aik interview dete hoye Fakhar un Nisa Judge Lahore High Court par badunwani ke ilzamat legaye aur nizam e adal par baat cheet karte hoye kaha ke “nizam e adal ki bunyadi kharabi ye hai ken a to ise Islami nizam e adal ke usolon par istawar kiya gaya aur na hi angreez ke nizam e adal ki khubiyon se arastah rehne deye gaya
Ate jate hukumranon ne adliya ko apne maqasid ke leye istemal karna chaha
 Arzi aur juzwaqti mafadat ke leye mun zor intezamiya hamesha adalti waqar se khelti rahi
 Jis tarha burro curacy mein apne hawari paida keye gaye isi tarha adliya mein ye sab se bari badqismati rahi hai
 Phele adwar mein isi tarha hota tha ke agar 6 Judge leye gaye hain to in mein se aki adh Judge aesa ajata tha jis ki hamdardiyan ya wabastagiyan hoti thein
 Mazi ke tajurbat bataye hain ke ye Judge bhi jab masnad e adalat par beth jata tha to amomi muhall ki waja se is ki zaheni kefiyat phele jesi nahi rehti thi aur neek naami ki khatir adala o insaf se nahi khelta tha
Munasib tadat mein deyanatdar, bakirdar aur khuaf e khuda rakhne wale Judges ki kami hamesh hi aik masla rahi hai lekin aj kal jo kuch ho raha hai I sne pore nizam e adal ki choleinholadi hain aur awam ka etemad adalaton se uthta jar aha hai
 Agar kisi Judge ki taqaruri par woqla ki anjumanon, qumi akhbaraat ke sahafiyon aur bakhbar logon ko kisi tarha ka tajub  uar heart na ho to wo shkhs theek hai lekin agar kisi shakhs ke taqarur par bar association ke dafatir mein qehqaye gunjane lagein, sahafi aur bakhabar log heart se aik dosre ka mun dekhne lagen hata ke aam log bhi cha magoyan karne lagein to aesa Judge yaqenan  mayar par pora nahi utarta aur wo munsif bane ka ehel nahi
 Is tarha ki taqarariyon aur intezamiya ke mafad parastana iqdat ne adliya ke idare ko shaded nuqsan phochya hai aur aaj halat ye ho chuki hai ke adalaton ke eyanon mein aesi awazein aur sazishein nazar aney lagi hain jo aam kisim ke sarkari daftaron ka khasa hoti hain
 3 vote mustarad kar deye gaye

Blochistan Subai assembly ke 43 member’s mein se 38 ne apna haq e raidahi istamal kiya
 Muhammad Rafiq Tarar ne Nawaz Sharif ki jila watni tak bara aham kardar ada kiya

 Wo Islam pasandon bil khusoos jamaat Islami ko dewaar se lagane ki policy par bhi amal peyra hain

December 2013 mien jamat e Islami ke markazi rehnuma Abdul Qadir ko phansi diye jane ke bad yeh umeed ki ja rahi thi ke Haseena Wajid aur in ke sathiyon ka gussa qadre thanda ho chukka ho ga
 Lekin ab lag raha hai ke jamat e islami ke 75 sala Ameer Maulana Mutee ur Rehman Nizami samait aik darjan se zaiyd aeham siyasi karkuno ko phansi ki saza suna kar Bangladesh ko danista taur par tabahi ki janib dhakela ja raha hai
 Abdul Qadir ki phansi par Bangladesh ke siyasi aur samaji halqon hatta ke zaraey iblaagh ne bhi maslehatan khamoshi ikhteyar kar rakhi thi, lekin taza sazaon ke faisle ke bad zaraey iblaagh ne bhi zaban khol di hai
Bengali zaraey iblaagh ne ab ki baar Haseena Wajid ki policy par karhi tanqeed karte hue jamaat ke sarbarah Maulana Mutee urRehman Nizami aur in ke deegar sathiyon ko saza e maut sunae jane ki khule alfaaz mien muzammat ki hai
 Siyasi, samaji aur iblaaghi halqon ki janib se miss Haseena Wajid ko yeh mashwara diya ja raha hai ke wo apna zehni muaaiyna karaey, kyun ke jis qisam ki siyasi inteqami policy inho ne apna rakhi hai wo kisi bhi soorat mien mulk o qaum ke mafaad mien nahi hai
Opposition ke musalsal aehtejaaj, siyasi inarki aur Haseena Wajid ki inteqami siyasat ke natijey mien maeshiyat badtareen tabahi se do chaar hui hai
 Haseena Wajid ke iqdamaat ke baiys gher jamhori quwwaton ko siyasat mien madakhlat ka mauqa mil sakta hai
 Bengali siyasat se ba khabar halqon ka khayal hai ke Haseena Wajid danista taur par mulk ko fauj ke hawale karne ki sazish kar rahi hain
 Agar inhe halaat ki nazakat ka mamooli sa bhi idraak ho to yeh andaza lar lena chahiye ke agar ab ki baar fauj ne iqtedar sambhala to Haseena Wajid apni zindagi ke baqiya ayyam mien siyasat ke qabil bhi nahi rahengi
 Unhen kamiyab karane ke leye Panjab aur Sindh ke wozra e aala ne do mehfooz tareen nashistein khali karaein thein aur unhen kamiyab karane ki zimedari qabol kit hi
 Janab Shaukat Azizne bhi hasbe riwayat bhohat wade waed keye, intakhabi nare lagaye, wahan ke awam ko kuch khawab dekhaye lekin natija wohi dhak ke teen pat
 Wazir e Azam muntakheb hone ke bad Shaukat AzizSahab ne aik bar bhi us elaqe ka dorah nahi kiya
Wazir e Azam Shaukat Azizpar us waqat qatilana hamla hoa jab wo abhi Wazir e Azam nahi bane the yani wo aik intekhabi jalse se  khitab kar ke wapis lot rahe the aur apni gari ke qareb phochne se chand lamhe phele aik zoordar damaka hoa aur wo bal bal bach gaye
 Ye aik khudkush hamla tha jis mein hamla awar apne maqsad mein kamiyab nahi ho saka
 Mumkin hai esa hi hoa ho kyun ke Wazir e Azam Shaukat Azizaksar o beshtar khzane ki tijoriyon ke bhare hoye hone ka dawa karte the lekin ese bhare hoye khazane ka kia faiedeha jo is mulik ke awam ke muan se roti ka akhari newala bhi cheen lene ke darpe ho
 Ho sakta ha ke Wazir e Azam Shaukat Azizki apni mali position phele se bhetar hogai ho lekin un ke dor e hukumat mein awam ki halat din badin abtar hoti chali ja rahi hai aur log khudkushiyan karne par majboor hen
13 September ko jab Panjub assembly ne Perviz Musharaf ke donon uhde apne pas rakhne ke bare mein qarardad pass ki to ugle chand roz mein wazir e azam Shaukat Azizne waze  tor par kha ke sadar ka wardi mein rehna MM ke sath kiye gaye muhaide ki khilaf warzi nahi
 Dosri taraf awam ki halat ye hai ke un ke mun se roti ka akhiri niwala bhi chena ja raha hai, log berozgari aur bhook ke hathon khud kushi karne par majbor hain
 Insaf ki farhami ki sorat e haal ye hai ke koi jaiz kaam bhi rishwat ke bagher hone ka tasawor bhi khatam ho chukka hai
 Mulik ka khazana bhara hoa hai lakin is ke samrat awam tak nahi phonche
 Awam ko is bhare hoye khgazane se kiya matlab jo un se do waqat ki roti bhi chen le
Sabiq Wazir e Azam Shaukat Azizke dor e hukumat mein  cheeni  ke bad tareen bhoran paida howa
  Cheeni i ki qemat 20 rupe se bharh kar 40 rupe tak ja phonchi, Wazir e Azam samet hukumati aehalkar  cheeni  ki market mein farhami par israr karte rahe aur awam ko indiya dete rahe ke wo chini utility store se khariden
 Mulik mein aese stores kitne hain?Awam ki bhari aksariyat aam dokanon se cheeni karedne pay majboor thi aur jin elaqon mein sarkari store the bhi to awam ko waha bhi mushkilat ka samna karna para
 Utility stores ki chini bhi mili bhaghat se aam dokanon par farokhat hoti rahi aur logon ko mehnghe damon milti rahi aur aj tak mil rahi hai
 Utility stores par chini ki qemat asal qemat se derah guna ziyadah thi is baat ko hukumat danista nazar andaz karti rahi
 Hukumat ne sugar mil malikan ko qematein kam karne par majbor nahi kiya balke neb ne tehqiqat karana chahi to Sadar Perviz Musharaf ke humum par ise bhi rok deya gaya kyun ke is mein ba asar hukumati ehalkar mulavis the aur Wazirati kursiyon par barjaman the
 Un ke khilaf tehqiqat se hukumati dhanche par manfi asrat muratab hone ka andesha tha
June 2006 ke akhir mein Pakistan steel mills ki farokhat ke silsile mein Pakistan ki tarikh ka sab se bara maliyati scandle samne aya jis mein Supreme Court ko madakhlat karni pari
 Sirf ye hi nahi KESC, PTCL ki nijkari, black cab, tracketer zarinalit, crislar aur railway coachon ke scandles ki baz ghasht bhi pore mulik mein suna di
 Kisi mamle mein transparanci nahi thi
 Commission aur kickback ka dor Dora raha, quomi assase koriyon ke mol farokhat keye gaye
 Supreme Court ke 9 arkan par mushtamil full bench ne Pakistan steel mills ki nijkari ko kaladam qarar de deya
 Is tarha 8 saal mein mukamal hone wale sab se bare sanati unit ko aik ghante ki karwai mein farikhat kar deya gaya
23 August 2006 ko  Wazir e Azam Shaukat Aziz ke khilaf tehrik e adam etimad jam karai gayi
 Is notice mein Wazir e Azam ke khilaf 30 nukat par mushtamil charge sheet tayar ki gayi thi aur jis par opposition ke kam o besh tamam arkan ke dastakhat the
 Charge sheet ein kaha gaya tha ke Wazir e Azam Pakistan steel mills ki privatization mein aain mein deye gaye mandate aur privatization ke qawanin ki khilaf warzi ke zimedar hain
 Is notice mein 2005 mein stock market corruption  karne ke zimedar brockers ke khilaf karwai na karne ka zimedar bhi Wazir e Azam ko theraya gaya
 Chini, semint, gandum, railway arazi scandal samit degar bezabtagiyon ki zimedari bhi Wazir e Azam par dal de gayi
27 August 2006 ko ray shumari hoi jis ke natije mein tehrik e adam etemad nakam ho gayi
  Apne khilaf tehrik e adam etemad nakam hone ke bad se le ka raj tak Wazir e Azam Shaukat Aziz gahe bagahe aur phele se ziyadah shadomad ke sath awam ko adaad o shumar ki bhol bholaiyon mein masrof rakhe hoye hain aur zarebubadla ke zakhair ki khushkhabriyan sunane ka fariza anjam de rahe hain

Maulana Kausar Niazi… Mianwali ke mardam khaiz khittey se talluq rakhte the, jahan ki Niazi Baradari ke naamwar afraad maslan General A K Niazi, Maulana Abdul Sattar Khan Niazi aur Imraan Khan Niazi ki shohrat mein koi kalaam nahi, lekin yeh sab he pur josh log apni zindagi ke mukhtalif adwaar mein shadeed tanqeed ka nishana bhi bane
 Kausar Niazi… bunyadi taur par mazhabi class ne in ke is jurm ko kabhi muaaf nahi kiya aur wo hamesha right baazo ka khaas nishana bane rahe, is shadeed nafrat ne in ke urooj ka raasta rook diya
 Dosri taraf peoples party ke bohat se log bhi inhe hamesha rujat pasand mulla samajhte rahe
 Peoples party ke bohat se logon ne inhe apni saffon mein hamesha shukk ki nazar se dekha
 Maulana Kausar Niazi hamari siyasi tareekh ke wo aadmi the, jinho ne mehaz apni salahiyat aur mehnat se aik maqam banaya magar wo zaati hesiyat mein khatir khuwa awami maqboliyat hasil na kar sake
 Kuch halqon mein in ke barey mein paae jane wale tassub, nafrat aur hassad ne in ke siyasi qad, shairana maqam aur ilmi rutbey ke hawale se dewarein khari kar den, wagarna aaj shayad wo shiddat pasandon ke khilaaf aitedaal pasand mazhabi quwwaton ke fikri rehnuma hote aur liberal powers ke liye aik ideal mazhabi rehnuma… magar taqdeer ke faisley alag he hote hain
 Saadgi aur kifayat shoaari sari umar in ka shuaar raha, lekin siyasi aur qaumi kamon mein apna paisa be-dareegh kharsh kiya
 Angrez khilafat tehreek ke bad tareen mukhalif the
 Seth chotani ko angrezon ne apni resha dawaniyon aur sarkari aehkamat ke zariye dewaliya kar diya aur wo is sadmey se is daarfani se kooch kar gaey
 Inho ne liyari ke logon ko basane ke liye 12 villages basane ka mansooba pesh kiya aur 1 village namone ke taur par tameer karne ke liye apni janib se 1 lakh 75 hazar rupey ki raqam pesh ki, lekin baldiya is se istefada na kar saki
 Angrezon ne apni makhsoos hikmat e amli ke tehat Sindh ko Bombay ke sath mila diya tha
 Chon ke is tarha baaz ilaqon mein hindoun ki aksariyat ho gait hi aur phir Bombay ke Hindustan ke musalmano ke mafadat ko sakht nuqsanaat pohchaya karte the

8 March kyun manaya jata hai? Darasal almi yom e khawateen ke paas e manzar se mutaliq bataya jata hai ke America ke shehar New York mein khawateen (women) ne apni takhuwa ke masail par ahtejaj kiya, jise ghur sawar daston ke zarye sakhti se kuchal deya gaya
Is muzahere mein khawateen ne mehgayi, khurak ki qilat aur almi jung ke bais paida hone wale masail par bhi shaded ahtejaj kiya
Sadyon porani riwayat itni bazbot hoti hain ke unhein koi riyasati qanon badal nahi sakta
Humare mulk ki khawateen hudod o qawanin ke mamle mien imtiazi soloq samet degar mamlat mein insaf ki talib hai
Humare masher ki khawateen wani, Quran se shadi, zabardasti shadi, gherat ke naam par qatal, teen bayak waqat talakon aur wirasat se mehromi jese ghambeer masail ka shikar hai
Zarirat is amar ki hai ke in tamam qawanin par nazar e sani ki jaye jo khawateen ke hoqoq ke tahafuz ki zamanat nahi dete, is ke elawa naye qawanin waza karne ki ashad zarorat hai ta ke Hawwa ki beti apni hurman nasibi ka rona na ro sake
Hawwa ki beti azal se zulm aur nainsafi ki chaki mein pisti hali arahi hai
Duniya mien khatoon jahan nazakat ki alamat hai, wahan mazlomiyat ka istaarah bhi hai
Wafa ka pekar to hai magar mehromi ka mazhar bhi hai

In ke paas rehne ka thikana bhi na tha
3 week tak New York ke aik park mein raat basar karne ke bad inhe bus stop par aik film audition ke liye diya gaya poster nazar aaya
Agarcha yeh 1 teesre darjey ki film thi, lekin baqaul Sylvester Stallone ke inhe us waqt 2 he option nazar aae ya to kahin chori ki jae ya phir is film mein qismat aazmai jae
5 baras tak inhe ne 6 films mein kaam kiya, jis se in ke career mein istehkaam to paida hua, lekin us waqt tak inho ne koi aesi film nahi kit hi, jis ki karkardegi ki wajah se in ka shumar superstars mein kiya jata
Jab yeh kahani filmsazon ko dikhai to ise filmane ke liye kae directors aur producers tayyar ho gae aur is script ke liye Sylvester Stallone ko 3 lac 50 thousand dollars ki peshkash bhi hui, lekin sab he kehna tha ke film ke markazi role ke liye kisi super star ko cast kiya jae
Yeh challenge stallone ko manzoor nahi tha
Isi wajah se is film ki aksbandi takheer ka shikaar ho gai
Jin mein se 4 par kamiyabi hasil hui,lekin badqismati se stallone behtareen actor ka award hasil nahi kar pae

Sylvester Stallone action hero hone ki wajah se aksar apni films ki aksbandi ke dauran zakhmi hote rahe hain
Khas taur par Rocky 4 ki aksbandi ke dauran jab actress Adolf Lofgren ne, inhe ki farmaiysh par in ke seene par ghonsa mara to stallone ko 4 din ICU mein guzaarne parhe
Jab ke film Escape To Victory ki aksbandi ke dauran azeem footballer Peele ki kick rokte hue stallone apni ungli turhwa bethe the
Kuch arsaa qabal The Expendables ki aksbandi ke dauran actor Steve Austin ke sath aik scene ki aksbandi karwate hue stallone ki garden ki haddi buri tarah mutassir hui aur ab in ki garden mein metal ki plate laga di gai hai
Yehi nahi bal ke paidaiysh ke waqt stallone ke face par scissor lagne ki wajah se face ka aik hissa waqti taur par maflooj ho gaya tha, jis ke asraat aaj bhi in ki zabaan aur face ke aik taraf maujood hain

balke asal masla Pakistani khilariyon ko benul aqawami satah par ziyadah se ziyadah tournaments kheelne ka moqa na milna hai

Question: Aik zamana tha ke squash mein Australian khilari chaye howae the, is ke bad Jahangir aur Jan Sheer ne hukumrani ki, phir Misr ke khilari samne aaye, lekin paistani khilari top 10    ya top 20 mein nazar nai aate?
Dosri janib Pakistan mein squash ka koi system nahi hai, yahan khilari khud hi training karte hain aur khud hi benul aqawami satah ke muqablon mein shirkat ki koshishs karte hain, sab kuch khilariyon ko khud hi karna parta
bhi mehdod hain
Question: Pakistani khilariyon ki bunyadi mushkilat aur masail kia hain?Nasir Iqbal: Pakistan mein benul aqawami satah par muqable na hone ki wajah se Pakistan ke aksar khilari apni karkardagi ka phele hi izhar nahi kar pat
Jis ki wajah se benul aqawani satah par ranking behtar hone ke imkanat madom ho jate hain, 
Nasir Iqbal: Aaj ke dor mein khilari beron e mulk ja kar nahi kheel sakte, yahan agar kheelna chahein to yahan international tournaments nahi ho rahe, zahir hai ke jab ranking behtar hone ke mawaqe mehdod hon ge to aap acha kheel kheel

Question: Mulk mein athletics ke mayar aur athletes ko hasil saholaton se mutmain hain?Razia Sheer Khan: Main ye baat khushi se nahi balke afsos se keh rahi hun ke is waqat majmoi tor par mayar gir raha hai
go ke athlete zaror samne aate rahe jinhon ne region ya Asian satah par achi karkardagi pesh ki lekin Pakistan ke qayam ko itne saal guzarne ke bawajod abhi tak kheelon ya athletics mein is ki taraqi aur tarwij ka aik baqa
national games aur national championship jese muqablon tak mein saholaton ka mayar intehai kharab hai
Question: Is waqat Inter school ya inter collegiate waghairah ke muqablon ki kia sorat e haal hai?Razia Sheer Khan: Mojudah sorat e haal bohat ziyadah tawajah mangti hai kyun ke 5 ya 10 saal phele tak jo saholaten thein wo
Jab ye sorat e haal ho gi to nojawan khelari kis tarah samne aayen ge
Main khud bhi schools aur colleges mein kheel kar aage barhi hun, mujhe malom hai ke wahan kin masail ka samna raha hai
khas tor par jab larkiyon ko ibtedai satah par mushkilat ka samna karna parta hai to wo khelon se dor ho jati hain
Phele inter schools aur inter colligate muqablon mein schools aur colleges ke talba aur talibat ki aik bari tadad sharik hoti thi ab y tadad ungliyon par gini ja sakti hai
lekin aaj ka baresh aur burdbar Saeed Anwar kal ke khalendare aur chulbule cricketer se bilkul mukhtalif hai, is ki zindagi mein yeh tabdeeli kyunkar aai
Saeed Anwar ke career ka aaghaz mayoos kun tha
Saeed Anwar dono innings mein 0 par out ho gae
Saeed Anwar ka aalmi record taweel arsey ke bad India ke Sachin Tendulkar ne torha
Saeed Anwar mein is tabdeeli ki wajah in ki chotio beti ki maut bani
Aaj b apni beti Bisma Shaeze ke zikar par Saeed Anwar ki aankhon se aansoun ka dariya baha nikalta hai

Saeed Anwar batate hain ke shiddat e ghum se wo cheekhne lage aur apni bachi ko pukarte rahe, lekin bhula jane wale kab laut kar aate hain

Assalam o alaikum! Dosto kal hum ny Federal or wo provinces jin mein abhi Ministerial posts ki upgradation nahi hoi, mein upgradation k liye protest start krnay k baray mein app logon ki opinion mangi thi. Kal sham sy ly kr ab tak humein jo response mila ha us k mutabiq 99.7% logon ny protest start krny ka mashwara diya ha or sath mein iss protest mein shareek honay ki yaqeen dehani bhi karai ha. Dosto jesa k aap log jantay hein k jin provinces mein upgradation hoi ha us k peachay jaddo jehad ki aik lambi dastaan ha. Wo kehtay hein na k jab tak bacha roye na to Maan bhi doodh nahi deti iss liye kabhi bhi koi plate mein rakh kr app ko apna haq nahi dy ga apna haq lenay k liye himmat or jazzba darkar ha jis ka izhar KPK or Punjab k dosto ny kiya or kamyaabi hasil ki. Dosto humaray liye aap logoon ki raaye ki bohat importance ha iss liye hum aaj sy apna protest start krny ka elaan krty hein. Iss silsaly mein pehla protest 14th January 2016 at 11:00 AM APCA (Pakistan Railway's Wing) k zaer-e-ehtemaam bamaqaam Pakistan Railways Divisional Superintendent Office, Rawalpindi opposite Rawalpindi Railway Station, ho ga. Tamam dosto (especially Islamabad Secretariat Employees Association, APCA Bait-ul-Mal & IESCO Employees Association) sy request ha k apnay haq k liye bahir niklien or iss ehtajaaj mein apni shirkat yaqeeni banaien keun k agr abb bhi hum na nikly to phir yeh mamlaa youn he latka rahay ga.Insha Allah For more details please contact: Protest Co-ordinator 0300-2341366 #PrimeMinisterOffice #PMPakistan #MianMuhammadNawazSharif #PMAJK #SardarAbdulMajid #CMSindh #QaimAliShah #CMBalochistan #SardarSanaullahZehri #CMGilgitBaltistan #HafizHafeezurRehman #AsifAliZardari #S_KhursheedShah #BilawalBhuttoZardari #FederalFinanceMinister #IshaqDar #FinanceMinisterSindh #FinanceMinisterBalochistan #MaryamNawazSharif #APCA #APCASindh #BhurgariMA #IslamabadCivilSecretariatEmployeesAssociation #ARYNEWS #GEONEWS #SAMMA #EXPRESSNEWS #DUNYANEWS www.facebook.com/PAKISTAN.FEDERAL.GOVERNMENT.CLERKS.UNION
Assalam o alaikum! Dosto kal hum ny Federal or wo provinces jin mein abhi Ministerial posts ki upgradation nahi hoi, mein upgradation k liye protest start krnay k baray mein app logon ki opinion mangi thi. Kal sham sy ly kr ab tak humein jo response mila ha us k mutabiq 99.7% logon ny protest start krny ka mashwara diya ha or sath mein iss protest mein shareek honay ki yaqeen dehani bhi karai ha. Dosto jesa k aap log jantay hein k jin provinces mein upgradation hoi ha us k peachay jaddo jehad ki aik lambi dastaan ha. Wo kehtay hein na k jab tak bacha roye na to Maan bhi doodh nahi deti iss liye kabhi bhi koi plate mein rakh kr app ko apna haq nahi dy ga apna haq lenay k liye himmat or jazzba darkar ha jis ka izhar KPK or Punjab k dosto ny kiya or kamyaabi hasil ki. Dosto humaray liye aap logoon ki raaye ki bohat importance ha iss liye hum aaj sy apna protest start krny ka elaan krty hein. Iss silsaly mein pehla protest 14th January 2016 at 11:00 AM APCA (Pakistan Railway's Wing) k zaer-e-ehtemaam bamaqaam Pakistan Railways Divisional Superintendent Office, Rawalpindi opposite Rawalpindi Railway Station, ho ga. Tamam dosto (especially Islamabad Secretariat Employees Association, APCA Bait-ul-Mal & IESCO Employees Association) sy request ha k apnay haq k liye bahir niklien or iss ehtajaaj mein apni shirkat yaqeeni banaien keun k agr abb bhi hum na nikly to phir yeh mamlaa youn he latka rahay ga.Insha Allah For more details please contact: Protest Co-ordinator 0300-2341366 #PrimeMinisterOffice #PMPakistan #MianMuhammadNawazSharif #PMAJK #SardarAbdulMajid #CMSindh #QaimAliShah #CMBalochistan #SardarSanaullahZehri #CMGilgitBaltistan #HafizHafeezurRehman #AsifAliZardari #S_KhursheedShah #BilawalBhuttoZardari #FederalFinanceMinister #IshaqDar #FinanceMinisterSindh #FinanceMinisterBalochistan #MaryamNawazSharif #APCA #APCASindh #BhurgariMA #IslamabadCivilSecretariatEmployeesAssociation #ARYNEWS #GEONEWS #SAMMA #EXPRESSNEWS #DUNYANEWS www.facebook.com/PAKISTAN.FEDERAL.GOVERNMENT.CLERKS.UNION

Federal Employees k up-gradation ki sumary ab be sard khany main pri hi. ure jo sammary PM ko bhaji gai hai woh as per KPS & Punjab nhi hai. ab to Balochistan waly ny bhi UP-gradation ki sammary as per KPK & pUNJAB approved kr di hai.
Nazir  sahb.  ki demand hai agr ap us ko study karin to ap ko pata chaly ga. k tamam employees admn/accounts/techncial/non technical tamam ki up-gradation ki safarsh ki gai hai ure protest ho rha hai.
Dosto court ne up gradation case ka mohtasar faisala sunaya. UDC / LDC wala case jis banday nay kiya hoa ha us sy detail mein baat hoi. 16.12.2015 ko iss case ki date thi or us din wakeelon ki strike thi jis ki wajha sy us banday ka wakeel paesh nahi hoa magr establishment division and finance division ka wakeel paesh ho gaya or unhon ny kaha k PM ny upgradation ki summary approve kr li ha or budget mein implement ho jaye gi iss py judge ny case dispose off kr diye.Dosto agar ap araam se beto gay tu wahi summary jo PM ne approved keya ha araam se budget me implement ho jaye gi. Liken jab hum sab koshish kare tu summary as per KPK implement ho jaye gi. Aor ye federal mulazemeen kisath zayadati hay ke KPK ne May 2014, Punjab govt ne jan 2016 se implement karaya hay liken federal walay na kpk aor na punjab ki tra kare gay sirf apna summary bana ke implement kara degi. Court iss cheez ko nahi daekh rahi k PM ny jo summary approve ki ha wo as per KPK, Punjab nahi ha.@abi hamara next gadam kaya hogaPlz comments

"meine yeh baby washer bachon kay kapron kay liay khareeda hai. Waisay tou machine hai, lekin mujhe pataya gaya tha kay gaba bohat acha brand hai aur sath mein warranty bhee derahay hain tou meine order kardia.

Mil bhee gaya jaldi aur kaam bhee bohat acha krraha hai. Baby washer aur spinner baby kay kapron ko dhonay kay liay bohata chee hai, aur akbhee kabar tou baroun kay joray bhee dhul jatay hain, lekin kuch 3 4 joray kiunkay ismein baray kaproun ki itnee jaga nai hai. iska size bhee munasib hai aur isko chalana bhee abra asan hai, aik average machine ki tarhan hee kaam krtee hai.

Mein tou samajh rahee thee kay agar umeedon kay mutabiq nai aaya , tou wapis karadoongi, lekin abhee tak jitna istemal kia hai, mein isse razi hoon. Bohat shukarya aapka, is genuine product kay liay :)
"

Sabse achi baat mujhe yeh lagi ke ye market se sasta parha mujhe or mere ghar par bethe bethe agaya. Sound quality bohot zabardast hai or earpiece bohot comfortable hai stuffing ki wajah se. Khair mein ye sabko suggest karna chahunga kyun ke mere paisay wasool hogaye hain.
"
"Boaht se headset dekhay gaming kay liay, lekin budget kay hisab se yeh wala bohat khoob laga mujhe. Fully adjustable hai aur foam covering headphones kay uper kaanoun pe zyada dabao bhee nai daltee aur sound bhee achee aatee hai. Aur microphone se itnee saaf quality sunai detee hai, vouce recording aur testing karke dekhee hai meine aur mein is kay result se khush hoon :)
"

I tried Americano Coffee Wagera - Sharfabad and seriously I don't like it all... It was tasteless... I asked the server there to please add some more coffee in it as the coffee was very light and tasteless (more like just hot water).. After that he came again but with the same tasteless coffee.. Then i thought its the best they can offer so i just drank it somehow.. And the same was with cappuccino.. But I'm very disappointed, was expecting much more cus of the hype.
I always wanted to have something similar to ALBaik ( Saudia ) in Pakistan and finally got to know that The Sauce have launched Patakha Chicken. I order from them often and their food is always fresh so tried this Patakha Chicken and I must say it was toooo close to Albaik’s spicy fried chicken. Perfect blend of masala and crisp. And the cherry on the top was it’s dip. I would rate this Patakha chicken 10/10. And it is a must try for all those who loves Albaik’s food. Location: SIndhi Muslim Society

So I am on a spree to try Indian Cuisine in Karachi wherever I can find. So that took me to D'Thaliland at Hussainabad. I was so ignorant that I was calling it D’Thailand all the time till the waiter listened and corrected me and left me embarrassed 😳.  It was my first time at Hussainabad Food street as for past few years I was more of pull k is par guy and amazed to see it was so jam packed mtlb raat 1 bje Din nikla hoa t.  When it comes to foods it was so balanced and up to the point. It wasn’t our spicy Pakistani food it was different in its own way and keeping all the spices very balanced. Almost everything was good . We had a Dhokla, Plate of Pani puri, Pav Bhaji , Masla Dosa, Mix thali and 3 drinks for around Rs.1500. It was economical and worth the money.  In the end we top it up with Rabri with hot Gulab Jamun on top from a Stall, somewhere in between the food street .  Next stop Will be Mirchilli.

Living in that part of city which everybody claims as Duniya ka Aakhri kona (Gulshan e Maymar) it is really hard to find any good fast food outlet. Many fast food outlets and franchises are present here and in the start their quality is exceptional but suddenly it starts to go down. Fish Corner is the only Fast Food outlet on whom I can rely,their Special Club Sandwich at 250 Rs is more than enough for me and the best part is their quality is consistent. Tried their Special Club Sandwich for the first time 3,4 months back and now it is my go to fast food outlet in Maymar. Ppl living in Maymar should definitely give it a try.  P.S: Pic is from their Facebook page cuz jab bhi yeh ata hai pic lenay ka time nahi hota.

Not did she plan the entire set-up in two days from scratch (ideas and execution) and from Dubai (we live here); she managed to run her whole team on video call and did this amazing setup in a very reasonably small room also 👏🏻 Coming to awesomest theme cake Ive ever seen, Sam's Cake Factory you guys out did yourself, I gave them a shabby reference from the internet and they gave us this 🙀🙌🏻 Overall, I did zero work (just paid😉) and these people made our event, a blast 💥🎭💣

WHY is Koyla chai so underrated? It's amazing! The warm bright sun on a cold evening made for an absolutely lovely day out. 😍 The view and the weather were perfect. It's been ages since I tried out a new chai place and I'm soooo glad I did. We ordered: Pizza fries Alu bunkabab. Blue colada. Caramel macchiato.  Everything was great. Pizza fries were EXCELLENT! Our total was around 1500 with tip which was worth it. If you order chai instead of the drinks, it'll probably be half of what we paid.  Service was good. I saw them sanitising tables when we entered and that made me very happy because it meant that I didn't have to. 😂❤️

For people who live in Korangi/Landhi and surrounding areas :  'Say Cheese' has been open for some weeks now at Korangi 2.5 No. I honestly expected the usual mediocre fast food experience you get at most local places but BOY i was wrong.  Lets start with the first one, PIZZA fries. Probably the first legit ones in this locality. They were overflowing with their signature sauce and MAN they were CHEESY. The large portion pizza fries of 'Say cheese special' flavor was for Rs. 500 and the quantity, the LOADED sauces and cheese made it TOTALLY worth it.  I also had their say cheese special zinger, which was again, more crispy saucy and cheesy than i expected it to be. This one costed like 350 Rs.…
