On my spree of trying Indian cuisine in Karachi, after trying D'Thaililand, I went to Mirchili . The food was OKish not what I have expected after seeing so many reviews on SWOT.  The Gappa Gotala was a really presentable or Instagramable dish but nothing fancy , it was a usual chaat which you can get anywhere plus the chick peas (Cholay) were cold as well which weren't enchancing the flavour as much as the hot ones do.  PavBhaji was good it would be much better if they use actual Pav instead of bun.  Khas Dhosa was better than the other food but nothing extraordinary. Coconut chutney was amazing though .  Bihari bun kebab was bland . It can be amazing if they use actual charcoal grilled Bihari…
Tired BBQ Chicken Bowl and Shanghai Beef Noodle Bowl from miyako and both were excellent. Both were true delight, perfect spice level . Chicken was so juicy and serving was huge! I couldn’t finish mine in one go.
Since Lotus Spread is short in the market and again is not readily available at store and wherever I can find it it’s really really expensive. Where can I find this spread in the most reasonable price as I run a home based bakery and need it very frequently. TIA
Where can i find the best golgappa/panipuri in karachi ? Picture for attention TIA 🥰
Time to review some sea food since Winter has arrived in Karachi 😍 We decided to visit Rashid Seafood like every year but this time Prawn Karahi made us astonished with the taste. A must try item if you are sea food lover along with their Grilled and Fried fishes of your choices we went for 'Surmai' and 'Heera'. Best dinner of this winter so far ❤️
Well for me burger is only of beef. Whoever likes beef burger will definitely love it. This one is Beef SmokeHouse from Ya Sheikh - Extreme Arabic Food. Beef Patty was juicy n spicy and well cooked. Crispy fries were also included. But they should give more fries with it. (Suggestion)
Ordered last night from Burger wrap after reading the positive reviews in swot. Firstly the COLD food was delivered in 2 hours. One of the chicken crisp patty was burnt (even my cat refused to eat it). The flamin hot burger was soggy and was not anything like the details or pictures they provided. The fries were not edible. The chicken of alfredo pasta was dry and tasted like boiled chicken. The sauce of alfredo pasta was good with balanced flavours (THE ONLY GOOD THING). Quantity 8/10 Quality 4/10 Costed 1350 with dc.

This Friday me and my family went to have dinner at a newly opened eatery Gidaan-Balochi Cuisine We ordered dumpukht both chicken and mutton, balochi tikka and chicken Malai boti... Since we didn't knew anything abt balochi cuisine, the owner, mr.Taimoor was kind enough to guide us through the menu and asked us to try balochi qawa taalcha... It had a really different and soothing taste and was perfect for this weather.... Then came in our food and we all were impressed with the taste... Malai boti was really tender and yummy... Both the dumpukhts were perfectly made, the rice were very aromatic and the meat was very tender and juicy... My favourite was the balochi tikka with plum chutney... I really had to stop myself from eating it... In the end we had green tea and doodh pati which was good too... All in all its a really good place, due to covid restrictions we sat outside elsewise they have an indoor setup too... I would recommend you all to try it out and experience something different in Karachi in this awesome weather which we don't get to have a lot...

Best Dhumba Karahi in Karachi??
Visited JucyLucy located at KDA Scheme 1. It was sort of a hidden place & I was in doubt while following google maps. Turns out it was located at a very peaceful place with ample parking. They have a small & cosy dine out facility which I would rate one of the best in the city, as the environment is quite secure with almost no human & vehicle traffic around.  Coming to the food, tried sliders and slot dog. Talking about sliders (mini burger), I always love to see burger joints offering it, as it allows to try variety available on the menu. Taste was authentic & cheesy (as it should be) with no bombardment of fancy sauces. Patty was rich in taste. Overall it was a great treat.  Hot dog is rare to find, so without a single doubt we tried Slot Dog. It was impressive in taste, quality of sausage seems premium & was cooked to perfection, served with mustard & tomato sauce.  Service was prompt as food was served within 15 minutes.  Total cost with trio of sliders, slot dog & a cold drink was around 1800.

Basketude Co.  I was on the lookout for someone who would arrange an anniversary surprise for my husband. I fished around on SWOT, and came across this post about Basketude. I messaged them on Facebook, got an immediate response and multiple options for what i was looking for. The owner, is humble, polite, honest and sincere to the cause. She will take you through all options individually and be very clear from the very start if it disrupts the budget , so that there are no misunderstandings. I bugged her for an hour and a half atleast, and she remained patient and calm. She keeps you in the loop when preparing your order, so that you are happy, and she delivered right on time on the agreed time and date which felt surprisingly good. I had always been on the lookout for one such page since i live abroad and miss so many family birthdays, i am so glad to have a go to person now. Cheers to her! So I ordered from KEKOU just wanted to come here and review it. If you are craving for some desi spicy Chinese take out food this is probably one of the best I’ve had the food came hot & fresh, we got kekous special prawns and hot & spicy chowmein. The chowmein was way too good perfect amount of spices and the taste was on point I was satisfied 😌 The prawns on the other hand were new for me since I only tried their chowmein before but honestly I was surprised how the prawns were fresh and the taste was great too. Delivery came quick. It’s also light on pocket perfect for lunch and dinner if you are low on budget. Recommend. 💯

I would like to share my reviews on Mad Cheese .. I ordered Sandwich, Pasta and Pizza from Mad Cheese and I must say it was worth buying the meal. It was so cheesy, scrumptious and mouthwatering that one could hardly resist! 🤤 The Pizza was in Chicken Supreme n Jalapeno ranch Flavour, Sandwich was in Cheese'n'Smoke Flavour and Pasta was in Mushroom Flavour. All these three items were so yummy and delicious that I ordered thrice after that. Total damage was around 1800 and it was the best food I have ever had. I surely recommend ya'll must give it a try. Pizza was like full of cheese with their signature sauces and sriracha sauce on top and with the perfect crust below! ❤️ Pasta was delicious, full creamy and saucy with perfect blends of herbs. Sandwich was something which I tried for the very first time it tasted really different and with full chicken chunks, sausages, cheese, olives it was stuffed very rich with entirely different combination of pizza dough and stuffed chicken. It was one of my favourite.. 😋💕 Overall It was a great experience!

Went for dinner at SteaK_CFU located in phase 2 of DHA. Its a small place with clean environment. Chef was very humble and nice, she came to our table and listened what exactly we wanted as we decided to leave the place cause didn't understand the menu at the first place. Recieved Panjeeri and Desi Ghee in the mail yesterday. Both the items are fantastic. However, the Desi Ghee is really something to write about. It's made differently, from churned yogurt rather than milk cream. That takes away the usual desi ghee 'odor/scent' that otherwise stops some people from consuming regular desi ghee. This one is for you urban lot. It's just pure desi ghee, minus the odor. More like butter actually.  Panjeeri is also very nice and hearty. With the usual assortment of dried fruits, nuts and semolina plus some other ingredients. It's all binded together by jaggery (Gurr) and the same desi ghee, so it's very light on both the palette and stomach. I've been munching every few minutes, and can't feel a thing.  Impressed every time a home chef does something different, especially when innovating quintessential desi fare!  Order from: https://m.facebook.com/2166847103382822

They were asking in an appropriate manner about food and other things. Ambiance 7/10 FOOD 1.We had Fire burger which was their speciality but I'm not really a "buger-person" so IDK how it was. Saltage Steakhouse  Full disclosure: this review is based on a curated menu sampling that I was invited to and which I did not pay for.  Where our wonderful city has more than it’s fair share of burgers (the kind you eat), there isn’t that much choice for meat lovers to enjoy steaks. I suppose that’s fair too, considering that generally, people are now warming up to the concept that it is actually possible for a steak to be cooked at anything other than “well done” temperature. Recently, places like Steak CFU, Prime 109, Markhor etc are starting to experiment with the kind of meats and cooking techniques we’ve seen abroad - much to the relief of meat lovers!  Saltage adds another option to the…
I ordered this yummy plus effective kamar kas barfi from organicgrocery_19 it was very delicious plus it helps to overcome your pain best for old age people as well as in post pregnancy guy do try is out in Sha Allah you will not regret.
A good meal can be as euphoric as it can be fulfilling. The attention to flavor in each of the different meat dishes that were presented on our table tonight has put me in such a food coma that I have not experienced in a while in Karachi  Saltage Steakhouse was going to serve good food i never had my doubts. Sarmad Shahbaz Bughio knows his food and better yet knows HOW to put that in the flavors of the food he creates and serves. He has cooked for his friends often and we all know how good he is, and today the meal was phenomenal.  Mahvash Siddiqi Khan actually wished that Anjum Rahman Ehsan who was a little delayed....would not show up so she and i could be gluttons.  Basma Hussain-Ahmed Sabeen Rasool missed you both on every bite, I was just powered on to eat for your absence as well. I guess I will just have to go back with you two. Discovered this dhabba style chai place recently, Pahari Chai. We got:  Chicken reshmi kebab: good, paired with a sada paratha and raita. Chicken cheese paratha: hot and crispy, very generously filled. Pizza fries: while these were fine taste wise, I wouldn't call them 'pizza' fries. Pahari tikka: very tender. Balanced spices too with a layer of cheese over the tikka. And it was pretty to look at (didn't get the top view pic) Kashmiri chai: wouldn't recommend this, maybe try their other chai instead.  Overall the food was quite decent and reasonable. Located near Continental Bakery in Johar. And it's a family place.

I ordered chinese from KEKOU Pakistan (smchs) yesterday for the 4th time. I called and placed the order but sadly they didn't deliver in my area so I asked the order to be picked by a careem delivery guy. The careem person didn't have enough cash on him to pay for the order so I called the kekou manager and asked for his account details so I could transfer the amount online. He said its okay you just take the food, eat and enjoy and pay later. I insisted but still he was adamant . That was something unusual but I was sold. I love the hot n spicy chowmein they have and the soup they serve. We ordered 1 chicken gravy, 1 beef gravy, 1 soup and chowmein. They had a 50% off offer going on. The bill was around 1510. Definitely ordering for the 5th time soon! Good job.

Tried desi food at Al Makkah Hotel Al Asif Square. We had to travel 50 minutes each side to get there and back. All the travel was totally worth it. We ordered Mutton(dumba) Tikka, Rosh. Kabuli Pulao. The meat was so tender and juicy. I had this Rosh dish for the first time. It came with a yakhni ka bowl. Absolutely amazing dish. Kabuli pulao was also well cooked. Then we had another one of their delicacies--Qawah with gur, which certainly helped digest the food. The whole dinner cost us around Rs 2700, split four ways. For desi food lovers, this is the place to be. It is on one edge of Karachi, sure, but totally worth-going.

After watching so many reviews and snaps of Sobremesa we decided to try it. As it was a saturday night it was packed but we got a table after 10-15mins of waiting. We were 3 people so we ordered 2 medium deep dish pizzas. •Chicago fire 4/10. It was the most recommended one by everyone and their most running flavor but it was really disappointing as the filling was not adequate and felt like we were just eating a big bakery pizza with added toppings. •Pepperoni 8/10. It was good with the red sauce and the beef. P.s the quantity wasn’t good as we had 4 slices each and even the manager said “Zyada nahe mangwalia aap ny” but we were still hungry after this lol. Service was really good 9/10. The bill was around 3900 for 2 medium pizzas and a large water bottle which tbh is kinda expensive for just pizzas. Definitely Overrated and not worth the hype!!

Went to howdy's last night. One of my favorite restaurants which offers a wide variety of yummy burgers ranging from chicken to beef at reasonable prices. We were 4 people and got our hands on following dishes. For the starter we had Chicken popers which were very crispy and tasty.  In the main course we had Rango tango burger Rodeo glory beef burger Creamy mushroom steak Bone marrow steak  Lastly in desert we had Chocolate 3 milk cake  Amongst the main dishes I absolutely loved the bone marrow steak. Everything was super amazing.  I am really satisfied with their service and they have awesome taste and quality.  But, by and large, the howdy still remains zabardast! HOWDY DHA Karachi

I ordered Broadway’s Chicken Calzone and BBQ Ranch Pasta from Broadway’s Mix n Match deal. I was worried my food will be cold because of the weather here in Karachi but it was delivered absolutely hot, fresh and right on time. Their new calzone had a decent serving size and the rich flavors made it one filling meal! The good old bbq ranch pasta was delicious and creamy like always.  Overall I’d say this deal is great value for money and can easily serve 2 people (if you’re in the mood to share that is 😁)  Taste 9/10 Vaue for money 10/10 Delivery 10/10

YBC matka biryani #ybc #yahyabiryani .. went to this new place near airport called ybc restaurant.. the biryani tasted good.  I like to outside .. open seating .. but cudnt do it there since they had super loud live music being played with drums and piano.. so loud that families were unable to talk to eachothers.. i am all up for music while eating but not the song "koi kar ke bahana saanu mil soohniye".. some slow tabla or sitaar is something that can be a good mood changer.. rather then mehndi dance vibe  The serving was not enough.. the serving for 4 can hardly be enough for 3 persons  They do not accept payment from card and there was no disclaimer or headsup.. no atm near by so please carry cash.

Breakfast is that meal of the day that actually lifts your mood up and brightens up your day!!  Went to Rostilj with friends and OMG we absolutely loved everthing. It's a quaint little cafe that ain't fancy but serves a really good breakfast. They've got a variety of platters to choose from and you can even customise according to your choice.  We got Nutella waffles, chicken cheese grilled sandwich, sunny side up egg and a platter of nutella pancakes with hash brown, sausages, sautéed veggies and chicken and mushroom omelette. Loved each and everything specially the omelette, nutella waffles with icecream and grilled chicken cheese sandwich. *Drools* 🤤😍  This is definately a place where I see myself going again and again as its super reasonable. A platter costs anywhere from 400 to 595 depending on your preference! 🍳🥚🥪🥞🧇☕  https://www.facebook.com/the.rostilj/

After hearing alot about Royal Jasmine, I decided to give their Sunday Brunch a try. Food aside, I would give them full score for the ambience they have created...Live Piano with a really good decor gives you really good and comortable vibes. The staff is very very cooperative, they'll always be on your side asking if you need anything and they'll also bring anything you ask from the buffet to your table if you request them. Coming to food now, they have live Egg, Puri, Paratha and Chai stations so you are always served hot and fresh. Usually Paaye are not that good in buffets but I loved the Paaye here. There was a lot of variety in breakfast including Cornflakes, Nihari and Chinese items.  Cost: Rs.1395 + Tax per person

Went Ramada Karachi Creek Hotel to try their Hi-Tea buffet and celebrate a friend's birthday. Tbh I was really nervous going there after reading mixed reviews on this page but I would gladly say it was a wonderful experience.  Food was amazing and fresh. Service was upto the mark but when it got busy their service also got a bit late but not too much. Cherry on top was the Live Music. It created an amazing ambiance with good food and drinks. They were offering discount on 5 guests. Hello everyone!  After ordering Alvigha quite many times during the last lock down, my friends and I really wanted to try out their newly opened dine-in place. Well tbh, it totally lived up to my expectations. The food was served piping hot, the taste was unique and heavenly, as usual. Though due to the in-door dining closed, the arrangement is made outside, which can be improved a little.  About the food we ordered;  Shahi BBQ Platter: Included all the kinds of BBQ items that one can think of, served with rice (picture is attached below). This was absolutely amazing. Loved almost all the items. This serves up to 6-7 persons.  Chicken Tikka Leg piece: It was juicy, a bit spicy, and full of flavors.  Despite the good taste, they need to work on their service. The waiters weren't responding timely but this may have happened due to the rush.  Overall, it was a pleasant experience and a nice place to spend a Saturday night.  Restaurant: Alvigha  Food: 9/10 Ambiance: 7/10 Service: 7/10 Value for money: 9/10  Location: Opposite Broadway (Gulshan), near Continental Bakery.

I want to share my wonderful experience of working with @cakesaaz .They provided us with wonderful services at reasonable rates. We are living in Canada, I and my husband planned to surprise our relatives in Pakistan. We contacted a few bakeries which provide online delivery services, none of them was ready to make a custom fondant cake of 2.5lb.  We heard about @cakesaaz and sent them photos of the cakes which we wanted to get ready for our relatives. They made exact cakes what we wanted and they delivered all cakes to the doorstep of our relatives on time. It was an amazing experience to get their services from abroad. Many thanks to Cakesaaz, we will surely try them again.

Finally I got the opportunity to try the Hi Tea at The Patio It has been the talk of the town for a while now and seeing frequent reviews about its Hi Tea brought a crescendo of excitement in me to try it once.  Timings were 4-7 pm ( every Thu, Sat) Though we reached 5 mins before 4 pm but it started approx 15 mins late.  The menu was just amazing and wholesome. They had options of non veg and veg in almost everything. I loved the quiche and the pasta. Tres leches cake was mind blowing. And I finished everything off with the tantalising apple pie and a side of whipped cream and coffee.  The waiters were such amicable people also the lady in white there, she was on her toes all the time serving people hot food and also inquiring if she could bring anything to their tables. She asked us too if everything was perfect and which actually was. Not exaggerating here but it was the hi light of all the Hi teas of my life. Like the Hi tea to trump all the Hi teas. Glad to end 2019 on a glorious note!

I organised a Girl’s Party yesterday at Once Upon A Time Cafe and Basement which is right beside Cineplex Cinema. As a really happy customer, I have to admit that they have an amazing basement with Kareoke Setup and other musical facilities. They helped me throughout from the day I went for reservation till the event day! The event was carried out smoothly and one of the main reason was that was the cooperation of OUAT’s staff! Oh yes, the food was amazing too, it was a buffet provided with the best items at very reasonable price! I would highly recommend this place for any indoor party and not only party but people can go there for food anytime, anyday!

First, Ayesha @ Dream Makers is an exceptionally well talented decorator and organiser, she really did an outstanding job on the decor. She was really cooperative and on top of each and every little task. So kudos, 10/10 to her and the beautiful arrangements by her.  Secondly, Once upon a cake, this maybe my 7th or 8th cake from them, sorry I’ve lost count after the first 2, they’ve never let me down. They even provided a customised cake topper which I ordered and the taste is just Perfect!!  Last but not the least, Pranzo, honestly I had my doubts about the place initially as I’ve never been there before but the place is so lit, the ambiance the, arrangement is just perfect and food is also good. This location is just perfect to throw an event or a small celebration.  You mix all three of the aforementioned and you have a PARTY!! Thank you for making a special day even more special CHEERS!!

It was our anniversary dinner and i wanted to ditch the regular cafes this time.  From reservation to entry, the process was very smooth, it was a sunday so make sure u reserve before you go.  Now coming to ambience, this place has one of the best ambience when it comes to outdoor sitting and the cold weather alleviates it further. The place was nicely lit up with warm lights. We ordered 2 Chicken Cheese Doner and it turned out to be a great experience overall. As for the quality of the food. The pita bread was overloading with the goodness of the herbs, jalapeños and sauces. The chicken pieces were succulent and topped with a cheese slice. The only thing they can do it better was to add fries to the wrap. We had to buy it separately.  Worth = 640 (320 each) 1 large fries = 120  One more thing there is no seating available so you can enjoy in your car or on your bike or the footpath. So we visited Southside Pizzeria after reading a review here on swots last night. It's located in Gulshan, near Maskan. We were 15 friends and decided to order 4 of their 20inch pizzas. I must say their pizzas are amazing! 😍 The dough and crust is not too thin, but also not too thick. The toppings and flavors that they're presenting are amazing. We ordered Southern BBQ, Showdown Rancher and Jalapeño Rush. All three flavors were so different than what other pizza restaurants are giving. They suggested us to order the Ranch flavor in 2 jumbos because its their signature flavor and it has everything that a signature flavor must have. We loved it and thank God for Gulshan finally having a new Pizza place. Our new favorite place definitely 😍😍 Sorry for not a lot of pictures. We only took pictures of the BBQ flavor because the other pizzas didn't last too long 😂😂

✨The Eat Street✨  In a mood for authentic street food? The Eat Street is a great place to satisfy that Desi food craving🥰 • Really helpful staff, extremely clean and cute little place, really fast service (just took them 5-6 mins to prepare a lot of food😲) and most importantly, it follows all the SOPs! •Delicious authentic Pakistani street food served in a hygienic way with amazing prices 👌🏻 • Wasn’t really ever a fan of bun kabab and shawarma...always wondered the hype about it in Pakistan🧐until I finally tried it here and came to like it 🤩 Always a fan of pani puri... so I was really surprised when I saw them serve it in a completely new way as “pani puri shots” ! It looked so appealing🥰Do give it a try

It is the sugar and thyme that made it taste divine! bursting of pleasure after eating this wonderful Penne Pasta that i ordered for lunch from Studio 7teas i would like to legit vouch for its great taste, freshness and pocket friendly price.  This had mushrooms, olives and chicken strips in it, cooked to perfection in an aromatic pasta sauce (that is their trade secret) however, i do requested to add a dash of sugar to mine, so they did and WALLAH, MAZA AGAYA!  Studio is located at Mohammed Ali Society and is in easy reach for people looking for tasty lunch options (like me) working near/on Shahrah e faisal. i got it delivered though, in 30 mins to my work place. This is the most suitable snack from kids to adults to seniors. Snack on the go!!  I highly recommend them...must try. Feel free to contact me if any further information required.

The wrap was SUPER delicious, it had chicken tikka ,some creamy slightly tangy sauces, sufficient amount of saucy cheese, some capsicum ,onions and green pepper. Craving for Fresh Seafood? Rashid SeaFood is the right choice for you! It’s a roadside restaurant where you have to select fish and prawns of your choice (any seafood you like) and you can tell them how would you like your fish/prawn to be grilled/fried/bbq/karahi and they cook exactly like it. In frame Grilled Fresh Fish and Fresh Prawn Karahi and ahh that fresh fish and prawns tastes like ahmaaaazing 🥺 You can buy fresh raw seafood too. I’d rate it 9/10 minus one point as they take 1 hour to get your order Whenever you are in Karachi and craving for seafood this is a must visit place. It’s located in Kiamari

Brace yourselves for a long review post. So, me and my wife had been preparing for our son's first birthday since the day he was born. No really, trust me. We had done eleven photoshoots of him on the sixth of every month prior to his birthday. We had covered several themes for his photoshoots and had been wondering what our final theme would look like. So, before we decided to settle down with "Marine Life" for his first birthday, we started looking for some of the finest Cake Artists in town. And while the search was on, someone from here and my friends list recommended Cake Artist Maria. Begum and I took a chance with her, seeing positive reviews and my God, did she not justify the hype! The cake looked and tasted unreal. Was stoked to see how good of a job she had done. Will definitely recommend her services to everyone. As for the setup, it was completely designed by my wife and I. We didn't hire anyone since we had been designing his monthly photoshoot themes for a long time.

https://www.facebook.com/Midtownbiryani/  They have a post on their Facebook page stating " There is no love sincerer than the love of Biryani" With Midtown Biryani , this is absolutely true. Totally left us all speechless!! What to say about the combo of spices, chicken and rice. My friend and I had dinner at Ginsoy SMCHS two days ago and I wanted to specifically post to appreciate their customer service.  We were seated outdoors. As for my experience, the soup I ordered wasn't warm/steaming as it should have been, so I requested them to heat it up but they replaced it with a hot soup immediately. Lastly, when we requested to pack our leftovers, they did pack it but somehow accidently misplaced it. In order to make up for it, they reordered our meals and packed it for us. We did have to wait an extra 15 minutes for it, but the way the manager/supervisor apologetically asked us to wait for the takeaways, I was immensely pleased by the way they handled the situation despite the rush and Covid restrictions.

Jesa likha tha wesa he paya sukoon wali jagah bilkul plus khana bhi zabardast, A rooftop open air restaurant with perfect environment, great ambiance and food even better. Recently, we tried Khausey and Dosa from Khao Dosa.  Khausay: Authentic, fresh and good proportions. Compared to khausas from other restaurants, they are more of a Burmeese style as the taste of scrumptious coconut milk curry was prominent but balanced with other flavours. Very homemade like. Owner told us it is their family recipe inherited from their ancestors from India.  Dosa: Tried the 'Classic Dosa'. Taste connects you with the basics of what a simple dosa is made of. Spices are well balanced and do not push away the yummilicious fusion of crunchy dosa wrap and mashed potatoes. Lives up to it's nomenclature.  In conclusion, it is a must try for every dosa and khausa lover. A better choice for those who are monotonous of khausas and dosas with too many confusing flavours in one meal. They left a fine aftertaste that gave me a craving to have them again.  Prices: 1 Classic Dosa with Sambar - 290/- 1 Chicken Khousey - 350/-  Location: Chota Bukhari, DHA, Karachi.
Tried these items from newly opened fastfood restaurant Hunger On Peak in Gulzar-e-Hijri scheme 33. The best thing is that they are serving broast cheesy garlic nan/garlic bread/garlic bun(whatever) instead of simple bun which is very tasty which is not being served by anyother small restaurant. The broast pieces are very big specially chest in this time when chicken is 400-450/kg. Price are of course normal. 220 leg, 240 chest. Also tried zinger burger. It was very juicy and crispy. I highly recommend yoi to try their broast with garlic bun. Must try  Location: Gulzar-e-Hijri, telecom exchange wali line ya police station wali limey, naalay kay barabar wala wala project (Poineer Castle), White House kay saamne

The best gol gappas in Karachi!  Here’s the location: Mashallah Shadab Gol Gappay & Chat Federal B Area Block 11 Gulberg Town, Karachi, Karachi City, Sindh https://goo.gl/maps/X4atMWF3d9bY13b86
Who seves best bbq platter for 3 to 4 persons

The Vittles Company. Cream cheese. This is probably the best product to emerge from the whole import substitution movement. It's smooth, and tastes rich and creamy, with just a bit of acidity. It's got no sugar, so that's a win. It's the type which you spread out on warm toasted bread for a quick breakfast.  This is a great product, at a super price. You get a full 300g tub for like PKR 550, which is basically at a 65% discount (on a per gram basis) to the smuggled Philadelphia. Always buy local (if quality is at par).  Here is to hoping they maintain the quality, and scale up distribution. May the cream with Mr. Vittles.  P.S. picture from the Facebook page, too lazy to take a half decent picture.

First dine-in at 'Colette, by Xanders' was a let-down.  The mains were misleadingly dull. Beneath the semblence of fancy menu listings, and extensive veneer work on the plates (splashes and sprinkles here and there) there wasn't much truth in the pudding itself.  The buckwheat crepes were overcooked, flavors disorderly and portions not as liberal as one would've liked them to be. Hot chocolate and dessert were the saving grace of the evening.  One does not expect such humdrum from the house of Flo and Xander's. Counting on Colette to see if it improvises and lives up to the repertoire that its pedigree entails.

Review: Pie in the Sky ( Gulshan Branch)  I've ordered a 6 pound cake for my baby's 1st birthday. Found it smaller in size and asked them to please weight it, upon placing it on the scale it was almost a pound less. The guy said there's a minor difference in weight, i told them that its almost 1pound less. They said to buy something else as compensation, i asked for refund and they actually refunded me 1250 which was the rate per pound.  The cake was undoubtedly good in taste,but my point here is, how many of us actually check it before leaving with the cake. Big names should act responsibly when people are trusting them

My family and I are huge coffee fans of coffee and as it is winter nowadays we decided to try this outlet named Coffee Wagera. I had also heard many great things about this place and believe me they are all true. The staff there, are really nice and they warmly welcomed me in. There was a guy named Altamash who was very kind and tender-hearted. He listened to me very attentively and did whatever I asked him to do. He even offered me a chair so that I wouldn’t have to stand, waiting for my drinks. I ordered mocha and iced mocha and both the drinks tasted amazing. My overall experience was superb. The staff was also very cautious as all of them were wearing masks and gloves to ensure the least amount of covid-19 spread. I really recommend this place to anyone out there wanting a delicious cup of coffee. It is a great addition in our city for all the coffee lovers.

Hi guys, so I want to talk about a burger place that I ignored for the longest time and based off of customer reviews on foodpanda, I recently decided to give it a shot, I’m talking about BigThick Burgerz here. I ordered their spicy Arizona burger meal and I was blown away by the fact that they’re actually serving GOOD QUALITY CHICKEN! It’s shameful that this has become a quality standard, as this should really be a prerequisite for any food business. Over the next week or so I tried a couple of other burgers from them (one was beef) and the other was a Zinger style Boston creamy burger, again, the food was fresh, the taste was great and more importantly, the quality of beef was truly amazing.  Whether you like the taste of an eatery or not, paying 600-800 bucks for a burger meal, you should at the bare minimum, get good quality chicken/beef. Something that I feel you don’t get at quite a few places charging between the mentioned bracket.  So this is a genuine shout out to the guys at BTB, keep at it! 😁👌

If I could give 50 stars to a home baker in Karachi ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I would definitely give to BarSal cakes & snacks for making my nephews dream cake!  I contacted the lady after reading a review here on swot and requested her last night to bake and deliver a cake today. I knew it was a super short notice but to my surprise she was willing to make the cake and deliver. I only shared a picture of the cake I wanted and she made exactly how I had requested her.  Also, she promised to deliver at 8 PM but the delivery took a little longer which I later found out was because the riders bike got kharab on the way and then she had to come with her husband to deliver it. It was a really sweet gesture!  Honestly, if you are looking for a custom made cake, look no further and contact her immediately. I contacted so many bakers and found her cakes to be the most economical and neat looking!  Thank you BarSal cakes. We really loved every bit of the cake!  I am definitely ordering again iA 🙂

Today, I visited a new food outlet opened in Gulistan e Johar named BIHAREEZ, they are offering take away and delivery. I ordered beef burger, overall it was a good experience, proper Covid SOP were followed, cleanliness was evident, pleasant behavior of staff, my burger was ready in 15minutes, packing was nice. The taste was different as it was a BIHAREE flavoured burger 'a fusion of biharee beef and traditional beef burger' I loved the taste and juicy flavor, along with french fries which taste far more better than available in so called international franchises. I would say it's a MUST TRY and specially all those who are BIHAREE BOTI and KeBAB Lovers who would have a new and different option in same BIHAREE flavour.... All those who are searching for something new to try I would recommend them to try BIHAREEZZZ......🙃🙂🙃🙂

Who has tried Mr. Burger in Karachi?  Its the original Karachi’s own burger chain, long before any foreign chains arrived, it was the most popular gourmet fast food at the time.  Did you know that the branch at Boat Basin Clifton is the only original one, owned by the original owners? The rest are all franchises.  Sadly they don’t have any online presence, just a google page, with their restaurant phone number.  Mr. Burger at Boat Basin Clifton has the best burgers juicy and succulent with their unique mustard and sauces, dripping cheese, and their fries are crispy with their unique flavor, better than any foreign franchises, any day!  Please do visit them and try their original burger, it is still one of the top five burgers in Karachi!  Address: Boat Basin Clifton Near the Aga Khan Community Center.  Phone: 021 35835975

P.F. Chang's Pakistan is one of the finest Chinese restaurants in Karachi, always known for a better Chinese taste. Most Chinese restaurants in Pakistan have a Pakistani taste in Chinese food but, they are among those very few restaurants that are still able to carry "Chinese" flavor to their dishes. I would highly recommend anyone reading this to go and experience exquisite Chinese cuisine:  Tempura-battered tossed with a sriracha aioli- 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐦p🍤  Crisp prawns, tossed in a spicy chili butter- 𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐭 & 𝐏𝐞𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐫 𝐏𝐫𝐚𝐰𝐧𝐬  Wok-tossed with egg, carrots, bean sprouts, green onion- 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐝 𝐑𝐢𝐜𝐞🍚 (The fillings were pretty mediocre though)  Drinks you should try: 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐰𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐆𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐞𝐫 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐚 and 𝐏𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐌𝐨𝐣𝐢𝐭𝐨. These are literally heaven to your tastebuds! Very refreshing🥂🥂

☘️Food Review☘️  🐥Clucky’s 🐥 . 💎I ordered cluck stacular deal from clucky’s. This deal contains 4 pcs fried chicken, 2 cluck crispers, 2 alakiev sandwiches and 1 litre Pepsi❤️. . . . 💎It was a great deal. The price was reasonable and the food was also flavorful💖💖💖. . . . 💎The fried chicken was very fresh and very crunchy as well as juicy. There was amazing seasoning on the chicken which added a lot of flavor to the chicken💞💞. . . . 💎The cluck crispers and the alakiev sandwiches were also very tasty & mouthwatering 😋😋. . . . 💎 They also followed all the SOPs in delivering the food. Everything was sealed properly and proper hygiene was followed✅. . . . 💎You should try it as well and I’m sure you’ll enjoy it👍👍.

In Karachi – a city where you are exposed to hundreds of eateries to choose from, I drove my family to Koel Cafe situated in Clifton, Block 4 today. Usually, when you are driving, parking is one of the first issues that come in your mind. However, that was not an issue with this place. Even on a Sunday, there was plenty of room outside the café to park. Furthermore, when it comes to their ambiance, the café was furnished with white wooden tables and chairs, and big pots of plants were placed all around the café. The fairy lights wrapped around the long branches and the fresh green leaves in the background gives the room a striking setting that allowed me to click aesthetic photos. When it… More

CAFÈ BOGIE Did you also think Bogie was a cafe made inside a train compartment, with just snacks and beverages? Watch this...  The six compartments are private dining rooms with a huge open-air seating behind it. The menu has 70+ items. Their special Bogie Sandwich was similar to CloudNaan stuff but better; bbq prawns were super awesome; bbq chicken was good too.  Also got a chance to meet the owner and listen to his inspiring story - how he started it with just one compartment four years ago built it to a 100+ capacity restaurant. And some useful insights on potential coffee shop spots on I.I. Chundrigar Road 🙂  Ps. 2000 for all which was good for three! He didn’t let me pay for the kulfi!

She sells many kinds of amazing sandwiches like chicken heaven sandwich, pizza sandwich, nutella sandwich and many more all while keeping the food as hygienic as she can. So this was purely an accidental discovery but we are glad we came across it. This is a rooftop restaurant in North Nazimabad Block B called 'Oriental Shinwari'. Ideal for family outing, great food, ambience even better. A calm, peaceful environment that you can't expect to have in the mid of the city. And in these lockdown days when indoor dining is not permitted and we don't have enough open air restaurants that offer amazing taste and a perfect ambience at the same time, it seems to be a great find. This place is located inside the Pakistan Rangers Officers' Club. We ordered their Shinwari special karahi and kabuli chicken pulao and both literally blew our mind. Also, their prices are quite reasonable. It's definitely going to be our fixed spot for Desi food in the future. Absolutely recommended! Much needed review! Ever since the lockdown happened I was a bit sceptical when food deliveries resumed, all those fast food restaurants were clearing up their old stock and delivering stale food. I came across NOWONDERPK and since it was a new start up I was assured that everything would be fresh. Ordered the buffalo ranch pizza and it has got to be the best pizza I have had in a long while, since I dont like a lot of buffalo sauce I told them to add less of it and trust me the taste was not comprised! Ordered it again the second time today and the taste was exactly the same! This new food joint has won me over completely. Also ordered the cheetos chicken sliders, very rich in flavour and perfection in every bite, I was a bit concerned that the cheetos taste would empower the burger but this was definitely not the case. The current ongoing Covid-19 pandemic has affected everyone's lives. One has to battle their problems only to have a better living.  Therefore, to cope up with such circumstamces, students from NUML University recently opened a small pop up stall in F-10 Markaz, named as Dice Fries.  Primary aim of setting up this stall is that they can fulfill their basic needs and pay their University fee.  If you show your support to them, pay a visit to their stall (F-10 Markaz) and try their menu, it will help them alot and ease their worries. Also, you will love their menu as it is very delicious and prepared by neat hands and in a clean environment. #environment #university #students #community #wellness #help #education

Went with my family to this new Balochi cuisine resfaurant 'Gidaan', opened just a week ago & located on main ittehad near sea view.  It was a very delicious food experience & something different. We tried mutton leg , mutton back chops, desi Murgh dumpukht(all 3 with rice) & beef seekh kababs, all made in traditional Balochi style. The eatery's very courteous owner Mr Taimur greeted us at the table, explained about the various dishes & helped select the menu for the night. He also suggested the traditional 'Taal cha' qehwa before the dinner which turned out to be a very refreshing hot beverage to have. Ended the dinner with again a nice cup of green tea. After the dinner their staff had us wash our hands right at our seats in traditional balochi style. (i have forgotten the name of the utensil but shared picture below).  This place is a very welcome addition, specially for mutton & dumpukht style food aficionados.  Not forgetting to mention, Covid related SOPs were properly being adhered to with with all staff working in masks & doing frequent sanitization.

مہران ایکسپریس کراچی اور میرپور خاص کے درمیان چلے گی۔
۔
کراچی سٹی سے دوپہر 3:55 بجے روانہ ہوکر رات 8:30 بجے میرپورخاص پہنچے گی۔
۔
میرپورخاص سے صبح 5 بجے روانہ ہوکر دن میں 9:30 بجے کراچی سٹی پہنچے گی۔
۔
کراچی سٹی اور میرپور خاص کے درمیان مہران ایکسپریس کے آٹھ اسٹاپ ہیں: کینٹ، ڈرگ روڈ، لانڈھی، جنگ شاہی، کوٹری، حیدرآباد، ٹندوجام اور ٹندو الللہ یار۔
۔
مارچ میں ٹرین آپرشن معطل ہونے سی قبل یہ اسی روٹ پر چلتی تھی۔
۔
مہران ایکسپریس 10 بوگیوں پر مشتمل ہے جن میں مجموعی طور 734 مسافروں کے سفر کرنے کی گنجائش ہے۔

The deputy commissioner informed that the food street will be lit with ornate lights, while new tiles will be laid on the ground after road repair work is completed, around the evening, the food street will be rendered traffic-free while the general traffic and pedestrians passing by will be provided a detour for them.🙄🙄“Sheikh Rasheed jis ko main kabhi apna chaprasi bhee na lagaon” say lay kar “Sheikh Rasheed is my interior minister!” tak ka safar!

#KKvMS #HBLPSLVکراچی: ڈیفینس پولیس کا قیوم آباد سیکٹر اے میں فحاشی کے اڈے پر چھاپہ،
کارروائی کے دوران بدکاری میں میں ملوث 2 مرد اور 6 خواتین کو گرفتار کرلیا گیا،
پولیس نے کاروائی کے دوران موبائل فونز نقد رقم سمیت دیگر سامان قبضے میں لے لیا، مقدمہ درج👏💯❤️کشمور: بچی سے زیادتی کا ملزم رفیق اپنے ساتھیوں کی فائرنگ سے ہلاک
کشمور: پولیس ملزم رفیق کو دوسرے ملزم خیراللہ کی گرفتاری کے لئے لے جارہی تھی، پولیس
کشمور: ملزمان نے پولیس پارٹی پر حملہ کیا جس سے رفیق ہلاک ہوا، پولیس
کشمور: ملزمان اور پولیس میں فائرنگ کا تبادلہ جاری، ضلع بھر سے نفری طلب🙄🙄Agreed 💯 ✓کشمور پولیس چار سالہ معصوم بچی اور ماں کو اجتماعی زیادتی کا نشانہ بنانے والے درندے کو پروٹوکول دینے میں مصروف ہے پولیس لاکپ میں وحشی کو مچھر نہ کاٹ لیں مچھردانی کا بھی فوری بندوبست کرلیا گیا..

یہ تصویر دیکھنے کے بعد کشمور پولیس کی تفتیش کس قدر شفاف ہوگی اندازہ خود ہی لگالیں -_-Ye To Sirf Woh Assets Hain Jo Declared Hain. Baqi Aap Samajh Jayen ☺️👌کشمور میں معصوم ‏علیشا اور اسکی والدہ سے زیادتی کرنے والے درندوں نے علیشا کی والدہ کو اس شرط پر چھوڑا کہ وہ کسی دوسری لڑکی کا بندوبست کرکے آئے تو وہ پولیس کے پاس گئی پولیس افسر محمد بخش نے،اپنی بیٹی کو پیش کیا کہ ملزمان سے کہو لڑکی کا بندوبست ہوگیا ہے, ثبوت کے طور پر اپنی بیٹی کی ملزمان سے بات بھی کرائی جس کے بعد ان درندوں کی گرفتاری عمل میں لائی گئی ہوئے, ‏سلام ہو اس پولیس افسر پر جس نے علیشا کی جان بچانے کیلئے اپنی معصوم بیٹی کو ملزمان سے فون پر بات کرائی کہ میں آ رہی ہوں، علیشا کو چھوڑ دیں جس کے بعد پولیس نے علیشا کی والدہ کے ساتھ مل کر اس مکان پر چھاپہ مارا جہاں ملزمان کو گرفتار کیا گیا اور علیشا کو بازیاب کرایا گیا۔

بشکریہ: صحافی قاضی آصفMolvi Sahab Nailed It 😍🤣پتا نہیں کیوں نہ آسمان پھٹا اور نہ زمین کانپی 😩

چار سال کی علیشا شلوار نیچے کر کے بتاتی ہے کہ میرے ساتھ کیا ظلم ہوا. دیکھنے والوں کی چیخیں نکل جاتی ہیں لیکن حکمرانوں کو کوئی فرق نہیں پڑتا..

ایک چار سالا معصوم بچی کو ماں سمیت 3 دن تک اجتماعی وحشت کا نشانہ بنایا گیا جب پولیس پہنچی تو بچی نے شلوار نیچے کرتے کہا دیکھیں پولیس انکل ان لوگوں نے میرے ساتھ کیا، کیا ہے! اللہ اکبر :(ایک بہترین انسانیت دوست انسان
ایک نہایت متحرک اور بے مثال خاتون
ایک تاریخ رقم کرنے والا شیر دل سپاہی
اور آخری ؟ ایک ڈھونگ ، فریب بس ؟
ارے نہیں نہیں بلکہ ایک بے مثال اور شاندار اداکارہ
ملک کو بدنام کرنے والی ملالہ ..!

کراچی: پاکستان ریلوے پیر 16 نومبر سے کے سی آر کو مرحلہ وار بحال کر رہی ہے، ترجمان

ابتدائی طور پر کے سی آر کو پپری سے لانڈھی سے اورنگی ٹاؤن تک چلایا جائیگا۔

دن میں 4 ٹرینیں پپری اور 4 اورنگی سے روانہ کی جائینگی

اوقات صبح 7 اور 10 بجے اور دوپہر میں 1 اور 4 بجے ہونگے

via Zayan Hasanقائد آباد واقعہ
بریلوی ،دیوبندی ، اہل حدیث علماء۔ کی تحقیقی کمیٹی نے متفقہ طور پر تحقیق کے بعد یہ اعلان کیا ہے کہ مقتول بنک منیجر عاشق رسول تھا اس نے قطعا کھبی کوئی توہین نہیں کی

اور قاتل نے ذاتی رنجش کی بنیاد پر قتل کیا تحقیق سے معلوم ہوا کہ مقتول بنک منیجر کا تعلق بھی بریلوی مسلک سے تھا "

تینوں مسالک نے انتظامیہ سے مطالبہ کیا ہے کہ قاتل کو عبرتناک سزا دی جائے۔ اور ساتھ ان عناصر کے خلاف بھی کاروائی کی جائے جنھوں نے اس دہشت گردی کو مذہبی رنگ دینے کی کوشش کی ہے

ماسک نہ پہننے پر جرمانہ عائد ہوگا۔ ترجمان کمشنر کراچی
کمشنر کراچی نے تمام ڈپٹی کمشنرز کو ہدایت جاری کردیں؛ ترجمان کمشنر کراچیآرزو اپنی مرضی سے مُسلمان ہوئ!

کوئ بھی مذہب زبردستی سے اپنایا نہیں جا سکتا جس بچی کے مُسلمان ہونے پہ واویلا مچا رکھا تھا سب نے خُود سنیں وہ کیا کہتی ہے.

خُدارہ پاکستان کو بدنام کرنا بند کریں یہ مذہب کے نام پہ ڈرامہ ہر انسان آزاد ہے اپنے دین کے معاملے میں.🙄🙄;)Sikandar Sanam 🥺🥺بینک منیجر کو قتل کرنے کی ویڈیو، گارڈ سے کسی قسم کی کوئی بحث نہیں ہوئی. گارڈ نے مکمل پلاننگ سے قتل کیا ہے.

تمام حالات واقعات نے پہلے ہی لگ بھگ یہ ثابت کر دیا ھے کہ عمران کا ناحق خون بہایا گیا.

یہ کیس صرف خوشاب کے لیے ہی نہی بلکہ پورے ملک کے لیے سوالیہ نشان ھے.اس بے غیرت بے دین جس نے اپنے معصوم بینک منیجر کو ناحق قتل کیا اسکو تو پھانسی پر لٹکانا ہی چاہئے ساتھ ساتھ پوری ویڈیو میں جو نام نہاد علماء اور عوام اسکے ساتھ نعرے مار رہی ہے اور اسکو ہیرو بنا رہے ہیں ان سب کو بھی اسکے ساتھ ہی پکڑ کر لٹکانا چاہئے تاکہ آئندہ کوئی بھی عشق رسول ص کے نام پر کسی معصوم کی جان نہ لے سکے اور فرقہ واریت میں لتھڑے جاہل مولوی بھی عبرت کا نشان کا بنیں۔It was raining at Masjid Al Haram today. <3

Tunnel was built in 1891 but buried in filth and waste has been meticulously recovered and restored by @ClimateChangePK to its original glory 💛💛

Will prove to be a model of #EcoTourism in Ayubia National Park, KPK ♥️♥️

The total length of the tunnel is just 250ft but it can reduce the distance of trek and at the same time 129 years old tunnel is a jewel, among the other historical sites of Galyat region 💓💓

Hats of to the responsible authorities, please do such things regularly to restore a glamorous Pakistan 🙏🙏

ملزم عابد کو لاہور منتقل کیا جارہا ہے۔کراچی: گزری پل پر ٹریفک حادثہ، ایک شخص جاں بحق،
جاں بحق ہو نے والے شخص کی شناخت 28 سالہ علی حسن کے نام سے ہوئی، جناح اسپتال منتقل، چھیپا ذرائعShare as much as you can!🤔🤔کراچی: شاہ فیصل کالونی شمع شاپنگ سینٹر کے قریب ڈبل کیبن گاڑی پر فائرنگ سے زخمی ہونے والے جامعہ فاروقیہ کے مہتمم مولانا عادل دم توڑ گئے.

مولانا عادل کے ڈرائیور مقصود بھی جاں بحق ہوگئے ہیں۔‏اللہ ملکِ پاکستان بالخصوص کراچی کے امن کو قائم رکھے۔

via HaramainAssistant Director (BPS-17) Asif Iqbal Chaudhary, Cybercrime Wing, Federal Investigation Agency (FIA), who registered an FIR against Actress/Singer Meesha Shafi and eight others for their involvement in a smear campaign against singer-actor Ali Zafar was SUSPENDED from the service.

“Service of Muhammad Asif Iqbal, assistant director/senior investigator (BPS-17) cybercrime reporting centre Lahore is hereby placed under suspension with immediate effect till further orders,” says an order issued by FIA Director (cybercrime wing) Amir Farooqi.

Neither a show-cause notice was issued to Mr Iqbal, nor any reason given for his suspension, an official source told Dawn.

#Karachi #Province #HalaatKiUpdatesExactly ten years ago in Sialkot, this time around, two brothers named Mughees and Muneeb were lynched mercilessly to death by an angry-mob. The brothers, kept insisting, that they didn't do anything wrong but people didn't stop thrashing them out. It is also reported that both brothers were trying to save each other but all their efforts went in vain because they were beaten by dozen of people using rods, sticks, stones and what not. Their culprits, the accused, were given death sentences and life imprisonment but later, the decision was revised and all death penalties were changed to 10-year imprisonment. تبدیلی آئے نا آئے عمران خان اور اُسکے ساتھی ایکسپوز انشا اللہ ہوتے رہیں گے

#ZafarMirza
#TaniaAidrusSomebody please help, there's a girl who's parents are stuck in water inside their car and can't get out of it because the water is flowing with high pressure.
They are stuck from around 1pm. They haven't eat or drink anything and are now saffocating. Nobody is helping them out, they contacted many people some came with troller and truck to help but refused and returned after seeing the situation.
I don't know how but somebody needs to do something, we can't let somebody die because government officials can't do anything.

WHERE'S HUMANITY? PLEASE DO SOMETHING

They are stuck in Nazimabad block 4, in front of fine petrol pump. There are many other cars and families stuck over there.

PS: As per this girl, going there in car won't help. They need a lifter or fire brigade anything really big and powerful to get them out from there.

Sc: Muniba Jamal#Karachi walo Apni Aankhen Khol Lo, Warna Tumhari Naslain Bhe Isi Tarah Khuwar Ho Jayen Gi 🙄🙄

CHICKEN FETTUCCINE ALFREDO❤️
Fish Masala Recipe | Masala Fish Gravy Recipe | مچھلی مصالحہ | Quick and easy Recipe by Sumra
Falafels are very easy to make with very simple and easy steps  Ingredients Chickpeas ------ 2 cup Parsley ------ 1 bunch Spring onion ----- 1 bunch or 6 to 7 stems Yellow onion ----- 1 small Sesame seeds ----- 2 Tbsp. Black pepper ---- 1 tsp Red chilli ------ 1/2 tsp Salt -------- 2 tsp Baking powder ------- 1 tsp Cumin powder ----- 2 tsp Coriander powder ------ 2 tsp  Directions  Soak chick peas in water for 8 to 12 hrs. or overnight. Drain the water completely and Coarsely grind them . Make paste of parsley spring onion and onion and add to the chickpeas. Add all the spices and the sesame seeds and mix it well. Make Falafels and Fry them on medium heat for 5 to 8 mins or brown in colour. Serve with Tahini or Humus. E N J O Y ....

Best Home Made Nehari Masala !!!!  Nihari is a National Pakistani dish consists of lamb or beef that takes longer time in the cooking and served with tasty cooked brains and bone marrow. The nihari has Old Delhi originations of the late 18th century during the Mughal Empire...  So here am sharing the best home nehari masla with you all !!!  Masala qunantity ( for 2kg nehari )  Ingredients:  1/2 teaspoon of Shah zeera 2 sticks of Daalchini 1/4 teaspoon of Jawatri 10 to 15 whole Black pepper 1 Netnug ( medium size) 1 flower of Baadyaan 3 bardhi Elaichi 6 small Elaichi 1 tablespoon of Souf 1 tablespoon of dry Rose Pastels 1/2 tablespoon of Ajwain 2 tablespoons of Saabit Zeera 3 pieces of…

Nana's Green Fish Curry  1/2 kg Fish sliced (Marinate with salt, tumermic and lemon juice) 1 Onion (finely chopped) 1 Tomato( finely chopped) 3-4 Slit green chillies 8-10 curry leaves Salt to taste  Green Masala 1 cup of corinader leaves 5/7 garlic pods 1 small pc of ginger Small ball of tamarind (Optional) or Lemon juice 1/2 tsp of turmeric 1/2 tsp cumin seeds 1/4 cup of fresh coconut  Grind all the above ingredients in 1/4 cup water for the green masala into a fine paste.  Preparation :  Pour in some oil in a pot. Add the onion and curry leaves.  Fry the onions till it gets translucent,then add the chopped tomatoes and green chilies and fry for 5 minutes. …

Hey Guys, Alot of you know me as the head chef of Grubshack Dubai. In these Covid times I know life has become difficult and Alot of people are at home so would like to share a couple of my very own home style recipes to keep you entertained. Never done this before so please show me some love. Grubshack Dubai  Home made Fish Ambotik  Ambotik masala: 12-15 kashmiri chillies Half cup water and half cup vinegar 1/2 tsp cumin seeds 1/2 tsp pepper corn 1/2 tsp turmeric powder Small piece ginger 5-6 garlic pods  Fish Marinade: 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 tsp tumeric  Optional : 5 pieces kokum  Grind all the above ingredients Except the Kokum into a smooth paste. Heat up a pot with oil and fry the masala for 7-10 mins until it is well cooked. Finally add in the marinated fish and cook for 10 mins. Finally add in the kokum and simmer for another 5 mins. Turn the flame off and your ready to go! Best served with steamed rice or pav. Here is the link if you want to check the process and share it https://youtu.be/UQ1sswtgEjg

Bombay style soya bean kheema👌(Green Masala)  So after alot of requests for vegan recipes here is one of my all time favorite dishes.  A flavour packed bowl of kheema well Soya bean kheema! For all the non-vegetarians out there this is a great dish for you too. You will never know the difference (I promise🤞).  Soya bean is filled with protein and are a rich source of various vitamins and minerals 😁  Green Masala: 1 bunch coriander 1/2 bunch mint 2-3 chilies (or as spicy as you like🔥) 5-7 pepper corn 3-5 cloves 1 cinamon stick 1 teaspoon cumin seeds 4-5 garlic pods 1 piece ginger  For Cooking: 150 gms Soaked Soya bean 1 large onion 1 large tomato 2 potatoes 1/2 bowl green peas…

Goan Beef Meatball Curry  Many of you who have had this dish at my home or at my restaurant have requested this recipe for a while now,so I thought why not Spread the Love.  This has been a favorite recipe in my husbands house for generations.  I traditionally use beef but you can use mutton or chicken mince.You can even buy readymade meatballs of your choice at a store if you want convenience and don’t want to get your hands dirty.  Ingredients: 1 Large Onion chopped 1 medium size ginger chopped 8-10 cloves garlic chopped Handfull of corinader chopped 3-4 chopped chilies 1 tsp salt 1 tsp pepper 1 egg 250 gms mince  Masala: 10-12 red kashmiri chilies 1 tbsp mistard seeds 2 cinnamon sticks 1/2…

Goan beef mince in Vindaloo masala  Ingredients: 1/2 kg beef mince 1 big onion (finely chopped) 1 big tomato( finely chopped) 1 big potato ( cut in small cubes) 1 cup of fresh or frozen green peas Half cup of freshly chopped coriander  Vindaloo masala: 8/10 Kashmiri chillies 6/8 garlic pods 1 small pc of ginger 1 inch cinnamon stick 6/8 peppercorns 6/8 cloves 1/4 tsp of turmeric pwd Grind all the above in vinegar to a smooth paste Salt to taste  Preparation: …
Hi Guys,  Thank you for your kind words and support on my last video. As promised I will be posting simple and easy recipes as often as I can.  Crispy Fish stuffed with Green Masala  Green masala:  1/2 tsp cumin seeds 1/2 tsp pepper corn 1/2 tsp turmeric powder Small piece ginger 5-6 garlic pods 4-5 green chillies 1 bunch coriander 1 bunch mint 1 piece of lemon  Fish Marinade: 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 cup Rava(semolina)  Grind all the masala ingredients into a smooth thick paste. Slit the fish from both sides then evenly rub salt and stuff with the green masala. Take the stuffed fish and gently coat in rava. Fry on medium high heat for 10-15 mins.  Good to go with a simple Dal and Rice! Party Tangy Chicken😍  Hey Guys so this recipe I will be sharing today is a Family friendly Chicken Gravy that is perfect for all ages.  From the young ones to the oldies I bet you'll be smacking your fingers with this recipe 😁  It is also a super duper easy recipe to follow👍😍  Chicken Gravy: 1/2 kg Chicken 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste 1 tsp pepper powder 1/2 cup tomato ketchep 1/4 red color 1 lemon (squeezed) 1 tbsp chili powder 1 tsp salt  2 tbsp corn flour 1 tsp roasted fenugreek (kastoori methi)  Marinate the chicken with all the ingredients except corn flour and the fenugreek leaves for 15-20 mins. I always wanted to have something similar to ALBaik ( Saudia ) in Pakistan and finally got to know that The Sauce have launched Patakha Chicken. I order from them often and their food is always fresh so tried this Patakha Chicken and I must say it was toooo close to Albaik’s spicy fried chicken. Perfect blend of masala and crisp. And the cherry on the top was it’s dip. I would rate this Patakha chicken 10/10. And it is a must try for all those who loves Albaik’s food. Location: SIndhi Muslim Society

So I am on a spree to try Indian Cuisine in Karachi wherever I can find. So that took me to D'Thaliland at Hussainabad. I was so ignorant that I was calling it D’Thailand all the time till the waiter listened and corrected me and left me embarrassed 😳.  It was my first time at Hussainabad Food street as for past few years I was more of pull k is par guy and amazed to see it was so jam packed mtlb raat 1 bje Din nikla hoa t.  When it comes to foods it was so balanced and up to the point. It wasn’t our spicy Pakistani food it was different in its own way and keeping all the spices very balanced. Almost everything was good . We had a Dhokla, Plate of Pani puri, Pav Bhaji , Masla Dosa, Mix thali and 3 drinks for around Rs.1500. It was economical and worth the money.  In the end we top it up with Rabri with hot Gulab Jamun on top from a Stall, somewhere in between the food street .  Next stop Will be Mirchilli.

Living in that part of city which everybody claims as Duniya ka Aakhri kona (Gulshan e Maymar) it is really hard to find any good fast food outlet. Many fast food outlets and franchises are present here and in the start their quality is exceptional but suddenly it starts to go down. Fish Corner is the only Fast Food outlet on whom I can rely,their Special Club Sandwich at 250 Rs is more than enough for me and the best part is their quality is consistent. Tried their Special Club Sandwich for the first time 3,4 months back and now it is my go to fast food outlet in Maymar. Ppl living in Maymar should definitely give it a try.  P.S: Pic is from their Facebook page cuz jab bhi yeh ata hai pic lenay ka time nahi hota.

WHY is Koyla chai so underrated? It's amazing! The warm bright sun on a cold evening made for an absolutely lovely day out. 😍 The view and the weather were perfect. It's been ages since I tried out a new chai place and I'm soooo glad I did. We ordered: Pizza fries Alu bunkabab. Blue colada. Caramel macchiato.  Everything was great. Pizza fries were EXCELLENT! Our total was around 1500 with tip which was worth it. If you order chai instead of the drinks, it'll probably be half of what we paid.  Service was good. I saw them sanitising tables when we entered and that made me very happy because it meant that I didn't have to. 😂❤️

On my spree of trying Indian cuisine in Karachi, after trying D'Thaililand, I went to Mirchili . The food was OKish not what I have expected after seeing so many reviews on SWOT.  The Gappa Gotala was a really presentable or Instagramable dish but nothing fancy , it was a usual chaat which you can get anywhere plus the chick peas (Cholay) were cold as well which weren't enchancing the flavour as much as the hot ones do.  PavBhaji was good it would be much better if they use actual Pav instead of bun.  Khas Dhosa was better than the other food but nothing extraordinary. Coconut chutney was amazing though .  Bihari bun kebab was bland . It can be amazing if they use actual charcoal grilled Bihari…
Tired BBQ Chicken Bowl and Shanghai Beef Noodle Bowl from miyako and both were excellent. Both were true delight, perfect spice level . Chicken was so juicy and serving was huge! I couldn’t finish mine in one go.

Ordered last night from Burger wrap after reading the positive reviews in swot. Firstly the COLD food was delivered in 2 hours. One of the chicken crisp patty was burnt (even my cat refused to eat it). The flamin hot burger was soggy and was not anything like the details or pictures they provided. The fries were not edible. The chicken of alfredo pasta was dry and tasted like boiled chicken. The sauce of alfredo pasta was good with balanced flavours (THE ONLY GOOD THING). Quantity 8/10 Quality 4/10 Costed 1350 with dc.

This Friday me and my family went to have dinner at a newly opened eatery Gidaan-Balochi Cuisine We ordered dumpukht both chicken and mutton, balochi tikka and chicken Malai boti... Since we didn't knew anything abt balochi cuisine, the owner, mr.Taimoor was kind enough to guide us through the menu and asked us to try balochi qawa taalcha... It had a really different and soothing taste and was perfect for this weather.... Then came in our food and we all were impressed with the taste... Malai boti was really tender and yummy... Both the dumpukhts were perfectly made, the rice were very aromatic and the meat was very tender and juicy... My favourite was the balochi tikka with plum chutney... I really had to stop myself from eating it... In the end we had green tea and doodh pati which was good too... All in all its a really good place, due to covid restrictions we sat outside elsewise they have an indoor setup too... I would recommend you all to try it out and experience something different in Karachi in this awesome weather which we don't get to have a lot...

Best Dhumba Karahi in Karachi??
Visited JucyLucy located at KDA Scheme 1. It was sort of a hidden place & I was in doubt while following google maps. Turns out it was located at a very peaceful place with ample parking. They have a small & cosy dine out facility which I would rate one of the best in the city, as the environment is quite secure with almost no human & vehicle traffic around.  Coming to the food, tried sliders and slot dog. Talking about sliders (mini burger), I always love to see burger joints offering it, as it allows to try variety available on the menu. Taste was authentic & cheesy (as it should be) with no bombardment of fancy sauces. Patty was rich in taste. Overall it was a great treat.  Hot dog is rare to find, so without a single doubt we tried Slot Dog. It was impressive in taste, quality of sausage seems premium & was cooked to perfection, served with mustard & tomato sauce.  Service was prompt as food was served within 15 minutes.  Total cost with trio of sliders, slot dog & a cold drink was around 1800.

I have been looking for ghar ka khana in budget for office. Cauz tbh, roz roz ghar se khana nahin leja sakti thy me. Aur muje diet karnay ka shoq bhy charhgaya tha tou i wanted something low fat. Came through Fresh Way Foods. They have two lunch menu plans. One is standard (1100/week), and the second one was low fat (1500/week).  The owner literally took care of everything. Matlab from protein portion to multivitamins to calcium. She used to send nuts and raita in all the meals. And the food was cooked in Olive Oil.  Perfect for Office going people i’d say!

Basketude Co.  I was on the lookout for someone who would arrange an anniversary surprise for my husband. I fished around on SWOT, and came across this post about Basketude. I messaged them on Facebook, got an immediate response and multiple options for what i was looking for. The owner, is humble, polite, honest and sincere to the cause. She will take you through all options individually and be very clear from the very start if it disrupts the budget , so that there are no misunderstandings. I bugged her for an hour and a half atleast, and she remained patient and calm. She keeps you in the loop when preparing your order, so that you are happy, and she delivered right on time on the agreed time and date which felt surprisingly good. I had always been on the lookout for one such page since i live abroad and miss so many family birthdays, i am so glad to have a go to person now. Cheers to her!  P.S I am unable to tag the page, if someone can, that would be great

So I ordered from KEKOU just wanted to come here and review it. If you are craving for some desi spicy Chinese take out food this is probably one of the best I’ve had the food came hot & fresh, we got kekous special prawns and hot & spicy chowmein. The chowmein was way too good perfect amount of spices and the taste was on point I was satisfied 😌 The prawns on the other hand were new for me since I only tried their chowmein before but honestly I was surprised how the prawns were fresh and the taste was great too. Delivery came quick. It’s also light on pocket perfect for lunch and dinner if you are low on budget. Recommend. 💯

I would like to share my reviews on Mad Cheese .. I ordered Sandwich, Pasta and Pizza from Mad Cheese and I must say it was worth buying the meal. It was so cheesy, scrumptious and mouthwatering that one could hardly resist! 🤤 The Pizza was in Chicken Supreme n Jalapeno ranch Flavour, Sandwich was in Cheese'n'Smoke Flavour and Pasta was in Mushroom Flavour. All these three items were so yummy and delicious that I ordered thrice after that. Total damage was around 1800 and it was the best food I have ever had. I surely recommend ya'll must give it a try. Pizza was like full of cheese with their signature sauces and sriracha sauce on top and with the perfect crust below! ❤️ Pasta was delicious, full creamy and saucy with perfect blends of herbs. Sandwich was something which I tried for the very first time it tasted really different and with full chicken chunks, sausages, cheese, olives it was stuffed very rich with entirely different combination of pizza dough and stuffed chicken. It was one of my favourite.. 😋💕 Overall It was a great experience!

Went for dinner at SteaK_CFU located in phase 2 of DHA. Its a small place with clean environment. Chef was very humble and nice, she came to our table and listened what exactly we wanted as we decided to leave the place cause didn't understand the menu at the first place. Then she brought chicken and beef steak, exactly how we wanted it to be. Beef steak was the showstopper and it was very juicy and not chewy at all. Chicken stake was a little bit chewy but it was worth trying it. We had prawn salad as starter which was perfectly balanced with sauces and spices. Both the main course platters had baked potatoes, mushrooms, sauce and salad as slides. For satisfying our sweet tooth craving we had chocolate mousse and strawberry cheese cake. Ambiance: 6/10 Food:- Starter: 4.5/5 Chicken steak: 3.5/5 Beef steak: 5/5 Desert: 4.5/5 Bill was around 8k. which was definitely worth the taste and quantity

The Big H Review!! What I ordered - Atomic crunch (chicken) - Meaty Heaven - Devil Fries - Cheese bombers Atomic Crunch Burger with a secret sauce topped in a donut bun. I really loved how the chicken fillet was thick and big which is something I don't find in other burger places. The Donut bun was soft and tasted fresh. Chicken fillet was juicy and loved the flavor. Overall I'd rate it a 4.5/5  Meaty heaven Burger, very well seasoned patty and something that kept me hooked was the quality of the beef. Probably the freshest of all and they are using donut buns which unlike conventional buns weren’t breaking apart and were super soft.  the owner was there throughout taking feedback positively. I was looking for a nice place to have halwa puri nashta with my family, and happened to find this amazing restaurant at Tariq Road. Surprisingly, it was the inauguration of their breakfast menu today, and they NAILED IT! The puris taste so much better than the average ones we find around K-Town. Highly recommended if you're looking for some delicious halwa puri breakfast with an open and safe environment to have it with your family! ✨  At Lajawab Zaiqa (Tariq Road, right in front of Dolmen Mall gate no. 5)  #Karachi #breakfast #halwapuri
Recieved Panjeeri and Desi Ghee in the mail yesterday. Both the items are fantastic. However, the Desi Ghee is really something to write about. It's made differently, from churned yogurt rather than milk cream. That takes away the usual desi ghee 'odor/scent' that otherwise stops some people from consuming regular desi ghee. This one is for you urban lot. It's just pure desi ghee, minus the odor. More like butter actually.  Panjeeri is also very nice and hearty. With the usual assortment of dried fruits, nuts and semolina plus some other ingredients. It's all binded together by jaggery (Gurr) and the same desi ghee, so it's very light on both the palette and stomach. I've been munching every few minutes, and can't feel a thing.  Impressed every time a home chef does something different, especially when innovating quintessential desi fare!  Order from: https://m.facebook.com/2166847103382822

Saltage Steakhouse  Full disclosure: this review is based on a curated menu sampling that I was invited to and which I did not pay for.  Where our wonderful city has more than it’s fair share of burgers (the kind you eat), there isn’t that much choice for meat lovers to enjoy steaks. I suppose that’s fair too, considering that generally, people are now warming up to the concept that it is actually possible for a steak to be cooked at anything other than “well done” temperature. Recently, places like Steak CFU, Prime 109, Markhor etc are starting to experiment with the kind of meats and cooking techniques we’ve seen abroad - much to the relief of meat lovers!  Saltage adds another option to the…
I ordered this yummy plus effective kamar kas barfi from organicgrocery_19 it was very delicious plus it helps to overcome your pain best for old age people as well as in post pregnancy guy do try is out in Sha Allah you will not regret.
A good meal can be as euphoric as it can be fulfilling. The attention to flavor in each of the different meat dishes that were presented on our table tonight has put me in such a food coma that I have not experienced in a while in Karachi  Saltage Steakhouse was going to serve good food i never had my doubts. Sarmad Shahbaz Bughio knows his food and better yet knows HOW to put that in the flavors of the food he creates and serves. He has cooked for his friends often and we all know how good he is, and today the meal was phenomenal.  Mahvash Siddiqi Khan actually wished that Anjum Rahman Ehsan who was a little delayed....would not show up so she and i could be gluttons.  Basma Hussain-Ahmed Sabeen Rasool missed you both on every bite, I was just powered on to eat for your absence as well. I guess I will just have to go back with you two.  The BREAD & BUTTER PUDDING was complimentary from the Chef and thu we were too full to have thought of ordering it.....we swiped the plate clean, its the best B&B pudding in town

Discovered this dhabba style chai place recently, Pahari Chai. We got:  Chicken reshmi kebab: good, paired with a sada paratha and raita. Chicken cheese paratha: hot and crispy, very generously filled. Pizza fries: while these were fine taste wise, I wouldn't call them 'pizza' fries. Pahari tikka: very tender. Balanced spices too with a layer of cheese over the tikka. And it was pretty to look at (didn't get the top view pic) Kashmiri chai: wouldn't recommend this, maybe try their other chai instead.  Overall the food was quite decent and reasonable. Located near Continental Bakery in Johar. And it's a family place.

Providing it's customers a very swift and polite services with the best quality of food in #ReasonablePrices is something #desiadda is doing very perfectly🤗. I recommend the viewers of this post and real #foodies to visit #desiadda at least for once, and next time, automatically, it will be the only place you'll like to visit with your loved ones❣️.. Atmosphere: 10/10 Services: 10/10 Taste: 10/10 Place: #desiadda Karachi.

I ordered chinese from KEKOU Pakistan (smchs) yesterday for the 4th time. I called and placed the order but sadly they didn't deliver in my area so I asked the order to be picked by a careem delivery guy. The careem person didn't have enough cash on him to pay for the order so I called the kekou manager and asked for his account details so I could transfer the amount online. He said its okay you just take the food, eat and enjoy and pay later. I insisted but still he was adamant . That was something unusual but I was sold. I love the hot n spicy chowmein they have and the soup they serve. We ordered 1 chicken gravy, 1 beef gravy, 1 soup and chowmein. They had a 50% off offer going on. The bill was around 1510. Definitely ordering for the 5th time soon! Good job.
I ordered pizza from pizzeria and it was amazing, their chicken cheese peproni pizza was filled with cheese and very delicious. I ordered spicy hub and chicken cheese peproni. I was worried that my food will be cold due to this weather but they never disappointed it was so fresh hot and tasty as I always  Taste 10/10 Sevice 9/10

Molten lava Cake 🧁 10/10  had a good experience overall, wonderful ambiance, welcoming staff, amazing theme. A perfect place for a DATE🙈 I would say.😊  Would recommend to all. Total Bill 💸 was around 3.5k. Swap for more pics 😌

Ok so. We friends went for dinner at The Big Tree House after looking at people raving about its food and stuff. We ordered fish and chips , Guacamole chicken something and Greek Pasta. Talking about food. It was BELOOWWWW AVERAGEE!!! The spinach in that chicken dish ( pic not attached ) was literally gone wrong. But fine it was just a side. Ignored. Fish and chips obviously no one can go wrong with it. Just a basic dish. PASTAA??? A NO NO. We sent that back twice and we could actually see the chef getting raged. And it felt lile we were just a couple of minutes away from being kicked out lol. The person who claimed to be one of the owners listened to the complain. Called the chef and he literally denied. As if it was the first time we were having Pasta? Hello? Just want to share a. Review honestly that the chef should atleast listen what the customer wants. Adding OREGANO in pasta won't solve the matter. Totally a waste of food. Money. time.

Went to The Lounge Restaurant on Saturday, ordered Club Sandwich & Pizza Fries. Loved the ambience but taste was average.
Tried desi food at Al Makkah Hotel Al Asif Square. We had to travel 50 minutes each side to get there and back. All the travel was totally worth it. We ordered Mutton(dumba) Tikka, Rosh. Kabuli Pulao. The meat was so tender and juicy. I had this Rosh dish for the first time. It came with a yakhni ka bowl. Absolutely amazing dish. Kabuli pulao was also well cooked. Then we had another one of their delicacies--Qawah with gur, which certainly helped digest the food. The whole dinner cost us around Rs 2700, split four ways. For desi food lovers, this is the place to be. It is on one edge of Karachi, sure, but totally worth-going.

Today we went to Lalu Khet and got a chance to taste the hyped Ghousia Nalli Biryani - Ghosia Food Center and Pakwan house  Experience was fine as I didn't have much expectations, heard many mixed reviews. Biryani was just ok, nalli was very fresh and stuffy, the best part was the behavior of their staff, they were so humble, polite, friendly and actually valuing the customer. This made it so special. The server also recorded his message, a slogan.

Fans of donuts burger in Gulshan here is our fix THE BIG H opened up a small joint in Gulshan block 4 near disco bakery  As i always enjoy experimenting with flavours and this donut burger was a treat.  Beef burger pepperoni priest was true treat to me. Coming to the size of the burger, the two patty filling was good enough it’ll be best to go for an extra patty. With this amazing blend of sauce idk what it was made of, perfectly seasoned beef patty and a slightly sweet donut ( though u do have an option to keep it non glazed)  Atomic crunch burger is treat to chicken lovers!!  The devil fries and onion rings were great too the dips are a plus.  All in all food was 9/10 must try GULSHAN-ites!  A reasonably priced joint with some tasty fast food !!
Finally tried the newly open pizza restaurant at SMCH Yellow Taxi Pizza Co. After hearing reviews about their three layered pizza we gave it a try' Totally a perfect spot to bless your taste buds with their delicious signature three layered pepperoni pizza' the dough was soft and toppings were generous. Its a must try for all pizza Lovers 💕The ambiance is pretty' cozy and small yet fun.✨ Reasonable deal is going on which offers 10inch medium pizza and two 345ml drink in just Rs: 795 🙂
So ! Finally went to So Gusto Wow the fries was very delicious i ever Had ..  If you really craving a burger with 140g of juicy double patty meat thats so soft that it literally melts in your mouth in every bite.  Taste 09/10 Services 10/10

#Review_Time So today after our final on-campus examination we went to House of Burgers (HOB)-Maskan. We were 5 people so we ordered their deal in which they were serving 2 Krispers in 400/-. We ordered 6 Chilli Mayo Krispers,2 loaded fries,1 cheesey jalapeno fries and drinks. Quantity was enough for us. Krisper was upto the mark. 10/10 Loaded fries were good in taste. 9/10 Cheesey jalapeno fries weren't that much good. It simply had only mayo sauce on it. 7/10
To bhae scenario yeh ha k recent influx jo burger joints ka hua ha Karachi ki market ma, us sa competition next level chal raha ha. To review trend ko continue rakhtay huay baat kartay hain Burgerlounge ki.  Inki photography friendlist ma sa aik banday na repost ki thi, plus aik recent review ma khud in logo na apne food pictures comments ma post kari thien, aur list ma naam lanay k liye woh he tempting enough thien. Chooti si sitting ka yeh restaurant sirf sitting tak he chota ha! Order tha aik Cheese Zango, aik Cheese Chickenester aur Loaded Fries.  Loaded fries ki baat karoun to they were really good, aur is visit ka sab sa acha item tha. A very good combination of sauces, jo dono fries aur…
