After watching so many reviews and snaps of Sobremesa we decided to try it. As it was a saturday night it was packed but we got a table after 10-15mins of waiting. We were 3 people so we ordered 2 medium deep dish pizzas. •Chicago fire 4/10. It was the most recommended one by everyone and their most running flavor but it was really disappointing as the filling was not adequate and felt like we were just eating a big bakery pizza with added toppings. •Pepperoni 8/10. It was good with the red sauce and the beef. P.s the quantity wasn’t good as we had 4 slices each and even the manager said “Zyada nahe mangwalia aap ny” but we were still hungry after this lol. Service was really good 9/10. The bill was around 3900 for 2 medium pizzas and a large water bottle which tbh is kinda expensive for just pizzas. Definitely Overrated and not worth the hype!!

Went to howdy's last night. One of my favorite restaurants which offers a wide variety of yummy burgers ranging from chicken to beef at reasonable prices. We were 4 people and got our hands on following dishes. For the starter we had Chicken popers which were very crispy and tasty.  In the main course we had Rango tango burger Rodeo glory beef burger Creamy mushroom steak Bone marrow steak  Lastly in desert we had Chocolate 3 milk cake  Amongst the main dishes I absolutely loved the bone marrow steak. Everything was super amazing.  I am really satisfied with their service and they have awesome taste and quality.  But, by and large, the howdy still remains zabardast! HOWDY DHA Karachi

I ordered Broadway’s Chicken Calzone and BBQ Ranch Pasta from Broadway’s Mix n Match deal. I was worried my food will be cold because of the weather here in Karachi but it was delivered absolutely hot, fresh and right on time. Their new calzone had a decent serving size and the rich flavors made it one filling meal! The good old bbq ranch pasta was delicious and creamy like always.  Overall I’d say this deal is great value for money and can easily serve 2 people (if you’re in the mood to share that is 😁)  Taste 9/10 Vaue for money 10/10 Delivery 10/10

YBC matka biryani #ybc #yahyabiryani .. went to this new place near airport called ybc restaurant.. the biryani tasted good.  I like to outside .. open seating .. but cudnt do it there since they had super loud live music being played with drums and piano.. so loud that families were unable to talk to eachothers.. i am all up for music while eating but not the song "koi kar ke bahana saanu mil soohniye".. some slow tabla or sitaar is something that can be a good mood changer.. rather then mehndi dance vibe  The serving was not enough.. the serving for 4 can hardly be enough for 3 persons  They do not accept payment from card and there was no disclaimer or headsup.. no atm near by so please carry cash.

All the things were really good in taste.  You will get a family kinda vibe from this restaurant with the delicious food in a such a reasonable price.  We waited a little bit extra but as it's new in the town we can ignore the waiting time. As there is always a room for improvements :)  Taste: 9/10 Quantity: 9/10 Total Price: 2260 pkr.

After seeing so many posts about the much hyped food joint Burger N' Barrel me and my friend thought to give it a try and man oh man, IT WAS WORTH IT. We ordered 1 Mack attack (beef) 1 Loaded x2 (beef) bec chicken burger bhi koi khaane ki cheez hai? And lastly their Loaded fries. The fries had a decent amount of chicken not entirely loaded but if you have an appetite of a chick (chooza) then it’s for you. The Mack Attack was juicy with good amount of mushroom sauce. 8/10 The loaded x2 was one of the best beef burgers I’ve ever had. It did justice to the name. It was loaded with jalapeños, cheese, sauces, and the juiciest beef patty. It's a must try if you want big burgers in reasonable… More

So the other day I bumbed a post in FB from Desilicous a home kitchen service and I thought let's give it a try and ordered their homemade khousey it's a Burmese dish. They take preorders so I was scheduled for next day delivery. Guys it was awesome something I never tasted in market and the quantity was good for two and they even put extra gravy with balance spice and tangyness. Everybody must try. Taste 10/10 value for money 10/10 hygiene 10/10 Ordered two Rs. 450 each delivery charges Rs. 150 We should support these home based ventures specially when someone offering awesome and hygienic products in good price.
Breakfast is that meal of the day that actually lifts your mood up and brightens up your day!!  Went to Rostilj with friends and OMG we absolutely loved everthing. It's a quaint little cafe that ain't fancy but serves a really good breakfast. They've got a variety of platters to choose from and you can even customise according to your choice.  We got Nutella waffles, chicken cheese grilled sandwich, sunny side up egg and a platter of nutella pancakes with hash brown, sausages, sautéed veggies and chicken and mushroom omelette. Loved each and everything specially the omelette, nutella waffles with icecream and grilled chicken cheese sandwich. *Drools* 🤤😍  This is definately a place where I see myself going again and again as its super reasonable. A platter costs anywhere from 400 to 595 depending on your preference! 🍳🥚🥪🥞🧇☕  https://www.facebook.com/the.rostilj/

Very creamy, sweet and crispy piece of cake ‘Malai Khaja’.  Its a ‘must have’ Mithai whenever you visit Karachi or who never had yet or for those who already live in Karachi.  “Malai Khaja” will cost you around PKR 800/- (for 1kg). They usually prepare one kg piece of Malai Khaja on pre-order basis.  I took 2 packets of Malai Khaja (half kg each).  Taste: 10/10 Cost Effective: ✅ Presentation: ✅

After hearing alot about Royal Jasmine, I decided to give their Sunday Brunch a try. Food aside, I would give them full score for the ambience they have created...Live Piano with a really good decor gives you really good and comortable vibes. The staff is very very cooperative, they'll always be on your side asking if you need anything and they'll also bring anything you ask from the buffet to your table if you request them. Coming to food now, they have live Egg, Puri, Paratha and Chai stations so you are always served hot and fresh. Usually Paaye are not that good in buffets but I loved the Paaye here. There was a lot of variety in breakfast including Cornflakes, Nihari and Chinese items.  Cost: Rs.1395 + Tax per person

Went Ramada Karachi Creek Hotel to try their Hi-Tea buffet and celebrate a friend's birthday. Tbh I was really nervous going there after reading mixed reviews on this page but I would gladly say it was a wonderful experience.  Food was amazing and fresh. Service was upto the mark but when it got busy their service also got a bit late but not too much. Cherry on top was the Live Music. It created an amazing ambiance with good food and drinks. They were offering discount on 5 guests. Rest you can see in the video.  Needless to say it was a good experience for me with amazing variety of desserts.  **P.s. After COVID-19 experience: Not as good as the previous one. Food wasn't as tasty as before. And no Background singing too. Fyki.

We only tried hot chocolate this time but the one thing that matters the most is good customer service and friendly staff which altogether makes every experience way better and worth it; All of this was clearly evident in their team. Hats off.  They have a good range of hot and cold beverages but somehow a little range of snacks which I hope they will increase in near future.  A very must try!

Hello everyone!  After ordering Alvigha quite many times during the last lock down, my friends and I really wanted to try out their newly opened dine-in place. Well tbh, it totally lived up to my expectations. The food was served piping hot, the taste was unique and heavenly, as usual. Though due to the in-door dining closed, the arrangement is made outside, which can be improved a little.  About the food we ordered;  Shahi BBQ Platter: Included all the kinds of BBQ items that one can think of, served with rice (picture is attached below). This was absolutely amazing. Loved almost all the items. This serves up to 6-7 persons.  Chicken Tikka Leg piece: It was juicy, a bit spicy, and full of flavors.  Despite the good taste, they need to work on their service. The waiters weren't responding timely but this may have happened due to the rush.  Overall, it was a pleasant experience and a nice place to spend a Saturday night.  Restaurant: Alvigha  Food: 9/10 Ambiance: 7/10 Service: 7/10 Value for money: 9/10  Location: Opposite Broadway (Gulshan), near Continental Bakery.

I want to share my wonderful experience of working with @cakesaaz .They provided us with wonderful services at reasonable rates. We are living in Canada, I and my husband planned to surprise our relatives in Pakistan. We contacted a few bakeries which provide online delivery services, none of them was ready to make a custom fondant cake of 2.5lb.  We heard about @cakesaaz and sent them photos of the cakes which we wanted to get ready for our relatives. They made exact cakes what we wanted and they delivered all cakes to the doorstep of our relatives on time. It was an amazing experience to get their services from abroad. Many thanks to Cakesaaz, we will surely try them again.

Finally I got the opportunity to try the Hi Tea at The Patio It has been the talk of the town for a while now and seeing frequent reviews about its Hi Tea brought a crescendo of excitement in me to try it once.  Timings were 4-7 pm ( every Thu, Sat) Though we reached 5 mins before 4 pm but it started approx 15 mins late.  The menu was just amazing and wholesome. They had options of non veg and veg in almost everything. I loved the quiche and the pasta. Tres leches cake was mind blowing. And I finished everything off with the tantalising apple pie and a side of whipped cream and coffee.  The waiters were such amicable people also the lady in white there, she was on her toes all the time serving people hot food and also inquiring if she could bring anything to their tables. She asked us too if everything was perfect and which actually was. Not exaggerating here but it was the hi light of all the Hi teas of my life. Like the Hi tea to trump all the Hi teas. Glad to end 2019 on a glorious note!

If you are fond of spicy Dehli cuisine then this place is surely for you to try Dehli style paaye. Mazedar haleem is not only serving the best Haleem in Karachi since decades but also has authentic paye which is only available on Sunday. Tried their paye very 1st time and I must say it was so delicious n worth trying, the paye curry was viscous and the blend of spices were also balanced. It is an ideal place to have desi breakfast at very economical price with a better quality, ambience and service. Total bill was 280 for 2 persons including tea Thanks so much to all those members who recommended me this place. ☺️ Suggestion: You might need to ask them to serve you warm meal as I experienced it was not properly heated.

So we visited Southside Pizzeria after reading a review here on swots last night. It's located in Gulshan, near Maskan. We were 15 friends and decided to order 4 of their 20inch pizzas. I must say their pizzas are amazing! 😍 The dough and crust is not too thin, but also not too thick. The toppings and flavors that they're presenting are amazing. We ordered Southern BBQ, Showdown Rancher and Jalapeño Rush. All three flavors were so different than what other pizza restaurants are giving. They suggested us to order the Ranch flavor in 2 jumbos because its their signature flavor and it has everything that a signature flavor must have. We loved it and thank God for Gulshan finally having a new Pizza place. Our new favorite place definitely 😍😍 Sorry for not a lot of pictures. We only took pictures of the BBQ flavor because the other pizzas didn't last too long 😂😂

✨The Eat Street✨  In a mood for authentic street food? The Eat Street is a great place to satisfy that Desi food craving🥰 • Really helpful staff, extremely clean and cute little place, really fast service (just took them 5-6 mins to prepare a lot of food😲) and most importantly, it follows all the SOPs! •Delicious authentic Pakistani street food served in a hygienic way with amazing prices 👌🏻 • Wasn’t really ever a fan of bun kabab and shawarma...always wondered the hype about it in Pakistan🧐until I finally tried it here and came to like it 🤩 Always a fan of pani puri... so I was really surprised when I saw them serve it in a completely new way as “pani puri shots” ! It looked so appealing🥰Do give it a try

Little known but amazing place of young, and skilled chefs,working under one roof of Knead Cafe located at shahrah e noor jahan north nazimabad,since the place has not been advertised in masses so very few people know about them,i visited two times and found consistency in quality and taste,today i went for breakfast there and ordered their special pizza paratha and halwa poori out of number of others breakfast items,I am confidently recommending you all to visit and have a good time. Open air,rooftop,great ambiance,staff is so friendly,comfortable environment,prices are bit high but food quality and quantity is upto expectations. Delicious pizza paratha,loaded with cheese,sauces,chicken,mushrooms,olives with mouth watering taste,you can say one of the best in town. This had mushrooms, olives and chicken strips in it, cooked to perfection in an aromatic pasta sauce (that is their trade secret) however, i do requested to add a dash of sugar to mine, so they did and WALLAH, MAZA AGAYA!  Studio is located at Mohammed Ali Society and is in easy reach for people looking for tasty lunch options (like me) working near/on Shahrah e faisal. i got it delivered though, in 30 mins to my work place.  Total cost: 370 PKR only.
Ordered these amazing box full of flavoured popcorns from Korneez 2 weeks back...i wanted to try all the flavours and then post a review.  Normally flavoured popcorns are over priced but there popcorns are very reasonably priced. All the flavours were so delicious and crunchy. Superb flavourful and fresh popcorns. Butterscotch, caramel peanut, toffee and plain popcorns are just WOW. Even their customer service is amazing and my order was delivered in 2 working days with free gift. This is the most suitable snack from kids to adults to seniors. Snack on the go!!  I highly recommend them...must try. Feel free to contact me if any further information required.

But when i order from the same restaurant via foodpanda, the food (70% of orders) is always cold and soggy.  I will appreciate if you justify this fact through some logical statement because afterall we all want to order through foodpanda but this issue makes us reluctant from doing so.  Regards.

Craving for Fresh Seafood? Rashid SeaFood is the right choice for you! It’s a roadside restaurant where you have to select fish and prawns of your choice (any seafood you like) and you can tell them how would you like your fish/prawn to be grilled/fried/bbq/karahi and they cook exactly like it. In frame Grilled Fresh Fish and Fresh Prawn Karahi and ahh that fresh fish and prawns tastes like ahmaaaazing 🥺 You can buy fresh raw seafood too. I’d rate it 9/10 minus one point as they take 1 hour to get your order Whenever you are in Karachi and craving for seafood this is a must visit place. It’s located in Kiamari

Visited Alaska Restaurant Clifton for a friend's birthday. One of the worst experiences ever. First, the waiters could not understand the orders properly, and were too unprofessional. The food didnt take long to arrive, but one of our friends ordered moroccan beef steak and what he got was moroccan grilled chicken..And RICE instead of FRIES. Another friend who ordered chicken hotshots from the appetizers recieved her order way after we all had recieve ours. The food was served cold. Quantity was miserably less..Like I could literally count on the penne inside my pasta..Cherry on the top..Food didnt even taste good. Mexican pasta was way too tangy, peach and strawberry lagoon was substandard while the steak was the worst steak my friend ever had according to him. In the end when we complained alot they gave us 30% off which was a fine gesture from them but it was someones birthday and we wanted it to be perfect. Portion: 5/10 Taste:6/10 Service:6/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!

We ordered beef and chicken and both were too good, really well spiced and obviously not dry. It's become our regular spot ❤️ They deliver it (in picture) and it comes steaming hot.

Brace yourselves for a long review post. So, me and my wife had been preparing for our son's first birthday since the day he was born. No really, trust me. We had done eleven photoshoots of him on the sixth of every month prior to his birthday. We had covered several themes for his photoshoots and had been wondering what our final theme would look like. So, before we decided to settle down with "Marine Life" for his first birthday, we started looking for some of the finest Cake Artists in town. And while the search was on, someone from here and my friends list recommended Cake Artist Maria. Begum and I took a chance with her, seeing positive reviews and my God, did she not justify the hype! The cake looked and tasted unreal. Was stoked to see how good of a job she had done. Will definitely recommend her services to everyone. As for the setup, it was completely designed by my wife and I. We didn't hire anyone since we had been designing his monthly photoshoot themes for a long time.

Plus they have a good variety of Parathas and we tried their Zinger and Mac & Cheese paratha both were really good but the "Mac & Cheese" took my heart, it was so cheesy and so scrumptious and i have truly become a big fan of it 🤤  I will recommend you guys to atleast try their mac and cheese once and honestly you will thanks me later! 😁  Location: Khadda Market, DHA

If we divide the cost per person, this costed 500 per head for JUST biryani. Total rip off! and the management replied that "sir jo h yeahe h itna he hota h apko kuch aur b mangwana chayea tha sth". Whyyyy would I do that! The serving size for 8 people was not even enough for 6 people! Seriously not recommended!

Malai boti was so soft and juicy, it was melting in my mouthh but the best part was Salmon fish. I never had such fish before. Everything was so hygenic and tasty and the damage was just Rs. 550. I was thinking jab bahir isi rate pr almost sab milta ha, why not order it from here where hygiene is guranteed. They have started delievery and takeaways now. I would highly recommend their food, specially their fish. Just to make it clear for everyone delivery and takeaway is for everyone including civilians. Location Services Mess Karachi

https://www.facebook.com/Midtownbiryani/  They have a post on their Facebook page stating " There is no love sincerer than the love of Biryani" With Midtown Biryani , this is absolutely true. Totally left us all speechless!! What to say about the combo of spices, chicken and rice. My friend and I had dinner at Ginsoy SMCHS two days ago and I wanted to specifically post to appreciate their customer service.  We were seated outdoors. As for my experience, the soup I ordered wasn't warm/steaming as it should have been, so I requested them to heat it up but they replaced it with a hot soup immediately. Lastly, when we requested to pack our leftovers, they did pack it but somehow accidently misplaced it. In order to make up for it, they reordered our meals and packed it for us. We did have to wait an extra 15 minutes for it, but the way the manager/supervisor apologetically asked us to wait for the takeaways, I was immensely pleased by the way they handled the situation despite the rush and Covid restrictions.

Jesa likha tha wesa he paya sukoon wali jagah bilkul plus khana bhi zabardast, A rooftop open air restaurant with perfect environment, great ambiance and food even better. Recently, we tried Khausey and Dosa from Khao Dosa.  Khausay: Authentic, fresh and good proportions. Compared to khausas from other restaurants, they are more of a Burmeese style as the taste of scrumptious coconut milk curry was prominent but balanced with other flavours. Very homemade like. Owner told us it is their family recipe inherited from their ancestors from India.  Dosa: Tried the 'Classic Dosa'. Taste connects you with the basics of what a simple dosa is made of. Spices are well balanced and do not push away the yummilicious fusion of crunchy dosa wrap and mashed potatoes. Lives up to it's nomenclature.  In conclusion, it is a must try for every dosa and khausa lover. A better choice for those who are monotonous of khausas and dosas with too many confusing flavours in one meal. They left a fine aftertaste that gave me a craving to have them again.  Prices: 1 Classic Dosa with Sambar - 290/- 1 Chicken Khousey - 350/-  Location: Chota Bukhari, DHA, Karachi.
Tried these items from newly opened fastfood restaurant Hunger On Peak in Gulzar-e-Hijri scheme 33. The best thing is that they are serving broast cheesy garlic nan/garlic bread/garlic bun(whatever) instead of simple bun which is very tasty which is not being served by anyother small restaurant. The broast pieces are very big specially chest in this time when chicken is 400-450/kg. Price are of course normal. 220 leg, 240 chest. Also tried zinger burger. It was very juicy and crispy. I highly recommend yoi to try their broast with garlic bun. Must try  Location: Gulzar-e-Hijri, telecom exchange wali line ya police station wali limey, naalay kay barabar wala wala project (Poineer Castle), White House kay saamne
Just ordered Southside Pizzeria at home. And tell you what hype is for real i tried their habanero mayhem it was too good crust and topping was unexpectedly awsome Taste:10/10 Service:10/10 Location : Maskan  Ps: this is not paid.
The best gol gappas in Karachi!  Here’s the location: Mashallah Shadab Gol Gappay & Chat Federal B Area Block 11 Gulberg Town, Karachi, Karachi City, Sindh https://goo.gl/maps/X4atMWF3d9bY13b86
Who seves best bbq platter for 3 to 4 persons

The Vittles Company. Cream cheese. This is probably the best product to emerge from the whole import substitution movement. It's smooth, and tastes rich and creamy, with just a bit of acidity. It's got no sugar, so that's a win. It's the type which you spread out on warm toasted bread for a quick breakfast.  This is a great product, at a super price. You get a full 300g tub for like PKR 550, which is basically at a 65% discount (on a per gram basis) to the smuggled Philadelphia. Always buy local (if quality is at par).  Here is to hoping they maintain the quality, and scale up distribution. May the cream with Mr. Vittles.  P.S. picture from the Facebook page, too lazy to take a half decent picture.

First dine-in at 'Colette, by Xanders' was a let-down.  The mains were misleadingly dull. Beneath the semblence of fancy menu listings, and extensive veneer work on the plates (splashes and sprinkles here and there) there wasn't much truth in the pudding itself.  The buckwheat crepes were overcooked, flavors disorderly and portions not as liberal as one would've liked them to be. Hot chocolate and dessert were the saving grace of the evening.  One does not expect such humdrum from the house of Flo and Xander's. Counting on Colette to see if it improvises and lives up to the repertoire that its pedigree entails.

Review: Pie in the Sky ( Gulshan Branch)  I've ordered a 6 pound cake for my baby's 1st birthday. Found it smaller in size and asked them to please weight it, upon placing it on the scale it was almost a pound less. The guy said there's a minor difference in weight, i told them that its almost 1pound less. They said to buy something else as compensation, i asked for refund and they actually refunded me 1250 which was the rate per pound.  The cake was undoubtedly good in taste,but my point here is, how many of us actually check it before leaving with the cake. Big names should act responsibly when people are trusting them

My family and I are huge coffee fans of coffee and as it is winter nowadays we decided to try this outlet named Coffee Wagera. I had also heard many great things about this place and believe me they are all true. The staff there, are really nice and they warmly welcomed me in. There was a guy named Altamash who was very kind and tender-hearted. He listened to me very attentively and did whatever I asked him to do. He even offered me a chair so that I wouldn’t have to stand, waiting for my drinks. I ordered mocha and iced mocha and both the drinks tasted amazing. My overall experience was superb. The staff was also very cautious as all of them were wearing masks and gloves to ensure the least amount of covid-19 spread. I really recommend this place to anyone out there wanting a delicious cup of coffee. It is a great addition in our city for all the coffee lovers.

Hi guys, so I want to talk about a burger place that I ignored for the longest time and based off of customer reviews on foodpanda, I recently decided to give it a shot, I’m talking about BigThick Burgerz here. I ordered their spicy Arizona burger meal and I was blown away by the fact that they’re actually serving GOOD QUALITY CHICKEN! It’s shameful that this has become a quality standard, as this should really be a prerequisite for any food business. Over the next week or so I tried a couple of other burgers from them (one was beef) and the other was a Zinger style Boston creamy burger, again, the food was fresh, the taste was great and more importantly, the quality of beef was truly amazing.  Whether you like the taste of an eatery or not, paying 600-800 bucks for a burger meal, you should at the bare minimum, get good quality chicken/beef. Something that I feel you don’t get at quite a few places charging between the mentioned bracket.  So this is a genuine shout out to the guys at BTB, keep at it! 😁👌

ATTENTION TO ALL GULSHAN BLOCK 11 PEOPLE  We won't be deprived of a good biryani anymore. 💖 A new biryani eatery named as Biryani House has been open in our premises. Rightnow they are offering Chicken Biryani and Chicken Pulao. We had their biryani yesterday and let me tell you its so so good. The flavours are so tempting and have that classic biryani aroma. A little oily but very chatpati and masaledar. They even tried to make their place pretty and chic with good sitting arrangements. Moreover people living near this area can order it on home delivery. Price of Biryani: Rs.100 (promotional price till tomorrow) Price of Raita: Rs.20 Price of Salad: Rs.20 Highly recommended 💖

Today me and my friends visited Delfrio Gulshan for my birthday celebration, all thanks to their amazing team it went awesome. I would add they are quite friendly and cooperative and they even played the happy birthday song for me 😂 and provided a sparkling candle as a small token of kindness.  Which brought a smile to my face, the ambiance was perfect especially the area for the celebration. The only problem we faced while we were dining was the lack of artificial air (fans) 😂 it was a hot day, so we needed fans obvio.  Let's talk about food, presentation 10/10 Quantity 10/10 Smell 10/10 😂  Perhaps I was too hungry, depends on your tastebuds though. Tempting in sight, divine in taste.  Items  (Starter) Peri Bites 10/10 spicy enough to spark your taste buds.  (Main course) Morrocan chicken 10/10 Mexican Chicken 9/10 Fettuccine pasta 10/10 Beef Lasagna 10/10  Mint lemonade (refreshing ) and cold drinks.  Bill was around 5,300 I lost my slip... Highly recommend this place, make a reservation in advance to avoid inconvenience :)

If I could give 50 stars to a home baker in Karachi ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I would definitely give to BarSal cakes & snacks for making my nephews dream cake!  I contacted the lady after reading a review here on swot and requested her last night to bake and deliver a cake today. I knew it was a super short notice but to my surprise she was willing to make the cake and deliver. I only shared a picture of the cake I wanted and she made exactly how I had requested her.  Also, she promised to deliver at 8 PM but the delivery took a little longer which I later found out was because the riders bike got kharab on the way and then she had to come with her husband to deliver it. It was a really sweet gesture!  Honestly, if you are looking for a custom made cake, look no further and contact her immediately. I contacted so many bakers and found her cakes to be the most economical and neat looking!  Thank you BarSal cakes. We really loved every bit of the cake!  I am definitely ordering again iA 🙂

Today, I visited a new food outlet opened in Gulistan e Johar named BIHAREEZ, they are offering take away and delivery. I ordered beef burger, overall it was a good experience, proper Covid SOP were followed, cleanliness was evident, pleasant behavior of staff, my burger was ready in 15minutes, packing was nice. The taste was different as it was a BIHAREE flavoured burger 'a fusion of biharee beef and traditional beef burger' I loved the taste and juicy flavor, along with french fries which taste far more better than available in so called international franchises. I would say it's a MUST TRY and specially all those who are BIHAREE BOTI and KeBAB Lovers who would have a new and different option in same BIHAREE flavour.... All those who are searching for something new to try I would recommend them to try BIHAREEZZZ......🙃🙂🙃🙂

I have had shawarma in UAE and its not the closest in fact the same as what’s available there. Also price is hell reasonable and presentation is also same as how they serve in UAE. Who has tried Mr. Burger in Karachi?  Its the original Karachi’s own burger chain, long before any foreign chains arrived, it was the most popular gourmet fast food at the time.  Did you know that the branch at Boat Basin Clifton is the only original one, owned by the original owners? The rest are all franchises.  Sadly they don’t have any online presence, just a google page, with their restaurant phone number.  Mr. Burger at Boat Basin Clifton has the best burgers juicy and succulent with their unique mustard and sauces, dripping cheese, and their fries are crispy with their unique flavor, better than any foreign franchises, any day!  Please do visit them and try their original burger, it is still one of the top five burgers in Karachi!  Address: Boat Basin Clifton Near the Aga Khan Community Center.  Phone: 021 35835975

P.F. Chang's Pakistan is one of the finest Chinese restaurants in Karachi, always known for a better Chinese taste. Most Chinese restaurants in Pakistan have a Pakistani taste in Chinese food but, they are among those very few restaurants that are still able to carry "Chinese" flavor to their dishes. I would highly recommend anyone reading this to go and experience exquisite Chinese cuisine:  Tempura-battered tossed with a sriracha aioli- 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐒𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐦p🍤  Crisp prawns, tossed in a spicy chili butter- 𝐒𝐚𝐥𝐭 & 𝐏𝐞𝐩𝐩𝐞𝐫 𝐏𝐫𝐚𝐰𝐧𝐬  Wok-tossed with egg, carrots, bean sprouts, green onion- 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐝 𝐑𝐢𝐜𝐞🍚 (The fillings were pretty mediocre though)  Drinks you should try: 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐰𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐆𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐞𝐫 𝐌𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐚 and 𝐏𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐌𝐨𝐣𝐢𝐭𝐨. These are literally heaven to your tastebuds! Very refreshing🥂🥂

CAFÈ BOGIE Did you also think Bogie was a cafe made inside a train compartment, with just snacks and beverages? Watch this...  The six compartments are private dining rooms with a huge open-air seating behind it. The menu has 70+ items. Their special Bogie Sandwich was similar to CloudNaan stuff but better; bbq prawns were super awesome; bbq chicken was good too.  Also got a chance to meet the owner and listen to his inspiring story - how he started it with just one compartment four years ago built it to a 100+ capacity restaurant. And some useful insights on potential coffee shop spots on I.I. Chundrigar Road 🙂  Ps. 2000 for all which was good for three! He didn’t let me pay for the kulfi!

This lady has just started a new startup right besides Al-Arab adjacent to Continental Bakery in main Gulistan-e-Johar which goes by the name of *SANDWICH STATION*. She sells many kinds of amazing sandwiches like chicken heaven sandwich, pizza sandwich, nutella sandwich and many more all while keeping the food as hygienic as she can. As you can see she stores all the ingredients in air tight containers and everything is as fresh as can be. Make sure to go and support this amazing startup the next time you wanna have a snack. Edit: the sandwiches started at 60 rupees and went upto around 200 rupees. The chicken heaven sandwich was for 100 rupees.

So this was purely an accidental discovery but we are glad we came across it. This is a rooftop restaurant in North Nazimabad Block B called 'Oriental Shinwari'. Ideal for family outing, great food, ambience even better. A calm, peaceful environment that you can't expect to have in the mid of the city. And in these lockdown days when indoor dining is not permitted and we don't have enough open air restaurants that offer amazing taste and a perfect ambience at the same time, it seems to be a great find. This place is located inside the Pakistan Rangers Officers' Club. We ordered their Shinwari special karahi and kabuli chicken pulao and both literally blew our mind. Also, their prices are quite reasonable. It's definitely going to be our fixed spot for Desi food in the future. Absolutely recommended!  Food: 9/10 Service: 8/10 Ambience: 12/10 (just to show how much I liked the calmness of the place :p)

Much needed review! Ever since the lockdown happened I was a bit sceptical when food deliveries resumed, all those fast food restaurants were clearing up their old stock and delivering stale food. I came across NOWONDERPK and since it was a new start up I was assured that everything would be fresh. Ordered the buffalo ranch pizza and it has got to be the best pizza I have had in a long while, since I dont like a lot of buffalo sauce I told them to add less of it and trust me the taste was not comprised! Ordered it again the second time today and the taste was exactly the same! This new food joint has won me over completely. Also ordered the cheetos chicken sliders, very rich in flavour and perfection in every bite, I was a bit concerned that the cheetos taste would empower the burger but this was definitely not the case. Highly recommend it! Do give it a try. P.s. Sliders ki picture nahi li was busy eating it ap unke page pe check karain P.p.s. they also give you alcohol swabs because safety first! No Wonder

The current ongoing Covid-19 pandemic has affected everyone's lives. One has to battle their problems only to have a better living.  Therefore, to cope up with such circumstamces, students from NUML University recently opened a small pop up stall in F-10 Markaz, named as Dice Fries.  Primary aim of setting up this stall is that they can fulfill their basic needs and pay their University fee.  If you show your support to them, pay a visit to their stall (F-10 Markaz) and try their menu, it will help them alot and ease their worries. Also, you will love their menu as it is very delicious and prepared by neat hands and in a clean environment. #environment #university #students #community #wellness #help #education

We cater to all businesses and retail customers that require premium cream cheese for baking, confectionaries and/or condiments for preparing high standard cuisine.  Our company's motto is to produce premium quality products to substitue highly priced imported products.  We have two sizes  300 GM bucket for Rs 550/-  1KG baker tub for Rs 1700/-  You can place your orders through  Facebook and Instagram @thevittlescompany  or  DM us on Whatsapp: 0316-VITTLES  The Vittles Cream Cheese is perfect for making baked/non baked cakes, cookies, & frostings! Went with my family to this new Balochi cuisine resfaurant 'Gidaan', opened just a week ago & located on main ittehad near sea view.  It was a very delicious food experience & something different. We tried mutton leg , mutton back chops, desi Murgh dumpukht(all 3 with rice) & beef seekh kababs, all made in traditional Balochi style. The eatery's very courteous owner Mr Taimur greeted us at the table, explained about the various dishes & helped select the menu for the night. He also suggested the traditional 'Taal cha' qehwa before the dinner which turned out to be a very refreshing hot beverage to have. Ended the dinner with again a nice cup of green tea. After the dinner their staff had us wash our hands right at our seats in traditional balochi style. (i have forgotten the name of the utensil but shared picture below).  This place is a very welcome addition, specially for mutton & dumpukht style food aficionados.  Not forgetting to mention, Covid related SOPs were properly being adhered to with with all staff working in masks & doing frequent sanitization.
Last night's family dinner at Alvigha... Literally the best BBQ we have ever had...fullstop.. Not only the BBQ even their rice were otherworldly.. A must visit for sure..  Taste 10/10 Service 8/10 (a bit slow) Ambiance ki to baat hi karna bekaar hai aaj kal..  Location: Gulshan, Block 2, near continental bakery..

کیا خبر کس جگہ پہ رک جائے....

Kia khabar kis jaagah pe ruk jayee..

Dekhoo saans ka etbaar na kerna!!
دیکھو سانس کا اعتبار مت کرنا.....!!!Us Din k baray mein Soncho !!

Islamic roman english/urdu quotes--


اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَصِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ

Hum Ko Seedha Rasta Chala Un Logo Ka Rasta Jin Par Apne In'aam Farmaya Hai(Surah. Al Fatiha)
Aalame Islam Ke 4 Raushan Sitaare
Hamara Maslak : Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamaat Hamari Dawat : Itteba Kitab Wa Sunnat Bar Tariqa e Aslaaf E Ummat. Hamara Nara : Ittehaad Ummat. Hamari Koshish : Ahya e Tauhid Wa Sunnat Aur Khatma Shirk Wa Bidat. Hamara Maqsad : Isha-at Maarofaat Wa Izaala-E-Munkiraat. Minjaanib : Majlis Tahaffuz Sunnat Wa Difa E Sahaba Radiallah Tal'a Anhum Andhra Pardesh.

Note :

 Is Istehaar Ka Mukammal Ihtaram Farmaye Niche Girne Se Aur Kisi Bhi Beahterami Se Bachaye. Is Me Ayat Quraaniya Aur Ahadees Mubaraka Tehreer Hai Isko Padhye Aur Chap Kar Dusro Tak Puhucha Kar Sawab Daarain Hasil Kijiye.


          Mohtaram Baradaraan E Islam Allah Ta’ala Ne Huzoor Akram Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Is Ummat Me Ibteda Hi Se Quran O Hadees Ke Beshumaar Maahir Ulama ,Fuqaha O Mujtahideen Ko Paida Farmaya , Jinho Ne Deen E Islam Ki Har Har Cheez Ki Tashreeh O Tehqeeq Kar Ke Deen Ko Mehfooz Farmadiya,Aur Deen E Islam Ko Guzashta Deeno Ki Tarah Jaahilo Aur Ulama E Soo’ Ki Hath Ka Khilona Banne Se Mehfooz Rakha . 

In Beshumaar Fuqaha O Mujtahideen Me Allah Ta’ala Ne Char Imamo (Imam Abu Haneefa, Imam Malik , Imam Shafai, Imam Ahmed Rah.Imahumullah) Ko Ummat E Muslima Ke Andar Be Inteha Maqbooliyat Ata Farmai Hatta Ke In Hazraat Ki Zindagi Me Bhi Aur Khusoosan Chauthi Sadi Se Lekar Sathwi Sadi Tak Ummat Ki Aksariyat Aur Athwi Sadi Se Lekar Chadhwi Sadi Tak Poori Ummat Quran O Hadees Ke Ahkaam Par Amal Ke Silsile Me In Charo Me Se Kisi Ek Ko Apna Rehbar O Rehnuma Tasleem Karti Aarah.E Hai. Ummat Ke In Charo Musallama O Muttfaqa Imamo Ki Mukhtasar Seerat Pesh E Khidmat Hai.



Imam E Azam Abu Haneefa (Rah.Matullahi Alaih)

: Ap Rah.. Hazrat Omer Farooq Razi Allahu Anhu Ke Abaad Kiye Hue Shahar Koofa Me 80 Hijri Me Paida Hue. Ap Rah. Ka Asal Naam Noman Aur Walid Ka Naam Sabit Hai. Hazrat Sabit Rah. Aur Unki Aulaad Ke Haq Me Hazrat Ali Razi Allahu Anhu Ne Barkat Ki Dua Farmai Thi. Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ko Aksar Ulama Ne Tabaeen Me Shumar Kiya Hai. [Al Bidaya Wan Nihaya 10/527] Imam Sahib Rah. Ke Watan Shahar Koofa Me 1500 Sahaba Ikraam Razi Allahu Anhum Tashreef Laye The.(Kitab Al Asmaa Wal Kuni 1/174)


Hazrat Ali Aur Ibne Masood Razi Allahu Anhuma Jaise Jaleelul Qadr Sahaba Koofa Me Kaiyi Saal Qiyam Farmaya[Siyar E Sahaba 7/600] Jiski Badaolat Ye Shahar Makke Mukarrama Aur Madine Tayyaba Ki Tarah. Quran O Hadees Ke Uloom Ka Itna Bada Markaz Ban Chukka Tha Ke Imam Bukhari Rah. Ne Ilm Ehadees Ke Liye Beshumaar Martaba Koofa Ka Safar Farmaya. [Hadi Us Saari 663]
Saheeh Bukhari Aur Saheeh Muslim Ke Sainkdo Muhaddiseen Koofa Hi Ke Bashinde The. Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ne Koofa , Makkah, Madina Waghair Ke Taqreeban 4000 Ulama O Muhaddiseen Se Quran O Hadees Ki Taleem Hasil Farmayi Jin Me Sab Se Mashhoor Hazrat Hamma Rah. Hain, Hammad Rah. Ke Ustaad Ibrah.Im Nakhee Rah. Hain, Unke Ustaad Hazrat Alqama Rah. Hai Aur Unke Ustad Hazrat Abdullah Bin Masood Razi Allahu Anhu , Hazrat Umar Farooq Razi Allahu Anhu Jaise Azeem Sahaba Ikraam Hain. 
Allah Ta’la Ne Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ko Taqwa O Taharat, Zakawat O Zahanat Ke Sath Quran O Ahaadis E Mubaraka Ka Aisa Zabardast Ilm Ata Farmaya Ke Bade Bade Muhaddiseen Ap Ki Azmat O Ilmi Shaan Ka Aaiteraaf Karte Nazar Aate Hain. Imam Bukhari O Muslim Aur Sainkdo Muhaddiseen Ke Ustaad Yahya Bin Qattan Rah. Farmate Hain Ke:”Hum Khuda Ke Samne Jhoot Nahi Bol Sakte, Waqai Baat Ye Hai Ke Abu Haneefa Rah. Se Behter Fiqh Humne Kisi Ki Nahi Suni Isliye Unke Aksar Aqwaal Humne Ikhtiyar Kiye Han.[Manaqib Zahbi 19]”.
Imam Bukhari Ke Azeem Ustaad Makki Bin Ibrahim Rah. Farmate Hain Ke:”Imam Abu Haneefa Apne Zamane Ke Sab Se Bade Aalim The.”[Manaib Zahbi 19]
Imam Ahlul Hadees Hazrat Wakee’, Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ke Qaul Ke Mutabiq Fatwa Dete The, Abu Haneefa Rah. Ki Tamam Hadeesen Wakee’ Rah. Ko Yaad Thi Aur Unho Ne Imam Sahib Se Bhot Saari Hadeesen Suni Thi.[Jame Bayanul Ilm 2/183]
Ilm E Hadees Ke Sutoon Yahya Bin Moin Rah. Farmate Hain:” Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Hadees Aur Fiqh Me Qabil Bharosa Aur Sache The, Allah Ta’la Ke Deen Ke Bare Me Qaabil E Aetemad The.”[Khairaatul Hisaan: 350 ]
Imamul Muhaddiseen Hazrat Abdullah Bin Mubarak Rah. Farmate The:
“Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Haafiz, Fiqh, Ilm E Hadees, Parhezgari Aur Taqwa Me Sab Se Aage The”[Manaqib Imam Azam 1/229]
Ye Naqabile Inkaar Haqeeqat Hai Ke Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ne Kayee Kitaben Tehreer Farmayi Jin Se Bade Bade Muhaddiseen O Ulama Bhot Lambe Zamane Tak Istefada Karte Rahe.[Tafseel Ke Liye Dekhye Aimma Arba Safha 86].
Masael Ko Hal Karne Me Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ka Tareekha Ye Tha Ke Ap Rah. Ke Samne Jab Koi Masla Pesh Hota To Ap Rah. Sab Se Pehle Kitabullah Me Uska Hukum Talash Farmaate , 
Agar Usme Na Mila To Ahaadis E Rasool Me Nazar Karte, Agar Ahaadis Me Bhi Na Mila To Sahaba Ikraam Razi Allahuanhum Ke Aqwaal O Fatwon Ko Dekhte Aur Usi Ke Mutabiq Jawab Dete Agar Sahaba Ke Darmyiaan Ikhtelaf Ho To Abdullah Bin Masood Ke Qaul Ko Ziyada Pasand Farmate The[Rehmatullahil Wassiaa : Duwwam] Agar Sahaba Ke Aqwaal Me Bhi Jawabna Milta To Phir Quran Hadees Ki Raushni Me Qiyas Farmaate The[Aimma Arba 54] 
Ap Rah. Farmaya Karte The Ke Agar Mera Koi Qaul Quran , Hadees E Rasool Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ya Sahabi Razi Allahu Anhu Ke Qaul Ke Khilaf Nazar Aaye To Meri Baat Ko Chordo.[Aqdul Jeed 53].
(Alhamdulillah Ulama E Ahnaf Ap Rah. Ki Is Naseehat Par Poora Amal Kar Rahe Hain, Agar Kisi Masle Me Saheeh Hadees Na Milti Sirf Zaeef Hadees Hi Hoti To Ap Rah. Qiyas Se Kaam Lene Ke Bajaye Usi Zaeef Hadees Par Amal Farmate The Jiski Kayee Misaalen Ibne Qayyim Rah. Ne Apni Kitab Al Aa’iaamul Muwwaqi-Een Jild Awwal Me Naqal Farmai Hain. Kis Qadar Afsos Ki Baat Hai Ke Aaj Baaz Log Is Azeem Imam Aur Ummat Ke Be Misaal Faqeeh O Muhaddis Ko Badnaam Karne Ki Koshish Karte Hue Ap Rah. Ke Khilaf Jhoota Propaganda Kar Rahe Hain Ke Ap Rah. Ko Sirf 17 Hadeesen Yaad Thi Ya Ap Quran Ohadees Ko Chorkar Qiyaas Se Masael Batate The (Naoozu Billah)
        Imam E Azam Ke 2 Azeem Shagird , Muhaddis O Faqeeh Imam Abu Yousuf Rah. Aur Imam Muhammad Rah. Ne Ap Rah. Ki Fiqh Ko Kayee Kitabon Me Jama Farma Diya , Fiqh Hanafi Ka Madaar Inhi Mustanad O Motabar Kitabon Par Hai. Isse Ye Maloom Hua Ke Jin Motasib Ya Kam Ilm Afraad Ne Ye Baat Likhi Hai Ke Fiqh Hanafi Ki Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. 
Tak Koi Sanad Nahi Hai Wo Ya To Jahalat Ka Shikaar Hain Ya Jaan Boojh Kar Awaam Ko Dhoka De Rah.E Hain. Sadiyon Se Ummat E Muslima Ki Aksariyat Isi Fiqh Ke Mutabiq Amal Karti Arah.I Hain Aur Aj Bhi Aksar Mulkon Me Ahle Islam Ki Sab Se Ziada Tadad Fiqh Hanafi Par Amal Paira Hai.



Imam Malik Rah.: 

Hazrat Imam Malik Rah. Muqaddas Tareen Shahar , Markaz E Islaam Madina Munawwara Ke Rehna Wale Aur Apne/ Daur Me Muhaddiseen Ke Imam The. 96 Hijri Me Ap Rah. Ki Wiladat E Ba Sa’adat Hui . Muwtta Malik, Aprah. Ki Riwayaat Ka Motabar Tareen Majmua Hai Jis Me Jagah Jagah Apke Maslak Ko Bhi Wazeh Kiya Gaya Hai. 

Ap Rah. Ki Buzrugi Aur Ilmi Maqaam Ka Ye Alam Tha Ke Hukoomat E Waqt Ki Taraf Se Ye Aelan Kardiya Gaya Tha Ke Musalmano Ko Imam Malik Rah. Aur Ibne Abi Zi’b Rah. Ke Ilawa Koi Teesra Shaqs Fatwa Na De, Imam Malik Rah. Khud Farmate Hain Ke Jab Tak 70 Ulama E   Waqt Ne Shahadat Na Dedi Ke Mai Fatwa Se Salta Hun Us Waqt Tak Maine Fatwa Nahi Diya.
[Tazkiratul Huffaz Bahawala Aimma Arba 109,117]


Fatwa Dete Waqt Ap Sab Se Pehle Kitabullah Ki Dekhte Uske Baad Hadees E Rasool Me Ghaur O Fikr Farmate, Hazrat Umar , Ibne Umar Razi Allahu Anhuma, 
Madina Ke Sahaba Ikram Ke Fatwe Aur Ahle Madina Ka Amal Ap Rah. Ke Nazdeek Behad Ahmiyat Ka Hamil Aur Hujjat O Daleel E Sharii Ki Haisiyat Rakhta Tha, Aur Ap Rah. Quran O Hadees Ke Baad Inhi Ke Mutabiq Fatwa Dete The, Agar Kisi Masle Ka Jawab Kitab O Sunnat Aur Mazkoora Cheezo Me Na Milta To Ijtehad Kar Ke Qiyas Se Jawab Diya Karte The.
[Zameema Ilm Usool E Fiqh 46]


Hazrat Imam Malik Rah. Masjid E Nabawi Me Roza E Jannat Me Dars E Hadees Kiya Karte The. Ap Rah. Ke Dars Me Misr, Maraqash , Spain, Iraq ,   Yemen , Aur Sham Waghaira Door Daraz Ilaaqo Se Talib E Ilm Aakar Shareek Hote, Unhin Shagirdo Ke Zariye Apka Mazhab Un Mulko Tak Pohancha. Maraqash Ke Mawali Misr Aur Africa Ke Musalman Aj Kal Maliki Mazhab Ke Muqallid Aur Pairo Kaar Hain.



Imam Shafa’ii Rah

.: Imam Muhammad Bin Idrees Shafa’ii Rah. Makktul Mukarrama Ke Bashinde , Azeem Tareen Muhaddis O Faqeeh Aur Ummat Ke Qabil E Ehtram Muqtada The. Apka Talluq Quraish Khandan Se Tha , Ap Rah. Ke Dada Shafa’e Sighaar E Sahaba Me Shumar Kiye Jate Hain. Imam Shfa’ii Rah. Ko Allah Ta’ala Bachpan Hi Se Zahanat O Zalawat , Fahem O Faqahat Aur Sa’aadat O Sharafat Se Nawaza Tha. Ap Rah. Ne Sirf 7 Saal Ki Umar Me Quran Paak Is Tarah. 


Yaad Kar Liya Tha Ke Uran Majeed Ke Tamam Maani O Tafasir Ap Rah. Par Wazeh Hogaye The Aur Sirf 10 Saal Ki Umar Me 10 Dino Me Pooro Muwatta Zabaani Yaad Karli Thi. Apne Daur Ke Mashhoor Ulama Ke Ilawa Ap Rah. Ne Madina Munawwara Me Imam Malik Se Ilm E Hadees Hasil Kiya Is Ke Baad Baghdad Jakar Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ke Shagird E Khaas Imam Muhammad Bin Hasan Rah. Se Ilm E Fiqh Ki Takmeel Farmayi. Ap Rah. In Dono Imamo Ke Bhot Ziada Ahsan Mand The Aur In Dono Ki Behad Tareef Farmate The.(Aimma Arba S 148) 
Quran O Hadees Ke Sath Arabi Zaban Ke Shaer O Adab Aur Arab Ke Waqiaat Me Bji Ap Rah. Ko Kamaal Hasil Tha. Ap Rah. Ke Ustaad Mihtaram Muhammad Bin Hasan Rah. Kisi Aalim Ki Itni Tazeem Nahi Farmate The Jitni Imam Shafai Rah. Ki Karte The. Ap Rah. Ke Shagird E Rasheed Imam Ahmed Bin Hambal Rah. Farmate The: Imam Shafai Rah. Logon Me Sab Se Ziada Quran O Hadees Ke Ma’aani Ko Janne Wale Hai.(Albidaya Wan Nihaya) 
Ap Rah. Rozana Raat Me Ek Quran Padhte The Aur Ramazanul Mubarak Me Rozana Din Raat Me 2 Quran Khatm Karte The.(Aimma Arba 175) 
Ap Rah. Ke Maslak Ki Bunyad Quran, Hadees,Ijma E Ummat Aur Qiyas Par Hai(Aimma Arba 162) Fiqh Hanafi Ke Baad Ahle Sunnat Musalmano Ki Aksaryat Isi Fiqh Ki Paband Hai.[Siyar E Sahaba 9/303]



Imam Ahmed Rah.: 
Hazrat Imam Ahmed Bin Hambal Rah. Wo Chauthe Imam Hain Jinko Poori Ummat “Imam Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamat” Ke Laqab Se Yaad Karti Hai Aur Sadyon Se Ummat Ka Ek Bada Tabqa Ap Rah. Ki Taqleed Karta Aarah.A Hai. Bachpan Hi Me Ap Rah. Ki Sharafat , Nek Nafsi Aur Buzrugi Ki Shohrat Ho Chuki Thi Aur Bade Bade Log Bhi Ap Rah. Ki Husn E Seerat Aur Aala Akhlaaq Par Tajjub Karte The.(Aimma Arba 188) 

16 Saal Ki Umar Me Ap Rah. Ne Hadees Shareef Ki Taleem Shuru Farmai. Ilme Hadees Me Ap Rah. Ke Sab Se Pehle Ustaad Imam Abu Haneefa Rah. Ke Sab Se Bade Shagerd , Azeem Muhaddis O Faqeeh Imam Abu Yusuf Rah. Hai.(Manaqib Imam Ahmed Li Ibne Joozi S 20 Bahawala Aimma Arba 190) 
Imam Ahmed Hadees Me Imam E Waqt The, Bade Zahid O Aabid The , Aamdani Ki Tangi Ke Bawajood Saqii The(Tareekhg Dawat O Azeemat 1/196) Ap Rah. Ne Ek Martaba Raat Ki Nafil Namazo Me Ek Quran Khatm Farmaya. Abu Dawood Rah. Farmate Hai: 
Imam Ahmed Rah. Ki Majlisen Akhirat Ke Yaad Ki Majlisen Hoti Thi Apki Majlis Me Kabhi Dunya Ka Tazkira Nahi Hota Tha.(Al Bidayah 10/779) 
Imam Ahmed Rah. Ke Asaateza Bhi Unki Bhot Tazeem Karte Aur Unke Taqwe Ki Tareef Karte The. Ap Rah. Ke Bhot Mehboob Ustaad Imam Shafai Rah. Farmaya Karte The Ke: Mai Baghdad Se Is Haal Me Nikla Hun Ke Wahan Ahmed Bin Hambal Se Bada Na Koi Muttaqi Hai Na Koi Faqeeh.(Tareekh E Dawat O Azeemat 1/189) 
Imam Ahmed Bin Hambal Rah. Ke Samne Jab Koi Naya Masla Pesh Hota To To Ap Rah. Sab Se Pehle Kitab O Sunnat Ki Taraf Mutawajjah Hote, Agar Koi Masla Quran O Hadees Me Na Milta To Sahaba Ikram Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Ijmai Qaul Ke Mutabiq Fatwa Dete Aur Sahaba Ikram Ke Qaul Ke Khilaf Kisi Ki Rai Ko Khatir Me Na Late, Agar Sahaba Ke Darmyan Is Masle Me Ikhtelaf Hota To Jis Sahabi Ka Qaul Quran O Hadees Ke Qareeb Hota Usko Ikhtyar Farmate Aur Sahaba Ikram Ko Chord Kar Apni Ya Kisi Aur Ki Raye Se Kuch Na Kehte, Agar Sahaba Ikram Ka Qaul Bhi Na Milta To Zaeef Hadees Par Amal Farmate Phir Kisi Masle Me Zaeef Hadees Bhi Na Hoti To Ap Rah. Qiyas Se Masla Ka Hukum Bayan Farmate The.(Aalamul Muwaqqi-een 1/25) 
Imam Ahmed Rah. Ye Bhi Farmaya Karte The Ke Jab Bhi Mujh Se Koi Aisa Masla Daryaft Kiya Gaya Jisme Mujhe Koi Hadees Na Mili To Maine Imam Shafai Rah. Ke Qaul Ke Mutabiq Fatwa Dedya(Siyarus Sahaba 9/327)
        Peeran E Peer Shaikh Abdul Qadar Jeelani Rah. , Allama Jauzi, Allama Zahbi Rah. Jaise Azeem Tareen Ulama Aur Muhaddiseen E Waqt Apki Taqleed Ko Apne Liye Raah E Najaat Tasawwur Karte The. Maujooda Saudi Hukumat Ke Rooh E Rawan , Shaikhul Islam Muhammad Bin Abdul Wahab Rah. Bhi Imam Ahmed Rah. Ke Muqallid The. 
Ahle Hadees(Ghair Muqallid) Aalim Ismail Salafi Sahib Gujranwali Likhte Hain Ke Najd Ke Ek Mashoor Alim Ka Naam Muhammad Bin Abdul Wahab Tha Unho Ne Najd Aur Qurb O Jawar Ke Ilaqo Me Waaz O Naseehat Ke Zarye Islaah E Haal Ki Koshish Ki, Logon Ko Shirk , Qabar Parasti, Bid’aat Aur Ghalat Rusoom Se Roka… Darasal Wo Log Hambali Hain Aur Fiqh Me Imam Ahmed Ko Peshwa Mante Hain Jis Tarah. Hamare Mulk Me Aam Log Hanafi Hain Najd Me Aksar Log Hambali Kehlate Hain.(Fatawa 16). 
Mashoor Ghair Muqallid Aalim Maulana Ibrahim Siyaal Kothi Sahib Tehreer Farmate Hain: Shaikh Muhammad Bin Abdul Wahab Hambali Mazhab Ke Muqallid The, Chunanche Ye Baat Unke Apne Khutbe Se Zaahir Hai Jo Unho Ne Haram Mohtaram Me Har Chaar Mazhab Ke Naami(Mashoor) Ulama Ke Samne Bayan Kiya.[Tareekh E Ahle Hadees 143] --

Ahle Sunnat aur Ahle Hadees


Hamara Maslak : 
Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamaat Hamari Dawat : Itteba Kitab Wa Sunnat Bar Tariqa e Aslaaf E Ummat. Hamara Nara : Ittehaad Ummat. Hamari Koshish : Ahya e Tauhid Wa Sunnat Aur Khatma Shirk Wa Bidat. Hamara Maqsad : Isha-at Maarofaat Waazaala-E-Munkiraat. Minjaanib : Majlis Tahaffuz Sunnat Wa Difa E Sahaba Radiallah Tal'a Anhum Andhra Pradesh.

Note :

 Is Istehaar Ka Mukammal Ihtaram Farmaye Niche Girne Se Aur Kisi Bhi Beahterami Se Bachaye. Is Me Ayat Quraaniya Aur Ahadees Mubaraka Tehreer Hai Isko Padhye Aur Chap Kar Dusro Tak Puhucha Kar Sawab Daarain Hasil Kijiye.
Mohtaram Bradaran E Islaam ! Hum Sab Ka Aqeedah Hai Ke Farmaan E Rasool Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Raushni Me Najaat Wali Aur Jannat Me Jane Wali Jamat Sirf “Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamaat” Hai.
       Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamaat Wo Log Hain Jo Quran O Hadees Aur Sahaba Ikram Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Tareeqe Ki Itteba Karte Hain , Kitab O Sunnat Aur Sahaba Ikaram Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Khilaf Deen Me Koi Nayee Baat Paida Nahi Karte, Shirk O Bid’aat Se Bhot Bachte Hain, Sahaba O Tabaeen , Salfe Saaliheen Se Muhabbat Rakhte Hain Unki Shaan Me Gustakhi O Be Adbi Nahi Karte , 

Quran O Hadees Ke Silsile Me Baghair Ilm Ke Koi Baat Zaban Se Nahi Nikalte, Shari’at Me Apni Taraf Se Koi Baat Nahi Kehte, Quran O Hadees Aur Ijma E Ummat Se Jo Aqaid O Amaal Sabit Hain Unko Baghair Shak O Shubah Ke Tasleem Karte Hain. Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamaat Hi Deen E Islaam Ke Tarjumaan O Alam Bardaar Hain Aur Unhi Ki Koshishon Se Saari Dunya Me Islam Phaila Hai.
       Isi Tarah Ahle Hadees Un Ulama E Ikram Aur Muhaddiseen Rahimahumullah Ko Kaha Jata Hai Jin Ka Sab Se Mehboob Aur Umar Bhar Ka Mashghala Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Mubarak Hadeeson Ko Suna Yaad Karna Logon Ke Samne Bayan Karna Aur Un Se Masael Ko Nikalna Hai . Isi Tarah Jo Log Ilm E Hadees Ko Hasil Karne Ke Liye Mehnat O Mujaheda Karte Hain, Fanne Hadees Me Maharat O Kamal Hasil Kar Lete Hain Aur Hadees Shareef Ki Khidmat Me Usko Padhne Padhane Me Mashghool Rehte Hain Aise Ulama E Ikram Ko “Ahle Hadees” Kaha Jata Hai(Tafseel Ke Liye Dekhen Sharf Ashaabul Hadees , Ahle Hadees Chand Haqaiq) 

Allama Ibrahim Yamani (Rah) Likhte Hain: Ahle Hadees Un Logon Ka Naam Hai Jinho Ne Ilm E Hadees Ki Taraf Poori Tawajjoh Ki, Isko Hasil Karene Ke Liye Dunya Se Yaksoo Hogaye… Yahi Log Ahle Hadees Hain Chahe Wo Kisi Bhi Maslak Ke Hon(Ar Rauzul Baasim 1/122) Ghair Muqallid Aalim Abdullah Damanwi Sahib Likhte Hain : Muhaddiseen Ki Jamat Ko Ahle Hadees Kaha Jata Hai Jis Tarah Mufassireen Ki Jamat Ko Ahlut Tafseer Kaha Jata Hai Aur Muarrikheen Ki Jamat Ko Ahlut Tareekh Kaha Jata Hai(Al Firqatul Jadeedah 9).
Isse Ye Baat Saaf Taur Par Maloom Hui Ke “Ahle Hadees” Ulama Ki Ek Jamaat E Khaas Ka Naam Hai Jo Ilm E Hadees Ke Husool Aur Uski Taleem Me Mashghool Rehti Hai. Kisi Makhsoos Firqe Ya Maslak Walon Ka Naam Nahi Hai. Inke Koi Imtiyazi Masael Nahi Hote Hain. Ahle Hadees Ko Ashaabul Hadees Aur Muhaddiseen Bhi Kaha Jata Hai. Ahle Hadees Jamaat Me Bhot Saare Muhaddiseen Mujtahid The Jaise : 
Imam Abu Haneefa, Imam Malik, Imam Shafa’ii, Imam Ahmed Rahimahumullah Waghaira, Aur Beshumaar Ahle Hadees Ulama In 4 Imamo Me Se Kisi Ek Ke Muqallid The. Jaise : Allama Nawawi Shafa’ii (Rah) Allama Zail’ii Hanafi (Rah) Ibne Abdul Barr Maliki (Rah) Allama Ibne Jauzi Hambali (Rah) Allama Aini Hanafi (Rah) Allama Ibne Hajar Shafa’ii (Rah) Shaikh Abdul Qadar Jeelani Hambali (Rah) Allama Qurtubi Hambali (Rah) Allama Ibne Kaseer Shafa’ii (Rah) Allama Shah Wali Ullah Muhaddis Dehlawi Hanafi (Rah) Baaz Kitabon Me Imam Malik (Rah) Imam Shafa’ii (Rah) Aur Imam Ahmed Rah Ko Mazhab Ahle Hadees Ka Imam Kaha Gaya Hai Aur Isi Munasibat Se Unki Taqleed Karne Walon Ko Bhi Ahle Hadees Kaha Gaya Hai (Rahmatullahul Waasi’aa) Algharz Kitabon Me Jahan Bhi “Ahle Hadees’ Ka Lafz Aya Hai Use Ya To Mujtahideen Aur Muhaddiseen Muraad Hain Ya Muqallideen ( Shafa’ii, Hambali) Inke alawa Koi Chautha Shakhs Hargiz Muraad Nahi Hai.
       Magar Hindustan Me Angrezon Ki Hukumat Ke Zamane Me Yahoodiyon Aur Isaaiyon Ki Khatarnaak Saazishon Ki Wajeh Se Musalmano Me Bhot Saare Firqe Paida Hue, Jiske Natije Me Musalma Ek Nabi Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ki Ummat Hone Ke Bawajood Aapas Me Ek Doosre Ke Dushman Ban Gaye, Hatta Ke Unki Masaajid Bhi Alag Alag Hogayeen, 

Un Naye Firqon Me Se Ek Firqa Maujooda Ghair Muqallideen Ka Bhi Hai Jo Apne Apko Ahle Hadees Kehta Hai. Inka Dawa Ye Hai Ke Wo Quran Aur Sirf Saheeh Hadeeson Ke Alawa Kisi Teesri Cheez Ko Hatta Ke Zaeef Hadeeson Ko Bhi Nahi Maante, Kisi Imam Ki Taqleed Ko Kufr O Shirk Qarar Dete Hain, Quran O Hadees Ke Maahir Ulam Se Masael Poochne Ke Bajaye Khud Tehqeeq Karne Aur Quran O Hadees Ko Khud Se Samajhne Ki Dawat Dete Hain, Baghair Ilm Ke Bahes O Mubahese Karte Hain Waghaira, In Ghair Muqallideen Ka Khayal Ye Hai Wo Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ke Zamane Se Hain. 
Ye Log Kitabon Me Jahan Kahin Bhi Ahle Hadees Ka Lafz Dekhte Hain To Fauran Us Par Qabza Karlete Hain Aur Is Khush Fehmi Aur Nadani Me Mubtala Hojate Hain Aur Kam Ilm Musalmano Ko Bhi Yahi Samjhate Hain Ke Is Lafz Se Unki Naye Makhsoos Jamat Hi Muraad Hai. Lekin In Seedhe Saadhe Dosto Ka Ye Khayal Ilmi, Amali Aur Tareekhi Har Aetebar Se Haqeeqat Ke Khilaf Hai. Kyun Ke Islami Tareekh Ki Motabar Kitabon Me Beshumar Jaghon Par Hanafi, Shafa’ii, Maaliki, Hambali Ulama Ko Ahle Hadees Aur Imam Ahle Hadees Ke Naam Se Yaad Kiya Gaya Hai. 
Lekin Kisi Bhi Kitab Ke Andar Kisi Bhi Zamane Me Na Ahliyat Ke Sath Khud Se Quran O Hadees Ko Samajhne Aur Jahalat O Kam Ilmi Ke Bawajood Shar’iat Ke Kisi Maahir Imam Ki Taqleed Na Karne Wale Ghair Muqallid Shakhs Ki Ahle Hadees Nahi Kaha Gaya. Angrez Ke Daur Se Pehle Rooye Zameen Par Maujoodah Zamane Ke Is Naye Ahle Hadees Maslak Ka Na Koi Madarsa Milta Hai Na Koi Masjid, Na Inki Koi Kitab Nazar Aati Hai Na Kisi Kitab Me In Ka Koi Tazkira Aya Hai. 
Tareekh Me Tabqaat E Hanafiya, Tabqaat E Shafai’yya, Tabqaat E Maalikiya , Tabqaat E Hanabela Ke Naam Se Kitaben Milti Hain. Lekin Tabqaat E Ahle Hadees Ya Tabqaat E Salafiyaa Ke Naam Se Koi Kitab Nahi Milti. Chauthi Sadi Se Pehle Aur Baad Ke Beshumaar Muhaddiseen Ke Namao Ke Sath Hanafi, Shafa’ii, Maliki Aur Hambali Ke Alfaaz Likhe Hue Hain Lekin Kisi Muhaddis Ya Mufassir Ke Naam Ke Sath Ghair Muqallid, Muhammadi, Salafi Ya Asari Likha Hua Nahi Hai. Ghair Muqallideen Ko Aam Log Ibteda Me Wahabi Kehte The Aur Ghair Muqallid Hazraat Apne Apko Muhammadi Kehte The, 
Phir Nawab Siddiq Hasan Khan Sahib Waghaira Ulama E Ghair Muqallideen Ne Mil Kar Angrezo Se Darkhast Kar Ke Apni Jamat Ke Liye “Ahle Hadees” Ka Naam Registered Karwaliya Us Waqt Se Ye Hazraat Apne Apko “Ahle Hadees ” Kehne Lagey(Mazeed Malomaat Ke Liye Dekhye Al Kalaamul Mufeed Fii Isbaatit Taqleed, Firqe Ahle Hadees Pak O Hind Ka Tehqeeqi Jayeza, Ta’aruf Ulama E Ahle Hadees) 
Maujooda Jamat Ahle Hadees Ki Tareekh Ka Agar Jayeza Liya Jaye To Maloom Hota Hai Ke Is Jamaat Ne Kam Ilm Muqallideen Khusoosan Hanafiyon Ko Ghair Muqallid Banane Ke Alawa Barre Sagheer(Hind O Pak) Ke Musalmano Ke Haq Me Aj Tak Ki Tareekh Me Kahin Bhi Koi Khaas Faida Aur Khair Ka Kaam Anjaam Nahi Diya, Is Jamat Ne Apne Aaghaz Hi Se hi Dushmann e Islaam ki Saazisho ka Shikaar Hokar Ummat E Muslimah Ki Aksariyat Ahnaaf Aur Fiqh E Hanafi Ko Apna Mukhaalif Bana Liya. Imam Azam Abu Haneefa (Rah) Aur 1200 Saal Se Jaari Musalmano Me Maqbool O Motabar Fiqh Hanafi Ko Jhoote Propaganda Ke Zarye Badnaam Karna Aur Ahnaaf Ko Fiqh Hanafi Se Hata Kar Ghair Muqallid Banana Hi Is Jamat Ka Asal Maqsad , Waqt Ka Sab Se Bada Jihaad, Mehboob Mashghala Aur Azeem Mission Hai. 
Maujooda Ahle Hadees Ahbaab Ne Shuru Hi Se Hanafiyo Par Jhoota Ilzam Lagaya Hai Ke Hanafi Log Quran O Hadees Ko Chord Kar Imam Abu Haneefa (Rah) Ki Har Har Baat Me Taqleed Karte Hain, Lekin Baar Baar Mutalabe Ke Bawajood Woh Log Ulama E Ahnaaf Ke Samne Aj Tak Fiqh Hanafi Ka Ek Bhi Masla Pesh Nahi Kar Sake Jo Quran Ya Saheeh Sareeh Marfoo’ Ghair Mu’ariz Hadees Ke Khilaaf Ho Aur Hanafi Maslak Me Us Par Fatwa Diya Gaya Ho.
Taqleed Ke Bare Me Ulama E Islam Aur Muhaddiseen E Ikram Ke Sunheri Aqwaal

1. Shaarih E Muslim, Muhaddis E Kabeer Allama Nawawi Shafa’ii (Rah) Farmate Hain: Quran O Hadees Ke Maahir Ulama Ne 4 Imamo Me Se Ek Hi Imam Ki Taqleed Ko Ummat Par Wajib Farmaya Hai Aur Imamula Harmain (Rah) Ne Charo Imamo Ki Taqleed Ke Wajib Hone Par Tamam Ulama Ka Ijma O Ittefaq Naqal Farmaya Hai(Rauzatut Taalibeen) Doosri Kitab Me Likhte Hain Har Shakhs Par Laazim Hai Ke Wo Koi Ek Maslak Chun Le Aur Phir Usi Ki Taqleed Kare(Bahawaala Taqleed Ki Shar’ii Haisiyat:66)
2. Tasawwuf e Kitaab Madarijus e Saleheen ke Musannif Allama Ibne Qayyim Rah Likhte Hain: Hadees Padh Kar Masael Batana Sirf Us Shakhs Ke Liye Jayaz Hai Jis Ke Paas Qaabiliyat O Salahiyat Ho, Wo Usool O Qawaid Aur Arabi Zaban Se Achi Tarah Waaqif Ho, Agar Kisi Shakhs Ke Pas Ye Salahiat Na Ho To Us Par Wahi Kaam Farz Hai Jsika Allah Ta’laa Ne Hukum Diya Hai Ke “Ahle Ilm Se Poocho Agar Tum Na Jante Ho”(A’alaamul Muwaqqi-een4/180)
3. Imam Baghawi (Rah) Farmate Hain Ke Jis Shakhs Ke Andar (Ijtehaad Ki Pancho) Sharten Maujood Na Hon Us Par Kisi Mujtahid Ki Taqleed Wajib Hai (Aqdul Jeed ,p No: 7) Shah Wali Ullah (Rah) Ka Irshad Hai: Ummat Ke Qabil E Aetemad Afraad Ne In Charo Maslakon Ki Taqleed Ke Jayez Hone Par Ittefaq Kar Liya Hai Jo Aj Tak Bhi Qayem Hai Aru Isme Jo Faidey Hain Wo Zaahir Hain(Hujjatullahul Baaligha 1/154).
Doosri Jagah Likhte Hain : Sahaba Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Zamane Se Charo Maslakon Ke Zaahir Hone Tak Musalmano Ka Yahi Tareeqa Raha Ke Unko Jo Mujtahid Mil Jata Wo Us Mujtahid Ki Taqleed Karlete Is Par Kisi Bhi Qaabil E Aetemad Aalim Ne Aeteraz Nahi Kiya, Agar In Musalmano Ka Ye Amal(Taqleed) Ghalat Hota To Us Zamane Ke Ulama Is Par Zaroor Aeteraz Karte(Eqdul Jeed ,p No: 23) Mufassir E Kabeer, Mulla Jivan (Rah) Farmate Hain: Is Baat Par Poori Ummat Ka Ittefaq Hogaya Hai Ke Itteba Sirf 4 Imamo Ki Jayaz Hai(Tafseerat E Ahmadiya)
       Muhaddis Ibne Hajar Makki Shafa’ii (Rah)   Farmate Hain: Hamare Zamane Me Ulama E Deen Ka Yahi Fatwa Hai Ke 4 Imamo(Imam Shafai, Malik, Abu Haneefa Aur Ahmed Rahimahumullah) Hi Ki Taqleed Jayaz Hai Inke Alawa Kisi Aur Imam Ki Jayaz Nahi(Fathul Mubeen Fii Sharhul Arbaieen 1/196)

       Mashhoor Faqeeh O Muhaddis Allama Syed Tahawi Hanafi (Rah) Farmate Hain: Allah Ta’ala Ki Madad Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamat Ki Muwafiqat Karne Me Hai… Aur Ye Najaat Pane Wala Firqa(Ahle Sunnat Wal Jamat) Aj Chaar Maslakon Me Jama Hogaya Hai. Aur Wo Hanafi, Maaliki, Shafa’ii, Aur Hambali Hain(Tahtawi 4/153)

       Panchwi Sadi Ke Azeem Tareen Muhaddis O Faqeeh Allama Ibne Abdul Barr (Rah) Wazeh Aur Do Tok Alfaaz Me Likhte Hain:

       “(Imamo Ke) Wo Tamam Aqwaal(Jin Me Unho Ne Apne Shagirdon Ko Taqleed Se Mana Kiya Hai Aur Jin Ko Aaj Ghair Muqallideen Zor O Shor Se Pesh Kar Rahe Hai Wo Aqwaal) Mujtahideen Ulama Ke Liye Hain( Aur Awaam Ke Mutalliq) Ulama Ka Is Baare Me Koi Ikhtelaaf Nahi Hai Ke Aam Musalmano Par Ulama Ki Taqleed Laazim Hai Aur Aayt E Shareefa   " فَاسْأَلُوا أَهْلَ الذِّكْرِ" Se Ulama Hi Muraad Hain(Jaame’ Bayan Ul Ilm 2/140)
       Maahir Quraa O Hadees Allama Ibne Jauzi (Rah) Irshad Farmate Hain: Foro’ii(Jayaz O Na Jayaz , Halaal O Haraam Ke) Masael Chaunke Naye Naye Pasha Aate Rehte Hain Aur Awaam Par Unka Pehchanna Dushwaar Hota Hai Aur Dhoka Khaana(Ghalati me padhna) Qareeb Hai Isi Liye Un Masael Me Aam Musalman Ko(Jo Mujtahid Na Ho) Taqleed Karna Behter Hai….. Iblees Ne…. Baaz Logo Ko Ye Samjha Diya Hai Ke Taqleed Par Jame Rehna Bura Hai.(Talbees E Iblees Mutarjim 108)

       Mahshoor Muarrikh E Islam Allama Ibne Khaldoon (Rah) Apne Haqeeqat Afroz Mushahade Ko Bayan Karte Hue Wazeh Alfaaz Me Likhte Hain: Tama Mulkon Me Taqleed Inhi 4 Imamo Par Mehdood Hogai Aur Inke Ilawa Doosre Maslak Ki Taqleed Karne Wale Khatm Hogaye Aur Aj Ahle Islaam Inhi 4 Imamo Ki Taqleed Par Muttafiq Hain.(Muqaddama Ibne Khaldoon 414)

       Hazrat Shah Ishaq Muhaddis Dehlawi (Rah) Sawaal No: 161/162 Ke Jawab Me Farmate Hain Charo Maslakon Ke Darmyan Jo Ikhtelaaf Hai Wo Ikhtelaaf Ya To Sahaba Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Ikhtelaaf Ki Wajeh Se Tha Aur Sahaba Razi Allahu Anhum Ke Mutalliq Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Ka Irshad Hai: Mere Sahaba Sitaron Kitarah Hain Tum Jiski Bhi Pairwi Karoge Hidayat Paa Jaaoge… Ya Qiyas O Hujjat Ke Ikhtelaaf Se Waqai Hua Aur Qiyaas Nas Se Sabit Hai… Ya Wo Ikhtelaaf Hadees Ke Zaahiri Alfaaz Aur Istimbaat Ki Wajeh Se Hai. In Charo Maslako Ke Muqallid Ko Bid’ati Nahi Kaha Jayega Kyun Ke Charon Ki Taqleed Hadees Shareef Ke Zaahir O Baatin Ki Taqleed Hai Aur Hadees Ki Itteba Karne Wale Ko Bid’ati Kehna Gumrahi Aur Sabab E Azaab Hai(Khulaasa Miatu Masael 92-102)

       Hindustan Ke Mufti Abddur Raheem Raajpoori (Rah) Farmate Hain: Dunya Ke Har Kaam Me Taqleed Ki Zaroorat Padti Hai. Lekin Deen Ke Maamle Chand Hadees Ki Kitabon Ke Tarjume Dekh Kar Apne Ap Ko Uloom E Quran O Hadees Ka Maahir Samajhne Lagna Aur Aimma E Hudaa O Aslaaf E Ezaam Ke Sath Badgumaani Karna, Unki Shaan Me Bad Zubani Aur Gustakhi Karna Aur Unki Taqleed Ko Shirk O Bid’at Kehna Aur Apni Naaqis Fahem O Aqal Par aetemad Karna Aur Hawaye (Khahishaat) Nafsaani Ki Itteba Ko Ain Tauheed Samajhna Ye Kahan Ka Insaaf Hai… Agar Hamare Ghair Muqallideen Bhai , Hat Dharm Kath Hujjati Aur Zid Ko Chord Kar Diyanat Daari Aur Thande Dil Se Ghaur Karen To Koi Wajeh Nahi Ke Adme Taqleed Ke Aqeede Par Jame Rhain. (Fatawa Raheemiya 4/182)
 --

Aasaar e sahaba rdh. 
Sahaba ikraam rdh. Sharf e sobat nabawi sallallahu alaihi wasallam ki binaa par sab ke sab aadil,siqaa,khuda parast , raast baaz aur seerat wa kirdaar ki paakeezgi me alaa maqaam par faaiz aur aasmaan e rushd wa hidayat ke chamakte sitaare the.phir bhi tadbeer e quran aur fahem e hadees me sab yaksa nahi the balke is lehaaz se unke darjaat wa muraatib me tafaawut tha.chunaanche taabii e kabeer imam masrooq bayaan karte hai ke maine sahaba ikraam rdh se iktesaab faiz kiya toh maine dekha sabka ilm in 6 buzurgo tak lauta hai.hazrat umar farooq rdh , hazrat ali e murtuza rdh. , hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh , hazrat maaz bin jabal rdh , hazrat abu darda rdh , hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh phir un buzurgo se iktesaab e faiz par maloom huva ke in sab hazraat ka ilm hazrat ali rdh aur hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh par muntahi hojata hai.(tabqaat e ibn saad ,jild 2 ,safa 25 )
Aur ek dusre mashoor taabii imam shabi farmate hai ke hazrat sahaba me deeni ahkaam wa masail me faisla karne wale 6 hazraat the. 3 madine munawwara me jinke asmaa yeh hai hazrat umar rdh , hazrat ube bin kaab rdh , hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh aur 3 kufa me hazrat ali rdh , hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh aur hazrat abu musa ashari rdh.(mustadrik haakim , jild 3 , safa :465)
Sahaba rdh me baishtar wo hazraat hai jo qirat khalfal imaam ke qayal nahi the.is muqtasar tamheed ke baad hazraat sahaba rdh,tabien aur tabe tabien rh. Ke kuch aasaar wa aqwal pesh kiye jaarahe hai.
 
Aasaar e hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh.


1. Baseer bin jaabir riwayat karte hai ke hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ne namaaz padhi toh kuch logo ko imam ke saat qirat karte suna , jab namaz se farigh huve tih farmaya kya abhi waqt nahi aaya ke tum log fahem wa aqal se kaam lo , jab quran ki qirat ki jaye toh tum uski taraf dhiyaan do aur chup raho jaise ke allah tala ne hukum diya hai.(jareer ul tabrii:jild 6:safa 216 , tafseer ibn kaseer:jild 2:safa 268 , mansoor lil suyuti:jild 3:safa 635)
2. Abu wayl kehte hai ke ek shaks ne imam ke peeche qirat karne ke bare me hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh. Se pucha toh inhone ne farmaya qirat ke waqt khamosh raho kyunke imam namaz me qirat me mashghool hai aur tume imam ki qirat kaafi hai.(musannaf abdur razzak:jild 2:safa 138 , musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 376 , muwatta imam muhammed safa 96 , sunan e kubra:jild 2:safa 160 , majmua al zawaid:jild 2:safa 110)
3. Alqama bin qais bayaan karte hai hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the na jehri namazo me na siri namazo me aur na pehli rakaato me na akhri rakaato me(muwatta imam muhammed safa 96). 
4. Hazrat alqama rh. Hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh se riwayat karte hai ke inhone farmaya kaash ke imam ke peeche qirat karne waale ke muh me mitti bhari huvi ho.(tahawi:jild 1:safa 150 , musannaf abdur razzaq:jild 2:safa 138 , asaar al sunan:safa 89)
 
Aasaar abdullah bin omar rdh.


Imam malik rh. Ba-waaste naafe riwayat karte hai ke hazrat abdullah bin omar rdh se jab pucha jaata ke kya koi imam ke peeche qirat karsakta hai ? Toh aap rdh farmaate ke tum me se koi jab imam ke peeche namaz padhe toh use imam ki qirat kaafi hai aur jab tanha namaz aadaa kare toh khud kare aur naafe kehte hai ke hazrat abdullah bin omar rdh imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the.(muwatta imam malik:safa 58).
Imam muhammed ubaidullah bin umar bin hafs bin aasim bin umar bin khattab ke waaste naafe se naql karte hai ke naafe ne hazrat abdullah bin omar rdh se riwayat kiya hai ke inhone farmaya jo shaks imam ke peeche namaz aada kare use imam ki qirat kaafi hai.
Hazrat anas bin sireen se riwayat hai ke inhone hazrat abdullah bin umar se pucha kya imam ke peeche mai qirat karsakta hu ? Toh hazrat ibn umar rdh ne farmaya tum toh moote pait ke ho(yaani bewaquf ho) tume imam ki qirat kaafi hai.
Zayed bin aslim hazrat ibn umar rdh se riwayat karte hai ke ibn umar rdh imam ke peeche qirat karne se mana karte the.
Qaasim bin muhammed bayaan karte hai ke abdullah bin umar rdh imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the khawa imam buland awaaz se qirat kare ya aahista qirat kare.
Ubaidullah bin maqsim riwayat karte hai ke inhone abdullah bin omar , zayed bin saabit aur jabir bin abdullah rdh se (imam ke peeche qirat ke bare me pucha) toh teeno hazraat ne farmaya kisi bhi namaz me imam ke peeche qirat na ki jaye.
 
Asar e hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh.


Hazrat ataa bin yaseer kehte hai ke inhone hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh se imam ke saat qirat karne ke bare me pucha toh aap ne farmaya imam ke saat kisi namaz me qirat nahi hai.
Tashreh: nawaab siddiq hasan khan rh. Likhte hai " zayed bin saabit ne farmaya imam ke saat bilkul qirat nahi ki jayegi hazrat jabir bhi yahi kehte hai aur hazrat ali, hazrat abdullah bin masood aur bahut saare sahaba rizwanallaahi tala alaihi ajmain ka yahi qaul hai."kaseer mannal sahaba " ko ba-taur e khaas pesh e nazar rakha jaye.
hazrat zayed bin saabit ke poote hazrat musa bin saaed se riwayat hai ke unke dada hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh ne farmaya jisne imam ke peeche qirat ki uski namaz (kamil) nahi huvi.
Hazrat ataa bin yaseer hazrat zayed bin saabit rdh se riwayat karte hai ke aap ne farmaya imam ke peeche qirat nahi hai.
 
Asar e hazrat jabir bin abdullah rdh.


1.Hazrat abu nayeem bin kisaan riwayat karte hai ke inhone hazrat jabir bin abdullah rdh. Ko yeh farmaate huve suna ke jis namaz padhi aur isme surah fatiha nahi padhi toh goya is namaz usne namaz nahi padhi magar jab ke wo imam ke peeche ho( yaani jab imam ki iteqah me namaz aadaa karraha hai toh ab uspar qirat zaruri nahi hai.
2.ubaidullah bin muqsim hazrat jabir rdh se riwayat karte hai ke hazrat jabir rdh, ne farmaya imam ke peeche qirat na kijaye.
3.hazrat ubaidullah bin muqsim kehte hai ke maine hazrat jabir bin abdullah rdh. Se pucha kya zohar wa asar imam ke peeche aap kuch padhte hai ? Toh inhone ne farmaya nahi(isse maloom horaha hai ke siri namazo me bhi muqtadi qirat nahi karega),
 
Asar e abdullah bin abbas rdh.


Abu jurah bin imraan bayaan karte hai ke maine hazrat abdullah bin abbas rdh. Se kaha kya imam ke peeche qirat karsakta hu ? Toh hazrat abdullah bin abbas ne farmaya nahi.yeh riwayat bhi apne itlaaq se jehri wa siri sab namazo ko shaamil hogi.
 
Asar e hazrat abu darda rdh


Hazrat abu nijaad bayaan karte hai ke hazrat saad bin abi waqas rdh ne farmaya mera ji chahta hai ke jo imam ke peeche qirat kar raha hai uske muh me angaar ho.(kyunke wo kitaab ullah wa sunnat e rasoolullah ke khilaaf kalaam karraha hai wallaahu alam)
 
Asar e khulfa e rasheedin rdh.


Musa bin uqba se riwayat hai ke rasoolullah sallallahu alaihi wasallam , hazrat abu bakar rdh , hazrat umar rdh , hazrat usmaan e ghani rdh imam ke peeche qirat karne se mana karte the.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 2:safa 139)
 
Asar e umar bin khattab rdh.


1. Naafe aur anas bin seerin riwayat karte hai ke hazrat umar farooq rdh ne farmaya ke tujhe(muqtadi)imam ki qirat kaafi hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 376)
2. Muhammed bin ijlaan se marwi hai ke hazrat umar farooq rdh ne farmaya jo shaks imam ke peeche qirat karta hai kaash ke uske muh me pattar ho.(muwatta imam muhammed:safa 106)
3. qasim bin muhammed se marwi hai ke hazrat umar bin khattab rdh ne farmaya imam ke peeche qirat na ki jaye imam buland awaaz se qirat kare ya buland awaaz se na kare.
 
Asar e hazrat ali rdh


Abdullah bin abi laila se marwi hai ke hazrat ali rdh ne farmaya jisne imam ke peeche qirat ki usne fitrat khodi.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 376)
Asar e hazrat ali rdh wa hazrat umar rdh wa hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh.
Abdur razzak ba-waasta dawud bin qais , muhammed bin ijlaan se riwayat karte hai ke inhone kaha hazrat ali e murtuza rdh ne farmaya jisne imam ke saat qirat ki wo fitrat par nahi hai(isliye ke usne quran wa hadees ki muqalifat ki) abdur razzak ne(isi sanad se kaha) aur hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ne farmaya imam ke peeche qirat karne wale ke muhme matti bhardi jaye aur abdur razzak ne (yeh bhi) kaha ke hazrat umar farooq rdh ne farmaya jo shaks imam ke peeche qirat karta hai meri quwaish hai ke uske muh me pattar ho(taake wo qirat na karsake).(musannaf abdur razzak:jild 2:safa )
 
Asar hazrat ube bin kaab rdh


Abdullah bin abi hazeel se marwi hai ke hazrat ube bin kaab rdh zuhar wa asar yaani sari namazo me imam ke peeche qirat karte the.
Tashreh: imam ibn abdul bar likhte hai ke bataur e qaas zohar wa asar ka zikr is baat ki daleel hai ke hazrat ube rdh jehri namazo me imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the.(al tamiya:jild 11:safa 36)
Asar e ayesha siddiqa rdh wa hazrat abu hurairah rdh.
Abu saleh rh, se marwi hai ke hazrat abu hurairah rdh aur hazrat ayesha siddiqa rdh hukum dete the ke imam jehri qirat na kare toh uske peeche qirat ki jaye.(sunan e kubra:jild 2:safa 171).
Tashreh: is rivayat se maloom huva ke dono hazraat jehri namazo me imam ke peeche qirat ke qayal nahi the.imam behaqi ne in dono akbar sahaba ka yeh amal do sanado se zikr kiya hai.aur dono ki sanade jaiyad hai.
aap dekh rahe hai ke fuqaha e sahaba me se hazrat siddiq e akbar , hazrat farooq azam , hazrat usmaan e ghani , hazrat ali , hazrat abdullah bin masood , hazrat abdullah bin omar , hazrat abdullah bin abbas , hazrat jabir bin abdullah , hazrat saad bin abi waqas , hazrat zayed bin saabit ,hazrat ube bin kaab , hazrat abu darda rdh , hazrat abu hurairah aur hazrat ayesha siddiqa rizwaanallaahi tala alaihi ajmain yeh sab hazraat (ba-istaisnaa hazrat ayesha siddiqa , hazrat abu hurairah rdh hazrat ube bin kaab rdh) mutalliqan qirat khalfal imaam ke qayal nahi hai.balke imam shaibi rh. Toh bayaan karte hai ke maine 70 badri sahaba rizwanallaahi tala alaihim ajmain ko dekha hai ke wo imam ke peeche muqtadi ko qirat karne se mana karte the.(roohul maani:jild 2:safa 135)
Hafiz baddar uddin aaini aur alama ali qaari rh. Saraahat karte hai ke 80 sahaba se imam ke peeche qirat mumaaniyat ka sabut milta hai.(undatul qaari shara al bukhari:jild 3:safa 67 , shara niqaaya:jild 1:safa 83).
Ab zeel chand tabien aur tabe tabien ke aqwal wa asaar mulaahaiza kijiye , taake in buzurgo ka nuqte nazar bhi masla zaire bahez ke bare me saamne aajaye.
 
Asaar e tabien rahimaullah ajmain:


1.hazrat ibrahim nakii bayaan karte hai ke hazrat alqama bin qais ne imam ke peeche kabhi kisi namaz me qirat nahi ki na jehri namazo me aur na siri me (na pehli rakaato me) na pichli rakaato me na surah fatiha aur na koi aur surat.
2.abu ishaq riwayat karte hai ke hazrat alqama bin qais rh. Ne farmaya meri quwaish hai ke jo imam ke peeche qirat karta hai uska muh bhar diya jaye.abu ishaq kehte hai ke mera khiyaal hai ke aapne farmaya uska muh mitti se ya pattar se bhardiya jaye.(musannaf abdur razzak:jild 2:safa 139)
3.hazrat ibrahim nakii rh. Se marwi hai ke hazrat alqama bin qais rh. Ne farmaya mujhe daant se angaar ka kaantna zyada pasand hai isse ke mai imam ke peeche qirat karo.(muwatta imam muhammed)
Tashreh:yeh riwayate saaf batta rahi,hai ke hazrat alqama rh. Jo hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ke ahem tareen tilaaza me hai na sirf yeh ke qirat khalful imam ke qayal aur uspar aamil nahi the balke wo qirat khalful imam ko had e darje na pasand karte the.
 
Asar e hazrat umaro bin maimoon degar tilaaza e hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh.


1. Hazrat maalik bin amaar bayaan karte hai ke maine hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ke beshumaar tilaaza se( qirat khalful imam ke bare me) pucha toh sabne yahi jawaab diya ke imam ke peeche qirat nahi kijayegi unme umaro bin maimoon khaas taur par qaabil e zikr hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377)
2. Hazrat abu ishaq bayaan karte hai ke hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ke tilaaza imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the.
Tashreh:is mauqe par yeh baat bhi pesh e nazar rahe ke yeh " ashaab e abdullah" ilmi duniya me apne uloom wa maarif aur seerat wa kirdaar ke aitebaar se apni ek khaas pehchaan rakhte the.chunaanche hazrat ameer uk momineen ali e murtuza rdh. Jaise sahabi e rasool jab kufa tashreef laaye toh hazrat abdullah bin masood rdh ke un tilaaza ki ilmi wa amali sargarmiyo ko dekhkar farmaya "abdullah bin masood ke tilaaza is shar ke roshan e chiraagh hai".(tabqaat ibn saad:jild 6:safa 4).
Aur aap dekh rahe hai ke yeh roshan chiraagh kul ke kul imam ke peeche qirat nahi karte the.
 
Asar e hazrat aswad bin yazeed rh.


Hazrat ibrahim nakii rh, se marwi hai ke aswad bin yazeed rh. Ne farmaya mujhe daanto se angaare ka kaantna is baat se zyada pasand hai ke mai imam ke peeche qirat karo jabke mujhe maloom hai ke wo qirat karta hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 376)
Dabra bin abdur rahmaan aur ibrahim nakii dono hazrat aswad bin yazeed se rivayat karte hai ke inhone farmaya meri quwaish hai ke jo shaks imam ke peeche qirat karta hai uska muh mitti se bhar diya jaye,(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
 
Asar e hazrat saweed bin ghafla rh.


Hazrat waleed bin qais riwayat karte hai ke maine hazrat saweed bin ghafla rh. Se pucha gaya mai zohar wa asar me imam ke peeche qirat karsakta hu ? Toh farmaya nahi,
Tashreh:saael waleed bin qais ko degar jehri namazo ke bareme me maloom tha ke inme imam ke peeche qirat karni durust nahi hai albatta zohar wa asar jo siri namaze hai unke bare me taradud tha ke in namazo me muqtadi ki qirat ka kiya hukum hai isliye hazrat saweed se daryaaft kiya toh inhone ne masla saaf kardiya ke siri namazo me bhi muqtadi ko qirat nahi karni chahiye.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 2: safa 377).
 
Asar hazrat abu wayl shafeeq bin salma.


Hazrat umaro bin marra hazrat abu wayl shafeeq bin salma rh. Se riwayat karte hai ke aap ne farmaya tujhe imam ki qirat kaafi hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
 
Asar e saeed bin jubair rh.


Hazrat abu yasheer riwayat karte hai ke maine hazrat saeed bin jubair se imam ke peeche qirat ke bareme pucha ? Toh farmaya ke imam ke peeche bilkul qirat nahi hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
 
Asar e saeed bin museeb rh.


Qatada hazrat saeed bin museeb se riwayat karte hai ke saeed bin museeb ne farmaya imam ke peeche khamosh raho.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
 
Asar e hazrat urwa bin zubair rh,


Hishaam bin urwa apne waalid hazrat urwa bin zubair se riwayat karte hai ke wo imam ke peeche sirf un namazo me qirat karte the jinme imam buland awaaz se qirat nahi karta. (muwatta imam maalik: safa 29).
Tashreh: yeh asar jehri namazo me imam ke peeche qirat na karne ke bare me bilkul waajeh aur saaf hai.
 
Asar e hazrat ibrahim nakii rh.


Hazrat mughira bin muqsim hazrat ibrahim nakii rh se riwayat karte hai ke hazrat ibrahim imam ke peeche qirat na pasand karte the aur farmaate the ke tujhe imam ki qirat kaafi hai.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
Akeel hazrat ibrahim nakii se riwayat karte ke inhone ne farmaya jo imam ke peeche qirat karta hai wo muqalifaat karne wala hai yaani quran wa hadees ke hukum ki khilaaf warzi kar raha hai.
(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 1:safa 377).
 
Asar e hazrat saalim bin abdullah bin omar rdh bin khattab.


Imam zehri rh. Hazrat saalim bin abdullah se riwayat karte hai ke aapne farmaya imam jin namazo me jehri se qirat karta hai tujhe uski qirat kaafi hai. Yaani muqtadi ko qirat karne ki zarurat nahi.(musannaf ibn abi shaiba:jild 2:safa 139). --

Ghair Muqallideen Ke Aiteraazaat Ki Haqiqat
Aiteraaz 1
: Hafiz Zubair Ali Zai Ne Tafseer E Qurtubi Ke Hawale Se Yeh Aiteraaz Kiya Hai Ke Yeh “وَإِذَا قُرِئَ الْقُرْآَنُ فَاسْتَمِعُوا لَهُ وَأَنْصِتُوا لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ “Ayat E Karima Me Na Imam Ka Zikr Hai Aur Na Muqtadi Ka , Isi Tarah Is Me Surah Fatiha Ka Bhi Zikr Nahi Hai Balke Yeh Ayat Mushrikeen Ke Daur Me Nazil Huvi Hai.

(Fatiha Khalful Imam: Safa 9)
